Part V. Maha-Vagga.
Based on the edition by L. Feer, London : Pali Text Society 1898

These files are provided by courtesy of the Pali Text Society for
scholarly purposes only.
In principle they represent a digital edition (without revision or
correction) of the printed editions of the complete set of Pali
canonical texts published by the PTS. While they have been subject to a
process of checking, it should not be assumed that there is no
divergence from the printed editions and it is strongly recommended that
they are checked against the printed editions before quoting.

STRUCTURE OF REFERENCES (added):
SN_n.n(n),n.n = Saṃyutta-Nikāya_division.GLOBAL SN-book number(INTERNAL book number in THIS division of the SN),chapter.section

to facilitate word search.

Saṃyutta-Nikāya Vol. V

[page 001]
1
SAṂYUTTA-NIKĀYA.

DIVISION V. MAHĀVAGGO.
Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsaṃbuddhassa || ||.

BOOK I.
MAGGA-SAṂYUTTAM XLV.

CHAPTER I. AVIJJĀVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,45(1).1. (1) Avijjā.
1. Evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sāvatthiyaṃ
viharati Jetavane Anāthapindikassa ārāme || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi Bhikkhavo ti || ||
Bhadante ti te bhikkhū Bhagavato paccassosuṃ || ||
Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3. Avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammā-
nam samāpattiyā1 anudeva2 ahirikam anottappaṃ || || Avij-
jāgatassa bhikkhave aviddasuno micchādiṭṭhi pahoti || mic-
chādiṭṭhissa micchāsaṅkappo pahoti || micchāsaṅkappassa
micchāvācā pahoti || micchāvācassa micchākammanto pa-
hoti || micchākammantassa micchāājīvo pahoti || micchāājī-
vassa micchāvāyāmo pahoti || micchāvāyāmassa micchāsati
pahoti || micchāsatissa micchāsamādhi pahoti || ||
4. Vijjā ca kho bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṃ dham-
mānaṃ samāpattiyā3 anudeva hirottappaṃ || || Vijjāgatassa

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 sammā-
2 B1-2 anvadeva always.
3 B1-2 sammā-

[page 002]
2 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
bhikkhave viddasuno sammādiṭṭhi pahoti || sammādiṭṭhissa
sammāsaṅkāppo pa- || sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācā pahoti ||
sammāvācassa sammākammanto pahoti || sammākammantassa
sammāājīvo pahoti || sammāājīvassa sammāvāyāmo pahoti ||
sammāvāyāmassa sammāsati pahoti || sammāsatissa sam-
māsamādhi pahotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).2. (2) Upaḍḍham.
1. Evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sakyesu1
viharati Sakkaraṃ2 nāma Sakyānaṃ nigamo || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam an-
taṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando
Bhagavantam etad avoca || Upaḍḍham idam bhante brah-
macariyassa yad idaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyānasahāyatā
kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā ti || ||
3. Mā hevam Ānanda mā hevam Ānanda || || Sakalam eva
hidam Ānanda brahmacariyaṃ yad idaṃ kalyāṇamittatā
kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā || || Kalyāṇamittas-
setam Ānanda bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkham3 kalyāṇasahāyassa
kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhā-
vessati ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bahulīkarissati4 || ||
4. Kathañcānanda5 bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto kalyāṇasahāyo
kalyāṇasampavaṅko ariyam atthaṅgikam maggam bahulī-
karoti || || Idhānanda bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇā-
miṃ || sammāsaṅkappam bhāveti vivekanissitam || la || sammā-
vācam bhāveti || sammākammantam bhāveti || sammāājīvam
bhāveti || sammāvāyāmam bhāveti || sammāsatim bhāveti ||
sammāsamādhim bhāveti vivekanissitam virāganissitam ni-
rodhanissitam vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho Ānanda
bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto kalyaṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggam bhāveti ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam
maggam bahulīkaroti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 Sakkesu.
2 S1 nagarakaṃ S3 nagaraṃ.
3 S1-3 pāṭikaṃkhā always.
4 B1-2 -karissatī ti.
5 S1-3 kathaṃ ānanda.

[page 003]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 3
5. Tad aminā petam Ānanda pariyāyena veditabbaṃ ||
yathā sakalam evidam brahmacariyaṃ yad idam kalyāṇa-
mittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyānasampavaṅkatā1 || || Ma-
maṃ2 hi Ānanda kalyāṇamittam āgamma jātidhammā
sattā3 jātiyā parimuccanti || jarādhammā sattā jarāya pa-
rimuccanti || maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇena parimuccanti ||
sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammā4 sattā soka-
paridevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi parimuccanti || || Iminā
kho etam5 Ānanda pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sakalam
evidam brahmacariyaṃ yad idaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇa-
sahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).3. (3) Sāriputto.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ6 || ||
2. Atha7 kho āyasmā Sāriputto yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antam nisīdi || || Ekam antam nisinno kho āyasmā Sāri-
putto Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Sakalam evidam8 bhante
brahmacariyaṃ yad idam kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā
kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā ti || ||
3. Sādhu sādhu Sāriputta || sakalam evidam Sāriputta
brahmacariyaṃ yad idaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā
kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā ti || || Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ Sāriputta
bhikkhave pātikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampa-
vaṅkassa ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati ariyam
aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bahulīkarissati || ||
4. Kathañca Sāriputta bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto kalyāṇa-
sahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam
bhāveti ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bahulīkaroti || || Idha9
Sāriputta bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ
virāganissitam nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmim || la ||
sammāsamādhim bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 add ti.
2 S3 maṃmaṃ here only.
3 missing in S1.
4 S1 -dhamma.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 missing in S1-3.
7 B2 attha.
8 B1-2 idaṃ always.
9 S1-3 kathaṃ.

[page 004]
4 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho Sāri-
putta bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampa-
vaṅko ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti ariyam aṭ-
ṭhaṅgikam maggam bahulīkaroti1 || ||
5. Tad aminā petam Sāriputta pariyāyena veditabbaṃ ||
yathā sakalam evidam brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇa-
mittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā2 || || Mamaṃ
hi Sāriputta kalyānamittam āgamma jātidhammā sattā
jātiyā parimuccanti || jarādhammā sattā jarāya parimuc-
canti || maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇena parimuccanti || so-
kaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammā3 sattā sokapa-
ridevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi parimuccanti || || Iminā kho
etaṃ Sāriputta pariyāyena veditabbaṃ || yathā sakalam
evidam brahmacariyaṃ yad idaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇa-
sahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).4. (4) Brāhmaṇo.
1. Savatthi nidānaṃ4 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando pubbaṇhasmayam nivā-
setvā pattacīvaram ādāya Sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi5 || ||
3. Addasā kho āyasmā Ānando Jānusoṇiṃ6 brāhmaṇaṃ
sabbasetena vaḷavābhirathena7 Sāvatthiyā niyyāyantaṃ ||
setā sudam assā yuttā honti setālaṅkārā seto ratho seta-
parivāro setā8 rasmiyo setā patodalaṭṭhi9 setaṃ chattaṃ
setaṃ uṇhīsaṃ setāni vatthāni setā upāhanā || setāya10 su-
daṃ vālavījaniyā11 vījīyati12 || || Tam enaṃ jano disvā evam
āha || Brahmaṃ13 vata bho yānam14 brahmayānarūpaṃ15
vata hoti || ||
4. Atha kho āyasmā16 Ānando Sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya
caritvā17 pacchābhattam piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena Bhagavā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 bhāvessati . . . -karissati.
2 B1-2 add ti.
3 S1 -dhamma.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1 B1 pāvīsi S3 pāvisī.
6 S3 -soṇi.
7 S1 vaḷabhi- S3 valabhi- B1-2 -ratena.
8 S1-3 seta.
9 S1 omits laṭṭhi.
10 S3 setā.
11 S1-3 ratavījaṇi (S1 -ī).
12 S3 vījiyati B1-2 bījeyyāti.
13 S1-3 brahmā.
14 S3 yāṇam always.
15 S1-3 -yānaṃ rūpaṃ always.
16 missing in S1-3.
17 S1-3 pavisitvā.

[page 005]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 5
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā
ekam antaṃ nisīdi || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā
Ānando Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Idhāham bhante
pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaram ādāya Sāvatthim
piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ1 || addasaṃ khoham2 bhante Jānusoniṃ3
brāhmaṇaṃ sabbasetena vaḷavābhirathena Sāvatthiyā niy-
yāyantam || setā sudam assā yuttā honti4 setālaṅkarā seto
ratho setaparivāro setā rasmiyo setā patodalaṭṭhi setaṃ
chattaṃ setam uṇhīsaṃ setāni vatthāni setā upāhanā se-
tāya sudam5 vālavījaniyā vījiyyati6 || tam enaṃ jano disvā
evam āha || Brahmaṃ vata bho yānaṃ brahmayānarūpaṃ
vata hoti7 || sakkā nu kho bhante imasmim dhammavinaye
brahmayānam paññāpetun ti || ||
Sakkā Ānandāti Bhagavā avoca || || Imasseva kho etam
Ānanda ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanam
brahmayānaṃ iti pi dhammayānam iti pi anuttaro saṅ-
gāmavijayo iti pi8 || ||
5. Sammādiṭṭhi Ānanda bhāvitā bahulīkatā rāgavinaya-
pariyosānā9 hoti || dosavinayapariyosānā9 hoti || mohavinaya-
pariyosānā9 hoti || || Sammāsaṅkappo Ānanda bhāvito ba-
hulīkato rāgavinayapariyosāno hoti || dosavinayapariyosāno
hoti || mohavinayapariyosāno hoti || || Sammāvācā Ānanda
bhāvitā bahulīkatā rāgavinayapāriyosānā hoti || dosa || pa ||
mohavinayapariyosānā hoti || || Sammākammanto Ānanda
bhāvito bahulīkato rāgavinayapariyosāno hoti || dosa || pa ||
mohavinayapariyosāno hoti || || Sammāājīvo Ānanda bhā-
vito bahulīkato rāgavinayapariyosāno hoti || dosa || pa || mo-
havinayapariyosāno hoti || || Sammāvāyāmo Ānanda bhāvito
bahulīkato rāgavinayapariyosāno hoti || dosa || pa || mohavinaya-
pariyosāno hoti || || Sammāsati Ānanda bhavitā bahulīkatā
rāgavinayapariyosānā hoti || dosa || pa || mohavinayapariyo-
sānā10 hoti || Sammāsamādhi Ānando bhāvito bahulīkato

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 pāvīsi B2 pavisiṃ.
2 S1-3 addasa khvāhaṃ.
3 S1-3 Jānussoniṃ (S3 -ṇiṃ) always.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 so S1-3; B1-2 bījeyyāti.
7 S1-3 -yānaṃvatarūpo instead of -rūpam vata; hoti being omitted.
8 B1-2 add ti.
9 S1-3 naṃ.
10 B1 S3 -sāno (S3 -ṇo).

[page 006]
6 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
rāgavinayapariyosāno hoti || dosa || pa || mohavinayapariyo-
sāno hoti || ||
Iminā kho etam1 Ānanda pariyāyena veditabbaṃ || yathā
imassevetam2 ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivaca-
nam brahmayānam iti pi dhammayānam iti pi anuttaro
saṅgāmavijayo iti pīti || ||
Idam3 avoca Bhagavā || idaṃ vatvā4 sugato athāparam
etad avoca satthā || ||
Yassa saddhā ca paññā ca || dhammā yuttā sadā dhuraṃ ||
hirī īsā mano yottaṃ5 || sati ārakkasārathi ||1||
Ratho sīlaparikkhāro || jhānakkho cakkaviriyo ||
upekkhā dhurasamādhi || anicchā parivāraṇaṃ ||2||
Abyāpādo avihiṃsā6 || viveko yassa āvudhaṃ ||
titikkhā dhammasannāho7 || yogakkhemāya vattati ||3||
Etad attaniyam8 bhūtaṃ || brahmayānaṃ anuttaraṃ ||
niyyanti dhīrā lokamhā || aññadatthu9 jayaṃ10 jayanti11 ||4||

SN_5,45(1).5. (5) Kimattha.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkamiṃsu12 || la || ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū Bhagavantam
etad avocuṃ || || Idha no bhante aññatitthiyā paribbājakā
amhe evam pucchanti || Kimatthi yam āvuso samaṇe Go-
tame13 brahmacariyam vussatī ti || || Evam puṭṭhā mayam
bhante tesam aññatitthiyānam paribbājakānam evam vyā-
karoma || || Dukkhassa kho āvuso pariññattam14 Bhagavati
brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || kacci mayam bhante evam puṭ-
ṭhā evam vyākaramānā vuttavādino ceva Bhagavato homa
na ca Bhagavantam abhūtena abbhacikkhāma || dhammassa

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S3.
2 S3 imassa-
3 S1 etad.
4 B1 adds na, B2 ca.
5 S3 yottā S1 ghottā.
6 S1-3 vihiṃsā S3 adds ca.
7 S3 vamma- B2 camma-
8 S3 attha- B2 attanisam.
9 S1-3 -atthuṃ.
10 S1 jaya S3 jayā.
11 B2 jahanti.
12 S3 -saṃkami.
13 S3 samaṇo gotamo.
14 S1 pariññatthaṃ.

[page 007]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 7
cānudhammaṃ vyākaroma || na ca koci sahadhammiko vā-
dānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatīti1 || ||
4. Taggha tumhe bhikkhave evam puṭṭhā evam vyāka-
ramāṇā vuttavādino ceva me hotha || na ca mam abhūtena
abbhācikkhatha || dhammassa cānudhammaṃ vyākarotha ||
na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ2 ṭhānam
āgacchati || || Dukkhassa hi bhikkhave3 pariññattam4 mayi
brahmacariyaṃ vussati || || Sace vo5 bhikkhave aññatit-
thiyā paribbājakā evam puccheyyuṃ || || Atthi panāvuso
maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyāti || evam
puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam aññatitthiyānam paribbāja-
kānam evaṃ vyakareyyātha || Atthi kho āvuso maggo
atthi paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyāti || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa
dukkhassa pariññāya6 || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
maggo || seyyathīdam || sammādiṭṭhi || la || sammāsamādhi ||
ayam bhikkhave maggo ayam paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa
pariññāyāti || ||
6. Evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam aññatitthivā-
nam paribbājakānam evam vyākareyyāthāti || ||

SN_5,45(1).6. (6) Aññataro bhikkhu1.
1. Sāvatthi nidānaṃ7 || ||
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || pa ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Brahmacariyam brahmacariyanti bhante
vuccati || katamaṃ nu kho bhante brahmacariyam kata-
mam8 brahmacariyapariyosānan ti || ||
Ayam eva kho bhikkhu ariyo {aṭṭhaṅgiko} maggo brah-
macariyaṃ || seyyathīdaṃ || Sammādiṭṭhi || pa-pe || sammāsa-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 adhigacchatīti.
2 S3 gārayho (or gārayhe by correction).
3 missing in B1.
4 S1-3 pariññatthaṃ.
5 S1-3 kho.
6 B1-2 pariññāyāti.
7 S1-3 omit nidānam here and further on.
8 missing in S1-3.

[page 008]
8 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
mādhi || || Yo kho bhikkhu rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohak-
khayo ||idam brahmacariyapariyosānan ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).7. (7) Aññataro bhikkhu 2.
1. Sāvatthi nidānaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā ten'; upasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā || la ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo ti bhante
vuccati || kissa nu kho etam1 bhante adhivacanaṃ rāga-
vinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo ti2 || ||
Nibbānadhātuyā3 kho etam bhikkhu adhivacanam rāga-
vinayo dosavinayo mohavinayoti || āsavānaṃ khayo tena
vuccatī ti || ||
4. Evam vutte so bhikkhu Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
Amatam4 amatan ti bhante vuccati || || Katanaṃ nu kho
bhante amataṃ || katamo amatagāmimaggo ti || ||
Yo kho5 bhikkhu rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo ||
idaṃ vuccati amataṃ || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo6
amatagāmimaggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || pe || sammā-
samādhī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).8. (8) Vibhaṅgo.
1. Sāvatthi nidānam || ||
2. Ariyaṃ vo bhikkhave aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ desissāmi
vibhajissāmi || taṃ sunātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhā-
sissāmī ti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū Bhagavato paccassosuṃ ||
Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3. Katamo bhikkhave ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyya-
thīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || pe || sammāsamādhi || ||
4. Katamā7 ca bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhi || || Yaṃ kho
bhikkhave dukkhe ñāṇaṃ dukkhasamudaye ñāṇam duk-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ko instead of nu kho etam.
2 S1-3 omit ti.
3 S1-3 yāyā instead of nibbi-.
4 missing in S1.
5 S1-3 so.
6 omitted by S1-3.
7 S1-3 katamo.

[page 009]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 9
khanirodhe ñāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiyā1 paṭipadāya
ñaṇaṃ || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhi || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave sammāsaṅkappo || || Yo kho2
bhikkhave nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpādasaṅkappo avihiṃ-
sāsaṅkappo3 || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāsaṅkappo || ||
6. Katamā ca bhikkhave sammāvācā || || Yā kho bhik-
khave musāvādāveramaṇī4 pisuṇāya4 vācāya veramaṇī pha-
rusāya5 vācāya5 veramaṇī samphappalāpā veramaṇī || ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave sammāvācā || ||
7. Katamo ca bhikkhave sammākammanto || || Yā6 kho
bhikkhave pāṇātipātā veramaṇī adinnādānā veramaṇī ab-
rahmacariyā veramaṇī || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammā-
kammanto || ||
8. Katamo ca bhikkhave sammāājīvo || || Idha bhikkhave
ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena7 jīvitaṃ8
kappeti || ayaṃ vuccati sammāājīvo || ||
9. Katamo ca bhikkhave sammāvāyamo || || Idha bhik-
khave bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam
ārabbhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati9 || Uppannānam pā-
pakānam akusalānaṃ dhammānam pahānāya chandaṃ
janeti || la || Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānam uppā-
dāya chandaṃ janeti || la || Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dham-
mānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhā-
vanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam ārab-
bhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhik-
khave sammāvāyāmo || ||
10. Katamā ca bhikkhave sammāsati || || Idha bhikkhave
bhikkhu kāye10 kāyanupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno sa-
timā vineyyaloke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || vedanāsu vedanā-
nupassi viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyyaloke a-
bhijjhādomanassaṃ || citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sam-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 -gāmini.
2 missing in S3.
3 S3 avihisā- (corrected from aviṃhisā-) S1 ahisā
(corrected from ahivisā).
4 B1-2 -ni always.
5 S3 omits ya.
6 S1 ye S3 yo.
7 S1-3 jīvena.
8 S1-3 jīvikaṃ.
9 S1 pajahati.
10 S1 kāyena.

[page 010]
10 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
pajāno satimā vineyyaloke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || dhammesu
dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sam-
māsati || ||
Katamo ca bhikkhave sammāsamādhi || || Idha bhikkhave
bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi
savitakkam savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukham pathamaṃ
jhānam upasampajja viharati || || Vitakkavicārāṇaṃ vūpa-
samā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhavam avi-
takkam avicāraṃ samādhijam pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānam
upasampajja viharati || || Pītiyā ca virāgā ca upekhako ca
viharati || sato ca sampajāno sukhañ ca kāyena paṭisaṃ-
vedeti || yan tam ariyā ācikkhanti upekhako satimā sukha-
vihārīti tatiyaṃ jhānam upasampajja viharati || || Sukhassa
ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadoma-
nassānam atthagamā adukkhamasukham upekhāsatipāri-
suddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānam upasampajja viharati || || Ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave sammāsamādhī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).9. (9) Suka.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Seyyathāpi bhikkhave sālisukaṃ vā ya-
vasukam vā micchāpaṇihitam hatthena vā pādena vā ak-
kantam hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindissati1 lohitaṃ vā2
uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || taṃ kissa hetu || micchā
paṇihitattā bhikkhave sukassa3 || || Evam eva kho bhik-
khave so vata bhikkhu micchāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā micchā-
paṇihitāya maggabhāvanaya avijjaṃ bhindissati vijjam4
uppādessati nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vij-
jati || taṃ kissa hetu || micchāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave diṭṭhiyā || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave sālisukaṃ vā yavasukaṃ5 vā
sammāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantam hatthaṃ
vā pādaṃ vā bhindissati || lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti6 thā-
nam etam vijjati || tam kissa hetu || sammāpaṇihitattā bhik-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 chijjati always.
2 missing in S3.
3 S3 sūkassa.
4 S1-3 avijjā chijjati vijjā instead of avijjamo
5 S1 B2 sūkam.
6 S3 uppādessati.

[page 011]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 11
khave sukassa1 || || Evam eva kho bhikkhave so vata bhik-
khu sammāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammāpaṇihitāya magga-
bhāvanāya avijjaṃ bhindissati vijjam uppādessati nibbā-
naṃ sacchikarissatī ti ṭhānam etaṃ vijjati || taṃ kissa hetu ||
sammāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave diṭṭhiyā || ||
4. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitāya2 diṭ-
ṭhiyā sammāpaṇihitāya2 maggabhāvanāya avijjam bhindati
vijjam uppādeti nibbānam sacchikarotī ti || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka-
nissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇā-
miṃ || pe || sammāsamādhim bhāveti vivekanissitam virāga-
nissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ ceso3
bhikkhave bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammāpaṇi-
hitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjam4 bhindati vijjam uppādeti
nibbānam sacchikarotī ti || ||
SN_5,45(1).10. (10) Nandiya.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Atha kho Nandiyo paribbājako yena
Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavatā sad-
dhiṃ sammodi || sammodānīyaṃ kathaṃ sārānīyaṃ vītisā-
retvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ||
3. Ekaṃ antaṃ nisinno kho Nandiyo paribbājako Bha-
gavantam etad avoca || || Kati nu kho5 bho Gotama dhammā
bhāvitā bahulīkatā nibbānagamā honti nibbānaparāyanā
nibbānapariyosānā ti ||
4. Aṭṭhime kho Nandiya6 dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
nibbānagamā honti nibbānaparāyanā nibbānapariyosānā ||
katame aṭṭha || seyyathīdaṃ sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe || sammā-
samādhi || || Ime kho Nandiya aṭṭha dhammā bhāvitā ba-
hulīkatā nibbānagamā honti nibbānaparayanā nibbānapa-
riyosānā ti || ||
5. Evaṃ vutte Nandiyo paribbājako Bhagavantam etad
avoca || || Abhikkantam bho Gotama abhikkantam bho

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 sūkassa S3 sūkkassa.
2 S1-3 omit sammā.
3 B1 has vo instead of ceso, omitted by B2
4 S1-3 avijjā.
5 S3 inserts bhante.
6 S1-3 Atha kho Nandiya aṭṭha instead of aṭṭhi-.

[page 012]
12 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
Gotama || pa || upāsakam mam bhavaṃ Gotamo dhāretu
ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti || ||
Avijjāvaggo1 paṭhamo2 || ||
Tassa uddānam3 || ||
Avijjā4 ca Upaḍḍhañca5 || Sāriputto ca Brāhmaṇo ||
Kimatthiyo dve6 Bhikkhu || Vibhaṅgo7 Sūka8 Nandiyoti9 || ||

CHAPTER II. VIHĀRAVAGGO DUTIYO

SN_5,45(1).11. (1) Vihāra1.
1. Sāvatthi nidānaṃ || ||
2. Icchāmaham bhikkhave aḍḍhamāsam paṭisalliyituṃ10 ||
namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapāta-
nīhārakenāti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū Bhagavato paṭissutvā11
nāssudha koci Bhagavantam upasaṅkamati aññatra ekena
piṇḍapātanīhārakena || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavā tassa aḍḍhamāsassa accayena paṭi-
sallānā vuṭṭhito bhikkhū āmantesi || || Yena svāham bhik-
khave vihārena paṭhamābhisambuddho viharāmi || tassa pa-
desena vihāsiṃ || ||
4. So evam pajānāmi micchādiṭṭhipaccayā pi vedayitaṃ ||
sammādiṭṭhipaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || pa || micchāsamādhipac-
cayā pi vedayitaṃ || sammāsamādhipaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || ||
Chandapaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || vitakkapaccayā pi vedayi-
taṃ || saññāpaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || ||
5. Chando ca avūpasanto hoti13 || vitakko ca avūpasanto
hoti14 || saññā ca avūpasantā hoti || tappaccayā vedayitaṃ || ||
[Chando ca vūpasanto hoti || vitakkā ca avūpasantā honti

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B1 only.
2 S1-3 Paṭhamo vaggo B2 Vaggo paṭhamo.
3 S1-3 tatruddānaṃ.
4 B1-2 Avijjañ.
5 S1-3 omit ca.
6 S3 ve B1 kimattaññatara B2 kimattamaññataro.
7 S1-3 vibhange.
8 S3 sundikena.
9 B1-2 Nandiyāti.
10 S1-3 -sallī- B2 -salla-
11 B2 paccassosuṃ begun not finished in S3.
12 S1-3 saññappaccayā the phrase is repeated in S1.
13 S1-3 vitakkāca avupasantā (S3 adds ca) honti.
14 S1-3 honti.

[page 013]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 13
saññā ca avūpasantā honti || tappaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || ||
Chando ca vūpasanto hoti || vitakkā ca vūpasantā honti ||
saññā ca avūpasantā honti || ||] 1 Chando ca vūpasanto hoti ||
vitakko ca vūpasanto hoti2 || saññā ca vūpasantā hoti3 ||
tappaccayā vedayitaṃ || ||
6. Appattassa pattiyā atthi āyāmaṃ4 || || tasmim pi ṭhāne
anuppatte tappaccayā pi vedayitan ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).12. (2) Vihāra2.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Icchāmāham bhikkhave temāsam pati-
salliyituṃ5 || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavā tassa temāsassa accayena paṭi-
sallāṇā vuṭṭhito bhikkhū āmantesi || || Yena svāham bhik-
khave vihārena pathamābhisambuddho viharāmi tassa pa-
desena6 vihāsiṃ7 || ||
4. So evam pajānāmi8 micchādiṭṭhipaccayā vedayitaṃ ||
micchādiṭṭhivūpasamapaccayā vedayitaṃ || sammādiṭṭhipac-
cayā9 vedayitaṃ || sammādiṭṭhivūpasamapaccayā9 vedayitaṃ ||
la10 || micchāsamādhipaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || micchāsamādhi-
vūpasamapaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || sammāsamādhipaccayā pi
vedayitaṃ || sammāsamādhivūpasamapaccayā pi vedayitaṃ ||
chandapaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || Chandavūpasamapaccayā p
vedayitaṃ || vitakkapaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || vitakkavūpasama-
paccayā pi vedayitaṃ || saññāpaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || saññā-
vūpasamapaccayā pi vedayitaṃ || ||
5. Chando ca avūpasanto hoti vitakko ca avūpasanto
hoti || saññā ca avūpasantā hoti tappaccayā pi vedayitaṃ ||
[Chando ca vūpasanto hoti vitakkā ca avūpasantā honti
saññā ca avūpasantā honti tappaccayā pi vedayitaṃ ||
Chando ca vūpasanto hoti vitakkā ca vūpasantā honti
saññā ca avūpasantā honti tappaccayā pi vedayitam] 11 ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 The part between [] is not to be found in B1-2.
2 S1-3 vitakkā- -santā honti here and further on.
3 S1-3 honti here and further on.
4 S1-3 āyāma B1 āyācam.
5 The sequel as in the preceding sutta.
6 S1-3 padeseneva.
7 S1 vihāsi.
8 S1-3 paṭijānāmi.
9 S1-3 add pi.
10 S1-3 sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ -pe-

14 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
chando ca vūpasanto hoti vitakko ca vūpasanto hoti sañ-
ñā ca vūpasantā hoti tappaccayā vedayitaṃ1 || ||

anuppatte tappaccayā pi vedayitan ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).13. (3) Sekho.
1. Sāvatthi4 || ||
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || pa5 ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Sekho sekho ti bhante vuccati || || Kittāvatā
nu kho bhante sekho hotī ti || ||
4. Idha [bhikkhave6] bhikkhu sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā
sammannāgato hoti || la || sekhena sammāsamādhinā saman-
nāgato hoti || || Ettāvatā kho bhikkhu sekho hotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).14. (4) Uppāde1.
1. Sāvatthi7 || ||
2. Aṭṭhime8 bhikkhave dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
anuppannā9 uppajjanti nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvā
arahato sammāsambuddhassa || ||
3. Katame aṭṭha || || Seyyathīdaṃ sammādiṭṭhi || pa-pe ||
sammāsamādhi || || Ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha dhammā bhā-
vitā bahulīkatā anuppannā9 uppajjanti nāññatra tathāga-
tassa pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).15. (5) Uppāde2.
1. Sāvatthi10 || ||
2. Aṭṭhime bhikkhave dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā anup-
pannā uppajjanti || nāññatra sugatavinayā || ||
3. Katame aṭṭha || || Seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1.
2 S3 atti.
3 S1-3 āyāma B1 āyācam.
4 in S1-3 only.
5 complete in S1-3.
6 missing in B1.
7 missing in S1-3.
8 S3 atthime.
9 S1-3 insert na (added between the lines in S1 2).
10 in B1-2 only.

[page 015]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 15
sammāsamādhi || || Ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha dhammā bhā-
vitā bahulīkatā anuppannā uppajjanti1 || nāññatra sugata-
vinayā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).16. (6) Parisuddha1.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Tatravoca2 ||pe || ||
3. Aṭṭhime bhikkhave dhammā parisuddhā pariodātā
anaṅgaṇā vigatupakkilesā anuppannā uppajjanti nāññatra
tathāgatassa pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa3 || ||
4. Katame aṭṭha || || Seyyathīdaṃ sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe ||
sammāsamādhi || || Ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha dhammā pa-
risuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatuppakilesā anuppannā
uppajjanti nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvā arahato sam-
māsambuddhassā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).17. (7) Parisuddha2.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Tatravoca2 || pe || ||
3. Aṭṭhime bhikkhave dhammā parisuddhā- -uppajjanti
nāññatra sugatavinayā || ||
4. Katame aṭṭha || || Seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe ||
sammāsamādhi || || Ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha dhammā pari-
suddhā- -uppajjanti nāññatra sugatavinayā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).18. (8) Kukkuṭārāma1.
1. Evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayam āyasmā ca Ānando
āyasmā ca Bhaddo Pāṭaliputte viharanti Kukkuṭārāme || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Bhaddo sāyaṇhasamayam paṭisal-
lānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā Ānando tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅ-
kamitvā āyasmatā Ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi || sammo-
danīyaṃ kathaṃ sārāṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Bhaddo āyasmantam
Ānandam etad avoca || || Abrahmacariyaṃ abrahmacari-
yanti āvuso Ānanda vuccati || katamaṃ nu kho āvuso ab-
rahmacariyan ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 uppanti.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 S1 sammāmbuddhassa.

[page 016]
16 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
Sādhu sādhu āvuso Bhadda bhaddako te āvuso Bhadda
ummaggo1 bhaddakam paṭibhānaṃ kalyāṇī2 paripucchā || ||
4. Evaṃ hi3 tvam āvuso Bhadda3 pucchasi || || Abrahma-
cariyam abrahmacariyanti āvuso Ānanda vuccati || katamaṃ
nu kho āvuso abrahmacariyan ti || ||
Evam āvuso ti || ||
5. Ayam eva kho āvuso aṭṭhaṅgiko micchāmaggo4 abrah-
macariyaṃ5 || seyyathīdam || Micchādiṭṭhi || pa || micchāsa-
mādhī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).19. (9) Kukkuṭārama2.
1.2. Pāṭaliputtanidānaṃ6 || ||
3. Brahmacariyam brahmacariyan ti āvuso Ānanda
vuccati || katamaṃ nu kho āvuso brahmacariyam katamam
brahmacariyapariyosānan ti || ||
Sādhu sādhu kho7 āvuso Bhadda bhaddako8 kho9 ti
āvuso Bhadda ummaggo bhaddakam paṭibhānam kalyāṇī
paripucchā || ||
4. Evaṃ hi tvam āvuso Bhadda pucchasi Brahmacari-
yam brahmacariyan ti āvuso Ānanda vuccati || katamaṃ
nu kho āvuso brahmacariyaṃ katamam brahmacariyapari-
yosānan ti || ||
Evam āvuso ti || ||
5. Ayam eva kho7 āvuso ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo brah-
macariyaṃ || || seyyathīdaṃ || Sammādiṭṭhi || pa-pe || sammā-
samādhi || || Yo kho āvuso rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohak-
khayo || imam brahmacariyapariyosānan ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).20. (10) Kukkuṭārama3.
1.2. Pāṭaliputtanidānaṃ10 || ||
3. Brahmacariyam brahmacariyan ti āvuso vuccati || kata-
maṃ nu kho āvuso brahmacariyaṃ || katamo brahmacārī ||
katamam brahmacariyapariyosānan ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B2 ummango B1 umaṅgo.
2 S1 -ṇi.
3 in B1-2 only.
4 S1-3 maggo without micchā.
5 S1 ābrahma-
6 this in B2 only; B1 nothing; S1-3 Taṃ yeva nidānaṃ
kukkutārāmeekamantam- -avoca.
7 missing in S1-3.
8 S1-3 bhaddakaṃ.
9 B1 vo; missing in S1-3.
10 so B2 only; S1-3 Taṃ yeva nidānaṃ.

[page 017]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 17
Sādhu sādhu1 āvuso Bhadda || bhaddako kho te2 āvuso
Bhadda ummaggo bhaddakam paṭibhānaṃ kalyāṇī pari-
pucchā || ||
4. Evaṃ hi tvam āvuso Bhadda pucchasi || || Brahmaca-
riyam brahmacariyanti āvuso Ānanda vuccati || katamaṃ
nu kho āvuso brahmacariyaṃ || katamo brahmacārī || kata-
mam brahmacariyapariyosānan ti || ||
Evaṃ āvuso ti || ||
5. Ayam eva kho āvuso ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo brah-
macariyaṃ || seyyathīdaṃ || Sammādiṭṭhi || pa || sammāsamā-
dhi || || Yo kho āvuso iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena
samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati brahmacārī || || Yo kho āvuso
rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo || idam brahmacari-
yapariyosānan ti || ||
Imesam tiṇṇaṃ suttantantānam ekanidānaṃ3 || ||
Vihāravaggo dutiyo4 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ || ||
Dve Vihārā ca5 Sekho6 ca || Uppādā7 apare duve8 ||
Parisuddhena9 dve10 vuttā11 Kukkuṭārāmena tayo ti13 || ||

CHAPTER III. MICCHATTAVAGGO TATIYO.

SN_5,45(1).21. (1) Micchattam.
1.2. Sāvatthinidānaṃ13 || ||
3. Micchatañ ca14 vo bhikkhave desissāmi15 sammattañ
ca16 || taṃ suṇātha || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 āma instead of sādhu-
2 missing in B1.
3 So S1-3; B1-2 have tiṇisuttantāni ekanidānāni.
4 S1-3 dutiyo vaggo.
5 S1 vihāre S3 -ro S1-3 omit ca.
6 S1-3 sekhā B1 seṃkho.
7 B1-2 uppāde.
8 S1-3 dve.
9 S1-3 parisuddhā B2 -suddena.
10 missing in S1-3 (erased in S3)
11 S1-3 vutto.
12 S1-3 kukkuṭārāme (S1 -maya) tatiyo ti || ||
13 S1-3 sāvatthi.
14 S1-3 omit ca.
15 S3 desissasi.
16 S3 omits ca; S1 adds sa.

[page 018]
18 Magga Saṃyuttam XLV.
4. Katamañ ca bhikkhave micchattaṃ || || Seyyathīdaṃ ||
micchādiṭṭhi || pa || micchāsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhik-
khave micchattaṃ || ||
5. Katamañca bhikkhave sammattam || || Seyyathīdaṃ ||
sammādiṭṭhi || pa || sammāsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
sammattan ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).22. (2) Akusalam dhammam.
1.2. Sāvatthi1 || || Tatravoca2 || ||
3. Akusale ca vo bhikkhave dhamme desissāmi kusale
ca3 dhamme || tam suṇātha || ||
4. Katame ca3 bhikkhave akusalā dhammā || seyyathīdaṃ ||
Micchādiṭṭhi || pa || micchāsamādhi || || Ime vuccanti bhik-
khave kusalā dhammā ti || ||
5. Katame- -kusalā dhammā- -Sammādiṭṭhi || pa || sam-
māsamādhi || || Ime- -kusalā dhammā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).23. (3) Paṭipadā1.
1.2. Sāvatthi1 || || Tatravoca2 || ||
3. Micchāpaṭipadañca4 vo bhikkhave desissāmi sammā-
paṭipadañca5 || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamā ca3 bhikkhave micchāpaṭipadā || || Seyyathī-
daṃ || micchādiṭṭhi || pa [pe] || micchāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ vuc-
cati bhikkhave micchāpaṭipadā || ||
5. Katamā ca bhikkhave sammāpaṭipadā || || Seyyathīdam ||
sammādiṭṭhi || pa [pe] || sammāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhik-
khave sammāpaṭipadā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).24. (4) Patipadā2.
1.2. Sāvatthi6 || || Tatravoca7 || ||
3. Gihino8 vāham bhikkhave pabbajitassa9 vā micchā-
paṭipadaṃ na vaṇṇemi || ||
4. Gihi vā bhikkhave pabbajito vā micchāpaṭipanno

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B1.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 missing in S3.
4 S1-3 -paṭipadā.
5 S1-3 -patipadāca.
6 missing in B1.
7 in S1-3 only.
8 B2 gīh- always B1 gīh- and gih-
9 B2 pabbajji- always B1 almost always.

[page 019]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 19
micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu1 nārādhako2 hoti ñāyaṃ3
dhammaṃ kusalaṃ || || Katamā ca bhikkhave micchāpaṭipadā ||
Seyyathīdaṃ || micchādiṭṭhi || pa || micchāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave micchāpaṭipadā || || Gihino vāham bhik-
khave pabbajitassa vā micchāpaṭipadaṃ na vaṇṇemi || ||
5. Gihivā bhikkhave pabbajito vā micchāpaṭipanno mic-
chāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu nārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ
kusalaṃ || ||
6. Gihino vāhaṃ bhikkhave pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭi-
padaṃ vaṇṇemi || ||
7. Gihi vā bhikkhave pabbajito vā4 sammāpaṭipanno
sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dham-
maṃ kusalaṃ || || Katamā ca5 bhikkhave sammāpaṭipadā ||
seyyathīdam || sammādiṭṭhi || pa [-pe] sammāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave sammāpaṭipadā || || Gihino vāham bhik-
khave pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭipadaṃ vaṇṇemi || ||
8. Gihi vā bhikkhave pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sam-
māpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ
kusalan ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).25. (5) Asappurisa1.
1.2. Savatthi || || Tatravoca6 || ||
2. Asappurisañ ca vo bhikkhave desissāmi sappurisañ
ca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave asappuriso || || Idha bhik-
khave ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti || micchāsaṅkappo mic-
chāvāco7 micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo
micchāsati micchāsamādhi || || Ayam vuccati bhikkhave
asappuriso || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave sappuriso || || Idha bhikkhave
ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko8 hoti || sammāsaṅkappo sammāvāco7

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -paṭi padattādhi-
2 S1-3 na ārādhako always.
3 S1 ñāya always, corrected here from nāyaṃ in S3.
4 These words from gihi are missing in S1-3.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 this number in S1-3 only.
7 S1-3 -vācā.
8 S1-3 sammādiṭṭhi.

[page 020]
20 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sam-
māsamādhi || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sappuriso ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).26. (6) Asappurisa2.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Tatravoca1 || ||
3. Asappurisañ ca vo bhikkhave desissāmi asappurisena
asappurisatarañ cā || sappurisañ ca vo bhikkhave2 desissāmi
sappurisena sappurisatarañ ca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave asappuriso || || Idha bhikkhave
ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti || pa-pe || micchāsamādhi || ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave asappuriso || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave asappurisena asappurisataro || ||
Idha bhikkhave ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti || pa [pe] || micchā-
samādhi micchāñāṇī3 micchāvimutti || || Ayam vuccati bhik-
khave asappurisena asappurisataro || ||
6. Katamo ca bhikkhave sappuriso || || Idha bhikkhave
ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti || pa4 || sammāsamādhi || ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave sappuriso || ||
7. Katamo ca bhikkhave sappurisena sappurisataro || ||
Idha bhikkhave ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko || pa5 || sammāsamā-
dhi || sammāñāṇī6 sammāvimutti || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
sappurisena sappurisataro ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).27. (7) Kumbha.
1.2. Sāvatthi7 || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kumbho anādhāro suppavattiyo8
hoti sādhāro duppavattiyo9 hoti || evam eva kho bhikkhave
cittam anādhāraṃ suppavattiyaṃ10 hoti || sādhāraṃ duppa-
vattiyaṃ11 hoti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 These numbers in S1-3 only.
2 S1-3 omit vo bhikkhave.
3 S1-3 -ñāṇaṃ corrected from ñānāṃ in S1.
4 S1-3 sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 S1 -ñāṇa S3 -ñānā.
7 in B2 only.
8 S1-3 ppavattayo.
9 S1-3 sādhārappavattayo S1 having a blank instead of du.
10 S1-3 anādhārappavattayaṃ with a blank instead of su in S1
11 S1-3 sādhārappavatti omitting yaṃ hoti with a blank instead of
du in S1.

[page 021]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 21
4. Ko ca bhikkhave cittassa ādhāro1 || || Ayam eva ariyo
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || pe || sammā-
samādhi || || Ayaṃ2 cittassa ādhāro3 || ||
5. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kumbho anādhāro suppavat-
tiyo4 hoti || sādhāro duppavattiyo5 hoti || evam eva kho
bhikkhave cittam anādhāram suppavattiyam6 hoti || sādhāram
duppavattiyaṃ7 hotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).28. (8) Samādhi.
1.2. Sāvatthi8 || || Tatravoca9 || ||
3. Ariyaṃ10 vo bhikkhave sammāsamādhiṃ desissāmi sa-
upanisaṃ saparikkhāraṃ || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave ariyo sammāsamādhi11 sa upa-
niso saparikkhāro || seyyathīdaṃ || Sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅ-
kappo - vācā -kammanto -ājīvo -āyāmo -sati12 || ||
5. Yā13 kho bhikkhave imehi sattahaṅgehi cittassa ekag-
gatā saparikkhārā14 || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ariyo sam-
māsamādhi saupaniso iti pi15 || saparikkhāro iti pī ti || ||
SN_5,45(1).29. (9) Vedanā.
1.2. Sāvatthi16 || || Tatravoca17 || ||
3. Tisso imā bhikkhave vedanā || katamā tisso || || Sukhā
vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā || || Imā kho
bhikkhave tisso vedanā || ||
4. Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam vedanānam pariññāya
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo || katamo ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko maggo || || Seyyathīdaṃ sammādiṭṭhi || la [pe] || sammā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 anādhāro -pe-
2 S1 inserts vuccati.
3 S1-3 anādhāro.
4 S1-3 duppavattayo.
5 S1-3 suppavattayo.
6 S1-3 duppavattayo.
7 S1-3 suppavattayo B2 suppavattiyaṃ.
8 missing in B.

10 S1 ayaṃ.
11 S1-3 omit sammā.

15 S1-3 omit itipi.
16 missing in B2.

22 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
samādhi || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave vedanānam pariññāya
ayam1 ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).30. (10) Uttiya or Uttika.
1.2. Sāvatthi2 || ||
3. Atha kho āyasmā Uttiyo yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || la || ||
4. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Uttiyo3 Bhaga-
vantam etad avoca || || Idha mayham bhante rahogatassa
paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi || || Pañca
kāmaguṇā vuttā Bhagavatā || katame nu kho4 pañca kāma-
guṇā Bhagavatā ti5 || ||
5. Sādhu sādhu Uttiya || pañcime kho Uttiya6 kāmaguṇā
vuttā mayā || || Katame pañca || cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā
kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmupasaṃhitā rajanīyā || sotaviñ-
ñeyyā saddā || ghānaviññeyyā gandhā || jivhaviññeyyā rasā ||
kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā
kāmupasaṃhitā rajanīyā || || Ime kho Uttiya pañcakāma-
guṇā vuttā mayā || ||
6. Imesaṃ kho Uttiya pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānam pahā-
nāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo || || Katamo ariyo
aṭṭhāṅgiko maggo || || Seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la || sam-
māsamādhi || || Imesaṃ kho Uttiya pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇā-
nam pahānāya ayam7 ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||
Micchattavaggo tatiyo8 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ || ||
Micchattam Akusalaṃ9 || duve Paṭipadā pi10 ca || dve
Sappurisena11 Kumbho12 || Samādhi Vedan-Uttiyenāti13 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B1-2, added between the lines in S3.
2 in B2 only.
3 S1-3 Uttiko-ka always.
4 B1 vo.
5 This phrase katame nu- is missing in S3.
6 S1-3 pañca instead of pañcime kho Uttiya.
7 missing in S1-3.
8 S1-3 tatiyo vaggo omitting micchattavaggo.
9 B1-2 add dhammaṃ.
10 B1 patipadāsu S1-3 dve patipadesu.
11 S1-3 asappuriso instead of dve sap-
12 B1-2 kumbhā.
13 S1-3 vedanā uttikenāti (S3 -kena cā ti).

[page 023]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 23

CHAPTER IV. PAṬIPATTIVAGGO CATUTTHO.

SN_5,45(1).31. (1) Patipatti.
1.2. Sāvatthinidānaṃ1 || || Tatravoca2 || ||
3. Micchāpaṭipattiñca vo bhikkhave desissāmi sammāpaṭi-
pattiñca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
Katamā ca bhikkhave micchāpaṭipatti || || Seyyathīdaṃ ||
micchādiṭṭhi || la [pe] || micchāsamādhi || || Ayam vuccati bhik-
khave micchāpaṭipatti || ||
4. Katamā ca bhikkhave sammāpaṭipatti || || Seyyathīdaṃ ||
sammādiṭṭhi || la [pe] || sammāsamādhi || || Ayam vuccati bhik-
khave sammāpaṭipattī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).32. (2) Paṭipanno.
1.2. Sāvatthi3 || || Tatravoca2 || ||
3. Micchāpaṭipannañ ca vo bhikkhave desissāmi sammā-
paṭipannañ ca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
3. Katamo ca bhikkhave micchāpaṭipanno || || Idha bhik-
khave ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti || la [||pe ||] micchāsamā-
dhi || || Ayam vuccati micchāpaṭipanno || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave sammāpaṭipanno || || Idha bhik-
khave ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti || la || sammāsamādhi || ||
Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāpaṭipanno ti4 || ||

SN_5,45(1).33. (3) Viraddho.
1.2. Sāvatthi5 || ||
3. Yesaṃ kesañci6 bhikkhave ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
viraddho || viraddho tesam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko7 maggo sammā-
dukkhakkhayagāmī8 || || Yesaṃ kesañci6 bhikkhave9 ariyo
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo āraddho || āraddho10 tesam ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko11 maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī12 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 sāvatthi.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 missing in B1.
4 S1-3 omit ti.
5 in B2 only.
6 S1 kesañca.
7 missing in S1.
8 B1-2 -gāmi always.
9 S3 inserts ayaṃ.
10 missing in S1.
11 missing in S3.
12 S1 omits sammā; S3 B2 add ti.

[page 024]
24 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || ||
Seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la || sammāsamādhi || || Yesaṃ
kesañci bhikkhave ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo viraddho ||
viraddho tesam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sammādukkhak-
khayagāmī || Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
maggo āraddho || āraddho tesam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
sammadukkhakkhayagāmī ti1 || ||
SN_5,45(1).34. (4) {Pāraṅgama.}
1. 2. Sāvatthi2 || ||
3. Aṭṭhime3 bhikkhave dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā apā-
rāpāraṅgamanāya4 saṃvattanti || || Katame aṭṭha || || Seyya-
thīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la || sammāsamādhi || || Ime kho bhik-
khave aṭṭha dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā apārāpāraṃ
gamanāya saṃvattantī ti || ||
4. Idam avoca Bhagavā || idaṃ vatvā5 Sugato athāparaṃ
etad avoca satthā6 || ||
Appakā te manussesu || ye janā pāragāmino ||
athāyam itarā7 pajā || tīram evānudhāvati || || (1)
Ye ca kho sammadakkhāte || dhamme dhammānuvattino ||
te janā pāram essanti || maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ || || (2)
Kaṇhaṃ8 dhammam vippahāya9 || kaṇham bhāvetha paṇḍito ||
Okā anokam āgamma || viveke yattha dūramam || || (3)
Tatrābhiratiṃ iccheyya || hitvā kāme akiñcano ||
pariyodapeyya attānaṃ || {cittakilesehi}10 paṇḍito || || (4)
Yesaṃ sambodhiyaṅgesu || sammācittaṃ subhāvitaṃ ||
ādānapaṭinissagge || anupādāya ye ratā || ||
Khīṇāsavā jutimanto11 || te loke parinibbutā ti || (5) ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This number 4 is missing in S3.
2 missing in B1.
3 B2 atthime.
4 S1-3 aparāparaṃ-
5 B1-2 add na.
6 B2 sattā.
7 B2 ittarā B1 ittharā
8 B2 kaṇha.
9 S1 vippāgahāya.
10 B1 B2 cittaṃ- S1-3 -kelesehi.
11 S1-3 jutī-

[page 025]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 25

SN_5,45(1).35. (5) Sāmaññam1.
1.2. Sāvatthi1 || ||
3. Sāmaññañca vo bhikkhave desissāmi sāmaññaphalāni
ca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamañca bhikkhave sāmaññaṃ || || Ayam eva ariyo
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || || Seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la || sam-
māsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sāmaññaṃ || ||
5. Katamāni ca bhikkhave sāmaññaphalāni || || Sotāpatti-
phalaṃ sakadāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arahattapha-
laṃ2 || || Imāni vuccanti bhikkhave sāmaññaphalānī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).36. (6) Sāmaññam2.
1.2. Sāvatthi1 || ||
3. Sāmaññañca vo4 bhikkhave desissāmi sāmaññatthañ
ca5 || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamañ ca6 bhikkhave sāmaññaṃ || ayam eva ariyo7
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la || sammā-
samādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sāmaññaṃ || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave sāmaññattho || yo kho bhikkhave
rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo || ayaṃ vuccati bhik-
khave sāmaññattho ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).37. (7) Brahmaññaṃ1.
1.2. Sāvatthi8 || ||
3. Brahmaññañ ca vo bhikkhave desissāmi brahmañña-
phalāni ca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamañca kho9 bhikkhave brahmaññaṃ || ayam eva
ariyo7 aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdam || sammādiṭṭhi || la ||
sammāsamādhi || || Idam vuccati bhikkhave brahmaññaṃ || ||
5. Katamāni ca bhikkhave brahmaññaphalāni || || Sotā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B2 only.
2 S1-3 arahattaṃ.
3 in B2 only.
4 missing in S1.
5 B1-2 have sāmaññatta-o-aṃ always, B1 more clearly than B2.
6 B1-2 insert kho (B2 vo).
7 B1 evāriyo.
8 in B2 only.
9 B2 vo, missing in S1-3.

[page 026]
26 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
pattiphalaṃ sakadāgamiphalam anāgāmiphalam arahatta-
phalaṃ1 || || Imāni vuccanti bhikkhave brahmaññaphalānī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).38. (8) Brahmaññaṃ2.
1.2. Sāvatthi2 || ||
3. Brahmaññañ ca vo bhikkhave desissāmi brahmāññat-
thañ ca3 || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamañ ca bhikkhave brahmaññaṃ || ayam eva ariyo
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammāsamādhi || la || sam-
māsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave brahmaññaṃ || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave brahmaññattho || || Yo kho4
bhikkhave rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo || ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave brahmaññattho ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).39. (9) Brahmacariyaṃ1.
1.2. Sāvatthi5 || ||
3. Brahmacariyañ ca vo bhikkhave desissāmi || brahma-
cariyaphalāni ca || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamañ ca bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ || ayam eva
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || pa ||
sammāsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ || ||
5. Katamāni6 ca bhikkhave brahmacariyaphalāni || || Sotā-
pattiphalaṃ sakadāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalam arahatta-
phalaṃ7 || || Imāni vuccanti bhikkhave brahmacariyaphalā-
nīti || ||

SN_5,45(1).40. (10) Brahmacariyaṃ2.
1.2. Sāvatthi5 || ||
3. Brahmacariyaṃ ca8 vo bhikkhave desissāmi brahma-
cariyatthañ ca || || taṃ suṇātha || ||
4. Katamañ ca bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ || ayam eva
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la ||
sammāsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 arahattam.
2 in B2 only.
3 B1 -attañ ca here only.
4 B1-2 ca.
5 in B1 only.
6 S1-3 katamā.
7 S1-3 arahattaṃ.
8 S1-3 omit ca.

[page 027]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 27
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave brahmacariyattho || Yo kho1
bhikkhave rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo || || Ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave brahmacariyatthoti || ||
Paṭipattivaggo2 catuttho3 || ||
Sabbam eva Sāvatthinidānaṃ4 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ || ||
Paṭipatti5 Patipanno ca6 || || Viraddhañ ca7 Pāraṅgamā8 ||
Sāmaññena dve vuttā || Brahmaññā9 aparo duve10 ||
Brahmacariyena dve vuttā || Vaggo tena pavuccatī ti || ||
AÑÑATITTHIYA-PEYYĀLO.

SN_5,45(1).41. (1) Virāga.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ11 || ||
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū- -etad avocuṃ12 || ||
3. Sace vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evam
puccheyyuṃ || || Kim atthi yam āvuso samaṇe Gotame
brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave
tesam aññatitthiyānam paribbājakānam evam vyākareyyā-
tha || || Rāgavirāgatthaṃ13 kho āvuso Bhagavati brahma-
cariyaṃ vussatī ti || ||
4. Sace pana vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evam
puccheyyuṃ || || Atthi panāvuso atthi paṭipadā rāgavirāgāyā
ti || evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam añña- parib- evam
vyākareyyātha || || Atthi kho avuso maggo atthi paṭipadā
rāgavirāgāyāti || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave maggo katamā14 ca paṭipadā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So S3; B1-2 ca; S1 nothing.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S1-3 add vaggo.
4 this mention in S1-3 only; S3 adds evā ti.
5 S1 paṭipatto S3 patipanno ca.
6 S3 paṭipanne omitting ca.
7 S1-3 viraddho.
8 S1-3 bhāvanassa ca.
9 S1-3 brahmaññam.
10 S5 dve.
11 S1-3 sāvatthi.
12 So S1-3.
13 B1-2 -rāgattaṃ.
14 S1-2 katamo.

[page 028]
28 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
rāgavirāgāya1 || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyya-
thīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la (pe) || sammāsamādhi || || Ayam
bhikkhave maggo ayam paṭipadā rāgavirāgāyāti || evam
puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam añña- parib- evam vyāka-
reyyāthā ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).42. (2) Saṃyojanam.
2. Sace vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evam
puccheyyuṃ || || Kim atthi yam āvuso samaṇe Gotame brah-
macariyam vussatī ti || evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam
añña- parib- evam vyākareyyatha || || Saṃyojanapahānatthaṃ
kho3 āvuso Bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || la4 ||

SN_5,45(1).43. (3) Anusayam.
2. -anusayasamugghāṭanatthaṃ kho3 avuso Bhagavati
brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || la || ||

SN_5,45(1).44. (4) Addhānam.
2. -addhānapariññatthaṃ5 kho avuso Bhagavati {brah-
macariyaṃ} vussatī ti || la ||

SN_5,45(1).45. (5) Asavakhaya.
2. -āsavānaṃ khayatthaṃ kho āvuso Bhagavati brah-
macariyaṃ vussatī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).46. (6) Vijjāvimutti.
2. -vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyatthaṃ6 kho āvuso Bha-
gavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || la || ||

SN_5,45(1).47. (7) Nāṇam.
2. -ñāṇadassanatthaṃ kho āvuso Bhagavati brahmaca-
riyam vussatī ti || la7 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -virāgā ca S1-3 -virāgāyā ti and S1 adds paṭipadā.
2 S3 kho.
3 B1 vo.
4 complete in S1-3 as the preceding virāga (numbers 3. 4.)
5 S3 -pariññaṭṭaṃ B1 -pariññattaṃ.
6 S1-3 -phalaṃ-
7 43-47 are more complete in S1-3 and, in B2, begin sāvatthi.

[page 029]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 29

SN_5,45(1).48. (8) Anupādāya.
2. Sa1 ce vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evam
puccheyyuṃ || || Kim atthi yam āvuso samaṇe Gotame brah-
macariyaṃ vussatī ti || evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam
añña- pari- evam vyākareyyātha || || Anupādāparinibbānat-
thaṃ kho avuso Bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || ||
3. Sace2 pana vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā
evam puccheyyuṃ || || Atthi panāvuso maggo atthi paṭipadā
anupādāparinibbānāyā ti3 || evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave
tesaṃ añña- parib- evaṃ vyākareyyātha || || Atthi4 kho āvuso
maggo atthi paṭipadā anupādāparinibbānāyā ti5 || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave maggo katamā ca paṭipadā
anupādāparinibbānāya || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ||
seyyathīdaṃ || || Sammādiṭṭhi || la || sammāsamādhi || || Ayam
bhikkhave maggo ayam paṭipadā anupādāparinibbāyā ti || ||
Evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam aññatitthiyānam pa-
ribbājakānam evam vyākareyyāthā ti || ||
Aññatitthiya-peyyālo6 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ || ||
Virāga-Saṃyojanaṃ Anusaya7 || ||
Addhānam Āsavakhayā8 ||
Vijjāvimutti9 Ñāṇañca ||
Anupādāya aṭṭhamī || ||
SURIYASSA PEYYĀLO.
Sabbaṃ10 Sāvatthinidānam || ||
I. VIVEKA-NISSITAM.

SN_5,45(1).49. (1) Kalyāṇamittatā.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato etam pubbaṅgamam etam
pubbanimittaṃ yad idam aruṇuggaṃ11 || evam eva kho bhik-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 preceded by Sāvatthi in B2.
2 B2 sāca.
3 S1-3 anupādāya-
4 S1-3 insert nu.
5 S3 anupādāya-
6 S1-3 -yāpeyyāli (S3 lī) B2 aññatitthiyavaggo pañcamo.
7 B1 -sayaṃ.
8 B1-2 āsavā-
9 S1 vijja-.
10 missing in B1-2.
11 S1-3 arunaggaṃ always.

[page 030]
30 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
khave bhikkhuno ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa uppādāya
etam pubbaṅgamam etam pubbanimittaṃ yad idam kalyā-
ṇamittatā || ||
3. Kalyāṇamittassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅ-
kham ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati1 a- a- maggam
bahulīkarissati2 || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu kalyā-
ṇamitto3 ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam
bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇā-
miṃ || la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodha-
nissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
kalyānamitto ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a-
bahulīkarotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).50. (2) Sīlam.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato etam pubbaṅgamam etam
pubbanimittaṃ yad idam aruṇuggaṃ || evam eva kho bhik-
khave bhikkhuno ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa uppādāya
etam pubbaṅgamam etam pubbanimittam yad idam sīla-
sampadā ||
3. Sīlasampannassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno patikaṅ-
kham || la ||

SN_5,45(1).51. (3) Chanda.
2. -yad idaṃ chandasampadā || la (pe) ||

SN_5,45(1).52. (4) Atta.
2. -yad idam attasampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).53. (5) Diṭṭhi.
2. -yad idaṃ diṭṭhisampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).54. (6) Appamāda.
2. -yad idam appamādasampadā || la ||

2 B1 -karissatī ti.
3 S1 -mitte.

[page 031]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 31

SN_5,45(1).55. (7) Yoniso.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato etam pubbaṅgamaṃ etam
pubbanimittaṃ yad idam aruṇuggam || evam eva kho bhik-
khave bhikkhuno ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa uppā-
dāya etam pubbaṅgamam etam pubbanimittaṃ yad idam
yonisomanasikārasampadā || ||
3. Yonisomanasikārasampannassetam bhikkhave bhik-
khuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ1 ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam bhāvessati a- a-
maggam bahulīkarissati || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu
yonisomanasikārasampanno ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam
bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka-
nissitam virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmim ||
la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ2 kho bhikkhave bhikkhu yo-
nisomanasikārasampanno ariyam atthaṅgikam maggam bhā-
veti a- a- bahulīkaroti || ||
II. RĀGAVINAYA.

SN_5,45(1).56. (8) Kalyāṇamittatā2.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato- || pe || yad idaṃ kalyāṇa-
mittatā3 || ||
3. Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ bhikkhave- || pe || bahulīkarissati || ||
Kathañ ca bhikkhave || pe || maggam bahulīkaroti || ||

vinayapariyosānaṃ dosavinayapariyosānam mohavinayapari-
yosānam || la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti rāga- dosa- moha-
vinayapariyosānaṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu kalyā-
ṇamitto ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam
bahulīkarotī ti || ||

sampadā || la4 ||

3. Yonisomanasikārasampannassetam bhikkhave bhikkhu-
no pāṭikaṅkham || pa || maggam bahulīkaroti1 || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti rāga-
vinayapariyosānaṃ dosavinayapariyosānam mohavinayapari-
yosānam || pa || sammāsamādhim bhāveti rāgavinaya- dosa-
vinaya- mohavinayapariyosānaṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu yonisomanasikārasampanno ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam
maggam bhāveti a- a- bahulīkarotī ti || ||
Suriyassa peyyālo2 || ||

Diṭṭhi ca Appamādo ca || Yoniso bhavati sattamaṃ || ||
EKADHAMMAPEYYĀLO I.
1. Sāvatthinidānam4 || ||
I. VIVEKANISSITAM.

SN_5,45(1).63. (1) Kalyāṇamittam1.
2. Ekadhammo bhikkhave bahupakāro5 ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgi-
kassa maggassa uppādāya || || Katamo ekadhammo || || Yad
idaṃ kalyānamittatā || ||

1 as 55.
2 B2 adds samatto; S1-3 suriyaṃpeyyāli (S3 lī).
3 B1-2 uddānam.
4 S1-3 omits nidānaṃ.

[page 033]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 33
3. Kalyāṇamittassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno paṭikaṅkhaṃ
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati a- a- maggam
bahulīkarissati1 || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu kalyā-
ṇamitto a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkaroti || ||

miṃ || la (pe) || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodha
nissitaṃ vossaggapariṇamiṃ || || Evam2 kho bhikkhave bhik-
khu kalyāṇamitto ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a-
maggam bahulīkarotī ti || ||

sampadā || la || ||

khun opātikaṅkham5 ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati

EKADHAMMAPEYYĀLO II.
1. Sāvatthinidānam || ||

I. VIVEKANISSITAṂo

SN_5,45(1).77. (1) Kalyāṇamittam1.
2. Nāham bhikkhave aññam ekadhammam pi samanu-
passāmi || yena anuppanno vā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
uppajjati || uppanno vā a- a- maggo bhāvanāpāripūrim
gacchati || yathayidam bhikkhave kalyāṇamittatā || ||
3. Kalyāṇamittassetam4 bhikkhave bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅ-
kham a- a- maggam bhāvessati a- a- maggam bahulīkaris-
sati5 || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto a- a-
maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkaroti6 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 The beginning of this number and the numbers 71-75
are developed, more or less, in S1-3.
2 S1-3 add eva.
3 B2 adds niṭṭhitaṃ S1-3 have ekadhammapeyyali (S3 lī).
4 S3 kalyāṇassetam.
5 B1 -karissatī ti
6 S1 -karotī ti.

[page 036]
36 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ || la-pe || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhik-
khave bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto1 a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a-
maggam bahulīkarotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).78. (2) Sīla1.
2. Nāham bhikkhave aññam ekadhammam pi samanu-
passāmi- || pe (77) || -yathayidam bhikkhave sīlasampa-
dā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).79. (3) Chanda.
2. -yathayidaṃ bhikkhave chandasampadā || la || ||

SN_5,45(1).80. (4) Atta.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave attasampadā || la || ||

SN_5,45(1).81. (5) Diṭṭhi1.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave diṭṭhisampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).82. (6) Appamāda1.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave appamādasampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).83. (7) Yoniso1.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave yonisomanasikārasampadā || ||
3. Yonisomanasikārasampannassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno
pātikaṅkhaṃ ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati a- a-
maggam bahulīkarissati2 || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu
a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ || pa [pe] || sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ ||
pa || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- viraga- nirodhanissi-
tam vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
yonisomanasikārasampanno a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a-
maggam bahulīkarotī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add kalyāṇasahāyo.
2 B1 -karissatī ti.

[page 037]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 37
II. RĀGAVINAYA-

SN_5,45(1).84. (8) Kalyāṇamittatā2.
2. Nāham bhikkhave aññam ekadhammaṃ samanupassā-
mi- || pe (77) || -yathayidam bhikkhave kalyāṇamittatā || ||
3. Kalyāṇamittassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅk-
haṃ || || maggam bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti rāga-
vinayapariyosānaṃ dosavinayapariyosānaṃ mohavinayapa-
riyosānaṃ || la1 || sammāsammādhim bhāveti rāga2 || dosa2 ||
mohavinayapariyosānaṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
kalyaṇamitto a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulī-
karotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).85. (2) Sīla2.
2. Nāham bhikkhave aññam ekadhammam pi samanu-
passāmi- || pe || -yathayidam bhikkhave sīlasampadā || la || ||

SN_5,45(1).86. (3) Chanda2.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave chandasampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).87. (4) Atta2.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave attasampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).88. (5) Diṭṭhi2.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave diṭṭhi sampadā || la ||
SN_5,45(1).89. (6) Appamāda2.
2. -yathayidam bhikkhave appamādasampadā || la ||

SN_5,45(1).90. (7) Yoniso2.
2. -yathayidam3 bhikkhave yonisomanasikārasampadā || ||
3. Yonisomanasikārasampannassetam bhikkhave bhik-
khuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ- || pe (83) || a- a- maggam bahulīkaroti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -pe- instead of rāga-
2 S1-3 vinaya-
3 S1 yampidam.

[page 038]
38 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti rāga-
dosa- mohavinayapariyosānam || la || sammāsamādhim bhā-
veti rāga- dosa- mohavinayapariyosānaṃ || || Evaṃ kho
bhikkhave bhikkhu yonisomanasikārasampanno a- a- mag-
gam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkarotī ti || ||
Ekadhammapeyyālo1 || ||
Uddānaṃ2 || ||

Diṭṭhi ca Appamādo ca || Yoniso bhavati3 sattamaṃ || ||
GAṄGĀPEYYĀLO.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ || ||
VIVEKANISSITAM.

SN_5,45(1).91. (1) Pācīna1.
2. Seyyathā pi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī pācīnaninnā4 pācī-
napoṇā pācīnapabbhārā || evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno
hoti nibbānapoṇo5 nibbānapabbhāro || || Kathañ ca bhik-
khave bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam ba-
hulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapab-
bhāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
ka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || la-pe ||
sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggaparināmim || || Evaṃ6 kho bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a-
maggam bhāvento a- a- bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti
nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāroti || ||

SN_5,45(1).92. (2) Pācīna2.

cīnapoṇā pācīnapabbhārā || evam eva kho bhikkhave || la ||

daṃ Gaṅgā Yamunā Acīravatī Sarabhū Mahī || sabbā tā
pācīnaninnā pācīnapoṇā pācīnapabbhārā || evam eva kho
bhikkhave || bhikkhu || pe || nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||

muddapoṇa samuddappabbhārā || Evam eva kho bhikkhave

ronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro4 || ||

Vivekanissitaṃ dvādasakī paṭhamakī8 || ||

yosānam dosa- mohavinayapariyosānaṃ- || ||

(or ki?), B2 pathamaka.

IV. NIBBĀNANNINO.

nibbānapoṇam nibbānapabbāram || evam kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento- -bahulīka-
ronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||
Gaṅgāpeyyālī1 || ||
Tassuddānaṃ || ||
Cha pācīnato ninnā || cha ninnā ca samuddato ||
Ete dve cha dvādasā honti2 || Vaggo tena pavuccatī ti || ||
Nibbānaninno dvādasakī3 || || catutthakī3 chaṭṭhānavakī3 || ||

CHAPTER V. APPAMĀDAVAGGO PAÑCAMO.

SN_5,45(1).139. (1) Tathāgata.
I. VIVEKA-
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ4 || ||
2. Yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā5 vā catup-
padā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B2 adds samattī.
2 B1 hoti.
3 B1 -kim.-- These parts II, III, IV of the Gaṅgāpeyyalo, --
which run on according to the pattern of I, -- are to be found
in the burmese Mss. only, where they are complete with the usual
abridgments, but altogether omitted in the Singhalese Mss which
merely alluded to them by saying: Vārasampekhenalikhitāṃ peyyālo
vitthāretabbo (S.p. 40 n 2.) -- On account of this, I suppress
these texts, numbering only them and not giving more than the
distinctive phrases and the reading mentions as afforded by
B1-2.
4 B2 omits nidānaṃ.
5 S1-3 dipadā.

[page 042]
42 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino1 vā || Tathāgato tesam
aggam akkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho || evam eva kho
bhikkhave ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbe te appamādamū-
lakā appamādasamosaraṇā || appamādo tesaṃ dhammānam
aggam akkhāyati || ||
3. Appamattassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno paṭikaṅkhaṃ2
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati a- a- maggam
bahulīkarissati3 || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave4 bhikkhu appa-
matto ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam
bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinā-
mim || la-pe || sammāsamādhim bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāga-
nissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ||
5. Evam eva5 kho bhikkhave bhikkhu appamatto ariyam
aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkarotīti6 || ||
Uparitiṇṇaṃ suttānaṃ vitthāretabbanti7 || ||
II. (RĀGAVINAYA-)
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti rāga-
vinayapariyosānaṃ dosavinayapariyosānaṃ mohavinayapari-
yosānaṃ || la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti rāgavinaya- dosa-
vinaya- mohavinayapariyosānaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 nevasaññino vā nāsaññino (S3 -saññīno)
2 S3 -kaṃkhā.
3 B1-2 -karissatī ti.
4 S1 inserts here bhikkha.
5 in S1-3 only.
6 S1-3 -karoti.
7 This notice is missing in S1-3 and the "upari tīṇi suttāni"
altogether suppressed; they are, on the contrary, fully exhibited
in B1-2; we give only the number 4 by which they differ.

[page 043]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 43
III. (AMATA-)
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti ama-
togadham amataparāyanam amatapariyosānaṃ || la || sammā-
samādhim bhāveti amatogadham amataparāyanam amata-
pariyosānaṃ || ||
IV. (NIBBĀNA-)
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti nibbā-
naninnaṃ nibbānapoṇam nibbānapabbhāraṃ || la || sammā-
samādhim bhāveti nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇam nibbāna-
pabbhāraṃ || ||

SN_5,45(1).140. (2) Padam (I--IV).
1. Sāvatthi1 || ||
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yāni kānici jaṅgamānaṃ2 pā-
ṇānam padajātāni sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ
gacchanti || hatthipadaṃ tesam aggam akkhāyati yad idam
mahantattena3 || evam eva kho bhikkhave ye keci kusalā
dhammā sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā ||
appamādo tesaṃ dhammānam4 aggam akkhāyati || ||
3. Appamattassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati a- a- maggam
bahulīkarissati || pe5 || ||

SN_5,45(1).141. (3) Kūṭam (I--IV).
1. Sāvatthi || ||
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo ||
sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭaninnā kūṭasamosaraṇā || kūṭaṃ
tāsam6 aggam akkhāyati || evam eva kho bhikkhave || ||
Yathā heṭṭhimasuttantam evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ7 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B2 only.
2 B1-2 jaṅgalāṇam.
3 B1 mahantenatthe.
4 in B1-2 only.
5 B1-2 karissatī ti || kathañ ca-; these Mss. repeat the numbers 4
and 5 of tathāgata I.
6 S1-3 tesaṃ.
7 instead of yathā- S1-3 have ye keci kusaladhammā -pe-

44 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.

la-pe || ||

tesam3 aggam akkhāyati || evam eva kho bhikkhave || la-pe || ||

rañño cakkavattissa5 anuyantā6 bhavanti7 tesaṃ rājā8 cak-
kavatti aggam akkhāyati || evam eva kho bhikkhave || la-pe || ||

SN_5,45(1).146. (8) Canda (I--IV).
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yā kāci tārakarūpānam pabhā ||
sabbā tā candimāpabhāya9 kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ || can-
dappabhā10 tāsam aggam akkhāyati || evam eva kho bhik-
khave || la-pe || ||

SN_5,45(1).147. (9) Suriya (I--IV).
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave saradasamaye viddhe vigatava-
lāhake deve ādicco nabham11 abbhussukkamāno12 sabbam
ākāsagatam tamagatam abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca13
virocati ca13 || evam eva kho bhikkhave || la-pe || ||

1 S1 -sārīyaṃ B1 -sāraṃ yaṃ S3 kālāsāriyaṃ.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 missing in S3.
4 S1-3 kujja-
5 B1 -vattino.
6 S1-3 anuyuttā.
7 B1 honti.
8 S1 B1-2 rājā tesaṃ.
9 B2 candima- S1-3 candiyā-
10 S3 candipabhā.
11 S1 nabhā.
12 B1 abbhussa-
13 missing in S1.

[page 045]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 45

SN_5,45(1).148. (10) Vattham (I--IV).
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vat-
thānaṃ || kāsikaṃ1 vatthaṃ tesam aggam akkhāyati || evam
eva kho bhikkhave ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbe te appa-
mādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā || appamādo tesam dham-
mānam aggam akkhāyati ||
3. Appamattassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkham2
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessati a- a- maggam ba-
hulīkarissatī ti || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu appamatto
ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahu-
līkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ virāga- nirodha- nissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ ||
la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitam
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ||
5. Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu appamatto ariyam aṭ-
ṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam
bahulīkarotī ti || ||
Appamādavaggo pañcamo3 || ||
Sabbam eva sāvatthinidānaṃ4 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ5 || ||
Tathāgatam6 Padaṃ Kūṭam7 ||
Mūlaṃ Sāro ca8 Vassikaṃ ||
Rājā Candima-Suriyā9 ca ||
Vatthena dasamam padaṃ || ||
Yad api Tathāgataṃ10 tad api vitthāretabbaṃ || ||

CHAPTER VI. BALAKARANĪYAVAGGO CHAṬṬHO.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ || ||

SN_5,45(1).149. (1) Balam.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā
karīyanti11 || sabbe te pathaviṃ12 nissāya pathaviyam pa-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 kāsika.
2 S1-3 -kaṃkhā.
3 missing in S1-3; the mention is in B2 pañcamo appamādavaggo samatto.
4 The whole phrase in S1-3 only.
5 B1 udānaṃ S1-3 tassuddānaṃ.
6 S1-3 -gata.
7 B1-2 kuṭam.
8 S1-3 sārena (S3 ṇa).
9 S1-3 -suriyo B2 sūriyaṃ (B1 yo).
10 S3 tathāgapadaṃ.
11 S1 kayiranti.
12 B1-2 putha- S3 B2 -vi.

[page 046]
46 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
tiṭṭhāya evam eva te1 balakaraṇīya kammantā karīyanti2 ||
Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭ-
ṭhāya ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam ba-
hulīkaroti || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle
patiṭṭhāya a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam bahulīkaroti || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitam virāganissitam nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇā-
miṃ || la (pe) || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggaparināmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho abhikkhave
bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya a- a- maggam bhāveti || a- a- maggam
bahulīkarotī ti || ||
Paragaṅgāpeyyālīvaṇṇiyato paripuṇṇasuttan ti vitthāra-
maggī3 || ||

SN_5,45(1).150. (2) Bījā.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ye keci4 bījagāmā5 bhūtagāmā
vuddhim viruḷhim vepullaṃ āppajjanti || sabbe te pathaviṃ6
nissāya pathaviyam patiṭṭhāya evam ete7 bījagāmā bhūta-
gāmā vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjanti || evam eva kho
bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlam nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya8 ariyam
aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīka-
ronto vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullam pāpuṇāti dhammesu || ||
Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya
a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto vud-
dhiṃ {virūḷhiṃ} vepullam9 pāpuṇāti dhammesu || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ || la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S3.
2 S1-3 kayiranti.
3 This phrase is to be found in the burmese MSS. which add,
according to the preceding case, the three statements referring
to 1. rāga-dosa-moha; 2. amata; 3. nibbāna.--
Nothing of this appears in the singhalese MSS. Therefore
I bound myself to this note upon this matter.
4 B2 adds me.
5 S3 -gāma.
6 B1-2 putha- S3 B2 -vi.
7 S1 eva kho te S3 eva kho.
8 S1 tiṭṭhāya.
9 S1-3 vepullatam.

[page 047]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 47
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ1 || evam2 kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya a- a- bhāvento a- a-
bahulīkaronto vuddhiṃ {virūḷhiṃ vepullam} papuṇāti dham-
mesū ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).151. (3) Nāgo.
2. Himavantam bhikkhave pabbatarājaṃ nissāya nāgā
kāyaṃ vaḍḍhenti balam gāhenti || || Te tattha kāyaṃ vaḍ-
ḍhetvā balam gāhetvā kusubbhe3 otaranti || kusubbhe ota-
ritvā mahāsobbhe otaranti || mahāsobbhe otaritvā kunnadiyo
otaranti4 || kunnadiyo otaritvā mahānadiyo otaranti || mahā-
nadiyo otaritvā mahāsamuddaṃ5 sāgaram otaranti || te tattha
mahantataṃ6 vepallatam7 āpajjanti kāyena || ||
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlam nissāya sīle
patiṭṭhāya ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento a- a-
maggam bahulīkaronto mahantatam vepullatam8 pāpuṇāti
dhammesu || ||
Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle pati-
ṭṭhāya ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento ariyam
aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bahulīkaronto mahantataṃ vepul-
latam8 pāpuṇāti dhammesu || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti || sammā-
samādhim bhāveti viveka- viraga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossagga-
parināmiṃ || || Evaṃ9 kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya
sīle patiṭṭhāya ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento10 a-
a- maggaṃ bahulīkaronto10 mahantatam vepullatam pāpuṇāti
dhammesū ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).152. (4) Rukkho.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave rukkho11 pācīnaninno12 pācī
napoṇo pācīnapabbhāro || so mūle13chinno14 katamena papā-
tena15 papateyyāti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 S1-3 insert eva.
3 B1 kusumbhe of -sobbhe always.
4 omit kunnadiyo o-
5 -samudda.
6 S1 mahattantaṃ B1-2 mahantattaṃ.
7 B1-2 vepullattaṃ.
8 B1-2 mahantattaṃ vepullattaṃ.
9 S1-3 insert eva.
10 S1 bhāveti -karoti.
11 missing in S1-3.
12 S1 pācīnninno S3 pācīṇa- always.
13 B1 mūla always.
14 B1 chinne.
15 in S1-3 only.

[page 048]
48 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
Yena bhante ninno yena poṇo yena pabbhāro ti || ||
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam
maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto nibbāna-
ninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro || || Kathañ ca
bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam
bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapab-
bhāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka-
[pe] la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodha-
nissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evam eva kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīka-
ronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo1 nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).153. (5) Kumbho.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kumbho nikkujjo2 vamateva
udakaṃ no paccāvamati || evam eva kho bhikkhave bhik-
khu ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam
bahulīkaronto vamateva pāpake akusale dhamme no paccā-
vamati || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a- maggam
bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto vamateva pāpake
akusale dhamme no paccāvamati || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka- ||
la || sammāsamādhim bhaveti viveva- virāga- nirodhanisitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a-
maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto vamateva
pāpake akusale dhamme no paccāvamatī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).154. (6) Sukiya.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave sālisūkaṃ3 vā yavasūkaṃ3 vā sam-
māpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ
vā pādaṃ vā chijjati4 lohitaṃ vā5 uppādessatī ti ṭhānam
etam vijjati || || Taṃ kissa hetu || sammāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave
sūkassa3 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 insert hoti.
2 B1-2 nikujjo.
3 B1 -suka-
4 B2 bhijjīti B1 bhissati.
5 in B1-2 only.

[page 049]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 49
3. Evam eva kho so vata1 bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitāya
maggabhāvanāya avijjam chijjati2 vijjam3 uppādessati4
nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti || ṭhānam etaṃ vijjati || taṃ kissa
hetu || sammāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave diṭṭhiyā || || Kathañca
bhikkhave bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammāpaṇi-
hitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjam bhindati vijjam5 uppādeti
nibbānam sacchikaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka-
nissitaṃ || pa [pe] || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitam vossaggaparināmiṃ || evaṃ kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammāpaṇihitāya magga-
bhāvanāya avijjam bhindati vijjam uppādeti nibbānam
sacchikarotī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).155. (7) Ākāsa.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ākāse vividhā vātā vāyanti ||
puratthimā pi vātā vāyanti || pacchimā pi vātā vāyanti ||
uttarā pi vātā vāyanti || dakkhiṇā pi vātā vāyanti || sarajā
pi vātā vāyanti || arajā pi vātā vāyanti || sītā pi vātā vāyanti ||
uṇhāpi vātā vāyanti || parittā pi vātā vāyanti || adhimattā
pi vātā vāyanti || ||
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam
maggam bhāvayato a- a- maggam bahulīkaroto cattāro pi
satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchanti || cattāro pi sam-
mappadhānā- || cattāro pi iddhipādā || pañca pi indriyāni- ||
pañca pi balāni- || satta pi bojjhaṅgā bhāvanā pāripūriṃ
gacchanti || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhuno a- a- bhāvayato
a- a- maggam bahulīkaroto cattāro pi satipaṭṭhānā ||
cattāro pi sammappadhānā || cattāro pi iddhipādā || pañca
pi indriyāni || pañca pi balāni6 || satta pi bojjhaṅgā bhāvanā
pāripūrim gacchanti || ||

[pe] || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno a- a-

jhaṅgā bhāvanā paripūrim gacchantī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).156. (8) Megha1.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave gimhānam pacchime māse ugga-
taṃ1 rajojallaṃ tam enam2 mahā akālamegho ṭhānaso
antaradhāpeti vūpasameti || || Evam eva kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulī-
karonto uppannuppānne pāpake akusale dhamme thānaso
antaradhāpeti vūpasameti || || Kathañca pana bhikkhave
bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulī-
karonto3 uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme thānaso
antaradhāpeti vūpasameti || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti || la [pe] ||
sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a-
maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto uppannup-
panne pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti
vūpasametīti || ||

SN_5,45(1).157. (9) Megha2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave uppannam mahāmegham tam
evam mahāvāto antarāyeva antaradhāpeti vūpasameti ||
evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a- aṭṭhaṅgikam mag-
gam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne
pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpeti vūpa-
sameti || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a- maggam
bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne
pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpeti vūpasa-
meti || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti || la
[pe] || sammāsamāddhiṃ bhāveti viveka- virāga- niro-

Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 51
dhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave

SN_5,45(1).158. (10) Nāvā.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave3 sāmuddikāya4 nāvāya vetta-
bandhanabandhāya5 chamasāni udake pariyenāya6 heman-
tikena thalam7 ukkhittāya vātātapaparetāni8 bandhanāni
tāni pāvussakena9 meghena abhippavuṭṭhāni10 appakasire-
neva11 paṭipassambhanti12 pūtikāni bhavanti || evam eva kho
bhikkhave bhikkhuno a- a- maggam bhāvayato a- a- mag-

bhanti pūtikāni bhavanti14 || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhik-

pūtikāni bhavantī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).159. (11) Āgantukā.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave āgantukāgāraṃ tattha pura-
tthimāya pi15 disāya āgantvā vāsaṃ kappenti || pacchimāya16
pi disāya āgantvā vāsaṃ kappenti || uttarāya pi15 disāya
āgantvā vāsam kappenti || dakkhiṇāya pi15 āgantvā disāya vā-
saṃ kappenti || khattiyā pi āgantvā vāsaṃ kappenti || brāhmaṇā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 inserts ṭhānaso.
2 B1 vūpasameti || la ||
3 B1 inserts bhikkhu.
4 B1 samuddi-
5 S1-3 vettabandhana (S3 - naṃ) omitting bandhāya.
6 B1 pariyādāya.
7 S1-3 thalejjā.
8 S1 -tape-
9 B1 pāvussikena.

52 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
pi āgantvā vāsaṃ kappenti || vessā pi āgantvā vāsaṃ kap-
penti || suddā pi āgantvā vāsaṃ kappenti || || Evam eva kho
bhikkhave bhikkhu ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento
a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto ye dhammā abhiññā1 pariñ-
ñeyyā te dhamme abhiññā parijānāti || la || ye dhammā
abhiññā pahātabbā te dhamme abhiññā pajahati || ye
dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā te dhamme abhiññā sacchi-
karoti || ye dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā te dhamme a-
bhiññā bhāveti || ||
3. Katame ca bhikkhave2 dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā ||
pañcupādānakkhandhā tissa vacaniyaṃ || katāme pañca ||
seyyathīdaṃ || Rūpupādānakkhandho || la [pe] viññāṇupā-
dānakkhandho || || Ime kho bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā
pariññeyyā || ||
4. Katame ca4 bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā || ||
Avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca ime bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā
pahātabbā || ||
5. Katame ca3 bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā ||
vijjā ca vimutti ca ime bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā sacchi-
kātabbā || ||
6. Katame ca4 bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā ||
samatho ca vipassanā ca ime bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā
bhāvetabbā || ||
7. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a- maggam bahulī-
karonto ye dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā te dhamme a-
bhiññā parijānāti || la [pe] || ye dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā
te dhamme abhiññā bhāveti || ||
8. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti || la
[pe] || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodha-
nissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhik-
khu a- a- maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto
ye dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā te dhamme abhiññā pa-
rijānāti || la || ye dhammā abhiñña pahātabbā te dhamme
abhiññā pajahati || ye dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā te
