1 S1-3 abhiññeyyā.
2 S3 inserts here bhikkhu.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 missing in S1-3.

[page 053]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 53
dhamme abhiññā sacchikaroti || ye dhammā abhiññā bhāve-
tabbā te dhamme abhiññā bhāvetī ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).160. (12) Nadī.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī pācīnaninnā pā-
cīnapoṇā pācīnapabbhārā || atha mahā janakāyo āgaccheyya
kuddālapiṭakam ādāya Mayam imaṃ Gaṅgaṃ1 nadim
pacchāninnaṃ karissāma pacchāpoṇam pacchāpabbhāranti || ||
Taṃ kim māññatha bhikkhave || api nu so mahājanakāyo
Gaṅgaṃ2 nadim pacchāninnaṃ kāreyya pacchāpoṇam
pacchāpabbhāran ti || ||
No hetam bhante || ||
Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
Gaṅgā bhante nadī pācīnaninnā pācīnapoṇā pācīnapab-
bharā || sā na sukarā pacchāninnaṃ kātum pacchāpoṇam
pacchāpabbhāraṃ || yāvadeva pana so mahā3 janakāyo kila-
mathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā ti || ||
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhum ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam
maggam bhāventam ariyam a- maggam bahulīkarontam
rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā mittā vā amaccā4 vā ñāti vā
sālohitā vā bhogehi abhihaṭṭhum pavāreyyuṃ || || Ehambho6
purisa kiṃ te ime kāsāvā anudahanti7 kim muṇḍo kapālam
anusaṃcarasi || ehi hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjassa
puññāni ca karohī ti || || So vata bhikkhave bhikkhu a- a-
maggam bhāvento a- a- maggam bahulīkaronto sikkham
paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissati9 || netam ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
Taṃ kissa hetu || || Yañhitam bhikkhave cittaṃ dīgharat-
taṃ vivekaninnaṃ vivekapoṇam vivekapabbhāram taṃ vata
hīnāyāvattissatī ti netam ṭhānam vijjati || || Kathañca bhik-
khave bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam ba-
hulīkaroti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 Gaṅgā.
2 S1-3 Gangāmahā.
3 S1-3 maha-
4 S1-3 vāmaccā instead of vā a-.
5 So B1 and B2 whose the sheet ṭaṃ begins here; S1-3 evaṃ.
6 S1-3 evambho B1 etambho.
7 B2 anudu (or da?) tanti.
8 S1-3 kabalī (S3 liṃ) manumāssaṃcarasi.
9 S1-3 -vatteyyāti.

[page 054]
54 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka-
nissitaṃ || la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggaparināmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhik-
khave bhikkhu a- a- maggam bhāveti a- a- maggam
bahulīkarotī ti || ||
Yad api balakaraṇīyaṃ tad api vitthāretabbaṃ1 || ||

Nāvā Āgantukā Nadīti6 || ||

CHAPTER VII. ESANAVAGGO SATTAMO.
17. Sāvatthinidānaṃ || ||

SN_5,45(1).161. (1) Esanā.
(I. Abhiññā)
2. Tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || katamā tisso || || Kāmesanā
bhavesanā brahmacariyesanā || || Imā kho bhikkhave tisso
esanā || || Imāsam kho8 bhikkhave tissannam esanānam
abhiññāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo8 bhāvetabbo || katamo
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ || la [pe] || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ9 || || Imāsaṃ10 kho bhik-
khave tissannam esanānam abhiññāya ayam11 ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||
4--5. -sammāsamādhim bhāveti rāga- dosa- mohapari-
yosānaṃ ||
6--7. -sammāsamāḍhim bhāveti amatogadham amataparā-
yanaṃ amatapariyosānam ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This phrase in B1-2 only.
2 B2 samatto S1-3 nothing.
3 S1-3 mūla.
4 S1-3 rukkha.
5 S1-3 sūkitaṃ.
6 S1 na, S3 nadī.
7 in B1-2 only.
8 missing in S1.
9 S3 inserts here imā kho bhikkhave tisso esanā.
10 S1 imaṃ S3 imā.
11 missing in S1-3.

[page 055]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 55
8--9. -sammāsamādhim bhāveti nibbānaninnam nibbāna-
poṇam nibbānapabbhāraṃ-1 || ||
(II. Pariññā)
10--17. Tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || katamā tisso || ||
Kāmesanā bhavesanā brahmacariyesanā || imā kho bhik-
khave tisso esanā || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam
esanānam pariññāya || la2 || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
bhāvetabbo ti || la3 || ||
Yad api abhiññā tad api pariññāya vitthāretabbaṃ4 || ||
(III. Parikkhaya)
18--25. Tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || katamā tisso || ||
Kāmesanā bhavesanā brahmacariyesanā || imā kho bhikkhave
tisso esanā || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam esanānam
parikkhayāya || la || ayam5 ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāve-
tabbo ti6 || ||
Yad api abhiññā tad api parikkhayāya vitthāre-
tabbaṃ7 || ||
(IV. Pahāna)
26--33. tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || || katamā tisso ||
Kāmesanā bhavesanā brahmacariyesanā || imā kho bhik-
khave tisso esanā || || Imāsam kho bhikkhave tissannam
esanānam pahānāya [pe] 8 || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
bhāvetabbo ti || ||
Yad api abhiññā tad api pahānāya vitthāretabbaṃ4 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 The numbers 4-9 complete in B1-2 are not even pointed out
in S1-3 - cf. the Appamāda-vaggo.
2 complete in S1-3 but only for the numbers 2-3.
3 S3 -- inserts here imā kho bhikkhave tisso esanā.
4 This advice is not to be found in the Singhalese Mss.
5 S1-3 omit || la || ayam.
6 S1-3 omit ti.
7 instead of this S1-3 have katamo ariyo- -maggo -idha-
-parikkhayāya- -maggo bhāvetabbo.
8 S1-3 abridge without even inserting -pe-, B1-2 are complete.

[page 056]
56 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.

SN_5,45(1).162. (2) Vidhā (I--IV).
[2--33] Tisso imā bhikkhave vidhā || katamā tisso || ||
Seyyo ham asmīti vidhā || Sadiso ham asmīti vidhā || Hīno
ham asmīti vidhā || || Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vidhā || ||
Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannaṃ vidhānam abhiññāya
pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
bhāvetabbo || || katamo ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti || la ||
sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitam
vossaggapariṇāmim || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannaṃ
vidhānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya
ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||
Yathā esanā evam vitthāretabbā || ||

SN_5,45(1).163. (3) Āsavo (I--IV).
[2--33] Tayo me bhikkhave āsavā || katame tayo || || Kāmā-
savo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo || || ime kho bhikkhave tayo āsavā || ||
Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam āsavānam abhiññāya
pariññāyaparikkhayāya pahānāya || pa || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).164. (4) Bhavo (I-IV).
[2--33] Tayo me bhikkhave bhavā || katame tayo || ||
Kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo || ime kho bhikkhave
tayo bhavā || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam bhavānam
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la || ayam
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).165. (5) Dukkhatā (I--IV).
[2--33] Tisso imā bhikkhave dukkhatā || katamā tisso || ||
Dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāradukkhatā vipariṇāmadukkhatā ||
imā kho bhikkhave tisso dukkhatā || || Imāsaṃ kho bhik-
khave tissannam dukkhatānam abhiññāya pariññāya parik-
khayāya pahānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
bhāvetabbo ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[page 057]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 57

SN_5,45(1).166. (6) Khilā (I--IV).
[2--33] Tayo me bhikkhave khilā || katame tayo || || Rāgo
khilo doso khilo moho khilo || ime kho bhikkhave tayo
khilā || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam khilānam
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la || ayam
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).167. (7) Malam (I--IV).
[2--33] Tīṇimāni bhikkhave malāni || katamāni tīṇi || ||
Rāgo malam doso malam moho malam || imāni kho bhik-
khave tīṇi malāni || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam
malānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ||
la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).168. (8) Nighā (I--IV).
1. Sāvatthi1 || ||
[2--33] Tayo me bhikkhave nighā || katame tayo || || Rāgo
nigho doso nigho moho nigho || ime kho bhikkhave tayo
nighā2 || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam nighānam
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ||la || ayam ariyo
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).169. (9) Vedanā (I--IV).
1. Sāvatthi1 || ||
[2--33] Tisso ima vedanā || katamā tisso || || Sukhā
vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā || imā kho
bhikkhave tisso vedanā || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissan-
naṃ vedanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pa-
hānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).170. (10) Taṇhā (viveka-) (I--IV).
1. Sāvatthi1 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B2 only.
2 S1-3 omit ime.ṇighā S3 nī- always.
3 The suttas 3-9 are so in B1-2, but more complete in S1-3 which
however do not give more than the first part (vivekanissitam etc.).

[page 058]
58 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
[2--3] Tisso imā bhikkhave taṇhā || katamā tisso || ||
Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā || imā kho bhikkhave
tisso taṇhā || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam taṇhānaṃ
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko maggo bhāvetabbo || katamo ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti viveka-
viraga- nirodhanissittaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || pa || sammā-
samādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitam vossagga-
pariṇamiṃ || ||
Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam taṇhānam abhiññāya
pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||
170. (11) Tasinā or1 Taṇhā2--4 (Rāgavinaya-) (I--IV).
[4--33] Tisso imā bhikkhave tasinā || pa || Imāsaṃ kho
bhikkhave tissannaṃ tasinānam abhiññāya pariññāya parik-
khayāya pahānāya || la || rāgavinaya- dosavimaya- mohavinaya-
pariyosānam || la || amatogadham amataparāyanam amata-
pariyosānam || pa || nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇaṃ nibbāna-
pabbhāraṃ || || Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam tasinānam
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || pa || ayam
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||
Esanavaggo sattamo2 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ3 || ||
Esanā Vidhā4 Āsavo || Bhavo5 Dukkhatā Khilā6 ||
Malaṃ7 Nigho8 ca Vedanā || Dve9 Taṇhā Tasināya cāti10 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This Tasinā (which is not to be found in the Singhalese Mss.)
is merely the complement of Taṇhā, the tenth and last text
of this chapter.
2 S1-3 omit sattamo; B2 has esanāvaggo niṭṭhito driven back to
the end.
3 S1-3 tassud- B2 omits tassa.
4 B2 vidha.
5 missing in S3; B2 adds ca.
6 S1-3 catisso khi (S1 bi?) lā (S3 laṃ).
7 S1-3 malañca.
8 S3 nīgho.
9 missing in S1-3.
10 S1-3 taṇhāyenacāti.

[page 059]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 59

CHAPTER VIII. OGHAVAGGO AṬṬHAMO.
1. Sāvatthinidānam1 || ||

SN_5,45(1).171. (1) Ogho.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave oghā || katame cattāro || || Kā-
mogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho || || ime kho bhikkhave
cattāro oghā || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam oghānam
abhiññāya pariññaya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la2 || ayam
ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||
3--33. Yathā esanā evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ3 || ||

SN_5,45(1).172. (2) Yogo.
2--33. Cattāro me bhikkhave yogā || katame cattāro || ||
Kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo || imekho bhik-
khave cattāro yogā || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnaṃ
yogānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ||
lā || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).173. (3) Upādānam.
2--33. Cattārimāni bhikkhave upādānāni || Katamāni
cattāri || || Kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānam
attavādupādānaṃ || imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri upādānāni || ||
Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam upādānānam abhiññāya
pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).174. (4) Ganthā.
2--33. Cattāro me bhikkhave ganthā4 || katame cattāro || ||
Abhijjhā5 kāyagantho || byāpādo kāyagantho || sīlabbata-
parāmāso kāyagantho || idaṃ saccābhiniveso kāyagantho ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B1 only; in B2 all the texts, save this, begin sāvatthi.
2 S1-3 are more complete in this and the following suttas,
but giving only the first development (vivekanissitam . . .).
3 This phrase in B1-2 only.
4 B1 gantā-to; B2 gandhā-dho both always.
5 S1 abhiññā.

[page 060]
60 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
ime kho bhikkhave cattāro ganthā || || Imesaṃ kho bhik-
khave catunnam ganthānam abhiññāya pariññaya parik-
khayāya pahānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).175. (5) Anusayā.
2--33. Sattime bhikkhave anusayā || katame satta || ||
Kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchā-
nusayo mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo || || Ime
kho bhikkhave satta anusayā1 || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave
sattannam anusayānaṃ abhiññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ||
la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).176. (6) Kāmaguṇa.
2--33. Pañcime bhikkhave kāmaguṇā || katame pañca || ||
Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmū-
pasaṃhitā rajanīyā || sotaviññeyyā saddā || la || ghānaviññeyyā
gandhā || la || jivhāviññeyyā rasā || la || kāyaviññeyyā phoṭ-
ṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā raja-
nīyā || || Ime kho bhikkhave pañca kāmaguṇā || || Imesaṃ
kho bhikkhave pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānam abhiññāya pa-
riññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la || ayam a- a- maggo
bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).177. (7) Nivaraṇāni.
2--33. Pañcimāni bhikkhave nivaraṇāni || katamānipañca || ||
Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ vyāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thīnamiddha-
nīvaraṇam addhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvara-
ṇaṃ || imāni kho bhikkhave pañca nīvaraṇāni || || Imesaṃ
kho bhikkhave pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānam abhiññāya pariñ-
ñāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).178. (8) Khandā.
2--33. Pañcime bhikkhave upādānakkhandhā || katame
pañca || seyyathīdaṃ || || Rūpūpādanakkhando vedanūpā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 sattānusayā instead of satta a-

[page 061]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 61
dānakkhandho saññūpādānakkhando saṅkhārūpādānak-
khandho {viññāṇūpādānakkhando} || ime kho bhikkhave pañ-
cūpādānakkhandhā || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam
upādānakkhandhānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya || la || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).179. (9) Orambhāgiya.
2--33. Pañcimāni bhikkhave orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparā-
māso kāmacchando byāpādo || imāni kho bhikkhave pañco-
rambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni || || Imesam kho bhikkhave
pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojānanam abhiññāya pa-
riññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya || pa || ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅ-
giko maggo bhāvetabbo ti || ||

SN_5,45(1).180. (10) Uddhambhāgiya.
2. Pañcimāni1 bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccam
avijjā || imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃ-
yojanāni || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddham-
bhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parik-
khayāya pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ||
katamo a- a- maggo || ||
3-17. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti
vivekanissitaṃ || la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggaparināmiṃ || || Imesaṃ kho
bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgiyānaṃ samyojanānam
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ayam a- a-
maggo bhāvetabbo ti2 || ||
Seyyathāpi3 bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī || la2 || ||
18. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccam
avijjā || imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni {saṃ-
yojanāni} || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddham-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 pañcime.
2 ti and all the sequel is to be found in B1-2 only.
3 Preceded by sāvatthi || in B2.

[page 062]
62 Magga-Saṃyuttam XLV.
bhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam abhiññaya pariññāya parik-
khayāya pahānāya a- a- maggo bhāvetabbo || katamo a- a-
maggo || ||
19--33. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhim bhāveti ||
la || sammāsamādhim bhāveti rāgavinaya- dosavinaya- moha-
vinayapariyosānam || amatogadham amataparāyanaṃ amata-
pariyosānaṃ || nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇam nibbānapab-
bhāraṃ || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddam-
bhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam abhiññāya parikkhāya pahā-
nāya ayam ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo ti1 || ||
Oghavaggo aṭṭhamo2 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ3 || ||
Ogho Yogo Upādānaṃ ||
Ganthaṃ4 Anusayena ca ||
Kāmaguṇā Nīvaraṇaṃ5 ||
Khandhā Oruddhambhāgiyāti || ||
Magga-Saṃyuttaṃ pathamaṃ7 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 The combination of the matters in this suttā is not identical to
that of Esanā 1, so that they do not agree outside although
they do inside.
2 S1-3 omit aṭṭhamo; B2 has only vaggo.
3 B1 S1-3 tassud-
4 B1 gantam B2 gandhā.
5 B1 ni-; S1-3 nīvaraṇā S3 adds ca.
6 B2 oruddhabhā- S1-3 omit ti.
7 This mention is not to be found in S1-3; B2 has samattam instead
of pathamam.

[page 063]
63

BOOK II.
BOJJHAṄGA-SAMYUTTAM XLVI.

CHAPTER I. PABBATAVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,46(2).1. (1) Himavantam.
1.2. Sāvatthi || || Tatravoca1 || ||
3. Himavantam bhikkhave pabbatarājānaṃ2 nissāya nāgā
kāyaṃ vaḍḍhenti balaṃ gāhenti || te tattha kāyaṃ vaḍ-
ḍhetvā balaṃ gāhetvā kussubbhe3 otaranti || kusubbhe
otaritvā4 mahāsobbhe otaranti || mahāsobbhe otaritvā4
kunnadiyo otaranti || kunnadiyo otaritvā mahānadiyo
otaranti || mahānadiyo otaritvā mahāsamuddasāgaram
otaranti || || Te tattha mahantatam5 vepullatam āpajjanti
kāyena || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle
patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulī-
karonto mahantatam vepullatam pāpuṇāti dhammesu || ||
Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya
satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto
mahantataṃ vepullataṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesu7 || ||
5. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
vivekanissitaṃ virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 In S1-3 only.
2 S1 -rājaṃ.
3 S1 kussu- always S3 here only.
4 B2 otaretvā.
5 S1 mahantaṃ (or mahattaṃ) always S3 here and once more B1-2
mahantattam always.
6 B1-3 vepullattam always.
7 B1 adds ti.

[page 064]
64 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgam bhāveti || la || viriyasam-
bojjhaṅgam bhāveti || la || viriyasambojjhaṅgam bhāveti || la ||
pītisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti || la || passaddhisambojjhaṅgam
bhāveti || la || samādhisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti || la || {upekhā-
sambojjhaṅgam} bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmim || ||
6. Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭ-
ṭhāya sattabojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulī-
karonto mahantataṃ vepullatam pāpuṇāti dhammesū ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).2. (2) Kāya.
1.2. Sāvatthi1 || ||
I.
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāram
paticca tiṭṭhati anāhāro no tiṭṭhati || evam eva kho bhik-
khave2 pañcanīvaraṇā āhāraṭṭhitikā āhāram paṭicca tiṭṭhan-
ti || anāhārā3 no tiṭṭhanti || ||
4. Ko ca4 bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā kāmac-
chandassa uppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyo-
bhāvāya vepullāya || || Atthi bhikkhave subhanimittam ||
tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro5 ayam āhāro anuppan-
nassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya uppannassa vā kamac-
chandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya || ||
5. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa
uppādāya uppannassa vā6 byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya ve-
pullāya || || Atthi bhikkhave paṭighanimittam || tattha ayoniso
manasikārabahulīkāro7ayam āhāro anuppannassa vā byāpā-
dassa uppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya
vepullāya || ||
6. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā thīnamid-
dhassa uppādāya uppannassa vā thīnamiddhassa bhiyyo-
bhāvaya vepullāya || || Atthi bhikkhave arati tandi vijam-
bhitā8 bhattasammado cetaso ca9 līnattaṃ10 || tattha11 ayoniso-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in S1-3 only.
2 S1-3 insert bhikkhu.
3 S1-3 B1 anāhāro.
4 S1 ci always, S3 ca here and once more.
5 S1-3 -manasikāro-
6 missing in S1.
7 S1 manasikāro-
8 S1-3 -bhikā.
9 missing in S3.
10 B1-2 lina-
11 missing in S1-3.

[page 065]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 65
manasikārabahulīkāro1 ayam āhāro anuppannassa vā thīna-
middhassa uppādāya uppannassa vā thīnamiddhassa bhiyyo-
bhāvāya vepullāya || ||
7. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā uddhacca-
kukkuccassa uppādāya uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa
bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya || || Atthi bhikkhave cetaso avūpa-
samo || tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro2 ayam āhāro
anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya uppan-
nassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya || ||
8. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppanāya vā vicikicchāya
uppādāya uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya
vepullāya || || Atthi bhikkhave vicikicchaṭṭhāniyā3 dhammā
tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro4 ayam āhāro anupan-
nāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya uppannāya vā vicikicchāya
bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya || ||
9. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhā-
ram paṭicca tiṭṭhati anāhāro no tiṭṭhati || evam eva kho
bhikkhave ime pañca nīvaraṇā āhāraṭṭhitikā āhāram paṭic-
ca tiṭṭhanti5 anāhārā no tiṭṭhanti6 || ||
II.
10. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko
āhāram paṭicca tiṭṭhati anāhāro no tiṭṭhati || evam eva kho
bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā āhāraṭṭhitikā āhāram paṭicca
tiṭṭhanti anāhārā no tiṭṭhanti || ||
11. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā satisam-
bojjhaṅgassa uppādāyā uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa
bhāvanāya7 pāripūriyā || || Atthi bhikkhave satisambojjaṅ-
gaṭṭhaniyā dhammā || tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
ayam āhāro8 anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppā-
dāya uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya7 pāri-
pūriyā || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 -manasikāro-
2 S1 -manasikāro-
3 B1-2 vicikicchā-
4 S1-3 tatthayoniso-
5 S3 tiṭṭhati.
6 S1-3 omit anāhārā no tiṭṭhanti.
7 S1 bhāvanā.
8 S3 omits ayam āhāro.

[page 066]
66 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
12. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anupannassa vā dhamma-
vicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā dhamma-
vicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā || || Atthi
bhikkhave kusalākusalā dhammā || sāvajjā navajjā1 dhammā ||
hīnapaṇītā2 dhammā || kaṇhasukkasappatibhāgā dhammā ||
tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayam āhāro anuppannassa
vā dhammavicayasambhojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā
dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā || ||
13. Ko ca3 bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā viriyasam-
bojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā viriyasambojjhaṅgassa
bhāvanāya4 pāripūriyā || || Atthi bhikkhave ārambhadhātu
nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu5 || tattha yonisomanasikāra-
bahulīkāro ayam āhāro anuppannassa vā viriyasambojjhaṅ-
gassa uppādāya uppannassa vā viriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhā-
vanāya6 pāripūriyā || ||
14. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā pītisamboj-
jhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa
bhāvānāya7 pāripuriyā || || Atthi bhikkhave pītisambhoj-
jhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammā || tattha yonisomanasikārabahulī-
kāro ayam āhāro anuppannassa vā pīti- uppādāya uppan-
nassa vā pīti-8 bhāvanāya pāripūriyā || ||
15. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā passad-
dhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā passaddhisam-
bojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā || || Atthi bhikkhave
kāyapassaddhi cittapasaddhi || tattha yonisomanasikāraba-
hulīkāro ayam āhāro anuppannassa vā passadhi- -ssa
uppādaya uppannassa vā passaddhi- -ssa bhāvanāya pāri-
pūriyā || ||
16. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisam-
bojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā samādhi- -ssa
bhāvanāya pāripūriyā || || Atthi bhikkhave samathanimittam
avyagganimittaṃ9 || tatthayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayaṃ
āhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya
uppannassa vā samādhi- -ssa bhāvanāya pāripuriyā || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 nāvajjā.
2 S1 adds ya.
3 So S3 here.
4 S1 bhāvanā.
5 S1 nikkamma- parakkamma-
6 S3 bhāvanā.
7 S1-3 bhāvanā.
8 S3 viriya-
9 S3 avyaggha-

[page 067]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 67
17. Ko ca bhikkhave āhāro anuppannassa vā upekhā-
sambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā || || Atthi bhikkhave upe-
khāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammā || tattha yonisomanasi-
kārabahulīkāro ayam āhāro anuppannassa vā upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā upekhāsambojjhaṅ-
gassa bhāvanāya1 pāripūriyā || ||
18. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāram
paṭicca tiṭṭhati anāhāro no tiṭṭhati || evam eva kho bhik-
khave ime satta bojjhaṅgā āhāratiṭṭhikā āhāram paṭicca
tiṭṭhanti anāhārā2 no tiṭṭhantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).3. (3) Sīla.3
2. Ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū4 sīlasampannā samādhisam-
pannā5 paññāsampannā6 vimuttisampannā vimuttiññāṇa-
dassanasampannā || dassanam pāham7 bhikkhave tesam
bhikkhūnam bahukāram vadāmi || ||
3. Savanam pāham bhikkhave tesam bhikkhūnam bahu-
kāram vadāmi || || Upasaṅkamanam pāham bhikkhave
tesam bhi- bahukāraṃ vadāmi || || Payirūpāsanam pāham
bhikkhave tesaṃ bhi- bahukāram vadāmi || || Anussatim
pāham bhikkhave tesam bhi- bahukāraṃ vadāmi || || Anu-
pabbajjam pāham bhikkhave tesam bhikkhūnam bahukāraṃ
vadāmi || ||
4. Taṃ kissa hetu || || Tathārūpānam bhikkhave8 bhik-
khūnam dhammaṃ sutvā dvayena vūpakāsena8 vūpakaṭṭho
viharati kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca9 || so
tathā vūpakaṭṭho viharanto taṃ dhammam anussarati
anuvitakketi || ||
5. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā10 vūpa-
kaṭṭho viharanto taṃ dhammam anussarati anuvitakketi ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 bhāvanāvanāya vā.
2 S1-3 anāhāro.
3 There is no trace of separation between this and the preceding
sutta in S1-3.
4 S3 yo . . bhikkhu.
5 S3 -sampanno.
6 B1-2 ñāṇa-
7 S1-3 paham always.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 S3 omits citta- ca.
10 S1-3 yathā.

[page 068]
68 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye tassa1 bhikkhuno ārad-
dho hoti || || Satisambojjhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ2 samaye bhikkhu
bhāveti || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhā-
vanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || || So tathā sato viharanto taṃ
dhammam paññāya pavicinati3 pavicarati parivīmaṃsam
āpajjati || ||
6. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā sato
viharanto taṃ dhammam paññāya pavicinati pavicarati
parivīmaṃsam āpajjati || dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ
samaye tassa1 bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || || Dhammavicaya-
sambojjhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || dhamma-
vicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhavanā4
pāripūriṃ gacchati || tassa taṃ dhammam paññāya pavi-
cinato pavicarato parivīmaṃsam āpajjato āraddhaṃ hoti
viriyam asallīnam || ||
7. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno taṃ dhammam
paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṃsam āpajjato
āraddham hoti viriyam asallīnaṃ || viriyasambojjhaṅgo tas-
miṃ5 samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti6 || || Viriyasamboj-
jhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ7 samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || viriyasamboj-
jhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūrim
gacchati || āraddhaviriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā || ||
8. Yasmim samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddhaviriyassa
uppajjati pīti nirāmisā || pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || || Pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ8
samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || || Pītimanassa
kāyo pi passambhati cittam pi passambhati || ||
9. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno pītimanassa
kāyo pi passambhati cittam pi pāssambhati || passaddhisam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || || Pas-
saddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ9 samaye bhikkhu bhāveti ||
passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā-

2 S3 B1-2 tasmiṃ.
3 S1-3 pavicināti.
4 missing in S1.
5 S1-3 yasmiṃ.
6 missing in S1-3.
7 S3 tasmiṃ.
8 B1 tasmiṃ.
9 B1-2 tasmiṃ.

[page 069]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 69
pāripūrim gacchati || || Passaddhakāyassa1 sukhaṃ hoti2 ||
sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati || ||
10. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno passaddha-
kāyassa1 sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati || samādhisamboj-
jhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddho hoti ||
samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ3 samaye bhikkhu4 bhāveti ||
samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā
pāripūriṃ gacchati || || So tathā samāhitam cittaṃ sādhu-
kam ajjhupekkhitā5 hoti || ||
11. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu6 tathāsamāhitaṃ
cittaṃ sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ7 samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgaṃ yasmiṃ2 samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgo8 tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ
gacchati || ||
12. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave sattasu bojjhaṅgesu
evam bahulikatesu satta phalā sattānisaṃsā pātikaṅkhā || ||
Katame satta phalā sattānisaṃsā || ||
13. Diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca9 aññam ārādheti || no
ce10 diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca11 aññam12 ārādheti || atha
maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti || ||
14. No ce10 diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca aññam ārādheti
no ce maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti || atha pañcannam oram-
bhāgiyānaṃ {saṃyojanānam} parikkayā antarāparinibbāyī
hoti || ||
15. No ce13 diṭṭheva dhamme patihacca aññam ārā-
dheti || no ce13 maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti || no ce pañcan-
nam orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā antarā-
parinibbāyī hoti || atha pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ samyo-
janānam parikkhayā upahacca parinibbāyī hoti || ||
16. No ce13 diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca aññam ārā-
dheti || no ce13 maraṇakāle aññam āradheti || no ce13 pañcan-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 passaddhi.
2 B1-2 omit sukhaṃ hoti.
3 all the Mss. tasmiṃ.
4 S1-3 add no.
5 S1-3 -pekkhitaṃ.
6 S1-3 add no.

[page 070]
70 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
nam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojānam parikkhayā antarā-
parinibbāyī hoti || no ce pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ
saṃyojanānam parikkhayā upahacca parinibbāyī hoti ||
atha pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam parik-
khayā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī1 hoti || ||
17. No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca aññam ārādheti ||
no ce2 maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti || no ce2 pañcannam
orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā antarāparinib-
bhāyī hoti || no ce pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyo-
janānam parikkhayā upahacca parinibbāyī hoti || no ce
pañcannam orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā
asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti || atha pañcannam orambhāgi-
yānaṃ saṃyojanānam parikkhayā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
hoti || ||
18. No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca aññam ārādheti3 ||
no ce maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti4 || no ce5 pañcannam
orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā antarāparinib-
bāyī hoti || no ce2 pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyo-
janānam parikkhayā upahacca parinibbāyī hoti || no ce
pañcanam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā asaṅkhāraparinib-
bāyī hoti7 || no ce6 pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyo-
janānam parikkhayā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti || atha
pañcannam orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā
uddhaṃsoto hoti akaniṭṭhagāmī || ||
19. Evam bhāvitesu8 kho bhikkhave sattasu bhojjhaṅgesu
evam bahulīkatesu ime satta phalā sattānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅ-
khā ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).4. (4) Vatta.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Sāriputto Sāvatthiyam viharati
Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme || ||
2. Tatra kho āyasmā Sāriputto bhikkhū amantesi Āvuso
bhikkhaveti || ||

1 S1-3 asaṅkhārika- always (S3 -rīka here only; S1-3 adds ve.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S1 dhāreti.
4 S1 dhāreti once more, S3 omits the whole phrase.
5 missing in S1.
6 This phrase is missing in S1-3.
7 S1 bhāvitosu.
8 S1-3 bhikkhavoti.

[page 071]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 71
Āvuso ti te bhikkhū āyasmato Sāriputtassa paccas-
sosuṃ || ||
Āyasmā Sāriputto etad avoca || ||
3. Sattime āvuso bojjhaṅgā || katame satta || satisamboj-
jhaṅgo || dhammavicaya- || viriya- || pīti- || passaddhi- || samādhi- ||
upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || ime kho1 āvuso satta bojjhaṅgā || ||
4. Imesaṃ khvāham1 āvuso sattannam bojjhaṅgānaṃ yena
yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṃ viharituṃ
tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ viharāmi || || Yena
yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi majjhantikaṃ samayaṃ vi-
harituṃ || tena tena bojjhaṅgena majjhantikaṃ2 samayaṃ
viharāmi || || Yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi sāyanha-
samayaṃ viharitum || tena tena bojjhaṅgena sāyanhasamayaṃ
viharāmi3 || ||
5. Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me āvuso hoti || Appamāṇo
ti me hoti || Susamāraddho ti me hoti || tiṭṭhantaṃ ca naṃ4
Tiṭṭhatīti pajānāmi || || Sa ce pi5 me cavati Idappaccayā
me cavatīti pajānāmi6 ||
6-10. || la7 ||
11. Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me āvuso hoti || Appa-
māṇo ti me hoti || Susamāraddho ti me hoti || tiṭṭhantaṃ ca
naṃ Tiṭṭhatīti pajānāmi || || Sa ce pi me cavati Idappac-
cayā me cavatīti pajānāmi8 || ||
12. Seyyathāpi āvuso rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā
nānārattānaṃ9 dussānam dussakaraṇḍako10 pūro assa || so11
yaññadeva dussayugam ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayam pāru-
pituṃ12 || taṃ tad eva dussayugam pubbaṇhasamayam
pārupeyya || || Yaññad eva dussayuham ākaṅkheyya maj-
jhantikaṃ13 samayam pārupituṃ || tan tad eva dussayugam
majjhantikaṃ13 samayam pārupeyya || || Yaññadeva dus-
sayugam ākaṅkheyya sāyaṇhasamayam pārupituṃ || tan tad
eva dussayugam sāyanhasamayam pārupeyya || ||

2 S1 -ka.
3 S1 -mīti.
4 S1-3 omit ca naṃ always.
5 missing in S3.
6 S3 -mīti.
7 S1-3 have a stroke but S1 a pe erased.
8 S3 pajānāti.
9 S3 nānarattānaṃ S1 nānattānaṃ.
10 S1-3 -raddhak-
11 S1-3 omit assa so.
12 S1 pārū- B1 pārum- both always.
13 S1-3 -tika.

[page 072]
72 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
13. Evam eva khvāham1 āvuso imesaṃ sattannam
bojjhaṅgānaṃ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṃ-
hasamayam viharituṃ || tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasa-
mayaṃ viharāmi || || Yena yena- omajjhantikaṃ samayaṃ
viharāmi || Yena yena- osāyaṇhasamayaṃ viharāmi2 || ||
14. Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me āvuso hoti Appamāno
ti me3 hoti- ocavatīti pajānāmi4 || ||
15-19. || la ||
20. Upekhāsambhojjhaṅgo- -Idappaccayā me cavatīti pa-
jānāmīti5 || ||

SN_5,46(2).5. Bhikkhu.
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkhami || la [pe] || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu
Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgā ti bhante
vuccatīti || Kittāvatā6 nu kho bhante bojjhaṅgāti vuccan-
tīti || ||
Bodhāya saṃvattantīti kho bhikkhu tasmā7 bojjhaṅgā ti
vuccanti || ||
3. Idha bhikkhu8 bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitam vossaggaparināmiṃ || la [pe] ||
upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanis-
sitaṃ9 vossagapariṇamiṃ ||
4. Tassime10 satta bojjhaṅge bhāvayato kāmāsavā pi cittaṃ
vimuccati || bhavāsavā pi cittaṃ vimuccati || avijjāsavā pi
cittaṃ vimuccati || Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamhīti11 || ñāṇaṃ
hoti || khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyaṃ kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ
nāparam itthattāyāti pajānāti ||
5. Bodhāya saṃvattantī ti kho12 bhikkhu13 tasmā14 boj-
jhaṅgā ti vuccantī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 kho (S1 ko) ham.
2 as the number 4.
3 S1 iti.
4 as 5.
5 as 11. The number 13-20 are the rehearsal of 4-11 without
any change.
6 S3 kittāva.
7 missing in S3.
8 S1-3 B2 bhikkhave.
9 S1 omits nirodha-
10 S1-3 sattime.
11 S1-3 vimutta (S3 -tti) miti.
12 missing in B1.
13 inserts ce.
14 taccamā.

[page 073]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 73

SN_5,46(2).6. (6) Kuṇḍali.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sākete viharati Añcana-
vane1 Migadāye || ||
2. Atha kho Kuṇḍaliyo paribbājako yena Bhagavā2
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sam-
modi || sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sārāṇīyam vītisāretvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Kuṇḍaliyo pa-
ribbājako Bhagavantam etad avoca 1|| ||
3 Aham asmi bho3 Gotama ārāmanisādi4 parisāvacaro ||
tassa mayham bho Gotama pacchābhattam bhuttapātarā-
sassa5 ayam ācāro6 hoti || ārāmena7 ārāmam uyyānena
uyyānam anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi || so tattha passāmi
eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe itivādapamokkhānisaṃsaṃ8 ceva9
katham kathente upārambhānisaṃsañ ca || bhavaṃ pana
Gotamo kimānisaṃso viharatīti || ||
Vijjāvimuttiphalānisaṃso kho Kuṇḍaliya tathāgato vi-
haratīti || ||
4. Katame pana bho Gotama dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā vijjāvimuttim paripūrentīti || ||
Satta kho Kuṇḍaliya sambojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulikatā
vijjāvimuttim paripūrentī ti || ||
5. Katame pana bho Gotama dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā sattabojjhaṅge paripūrentī ti || ||
Cattāro kho Kuṇḍaliya satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
sattabojjhaṅge paripūrentī ti || ||
6. Katame pana bho Gotama dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā10 cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrentī ti || ||
Tīṇi kho Kuṇḍaliya sucaritāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni
cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrentīti || ||
7. Katame pana bho Gotama dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā tiṇi sucaritāni paripūrentīti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 añjana-
2 S1 bhagava.
3 S3 asmiṃ, omitting bho B1 ayam-
4 S1-3 ārāmā- B1-2 -nissādi.
5 S3 bhukta-
6 S1 āvāro B1-2 āhāro.
7 S1 āromena.
8 B1-2 -dapā- S1 -mokhā.
9 S1-3 eva.
10 S1 -kata.

[page 074]
74 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
Indriyasaṃvaro kho Kuṇḍaliya1 bhāvito bahulīkato tīni
sucaritāni paripūrentīti || || Katham bhāvito ca2 Kuṇḍaliya3
indriyasaṃvaro katham bahulīkato tīni sucaritāni pari-
pūreti4 || ||
8. Idha Kuṇḍaliya1 bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā
manāpaṃ nābhijjhati5 nābhihaṃsati na rāgaṃ janeti || tassa
ṭhito ca6 kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ7 cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ8
suvimuttaṃ || || Cakkhunā kho paneva rūpaṃ disvā amanā-
paṃ na maṅku hoti || apatiṭṭhitacitto9 ādīnamānaso10 avyā-
pannacetaso || tassa ṭhito ca kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittam
ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitam suvimuttaṃ || ||
9-12. Puna ca paraṃ Kuṇḍaliya bhikkhu sotena sad-
dam sutvā || la [pe] || ghaneṇa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā || la [pe] ||
jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā || la [pe] || kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ
phusitvā || la [pe] ||
13. Manasā dhammaṃ viññāya manāpaṃ nābhijjhati11
nābhihaṃsati na rāgaṃ janeti || tassa ṭhito va12 kāyo hoti
ṭhitaṃ cittam ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ || || Ma-
nasā13 kho paneva14 dhammaṃ viññāya amanāpaṃ na
maṅku hoti || apatiṭṭhitacitto ādīnamanaso15 avyāpannacetaso ||
tassa ṭhito va12 kāyo16 hoti ṭhitaṃ cittam ajjhattaṃ susaṇ-
ṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ || ||
14. Yato kho Kuṇḍaliya bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpam disvā
manāpāmanāpesu rūpesu ṭhito ca17 kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittam
ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitam suvimuttam || sotena saddaṃ sutvā ||
la [pi] || ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā || la [pe] jivhāya rasaṃ
sāyitvā || la [pe] || kāyena poṭṭhabbam phusitvā || la [pe] ||
manasā dhammaṃ viññāya manāpāmanāpesu dhammesu
ṭhito ca kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 kuṇḍalīya.
2 missing in B1-2
3 B1 kuṇḍiliya.
4 B1 -pūrenti S1-3 pūrentīti.
5 S1-3 nābhijjati.
6 put after kāyo in S1-3.
7 S3 paṭṭhita S1 paṭṭhiti.
8 S1-3 susaṃvihitaṃ.
9 B2 appa- S1-3 apatiṭṭhika-
10 S1 ādina- B1-2 adina- S1-3 -manaso.
11 S1 nābhijati S3 nābhijjati as before.
12 B1-2 ca.
13 S3 manāsā.
14 S1-3 panetaṃ.
15 B1 ādina S1-3 -manaso B2 adinamāso.
16 S3 adds va.
17 S1-3 ṭhiteva instead of ṭhito ca.

[page 075]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 75
suvimuttaṃ || evam bhāvito kho Kuṇḍaliya indriyasaṃvaro
evam bahulīkato tīni sucaritāni paripūreti1 || ||
15. Katham bhāvitāni ca Kuṇḍaliya tīṇi sucaritāni
katham bahulīkatāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti1 || ||
Idha Kuṇḍaliya khikkhu kāyaduccaritam pahāya kāyasu-
caritam bhāveti || vacīduccaritam pahāya vacīsucaritam
bhaveti || manoduccaritam pahāya manosucaritam bhāveti || ||
Evam bhāvitāni kho Kuṇḍaliya tīṇi sucaritāni evam ba-
hulīkatāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti || ||
16. Katham bhāvitā ca Kuṇḍaliya cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
katham bahulīkatā sattabojjhaṅge paripūrenti || || Idha
Kuṇḍaliya2 bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī sam-
pajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || vedanāsu ||
pa (-pe) || citte || pa -- pe || dhamme dhammānupassī viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Evam bhāvitā kho Kuṇḍaliya cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evam
bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti || ||
17. Katham bhāvitā ca Kuṇḍaliya satta bojjhaṅgā
katham bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrenti || || Idha Kuṇ-
ḍaliya bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga-
nirodanissitaṃ vossaggaparināmiṃ || la || upekhāsambojjhaṅ-
gam bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapari-
nāmiṃ || || Evam bhāvitā kho Kuṇḍaliya satta bojjhaṅgā
evam bahulīkatā3 vijjāvimuttiṃ4 paripūrentīti || ||
18. Evaṃ vutte Kuṇḍaliyo paribbājako Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Abhikkantam bho Gotama || pe || pāṇupetam
saraṇaṃ gatan ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).7. Kūṭa.
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopāna-
siyo5 sabbā tā kūṭaninnā kūṭapoṇā kūṭapabbhārā || evam
eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta
bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo
nibbānapabbhāro || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -purentīti.
2 S1 kuṇḍali.
3 S1 evambhāvitā.
4 S1 vimuttim without vijjā.
5 S1 gopanasiso.

[page 076]
76 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
4. Kathañ ca1 bhikkhave bhikkhu satta bojjhaṅge bhā-
vento satta bojjhaṅge2 bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti
nibbānapoṇo o pabbhāro || || Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sati-
sambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || la [-pe] || upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhā-
veti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ||
Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento
satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbāna-
poṇo nibbānapabbhāroti || ||

SN_5,46(2).8. (8) Upavāna.
1. Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca Upavāṇo āyasmā ca Sāri-
putto3 Kosambiyaṃ viharanti Ghositārāme || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto sāyānhasamayam paṭi-
sallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā Upavāṇo tenupasaṅkami || upa-
saṅkamitvā āyasmatā Upavāṇena saddhiṃ sammodi || sam-
modanīyaṃ sarāṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ||
Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Sāriputto āyasmantam
Upavāṇam etad avoca || ||
3. Jāneyya4 nu kho āvuso Upavāṇa bhikkhu Paccattaṃ
yonisomanasikārā5 evaṃ susamāraddhā me6 sattabojjhaṅgā
phāsuvihārāya {saṃvattantīti} || ||
4. Jāneyya7 kho āvuso Sāriputta bhikkhu Paccattaṃ
yonisomanasikārā evam sūsamāraddhā me8 satta boj-
jhaṅgā phāsuvihārāya {saṃvattantīti} || || Satisambojjhaṅgam9
āvuso bhikkhu ārambhamāno10 va janāti11 || || Cittañ ca me
suvimuttam12 thīnamiddhañca me susamūhataṃ uddhacca-
kukkuccañ ca me suppaṭivinītaṃ13 āraddhañca me viriyam
aṭṭhikatvā14 manasikaromi no ca līnan ti || la-pe || Upekhā-
sambojjhaṅgam āvuso bhikkhu ārambhamāno va jānāti11

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 Kathamhi.
2 S1-3 omit satta-
3 S1-3 Atimutto -a always (S3 Atimutte here).
4 S1 jāneyyā.
5 S1-3 -kāro always.
6 S1-3 ime.
7 S1 jāneyyā; S1-3 insert nu.
8 missing in S3.
9 B1 inserts kho.
10 B1-2 ārabbha- always.
11 B1-2 pajānāmi instead of va- always.
12 S3 sucittaṃ.
13 S1 -viddhānitaṃ S3 -ghānitam.
14 B1-2 aṭṭhiṃ- always.

[page 077]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 77
Cittañ ca me suvimuttaṃ thīnamiddhañ ca me susamū-
hatam1 uddhaccakukuccañ ca me suppaṭivinītam ārad-
dhañ ca me viriyam aṭṭhikatvā manasīkaromi no ca līnan ti || ||
Evaṃ kho āvuso Sāriputta jāneyya Paccattam yonisomana-
sikārā evaṃ susamāraddhā me satta bojjhaṅgā phāsuvi-
hārāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).9. (9) Uppannā (or Uppāda)1.
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā anup-
pannā uppajjanti || naññatra Tathāgatassa pātubhāvā ara-
hato sammāsambuddhassa || katame satta || ||
3. Satisambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || ||
Ime2 kho3 bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
anuppannā uppajjanti || nāññatra Tathāgatassa pātubhāvā
arahato sammāsambuddhassā ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).10. (10) Uppannā (or Uppāda)2.
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
anuppannā uppajjanti || nāññatra Sugatavinayā || katame
satta || ||
3. Satisambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || || Ime
kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā anup-
pannā uppajjanti || nāññatra Sugatavinayāti4 || ||
Pabbatavaggo pathamo5 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ6 || ||
Himavantaṃ Kāyaṃ Sīlaṃ7 ||
Vattam8 Bhikkhu ca Kuṇḍali9 ||
Kūṭañca10 Upavāṇañca ||
Uppannā11 apare duveti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 susamāhataṃ.
2 S1 itime.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 This number with the words katame satta of the preceding one is
awkwardly rehearsed in S1.
5 S1-3 Paṭhamo vaggo only.
6 S1-3 tatruddānaṃ.
7 S1-3 Kāyo sīlañca.
8 S1-3 Vatta.
9 S3 adds ya.
10 S1-3 Kuṭa. All the Mss. have ku- always.
11 S1-3 Uppāde.

[page 078]
78 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.

CHAPTER II. GILĀNAVAGGO DUTIYO.

SN_5,46(2).11. (1) Pāṇā.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ye keci pāṇā cattāro iriyāpathe
kappenti kālena gamanam kālena ṭhānaṃ kālena nisajjaṃ
kālena seyyam || sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviyam1
patiṭṭhāya evam ete cattāro iriyāpathe kappenti || evam eva
kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta
bojjhaṅge bhāveti satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaroti || ||
3. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu silaṃ nissāya sīle pa-
tiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāveti satta bojjhaṅge2 bahulī-
karoti || || Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam
bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ ||
la [pe] || upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga- niro-
dhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave
bhikkhu sīlam nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya3 satta bojjhaṅge
bhāveti satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkarotī ti4 || ||

SN_5,46(2).12. (2) Suriyassa upamā 1.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato etam pubbaṅgamam
etam pubbanimittam yad idam aruṇuggam5 || evam eva kho
bhikkhave bhikkhuno sattannam bojjhaṅgānam uppādāya
etam pubbaṅgamam etam pubbanimittaṃ yad idaṃ ka-
lyāṇamittatā || || Kalyaṇamittassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno
pātikaṅkham6 satta bojjhaṅge bhāvessati satta bojjhaṅge
bahulīkarissati7 || ||
3. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto satta boj-
jhaṅge bhāveti satta- bahulīkaroti || || Idha bhikkhave
bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti vivekanissitam || la-pe ||
upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodha-
nissitam vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 pathavim (S1 -vi).
2 S3 omits satta.
3 S3 omits sīlam nissāya-.
4 S3 karoti.
5 S1-3 aruṇaggam always.
6 S1-3 -kaṅkhā.
7 B1-2 -karissatīti.

[page 079]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 79
bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto satta bojjhaṅge bhāveti satta bhoj-
jhaṅge bahulīkarotīti || ||

SN_5,46(2).13. (3) Suriyassa upamā 2.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato etam pubbaṅgamam
etam pubbanimittaṃ yadidam aruṇuggam || evam eva kho
bhikkhave bhikkhuno sattannam bojjhaṅgānam uppādāya
etam pubbaṅgamam etam pubbanimittaṃ yad idaṃ yoniso-
manasikāro || || Yonisomanasikārasampannessetam bhikkhave
bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ1 satta bojjhaṅge bhāvessati satta
bojjhaṅge bahulīkarissati2 || ||
3. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu yoniso manasikāra-
sampanno satta bojjhaṅge bhāveti sattabojjhaṅge bahulī-
karoti || || Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam
bhāveti || pe-la || upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka-
virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ kho
bhikkhave bhikkhu yonisomanasikārasampanno satta boj-
jhaṅge bhāveti sattabojjhaṅge bahulīkarotī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).14. (4) Gilanā 1
1. Evam me sutam3 ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Rājagahe
viharati Veḷuvane Kalandakanivāpe || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā Mahā-Kassapo
pipphalīguhāyam4 viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷha-
gilāno || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavā sāyaṇhasamayam paṭisallāṇā vuṭ-
ṭhito yenāyasmā Mahā-Kassapo tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅka-
mitvā paññatte āsane nisidi || ||
4. Nisajja kho Bhagavā āyasmantam Mahā-Kassapam
etad avoca || || Kacci te Kassapa khamanīyam kacci
yāpanīyaṃ kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhik-
kamanti paṭikkamo sānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -kankhā.
2 S1-2 -karissatīti.
3 This phrase in S1-3 only.
4 S3 - li B1-2 pippalī (B2 -li).

[page 080]
80 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na me1 yāpanīyaṃ bāḷhā
me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikammanti abhik-
kamo sānam paññāyati no patikkamo ti2 || ||
4. Sattime Kassapa bojjhaṅgā mayā sammad akkhātā
bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya sam-
vattanti || katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo kho Kassapa
mayā sammad akkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sam-
bodhāya nibbānāya3 saṃvattati || la4 || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
kho Kassapa mayā sammad akkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato
abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || || Ime kho
Kassapa satta bojjhaṅgā mayā sammad akkhātā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattan-
tī ti || ||
Taggha Bhagava5 bojjhaṅgā taggha Sugata bojjhaṅgā ti || ||
5. Idam avoca Bhagavā || attamano āyasmā Mahā-Kas-
sapo Bhagavato bhāsitam abhinandi || vuṭṭhāhi ca āyasmā6
Mahā-Kassapo tamhā ābādhā7 || || Tathā pahīno cāyas-
mato Mahā-Kassapassa so ābhādho ahosī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).15. (5) Gilāna 2.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Rājagahe viharati Veḷuvane
Kalandakanivāpe || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno8
Gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati ābhādhiko dukkhito bāḷha-
gilāno || ||
3-5. Atha kho Bhagavā sāyanhasamayam paṭisallānā
vuṭṭhito- -Tathā pahīno cāyasmato Mahā-
Moggalānassa so ābādho ahosīti9 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B2 only.
2 S1 paṭikkhamoti.
3 S1 nibbānā.
4 more complete in S1-3; but S1 omits the second and the third
sambojjhaṅgo; and S3 adds between the lines the first and
the second which had been omitted.
5 B1-2 Bhagavā.
6 S1-3 cāyasmā.
7 S1 ādhā.
8 S1-3 Mogallā- always.
9 This text does not differ from the preceding one, but by the
change of name.

[page 081]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 81

SN_5,46(2).16. (6) Gilāna 3.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Rājagahe viharati Veḷuvane
Kalandakanivāpe || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Bhagavā ābādhiko hoti
dukkhito bāḷhagilāno1 || ||
3. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Cundo yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antam nisīdi || ||
4. Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ2 kho āyasmantam Mahā-Cun-
dam Bhagavā etad avoca || || Paṭibhantu taṃ Cunda boj-
jhaṅgā ti || ||
5. Sattime bhante bojjhaṅgā Bhagavatā sammad ak-
khātā3 bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodāya nibbānāya
{saṃvattanti} || katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo kho bhante
Bhagavatā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya
sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || la-pe || Upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgo kho bhante Bhagavatā sammadakkhāto bhāvito
bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || ||
Ime kho bhante satta bojjhaṅgā Bhagavatā sammadak-
khātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbā-
nāya saṃvattantīti4 || ||
Taggha Cunda bojjhaṅgā taggha Cunda bojjhaṅgā ti || ||
6. Idam avocāyasmā5 Mahā-Cundo samanuñño satthā
āhosi6 || vuṭṭhāhi ca Bhagavā tamhā ābādhā || || Tathā
pahīno ca Bhagavato so ābādho ahosīti || ||

SN_5,46(2).17. (7) Pāraṅgāmi or Aparam.
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
apārāpāraṅgamanāya7 {saṃvattanti} || katame satta || || Sati-
sambojjhaṅgo || la || pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || || Ime kho
bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā apārāpāraṅ-
gamanāya7 saṃvattantī ti || ||
3. Idam avoca 8|| ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 bāḷhā.
2 S1 nisinno.
3 S1 -akkhatā.
4 S1 -vattati.
5 S1 avocayasmā.
6 S1-3 ahosīti.
7 S1-3 aparāparaṃ-
8 in S1-3 only.

[page 082]
82 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
Appakā te manussesu || pe ||
Te loke parinibbutā ti1 || ||

SN_5,46(2).18. (8) Viraddho or Āraddho.
2. Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā viraddhā ||
viraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī2 || ||
Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā āraddhā || ārad-
dho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī || || Ka-
tame satta || Satisambojjhaṅgo || || la-pe || Upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgo || ||
3. Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ime satta bojjhaṅgā virad-
dhā || viraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammā dukkhak-
khayagāmī || || Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ime satta bojjhaṅgā
āraddhā || āraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhak-
khagāmī ti3 || ||

SN_5,46(2).19. (9) Ariyo.
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ariyā
niyyānikā niyyanti4 takkarassa sammādukkhakkhayāya ||
katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || Upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgo5 || || Ime kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā ariyā niyyānikā niyyanti takkarassa sammā-
dukkhakkhayāyāti || ||

SN_5,46(2).20. (10) Nibbidā.
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya
sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti || katame satta || || Sati-
sambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || || Ime kho
bhikkhave satta bojjhāṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbi-
dāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya6 abhiññāya sambod-
hāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So S1-3; complete in B1-2 See the Stanzas of Magga-S. IV 4 (p.24).
2 S1 -khayā-
3 S1 -gāmiti S3 -gāminti.
4 S1-3 nīyanti.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 missing in S1-3.

[page 083]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 83
Gilānavaggo dutiyo1
Tassuddānaṃ2 || ||
Pāṇā Suriyūpamā dve3 ||
Gilānā4 apare tayo ||
Pāraṅgāmī Viraddho ca5 ||
Ariyo6 Nibiddāya cāti || ||

CHAPTER III. UDĀYIVAGGO TATIYO.

SN_5,46(2).21. (1) Bodhanā.
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā ekām antaṃ nisīdi7 || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgāti bhante vuccanti || ||
Kittāvatā8 nu kho bhante Bhojjhaṅgā ti vuccantī ti || ||
Bodhāya9 saṃvattantīti kho bhikkhu || tasmā Bhojjhaṅgāti
vuccanti || ||
3. Idha10 bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti || pe-la ||
{Upekhāsambojjhaṅgam} bhāveti11 vivekanissitam virāga-
nissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇamiṃ || ||
4. Bodhāya9 saṃvattantī ti kho bhikkhu tasmā Bojjhaṅgā
ti vuccantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).22. (2) Desanā.
2. Satta vo12 bhikkhave bojjhaṅge desissāmi tam suṇātha || ||
Katame ca bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā || || Satisambojjhaṅgo ||
la [pe] || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || || Ime kho bhikkhave satta
bojjhaṅgā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add vaggo omitting gilāna-
2 S1-3 uddānaṃ.
3 S1-3 pāṇopavesuriye; S1 has pāṇe- corrected from pāṇo.
4 S1-3 gilāno.
5 S1-3 aparamaraddhoti ca instead of pāraṃ-
6 S1-3 ariya.
7 S1-3 bhagavantam abhivādetvā -pe- instead of ekam-
8 S3 kittāva.
9 B1-2 sambodhāya.
10 S1-3 B2 insert bhikkhave.
11 S1-3 bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ.
12 S1-3 sattime.

[page 084]
84 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.

SN_5,46(2).23. (3) Ṭhānā.
2. Kāmarāgaṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammānam mana-
sikārabahulīkārā anuppanno ceva1 kāmacchando uppajjati
uppanno ca2 kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃ-
vattati3 || ||
3. Byāpādaṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammānam mana-
sikārabahulīkārā4 anuppanno ceva byāpādo uppajjati ||
uppanno ca byāpado bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati5 || ||
4. Thīnamiddhaṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammānam
manasikārabahulīkārā anuppannañ ceva thīnamiddham
uppajjati || uppannañca6 thīnamiddham bhiyyobhāvāya ve-
pullāya saṃvattati || ||
5. Uddhaccakukkaccaṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammānam
manasikārabahulīkārā anuppannañ7 ceva uddhaccakuk-
kuccam uppajjati || uppannañ7 ca uddhaccakukkuccam
bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati || ||
6. Vicikicchāṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammānam mana-
sikārabahulīkārā anuppannā ceva vicikicchā uppajjati ||
uppannā ca vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati || ||
7. Satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammānam
manasikārabahulīkārā8 anuppanno ceva satisambojjhaṅgo
uppajjati || upanno ca9 satisambojjhaṅgo bhāvanā pāri-
pūriṃ gacchati || la-pe ||
8. Upekhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānam bhikkhave dhammā-
nam manasikārabahulīkārā anuppanno ceva upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgo uppajjati || uppanno ca upekhāsambojjhaṅgo bhā-
vanā pāripūrim gacchatī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).24. (4) Ayoniso.
2. Ayoniso bhikkhave manasikaroto10 anuppanno ceva
kāmacchando uppajjati || uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyo-
bhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 eva.
2 S1-3 ceva.
3 S1-3 samvattanti (S3 -ntī).
4 each letter of bahulīkārā is crossed by a vertical streak in S1.
5 S1 anuppannā-
6 S1 uppannā ca S3 uppanno ceva.
7 S1-3 anuppannā . . . uppannā.
8 S1 manasikārā-
9 S1-3 ceva.
10 S1-3 manasikāro B1 -kareto.

[page 085]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 85
3. Anuppanno ceva1 byāpādo uppajjati || uppanno ca
byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati ||
4. Anuppannaṃ ceva thīnamiddham uppajjati || uppannañca
thīnamiddham bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati || ||
5. Anuppannaṃ ceva2 uddhaccakukkaccam uppajjati ||
uppannaṃ ca uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhāvāya vepul-
lāya saṃvattati || ||
6. Anuppannā ceva vicikicchā uppajjati || uppannā ca vivi-
kicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati || ||
7. Anuppanno ceva satisambojjhaṅgo nuppajjati uppano
ca satisambojjhaṅgo nirujjhati || la-pe || Anuppanno ceva
upekhāsambojjhaṅgo nuppajjati || uppanno ca upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgo nirujjhati3 || ||
8. Yoniso ca kho4 bhikkhave manasikaroto anuppanno
ceva kāmacchando nuppajjati || uppanno ca kāmacchando
pahīyati || ||
9. Anuppanno ceva byāpādo nuppajjati || uppanno ca byā-
pādo pahīyati || ||
10. Anuppannañ5 ceva thīnamiddhaṃ nuppajjati || uppan-
naṃ ca ṭhīnamiddham pahīyati6 || ||
11. Anuppannañ7 ceva uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nuppajjati ||
uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccam pahīyati || ||
12. Anuppannā ceva vicikicchā nuppajjati || uppannā ca
vicikicchā pahīyati || ||
13. Anuppanno ceva satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati8 || up-
panno ca satisambojjhaṅgo bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati ||
la-pe || || anuppanno ceva upekhāsambojjhaṅgo uppajjati ||
uppanno ca upekhāsambojjhaṅgo bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gac-
chatī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).25. (5) Aparihāni.
2. Satta vo bhikkhave aparihāniye dhamme desissāmi ||
taṃ suṇātha || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ca always.
2 So S1-3 here only.
3 S1-3 have -pe- instead of uppanno ca-
4 S1-3 omit ca kho.
5 B1 anuppanno.
6 This number is missing in S1-3.
7 S1 anuppanna.
8 S1 nuppaj-

[page 086]
86 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
3. Katame ca bhikkhave satta aparihāniyā dhammā ||
yad idam satta bojjhaṅgā || katame satta || || Satisamboj-
jhaṅgo || la-pe || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo || || Ime kho bhikkhave
satta aparihāniyā dhammā ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).26. (6) Khayo.
2. Yo bhikkhave maggo yā paṭipadā taṇhakkhayāya1
saṃvattati2 || tam maggaṃ tam paṭipadam bhāvetha || ||
3. Katamo ca bhikkhave maggo katamā ca paṭipadā
taṇhakkhayāya1 {saṃvattati}2 || yadidaṃ satta bojjhaṅgā ||
katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgo ti || ||
4. Evaṃ vutte āyasmā Udāyi Bhagavantam etad avoca ||
Katham bhāvitā nu kho bhante satta bojjhaṅgā katham
bahulīkatā taṇhakkhayāya saṃvattantīti3 || ||
5. Idha Udāyi4 bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossagaparināmiṃ5 vipu-
laṃ6 mahaggatam appamāṇam abyāpajjhaṃ7 || tassa8 {sati-
sambojjhaṅgam} bhāvayato viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇamiṃ vipulam mahaggatam appamāṇam abyā-
pajjhaṃ taṇhā pahīyati || || tanhāya9 pahānā kammam pa-
hīyati || kammassa pahānā dukkham pahīyati10 || ||
6-11. || la ||
12. Upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga- niro-
dhanissitam vossaggapariṇāmim11 vipulam mahaggatam12
appamāṇam abyāpajjhaṃ || tassa upekhāsambojjhaṅgam
bhāvayato viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇā-
miṃ11 vipulam mahaggatam appamāṇam abyāpajjhaṃ taṇhā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 taṇhā-
2 S1-3 saṃvattanti.
3 S1-3 saṃvattantī ti.
4 S1-3 idhudāyi instead of idha-
5 missing in B1-2.
6 S1-3 vepulla B2 vipullam both always.
7 B1-2 abyāpajjam always.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 B1 taṇhā.
10 This phrase (from taṇhāpahānā) is missing in S1-3 although it be
to be found further on (No 12).
11 missing in B1.
12 S1-3 omit vipulaṃ-

[page 087]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 87
pahīyati || taṇhāya pahānā1 kammam pahīyati || kammassa
pahānā dukkham pahīyati || ||
13. Iti kho Udāyi taṇhakkhayā kammakkhayo kammak-
khayā2 dukkhakkhayo ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).27. (7) Nirodho3.
2. Yo bhikkhave maggo yā paṭipadā taṇhānirodhāya
saṃvattati4 || tam {maggaṃ} tam paṭipadam bhāvetha ||
3. Katamo ca bhikkhave maggo katamā ca5 pati-
padā taṇhānirodhāya6 {saṃvattati}5 || yad idaṃ satta boj-
jhaṅgā || katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || upek-
kāsambojjhaṅgo || ||
4. Katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā katham
bahulīkatā taṇhānirodhāya saṃvattanti || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti ||
viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇamiṃ || la-pe ||
upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanis-
sitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ||
5. Evam7 bhāvitā kho bhikkhave8 satta bojjhaṅgā evam
bahulīkatā taṇhānirodhāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).28. (8) Nibbedho.
2. Nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ vo bhikkhave maggaṃ desissāmi ||
taṃ suṇātha || ||
3. Katamo ca bhikkhave nibbedhabhāgiyo maggo || ||
Yad idam satta bojjhaṅgā || katame sattā || Satisamboj-
jhaṅgo || pa-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo ti || ||
4. Evam vutte āyasmā Udāyi Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
Katham bhāvitā nu kho bhante satta bojjhaṅgā katham
bahulīkatā nibbedhāya saṃvattantī ti || ||
5. Idha Udāyi9 bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam10 bhāveti
viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ11 vipulam12 mahaggatam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ya.
2 S1 kammadukkhayā.
3 There is no sign of separation in S1-3 between this and the
preceding sutta.
4 S1-3 saṃvattanti.
5 missing in S1-3
6 S1 -nirodhā.
7 missing in S1.
8 S1-3 bhikkhu.
9 S1-3 idhudāyi.
10 S1 sattabojjhaṅgaṃ.
11 S1-3 omit nirodha-
12 S1-3 vepulla B1 vipullam both always.

88 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
appamāṇam abyāpajjham1 || so satibojjhaṅgam bhāvitena
cittena anibbiddhapubbam2 appadālitapubbam lobhak-
khandham nibbijjhati3 padāleti || anibbhiddhapubbam2 appa-
dālitapubbam dosakkhandham nibbijjhati3 padāleti || anib-
biddhapubbam appadālitapubbam mohakkhandham nibbij-
jhati4 padāleti || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka-
virāga- nirodhanissitām vipulam mahaggatam appamāṇam
abyāpajjhaṃ || So5 upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāvitena anib-
biddhapubbam6 appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandham nib-
bijjhati padāleti || anibbiddhapubbam7 appadālitapubbaṃ
dosakkhandham nibbijjhati padāleti || anibbiddhapubbam7
appadālitapubbam mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāleti || ||
6. Evam bhāvitā kho Udāyi satta bojjhaṅgā evam bahulī-
katā nibbedhāya8 saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).29. (9) Ekadhamma.
2. Nāham bhikkhave aññam ekadhammam pi samanu-
passāmi yo9 evam bhāvito bahulīkato10 saṃyojaniyānaṃ
dhammānam pahānāya saṃvattati11 || yathayidam bhik-
khave satta bojjhaṅgā12 || katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo ||
la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo ||
3. Katham bhāvitā ca13 bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā
katham bahulīkatā14 saṃyojaniyānam dhammānam pahā-
nāya saṃvattanti || || Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisam-
bojjhaṅgam bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ || la [pe] || Upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vos-
saggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave satta
bojjhaṅgā evam bahulīkatā saṃyojaniyānaṃ dhammānam
pahānāya saṃvattanti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -pajjam always.
2 S1 anibbadha- S3 anibbidha- both always.
3 S1-3 nivijjati.
4 S1 nivijjhati.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 S1 anibbādha-
7 S1 anibbaddha-
8 S1-3 nibbānāya.
9 S1 ye S3 yena.
10 S1-3 bhāvitā bahulīkatā.
11 S1-3 saṃvattanti (S3--ntī).
12 S1 bojjhāṅgaṃ.
13 missing in S1-3.
14 S1-3 insert ca bhikkhave.

[page 089]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 89
4. Katame ca bhikkhave saṃyojaniyā dhammā || || Cak-
khum1 bhikkhave saṃyojaniyo dhammo2 || || Etthete3 uppaj-
janti saṃyojanavinibandhā4 ajjhosānā || Jivhāsaṃyojaniyo5
dhammo || etthete uppajjanti saṃyojanavinibandhā ajjho-
sānā || || Manosaṃyojaniyo dhammo || etthete uppajjanti
saṃyojanavinibandhā ajjhosānā || ||
Ime vuccanti bhikkhave saṃyojaniyā dhammā ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).30. (10) Udāyi.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sumbhesu viharati Seta-
kam6 nāma Sumbhānam nigamo || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Udāyi yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || la-pe || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Udāyi
Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Acchariyam bhante abbhutam bhante yāva bahuka-
tañca me7 bhante Bhagavati pemañca gāravo8 ca hiri ca9
ottappañca || Ahaṃ hi bhante pubbe agārikabhūto10 samāno
abahukato ahosiṃ11 dhammena || abahukato saṅghena || so
khvāham bhante12 Bhagavati pemañca gāravañca hiriṃ13
ca ottapañca sampassamāno agārasmā anagāriyam14 pab-
bajito || tassa me Bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi || || Iti rūpam
iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthagamo || || Iti vedanā ||
la-pe || Iti saññā || Iti saṅkhārā || Iti viññāṇaṃ iti viññāṇassa
samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthagamo ti || ||
4. So khvāham bhante suññāgāragato15 imesam pañcu-
pādānakkhandhānam16 ukkujjāvakujjam samparivattento17
Idaṃ dukkhanti yathā bhūtam abbhaññāsiṃ || Ayaṃ duk-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 cakkhu.
2 B1 S1-3 samyojaniyā dhammā always B1 has dhammo here only.
3 S1-3 ettha te always.
4 B1 S1-3 saṃyojani- (S3 -niṃ), both here only S1-3 vinibbaddhā always.
5 S1-3 jivhāya-
6 S1-3 sedakaṃ.
7 B1 bahukārācime B2 bahupakārāvime.
8 S3 gāragāravo.
9 B1 S3 hiriṃ (iñ) ca.
10 B1 anagārika-
11 S1 B2 ahosi.
12 missing in B1-2.
13 S1-3 hiri.
14 B1-2 anāgāriyaṃ.
15 S1 suññāgārato.
16 S1-3 imesu- -kandhesu.
17 S1-3 -vattanto.

[page 090]
90 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
khasamudayo ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsim || Ayaṃ dukkha-
nirodho ti1 yathābhūtam abbhaññāsiṃ || Ayam dukkhaniro-
dhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsiṃ || ||
5. Dhammo ca me bhante abhisamito2 maggo ca paṭi-
laddho || yo me bhāvito bahulīkato tathā tathā viharantam
tathattāya3 upanessati4 || yathāham Khīnā jāti vusitam
brahmacariyaṃ nāparam itthattāyāti pajānissāmi || Satisam-
bojjhaṅgo me bhante paṭiladdho || yo me5 bhāvito bahulī-
kato tathā tathā viharantam tathattāya upanessati yathāham
Khīnājati- -itthattāyāti pajānissāmi6 || la-pe || Upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgo kho7 me bhante pariladdho || yo me bhāvito ba-
hulīkato tathā tathā viharantam tathattāya upanessati ||
yathāham Khīnā jāti- -itthattāyati pajānissāmi || || Ayaṃ
kho me bhante maggo paṭiladdho || yo me bhāvito bahulī-
kato tathā tathā viharantam tathattāya upanessati yathā-
haṃ Khīnā jati- -nāparam itthattāyāti pajānissāmī ti || ||
6. Sādhu sādhu Udāyi eso hi te Udāyi maggo paṭilad-
dho || yo te bhāvito bahulīkato tathā tathā viharantam
tathattāya8 upanessati || yathā tvaṃ Khiṇā jāti vusitam
brahmacariyaṃ kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam itthattāyā ti
pajānissāmī ti9 || ||
Udāyivaggo tatiyo10 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ11
Bodhanā Desānā Ṭhānā ||
Ayoniso12 cāparihāni13 ||
Khayo Nirodho Nibbedho ||
Ekadhammo Udāyinā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 -nirodhāti.
2 S1 -sameto S3 dhamme . . . abhisamete.
3 S1 tatthāyaṃ S3 tathattāyaṃ.
4 B1-2 upanissati always.
5 missing in S3.
6 S3 paṭijā- here and further on.
7 missing in B1-2.
8 B1 tattāya.
9 B1 -nissatīti B2 -nissati.
10 driven back to the end in S1-3.
11 S1-3 tatruddānaṃ.
12 S3 yoniso.
13 S1-3 aparihāni ca B2 -hāniṃ.

[page 091]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 91

CHAPTER IV. NĪVARAṆAVAGGO CATUTTHO.

SN_5,46(2).31. (1) Kusalā1.
2. Ye keci bhikkhave dhammā kusalākusalabhāgiyā
kusalapakkhikā1 || sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasa-
mosaraṇā || appamādo tesaṃ dhammānam aggam akkhā-
yati || ||
3. Appamattassetam bhikkhave bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ2
satta bojjhaṅge bhāvessati || satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaris-
sati || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu appamatto satta boj-
jhaṅge bhāveti || satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti vive-
kanissitaṃ || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka-
virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇamiṃ || || Evaṃ kho
bhikkhave bhikkhu appamatto satta bojjhaṅge bhāveti ||
sattabojjhaṅge bahulīkarotī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).32. (2) Kusalā2.
2. Ye keci bhikkhave dhammā kusalākusalabhāgiyā
kusalapakkhikā3 || sabbe te yoniso manasikāramūlakā yoniso-
manasikārasamosaraṇā || yonisomanasikāro tesaṃ dham-
mānam aggam akkhāyati || ||
3. Yoniso manāsikārasampannassetam bhikkhave bhik-
khuno pātikaṅkhaṃ sattabojjhaṅge bhāvessati sattabojjhaṅge
bahulīkarissati || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu yoniso-
manasikārasampanno sattabojjhaṅge bhāveti sattabojjhaṅge
bahulīkaroti || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
vivekanissitaṃ || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || || Evaṃ
kho bhikkhave bhikkhu yonisomanasikārasampanno satta
bojjhaṅge bhāveti satta- bahulīkaroti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -pakkhiyā.
2 S1-3 -kaṃkhā.
3 S1 kusalapalapakkhiyā S1-3 -pakkhiyā always.

[page 092]
92 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.

SN_5,46(2).33. (3) Kilesa1.
2. Pañcime bhikkhave jātarūpassa upakkilesā || Yehi
upakkilesehi1 upakkiliṭṭham jātarūpaṃ na ceva mudu2
hoti || na ca kammaniyaṃ na ca pabhassaram pabhāṅgu
ca na ca sammā upeti kammāya || || Katame pañca || ||
3. Ayo bhikkhave jātarūpassa upakkileso || yena upak-
kilesena upakkiliṭṭhaṃ jātarūpaṃ3 na ceva mudu2 hoti
na ca kammaniyaṃ na ca pabhassaram pabhaṅgu ca na
ca sammā upeti kammāya || ||
4. Loham bhikkhave jātarūpassa upakkileso || yena upak-
kilesena uppakkiliṭṭham jātarūpaṃ || la-pe || ||
5. Tipu4 bhikkhave jātarūpassa upakkileso || la [pe] || ||
6. Sīsam bhikkhave jātarūpassa upakkileso || la-pe || ||
7. Sajjhum5 bhikkhave jātarūpassa upakkileso yena
upakkilesena uppakkiliṭṭham6 jātarūpam na ceva7 mudu8
hoti na ca kammaniyaṃ na ca pabhassaram pabhaṅgu ca
na ca9 sammā upeti kammāya || ||
8. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca jātarūpassa uppakkilesā yehi
{upakkilesehi} uppakkiliṭṭhaṃ10 jātarūpaṃ na ceva7 mudu8
hoti || na ca kammaniyaṃ na ca pabhassaram pabhaṅgu
ca11 na ca12 sammā upeti kammāya || || Evam eva kho
bhikkhave pañcime cittassa upakkilesā || || yehi upakkilesehi
upakkiliṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ na ceva mudu13 hoti || na ca kam-
maniyaṃ na ca pabhassaram pabhaṅgu ca na ca sammā
samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya || || Katame pañca || ||
9. Kāmacchando bhikkhave cittassa upakkileso || yena
upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhaṃ14 cittaṃ na ceva mudu8 hoti
na ca kammaniyam na ca pabhassaraṃ pabhaṅgu ca na
ca sammā sammādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya || ||
10--13. || la15 ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 pakkilesehi.
2 S1-3 muduṃ.
3 missing in S1.
4 S1 tipū.
5 S1 sajjham B1 sajjhu.
6 S1 upakkimi-
7 S1 ce.
8 S3 muduṃ.
9 missing in S1.
10 S1 -liṭṭha.
11 S1 pabhaṅguñca.
12 missing in S1-3.
13 S1-3 muduṃ.
14 missing in S1.
15 much developed in S1-3.

[page 093]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 93
14. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca cittassa1 upakkilesā || yehi
upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ cittam na ceva mudu2 hoti na
ca kammaniyaṃ na ca pabhassaram pabhaṅgu ca na ca
sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāyā ti3 || ||

SN_5,46(2).34. (4) Kilesa2.
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇā
cetaso anupakkilesā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiphala-
sacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti || katame satta || ||
3. Satibojjhaṅgo bhikkhave anāvaraṇo anīvaraṇo cetaso
anupakkileso bhāvito bahulīkato vijjāvimuttiphalasacchi-
kiriyāya4 saṃvattati5 || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo6 bhik-
khave anāvaraṇo anīvaraṇo cetaso anuppakileso bhāvito
bahulīkato vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati5 || ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā anāvaraṇā anī-
varaṇā cetaso anupakkilesā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimutti-
phalasacchiriyāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).35. (5) Yoniso1.
2. Ayoniso bhikkhave manasikaroto anuppanno ceva
kāmacchando uppajjati || uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyo-
bhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati7 || ||
3. Anuppanno ceva8 byāpādo uppajjati || uppanno ca9
byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati || ||
4. Anuppannaṃ ceva10 thīnamiddham uppajjati || uppan-
naṃ ca thīnamiddham bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃ-
vattati || ||
5. Anuppannañceva11 uddhaccakukkuccam uppajjati ||
uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
{saṃvattati} || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 citta.
2 S1-3 muduṃ.
3 S1-3 khayāya.
4 S3 omit ya.
5 S1-3 -vattanti.
6 S2-3 insert kho.
7 S1 -vattanti S3 -vattantīti.
8 S1-3 ca.
9 S3 vā.
10 S1-3 anupanno ca.
11 S1-3 anuppannañca.

[page 094]
94 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
6. Ayoniso ca bhikkhave manasikaroto1 anuppannā2
ceva3 vicikicchā uppajjati || uppannā ca vicikicchā bhiyyo-
bhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati || ||

SN_5,46(2).36. (6) Yoniso2.
2. Yoniso ca kho4 bhikkhave manasikaroto anuppanno
ceva5 satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati || uppanno ca satisamboj-
jhaṅgo bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati || la-[pe] || anuppanno
ceva5 upekhāsambojjhāṅgo uppajjati || uppanno ca {upek-
hāsambojjhaṅgo} bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchatīti6 || ||

SN_5,46(2).37. (7) Vuddhi (or Aparihāni? ).
2. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā7 bahulīkatā vud-
dhiyā8 aparihānāya9 saṃvattanti || || Katame satta || ||
3. Satisambojjhaṅgo || la-pe || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā vuddhiyā8 aparihānāya10 saṃvattantīti || ||

SN_5,46(2).38. (8) Āvaraṇa-Nīvaraṇa (or Nīvaraṇāvaraṇa).
2. Pañcime bhikkhave āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso uppak-
kilesā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā || katame pañca || ||
3. Kāmacchando bhikkhave āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso
upakkileso paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo || Byāpādo bhikkhave
āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso11 uppakkileso paññāya dubbalī-
karaṇo12 || || Thīnamiddham bhikkhave āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ
cetaso upakkilesam13 paññāya dubbalīkaraṇaṃ14 || Uddhac-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 These words in S1-3 only, S3 omits bhikkhave.
2 S3 anuppanno.
3 missing in S1.
4 S3 omits kho S1 cakho.
5 S1-3 ca.
6 B1 gacchati. This number is rehearsed in S1-3 but mutilated,
the second part of the first article missing. The whole text
seems to be inseparable from the preceding suttas; but
the uddāna divides them.
7 S3 inserts pāripūritā.
8 B1 buddhiyā always.
9 S1 aparihīnāya S3 has -hā- corrected from hi.
10 S3 -hīnāya.
11 missing in S1.
12 B1 -karaṇā.
13 S3 -kileso.
14 S1 -karaṇo S3 -karaṇaṃ corrected from -ṇo.

[page 095]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 95
cakukkuccam bhikkhave āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ cetaso upak-
kilesam1 paññāya dubbalīkaraṇaṃ || || Vicikicchā bhik-
khave āvaranā nīvaraṇā2 cetaso uppakkilesā1 paññāya
dubbalīkaraṇā3 || ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca āvaranā nīvaraṇā cetaso
upakkilesā paññāya dubbulīkaraṇā || ||
5. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇā
cetaso anuppakkilesā bhavitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiphala-
sacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti || || Katame satta || ||
6. Satisambojjhaṅgo bhikkhave anāvaraṇo anīvaraṇo
cetaso anupakkileso bhāvito bahulīkato vijjavimuttiphala-
sacchikiriyāya saṃvattati || la-pe || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo4
bhikkhave anāvaraṇo anīvaraṇo cetaso anuppakkileso
bhāvito bahulīkato vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃ-
vattati || ||
7. Ime kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā anāvaraṇā anī-
varaṇa cetaso anupakkilesā5 bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvi-
muttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti6 || ||
8. Yasmim bhikkhave samaye7 ariyasāvako aṭṭhiṃ8
katvā manasikatvā sabbacetaso9 sammannāharitvā ohita-
soto dhammaṃ suṇāti || imassa pañca10 nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ
samaye na honti || satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanā
pāripūriṃ gacchanti || ||
9. Katame pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti || ||
Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti || || Byā-
pādanīvaraṇam || pe || Thīnamiddhanivaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye
na hoti || || Uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye
na hoti || || Vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti || ||
Imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti.
10. Katame satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanā
pāripūriṃ gacchanti || || Satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || la-pe || || Upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 -kileso.
2 S1 āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo.
3 S1 -karaṇaṃ.
4 S1-3 insert kho.
5 S1 -kileso.
6 B1-2 -vattantī ti.
7 put before bhikkhave in S1-3.
8 S1-3 aṭṭhi.
9 B1-2 sabbaṃ-
10 S1-3 pañcassa instead of imassa pañca.

[page 096]
96 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
11. Yasmiṃ bhikkhave samaye ariyasāvako aṭṭhiṃ katvā
manasi katvā sabbacetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dham-
maṃ suṇāṭi || imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na
honti || ime satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanā pāri-
pūriṃ gacchantī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).39. (9) Rukkham.
2. Santi bhikkhave mahārukkhā aṇubījā1 mahākāyā2
rukkhānaṃ ajjhārūhā || ye hi rukkhā3 ajjhāruḷhā4 obhag-
gavibhaggā vipatitā5 senti || ||
3. Katame ca bhikkhave mahārukkhā aṇubījā mahākāyā
rukkhānam ajjhārūhā ye hi rukkhānam ajjhārūḷhā obhagga-
vibhaggā vipatitā senti || || Seyyathīdam assattho nigrodho
pilakkho6 udumbaro kacchako kapitthako7 || || Ime kho te8
bhikkhave mahārukkhā aṇubījā mahākāyā rukkhānam aj-
jhārūhā9 ye hi rukkhā ajjhārūḷha obhaggavibhaggā vipatitā
senti10 || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave idhekacco kulaputto yādisake11
kāme ohāya agārasmā anāgāriyam pabbajito hoti || so tādi-
sakehi vā12 kāmehi tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarehi13 obhagga-
vibhaggo vipatito seti || ||
5. Pañcime bhikkhave āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhā-
rūhā14 paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā || || Katame pañca || || Kā-
macchando bhikkhave āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhārūho
paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo || || Byāpādo bhikkhave āvaraṇo
nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhārūho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo || ||
Thīnamiddham bhikkhave āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ cetaso aj-
jhārūham paññāya dubbalīkaraṇaṃ || || Uddhaccakukkuccam
bhikkhave āvaraṇam nīvaraṇam cetaso ajjhārūhaṃ pañ-
ñāya dubbalīkaraṇaṃ || || Vicikicchā bhikkhave āvaraṇā
nīvaraṇā ajjhārūhā paññaya15 dubbalīkaraṇā || || Ime kho

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 B1-2 anu- always.
2 S1 mākāyā.
3 S1 rukkho.
4 S1-3 ajjhorūḷhā.
5 B1-2 vippati- always.
6 B1-2 milakkhu.
7 B1 kapittano.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 S1-3 -rūḷhā.
10 S1-3 honti.
11 S1 yādiyako.
12 missing in B1-2.
13 S1 papiyatarehi.
14 S1-3 add ya.
15 S1 pāññāya

[page 097]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 97
bhikkhave pañca āvaranā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhārūhā pañ-
ñāya dubbalīkaraṇā || ||
6. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇā
cetaso anajjhārūhā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiphalasac-
chikiriyāya saṃvattanti || katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo
bhikkhave anāvaraṇo anīvaraṇo cetaso anajjhārūho bhāvito
bahulīkato vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati || la
[pe] || || Upekhāsambojjaṅgo bhikkhave anāvaraṇo anīvaraṇo
cetaso anajjārūho bhāvito bahulīkato vijjāvimuttiphalasac-
chikiriyāya saṃvattati || || Ime kho bhikkhave satta boj-
jhaṅgā anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇā cetaso anajjhārūhā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvatta tī ti || ||

SN_5,46(2).40. (10) Nīvaraṇaṃ.
2. Pañcime bhikkhave nīvaraṇā andhakaraṇā acakkhu-
karaṇā aññāṇakaraṇā paññānirodhikā1 vighātapakkhiyā
anibbānasaṃvattanikā2 || || Katame pañca || || Kāmacchanda-
nīvaraṇam bhikkhave andhakaraṇam āññāṇakaraṇam acak-
khukaraṇam paññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhiyam anibbāna-
{saṃvattanikaṃ} || Byāpādanīvaraṇam bhikkhave ||la [pe] ||
Thīnamiddhanīvaraṇam bhikkhave ||la-pe || Uddhaccakuk-
kuccanīvaraṇam3 bhikkhave ||la [pe] || || Vicikicchānīvaraṇam
bhikkhave andhakaraṇam acakkhukaraṇam aññāṇakaraṇam4
aññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhiyam anibbānasaṃvattani-
kaṃ || || Ime kho bhikkhave pañcanīvaraṇā andhakaraṇā
acakkhukaraṇā aññāṇakaraṇā paññānirodhikā vighātapak-
khiyā anibbānasaṃvattanikā || ||
3. Sattime bhikkhave bojjhaṅgā cakkhukaraṇā ñāṇa-
karaṇā paññāvuddhiyā5 avighātapakkhiyā nibbānasaṃvatta-
nikā || || Katame satta || || Satisambojjhaṅgo bhikkhave
cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiyo avighāta-
pakkhiyo nibbānasaṃvattaniko || la-pe || || Upekhāsambojj-
haṅgo bhikkhave cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvud-
dhiyo avighātapakkhiyo nibbānasaṃvattaniko || || Ime kho

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 nirodhiyā-yaṃ always (S1 nirodhisā here)
2 S1 anibbānāya saṃ-
3 S1 -kukkuccaṃ-
4 S1 apaññāṇa-
5 missing in S1-3. B1 -buddhiy- always

[page 098]
98 Bojjhaṅga-Saṃyuttam XLVI.
bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā cakkhukaraṇā ñaṇakaraṇā pañ-
ñavuddhiyā avighātapakkhiyā nibbānasaṃvattanikāti || ||
Nīvaraṇavaggo catuttho1 || ||

Dve Yoniso ca Vuddhi ca4 ||
