148 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
12. Ko ca bhikkhave bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko
visayo || yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā || || Katame cattāro || ||
13. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyanupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Vedanāsu || Citte1 || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Ayam bhikkhave bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).7. (7) Makkaṭo.
3. Atthi bhikkhave Himavato pabbatarājassa duggā
visamā desā || yattha neva makkaṭānaṃ cāri2 na ma-
nussānaṃ || ||
4. Atthi bhikkhave Himavato pabbatarājassa duggā
visamā desā || yattha makkaṭānaṃ hi kho cāri na ma-
nussānaṃ3 || ||
5. Atthi Himavato pabbatarājassa samā bhūmibhāgā
ramanīyā || yattha makkaṭānañceva cāri manussānañ ca || ||
Tatra bhikkhave luddā4 makkaṭavīthīsu lepam oḍḍenti5
makkaṭānam bādhanāya || || Tatra bhikkhave ye te makkaṭā
abālajātikā6 alolajātikā6 te taṃ7 lepaṃ disvā ārakā pari-
vajjanti8 || || Yo pana so hoti makkaṭo bālajātiko6 lola-
jātiko6 || so tam lepam upasaṅkamitvā hatthena gaṇhāti ||
so tattha bajjhati || || Hattham mocessāmīti dutiyena
hatthena gaṇhāti || so tattha bajjhati || || Ubho hatthe mo-
cessāmīti pādena gaṇhāti so tattha bajjhati || || Ubho hatthe
mocessāmīti pādam cā ti9 dutiyena pādena gaṇhāti so tattha
bajjhati || || Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pāde cā9 ti tuṇḍena
gaṇhāti so tattha bajjhati || ||
6. Evaṃ hi so10 bhikkhave makkaṭo pañcoḍḍito11 thu-
nam12 seti anayam āpanno byasanam āpanno yathākāma-

karaṇīyo luddassa || || Tam enam1 bhikkhave luddo vijjhitvā2
tasmiṃ yeva kaṭṭhakataṅgāre3 avasajjetvā4 yena kāmam
pakkamati || ||
7. Evaṃ hi5 tam bhikkhave hoti yo6 agocare carati
paravisaye || tasmā ti ha bhikkhave mā agocare carittha
paravisaye || agocare bhikkhave caratam paravisaye lacchati
Māro otāraṃ lacchati Māro7 ārammanaṃ || ||
8. Ko ca bhikkhave bhikkhuno agocaro8 paravisayo || ||
Yad idam pañcakāmaguṇā || katame pañca || ||

[pe] || Kāyaviññeyyā poṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya-
rūpā || kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā || || Ayam bhikkhave bhik-
khuno agocaro paravisayo || ||

care bhikkhave carataṃ sake pettike visaye na lacchati
Māro otāram na lacchati Māro ārammaṇaṃ || ||
11. Ko ca bhikkhave bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko
visayo || || Yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || ||
12. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Ayam bhikkhave bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo
ti10 || ||

SN_5,47(3).8. (8) Sūdo.
I.
Seyyathāpi bhikkhave bālo avyatto akusalo sūdo rājānam
vā rājamahāmattānaṃ11 vā nānāccayehi12 sūpehi paccu-
paṭṭhito assa || ambilaggehi pi tittakaggehi pi kaṭukaggehi
pi madhuraggehi pi khārikehi pi akhārikehi pi loṇikehi13
pi aloṇikehi pi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ena.
2 S1-3 jhatvā.
3 S1-3 kaṭṭhakaṃ uddha (S3 ubba-) retvā.
4 B1 avassa- S1-3 āvajje-
5 B1 so B2 se.
6 S1 so.
7 S1 amāro.
8 S3 gocaro.
9 S1 -veññeyyā.
10 S1-3 omit ti.
11 B1-2 -mahāmattaṃ always.
12 S1-3 nānā- always.
13 S1-3 loṇa (S3 -na-) kehi.

[page 150]
150 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
4. Sa kho so bhikkhave bālo avyatto akusalo sūdo sa-
kassa bhattassa1 nimittaṃ na uggaṇhati || Idam2 vā me
ajja bhattasūpeyyaṃ ruccati || imassa vā abhiharati || imassa
vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti || imassa vā vaṇṇam bhāsati || || Ambi-
laggaṃ vā me ajja bhattasūpeyyaṃ ruccati || ambilaggassa3
vā abhiharati || ambilaggassa4 vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti || ambi-
laggassa5 vā vaṇṇam bhāsati || || Tittakaggaṃ vā me ajja6
Kaṭukaggaṃ vā me ajja6 || Madhuraggaṃ vā me ajja ||
Khārikaṃ vā me ajja || Akhārikaṃ vā me ajja7 || Loṇikaṃ
vā me ajja8 || Aloṇikaṃ vā me ajja bhattasūpeyyaṃ ruccati ||
aloṇikassa vā abhiharati || aloṇikassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti9
aloṇikassa vā10 vaṇṇam bhāsatī ti || ||
5. Sa kho so bhikkhave bālo avyatto akusalo sūdo na
ceva lābhī hoti acchādanassa11 || na lābhī vetanassa12 na13
lābhī abhihārānaṃ || taṃ kissa hetu || || Tathā hi so bhik-
khave bālo14 avyatto akusalo sūdo sakassa bhattassa ni-
mittaṃ na15 ugganhāti || ||
6. Evam eva kho bhikkhave idhekacco bālo avyatto
akusalo bhikkhu kāye16 kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī sampa-
jāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || tassa kāye17
kāyānupassino viharato cittaṃ na17 samādhiyati upakkilesā
na17 pahiyyanti || so taṃ nimittam na18 uggaṇhāti || Ve-
danāsu || Citte19 || Dhammesu dhammānupassi viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ na17
samādhiyati upakkilesā na17 pahiyyanti || so tam nimittaṃ
na uggaṇhāti || ||
7. Sa kho so bhikkhave bālo avyatto akusalo bhikkhu
na ceva lābhī diṭṭheva dhamme sukhavihārānaṃ || na lābhī

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 bhattussa; S1-3 B2 bhattu- always.
2 B1 imaṃ.
3 S1-3 aloṇa (S3 -na-) kassa.
4 S1-3 ambilassa.
5 S1 tittikaggañcā.
6 S1-3 add me.
7 missing in S3, repetition of khārikaṃ- in S1.
8 S1-3 omit loṇikaṃ-
9 this phrase is rehearsed in S3.
10 missing in S1.
11 S1 acchādassa.
12 B1-2 vetta- always.
13 missing in S1.
14 S1 bāle.
15 missing in S1.
16 S1-3 kāyena.
17 missing in S1-3.
18 missing in S1.
19 S1-3 cittesu.

[page 151]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 151
satisampajaññassa || tam kissa hetu || || Tathā hi so bhik-
khave bālo avyatto akusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa ni-
mittaṃ na uggaṇhāti || ||
II.
8. Seyyathāpi pi bhikkhave paṇḍito vyatto kusalo sūdo
rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattānaṃ1 vā nānāccayehi2 sūpehi
paccupaṭṭhito assa || ambilaggehi pi tittakaggehi3 pi kaṭu-
kaggehi pi madhuraggehi pi4 khārikehi pi akhārikehi pi5
loṇikehi6 pi aloṇikehi pi7 || || Sa kho so bhikkhave paṇ-
ḍito8 vyatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattassa nimittam
uggaṇhāti || Idam vā me ajja bhattasupeyyaṃ ruccati ||
imassa vā abhiharati9 || imassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti || imassa
vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati || || Ambilaggaṃ vā me ajja bhattasū-
peyyaṃ ruccati ambilaggassa vā abhiharati || ambilaggassa
vā bahum10 gaṇhāti || ambilaggassa11 vā vaṇṇam bhasati12 ||
Tittakaggaṃ vā ma ajja || Kaṭukaggaṃ vā me ajja || Madhu-
raggaṃ vā me ajja || Khārikaṃ vā me ajja || Akhārikaṃ vā
me ajja || Loṇikaṃ vā me ajja || Aloṇikaṃ vā me ajja
bhattasūpeyyaṃ ruccati || aloṇikassa vā abhiharati || aloṇi-
kassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti || aloṇikassa vā vaṇṇam bhāsatī ti || ||
9. Sa kho bhikkhave paṇḍito vyatto kusalo sūdo lābhī
ceva hoti acchādanassa13 lābhī vetanassa14 lābhi abhi-
hārānaṃ || taṃ kissa hetu || || Tathā hi so bhikkhave paṇ-
ḍito vyatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattassa nimittam uggaṇ-
hāti || ||
10. Evam eva kho bhikkhave idhekacco paṇḍito vyatto
kusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyanupassī viharati || ātāpī sampa-
jāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || tassa kāye
kāyānupassino viharato cittaṃ samādhiyati upakkilesā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -mattaṃ.
2 S3 nānacca- S1 nacca-.
3 S1-3 titti S3 titta both omitting kaggehi pi.
4 repeated in S1.
5 S3 omits akhā-
6 S1 loṇkehi S3 alonikehi pi.
7 S3 lonikehi pi.
8 S1 adds pi. 9. S1-3 adhiharati.
10 S1 bahu.
11 S1-3 aloṇi (S3 ni) kassa.
12 S1-3 bhāsatī ti the end of this number is missing in S1-3.
13 S1 acchādassa.
14 B1-3 vetta-

[page 152]
152 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
pahīyanti || so taṃ nimittam uggaṇhāti || Vedanāsu || [pe] ||
Citte || [pe] || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ samā-
dhiyati upakkilesā pahīyanti || so taṃ nimittam uggaṇhāti || ||
11. Sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito vyatto kusalo bhikkhu
lābhī ceva hoti diṭṭheva dhamme sukhavihārānaṃ lābhī
hoti1 satisampajaññassa || taṃ kissa hetu || || Tathā hi so
bhikkhave paṇḍito vyatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa
nimittam uggaṇhātī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).9. (9) Gilāno.
1. Ekam me sutaṃ2 Ekam samayam Bhagavā Vesāliyaṃ
viharati Beluvagāmake3 || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā4 bhikkhū āmantesi || || Etha tumhe
bhikkhave samantā5 Vesāliyā yathā mittaṃ6 yathā san-
diṭṭhaṃ yathā sambhattaṃ7 vassam upetha gacchatha8
idhevāham Beluvagāmake vassam upagacchamīti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū Bhagavato paṭissutvā
samantā9 Vesāliyā yathā mittam yathā sandiṭṭham yathā
sambhattaṃ10 vassam upagañchuṃ || Bhagavā pana tattheva8
Beluvagāmake vassam upagañchi11 || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavato vassupagatassa kharo ābādho
uppajji || bāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikā12 || tatra13
sudam Bhagavā sato sampajāno adhivāsesi avihañña-
māno || ||
4. Atha kho Bhagavato etad ahosi || Na kho pana me
tam paṭirūpaṃ yo ham anāmantetvā14 upaṭṭhāke anapalo-
ketvā bhikkhusaṅgham15 parinibbāyeyyaṃ16 || yan nūnāham
imam ābādham viriyena patipaṇāmetvā jīvitasaṅkhāram

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in S1-3 only.
2 this phrase in B1-2 only.
3 B1-3 velu- S3 beḷu- both always.
4 S1 bhikkhave.
5 S1-3 sāmantā corrected from sa- in S3.
6 S3 yathānimittaṃ.
7 S3 sambhataṃ.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 S1 sā-
10 S3 -bhataṃ corrected from -bhattaṃ.
11 B1-2 -gacchanti -gacchati.
12 B1 maraṇa-
13 S1-3 tā.
14 S3 āmantetvā.
15 S1-3 -saṅghe.
16 B1-2 -nibbāyeyya S1 -nibbāpeyyaṃ.

[page 153]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 153
adhiṭṭhāya vihareyyanti || || Atha kho Bhagavā tam ābādhaṃ
viriyena patipaṇāmetvā jīvitasaṅkhāram adhiṭṭhāya vihāsi || ||
5. Atha kho Bhagavā gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito1 ge-
laññā vihārā nikkhāmitvā2 vihārapacchā chāyāyam3 pañ-
ñatte āsane nisīdi || ||
6. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nīsīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando
Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Diṭṭhā4 bhante khamanīyam
diṭṭhā4 bhante Bhagavato yāpanīyaṃ || api me bhante
madhurakajāto viya kāyo || disā pi me na pakkhāyanti ||
dhammā pi5 maṃ na paṭibbanti Bhagavato gelāññena || ||
Api ca me bhante ahosi kācid eva assāsamattā6 || na tāva
Bhagavā parinibbāyissati || na tāva Bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgham
ārabbha kiñcid eva7 udāharatī ti || ||
7. Kim pana dāni Ānanda bhikkhusaṅgho mayi paccā-
siṃsati8 || desito Ānanda mayā dhammo anantaram abā-
hiraṃ katvā9 || || Natthānanda Tathāgatassa dhammesu
ācariyamuṭṭhi || yassa10 nūnānanda11 evam assa Aham
bhikkhusaṅgham pariharissāmīti vā Mamuddesiko bhikkhu-
saṅgho ti vā so10 nūnānanda11 bhikkhusaṅgham ārabbha
kiñcid eva udāhareyya || || Tathāgatassa kho Ānanda na
evam hoti || Aham bhikkhusaṅgham pariharissamī ti vā
Mamuddesiko bhikkhusaṅgho ti vā sakim Ānanda Tathā-
gato bhikkhusaṅgham ārabbha kiñcid eva udāharissati || ||
8. Etarahi kho panāham Ānanda jiṇṇo vuddho12 ma-
hallako addhagato vayo anuppatto asītiko me vasso13
vattati || || Seyyathāpi Ānanda jarasakaṭam vedhamissakena14
yāpeti || evam eva kho Ānanda vedhamissakena15 maññe
tathāgatassa kāyo yāpeti || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -vuṭṭhite.
2 S1-3 omit vihārā nikkhamitvā.
3 S3 yāyaṃ.
4 B1-2 diṭṭhaṃ.
5 B1 inserts naṃ.
6 B2 asāsa- S1-3 assādamattaṃ (S1 -matta).
7 S1-3 kiñci.
8 B1-2 -sīsati.
9 B1-2 karitvā.
10 B1 yaṃ.
11 S1-3 nūna ānanda.
12 B1 buddho.
13 S1-3 vayo.
14 B2 vekha- S1-3 vegha- always.
15 B1 -missako.

[page 154]
154 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
9. Yasmiṃ Ānanda samaye Tathāgato sabbanimittānam
amanasikārā ekaccānam vedanānaṃ nirodhā1 animittam
cetosamādhim upasampajja viharati || phāsutaram Ānanda
tasmiṃ samaye Tathāgatassa kāyo hoti || || Tasmā ti hānanda
attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā
dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā || || Kathañcānanda bhikkhu
attadīpo viharati attasaraṇo anaññasaraṇo dhammadīpo
dhammasaraṇo anaññasaraṇo || ||
10. Idhānanda bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || || Evaṃ
kho Ānanda bhikkhu attadīpo viharati attasaraṇo anaññā-
saraṇo dhammadīpo dhammasaraṇo anaññasaraṇo || ||
11. Ye hi keci Ānanda etarahi vā mamaccaye2 vā atta-
dīpā viharissanti attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā
dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā || tamatagge3 me4 te Ānanda
bhikkhū bhavissanti ye keci sikkhākāmā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).10. (10) Bhikkhunivāsako.
1. Savatthi5 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivā-
setvā pattacīvaram ādāya yena aññataro6 bhikkhunu-
passayo7 tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane
nisīdi || ||
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhuniyo yenāyasmā Ānando
tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam Ānandam
abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || || Ekam antaṃ nisinnā
kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantam Ānandam etad avocuṃ || ||
3. Idha bhante Ānanda sambahulā bhikkhuniyo catūsu
satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacittā viharantiyo uḷāram pubbenā-
param visesaṃ sampajānantī ti8 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S3.
2 B1 mapaccaye.
3 S3 tamatamagge-
4 B1 pe.
5 in B1 only.
6 S1-3 yenañña-
7 S1 bhikkhunipa- always.
8 S1-3 jānantī ti.

[page 155]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 155
Evam etam bhaginiyo evam etam bhaginiyo || yo hi1
koci bhaginiyo bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhā-
nesu supatiṭṭhitacitto viharati || tassetam pāṭikaṅkham
uḷāram pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ sampajānissatī ti2 || ||
4. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā
kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃ-
setvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi || ||
5. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando3 Sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya ca-
ritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena Bhagavā
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā
ekam antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā
Ānando Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Idhāham bhante
pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā pattacīvaram ādāya yena añ-
ñataro4 bhikkhunupassayo5 tenupasaṅkamiṃ || upasaṅka-
mitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṃ || || Atha kho bhante sam-
bahulā bhikkhuniyo yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅ-
kamitvā mam abhivādetvā ekam antam nisīdiṃsu6 || ekam
antaṃ nisinnā kho bhante tā bhikkhuniyo mam etad
avocuṃ || || Idha bhante Ānanda sambahulā bhikkhuniyo
catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacittā viharantiyo7 uḷaram
pubbenāparam visesaṃ sampajānantī ti8 || || Evam vuttā-
ham bhante tā bhikkhuniyo etad avocuṃ9 || Evam etam
bhaginiyo evam etam bhaginiyo yo hi koci bhaginiyo
bhikkhu va bhikkhunī vā catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhi-
tacitto10 viharati || tassetam pāṭikaṅkham uḷāram pubbenā-
paraṃ visesaṃ saṃjānissatī ti11 || ||
6. Evam etam Ānanda evam etaṃ || yo hi koci Ānanda
bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhita-
citto10 viharati || tassetam pāṭikaṅkham uḷāram pubbenā-
param visesaṃ sañjānissatī ti11 || katamesu catusu || ||
7. Idhānanda bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B1-2.
2 S1-3 saṃjānissatī ti.
3 S1-3 āyasmānando.
4 S1-3 yenañña-
5 S1 bhikkhuni-
6 S3 nisīdi.
7 S1-3 viharanti.
8 S1-3 saṃjānantī ti.
9 B1 avocuṃ.
10 S1-3 supaṭṭhitacittā.
11 S1-3 jānissatī ti.

[page 156]
156 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
Tassa kāye kāyanupassino viharato kāyārammano vā
uppajjati kāyasmim pariḷāho cetaso vā līnattam bahiddhā
vā cittaṃ vikkhipati || || Tenānanda1 bhikkhunā kismiñcid
eva pasādaniye nimitta cittam paṇidahitabbam || tassa kis-
miñcid eva pasādaniye nimitte cittam paṇidahato pāmujjaṃ
jāyati || pamuditassa pīti jāyati || pītimanassa kāyo passam-
bhati || passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedayati2 || sukhino cittaṃ
samādhiyati || || So iti paṭisañcikkhati || Yassa khvāhaṃ3
atthāya cittam paṇidahiṃ so me attho abhinipphanno4
handa dāni paṭisaṃharāmī ti || So paṭisaṃharati ceva na
ca vitakketi na ca vicāreti5 || Avitakkomhi avicāro ajjhattaṃ
satimā sukhamasmī ti6 pajānāti || ||
8--9. Puna ca param Ānanda vedanāsu || citte7 || ||
10. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || tassa dhammesu
dhammānupassino viharato dhammārammaṇo vā uppajjati
kāyasmiṃ8 pariḷāho cetaso vā9 līnattam bahiddhā vā
cittaṃ10 vikkhipati || || Tenānanda bhikkhunā kismiñcid11
eva pasādaniye nimitte cittam paṇidahitabbaṃ || tassa ki-
miñcid12 eva pasādaniye nimitte cittam paṇidahato pā-
mujjaṃ jāyati || pamūditassa pīti jāyati || pītimanassa kāyo
passambhati || passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedayati13 || sukhino
cittaṃ samādhiyati || so iti paṭisañcikkhati || Yassa khvā-
ham14 atthāya cittam paṇidahiṃ || so me attho abhinipphanno ||
handa dāni paṭisaṃharāmīti || || So paṭisaṃharati ceva na
ca vitakketi na ca vicāreti || Avitakkomhi avicāro ajjhattaṃ
satimā sukhamasmī ti15 pajānāti || ||
11. Evaṃ kho Ānanda paṇidhāya bhāvanā hoti || ||
12. Kathañcānanda apaṇidhāya bhāvanā hoti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 tenahānanda always.
2 S1-3 vediyati.
3 S1-3 khoham always.
4 B1-2 -nippanno always.
5 S1-3 vicarati always.
6 S3 sacittasmī ti S1 sacītasmī ti.
7 more complete in S1-3.
8 S1-3 insert hi.
9 missing in S1-3.
10 S1-3 vitakkaṃ.
11 B1 S1-3 kismicid.
12 S1-3 kismicid B1 kismiṃcid.
13 S1-3 vedeti.
14 S1-3 Khoham.
15 S1-3 sacita (S3 tta) smīti.

[page 157]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 157
13. Bahiddhā Ānanda1 bhikkhu cittam apaṇidhāya
Apaṇihitam me bahiddhā2 cittan ti pajānāti || || Atha
pacchāpure asaṃkhittaṃ3 vimuttam Apaṇihitan ti pajānāti || ||
Atha ca pana kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno
satimā sukhamasmī ti4 pajānāti || ||
14. Bahiddhā Ānanda bhikkhu cittam apanidhāya Apa-
ṇihitam me bahiddhā cittan ti pajānāti || || Atha pacchā-
pure asaṃkhittam3 vimuttam Apaṇihitanti pajānāti || ||
Atha ca pana vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharāmi ātāpī
sampajāno satimā Sukham asmī ti pajānāti || ||
15. Bahiddhā Ānanda bhikkhu cittam apaṇidhāya Apaṇi-
hitam me bahiddhā cittan ti pajānati || || Atha pacchāpure
asaṃkhittam vimuttam5 Apaṇihitanti pajānāti || || Atha6
pana citte cittānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā
sukhamasmīti pajānāti || ||
16. Bahiddhā Ānanda bhikkhu cittam apanidhāya apa-
ṇihitam me bahiddhā cittanti pajānāti || || Atha7 pacchā-
pure asaṃkhittaṃ8 vimuttam Apaṇihitanti pajānāti || || Atha
ca pana dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi || ātāpī sam-
pajāno satimā sukhamasmīti pajānāti9 || ||
17. Evaṃ kho10 Ānanda apaṇidhāya bhāvanā11 hoti || ||
18. Iti kho Ānanda desitā mayā paṇidhāya bhāvanā
desitā apaṇidhāya bhāvanā || || Yam12 Ānanda satthārā
karaṇīyam sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampam
upādāya || kataṃ vo tam13 mayā || || Etāni Ānanda rukkha-
mūlāni etāni suññāgārāni nijjhāyathānanda14 mā pamā-
dattha ma pacchāvippatisārino ahuvattha || ayaṃ vo am-
hākam anusāsanī ti || ||
19. Idam avoca Bhagavā || attamano āyasmā Ānando
Bhagavato bhāsitam abhinandī ti15 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 bahiddhānanda always.
2 missing in S1.
3 S1-3 ayaṃcittaṃ always.
4 S1-3 sutasmīti always.
5 S1 cittaṃ.
6 S1-3 insert ca.
7 S1-3 insert kho.
8 S1-3 ayaṃ cittaṃ.
9 S1-3 pajānāmi.
10 missing in S1-3.
11 S1-3 bhāvanāya.
12 S1 ya.
13 missing in B1-2 added between the lines in S3.
14 S3 jhāyathā- S1 kāyāṃyathānanda.
15 number 19 is to be found in B1-2 only.

158 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
Tatruddānam1 || ||
Ambapālivaggo pathamo2 || ||
Ambapāli3 Sato Bhikkhu ||
Sāllam4 Kusalarāsi5 ca ||
Sakunagghi Makkaṭo6 Sūdo ||
Gilāno Bhikkhuni-vāsakoti7 || ||

CHAPTER II. NĀLANDAVAGGO DUTIYO.

SN_5,47(3).11. (1) Mahāpuriso.
1. Sāvatthi-nidānaṃ8 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto yena Bhagavā tenupa
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā || pe || Ekam antam nisinno kho
āyasmā Sāriputto Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Mahāpuriso mahāpuriso ti bhante vuccati || Kittāvatā
nu kho bhante mahāpuriso hotī ti || ||
Vimuttacittattā kho haṃ9 Sāriputta Mahāpuriso ti va-
dāmi || avimuttacittattā No mahāpuriso ti vadāmi || || Kathañ
ca Sāriputta vimuttacitto hoti || ||
4. Idha Sāriputta bhikkhu kāye kāyanupassī viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam ||
tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati
anupādāya āsavehi || || Vedanāsu || || Citte || || Dhammesu
dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || tassa dhammesu dhammānu-
passino viharato cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya
āsavehi || ||
5. Evaṃ kho Sāriputta vimuttacitto hoti || || Vimutta-
cittattā10 kho haṃ Sariputta Mahāpuriso ti vadāmi || avi-
muttacittattā11 No mahāpuriso ti vadāmī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in S1-3 only.
2 drawn back to the end in S1-3.
3 S1 ambali.
4 S1-3 sāla.
5 B1-2 -rāsī.
6 S1-3 makkaṭa.
7 S1 upassane cāti S3 upassayena cāti instead of vāsakoti.
8 S1-3 omit nidānaṃ.
9 S3 kho ahaṃ B1-2 kvāhaṃ always.
10 S1-3 -cittaṃ.
11 S1-3 avimuttattā.

[page 159]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 159

SN_5,47(3).12. (2) Nālandam.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Nālandāyaṃ viharati Pā-
vārikambavane || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto yena Bhagavā tenupasari-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā || [pe] || Ekam antam nisinno kho
āyasmā Sāriputto Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Evam pasanno1 ham bhante Bhagavati || Na cāhu na
ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāh-
maṇo vā Bhagavatā bhiyyo bhiññataro yad idaṃ sam-
bodhiyan ti || ||
Uḷārā kho tyāyaṃ2 Sāriputta āsabhi3 vācā bhāsitā
ekaṃso gahito sīhanādo nadito || || Evam pasanno4 ham
bhante Bhagavati na cāhu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi
vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā Bhagavatā bhiyyo
bhiññataro yad idaṃ sambodhiyan ti || ||
4. Kinnu te Sāriputta ye te ahesum atītam addhānam
arahanto sammāsambuddhā5 || sabbe te bhagavanto6 ce-
tasā cetopariccaviditā || Evaṃsīlā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ
iti vā || Evaṃ dhammā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ iti vā || Evam
paññā te bhagavanto ahesum iti vā7 || {Evaṃvihārino} te
bhagavanto ahesuṃ iti vā Evaṃvimuttā te bhagavanto
ahesum iti vā ti8 || ||
No hetam bhante || ||
5. Kim pana te9 Sāriputta ye te bhavissanti anāgatam
addhānam arahanto sammāsambuddhā || sabbe te bhaga-
vanto cetasā cetopariccaviditā evaṃsilā te bhagavanto
bhavissanti iti vā evaṃ dhammā te bhagavanto bhavissanti
iti vā evampaññā te bhagavanto bhavissanti iti vā evaṃ-
vihārino te bhagavanto bhavissanti iti vā10 || evaṃvimuttā
kho11 bhagavanto bhavissanti iti vā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 pasannā always.
2 uḷāro tya(S3 -ta) trāyaṃ (S1 -ya).
3 S1 asābhiṃ-
4 B1 pasannā.
5 S1 -buddho S3 -buddhā corrected from -buddho.
6 S1 bhagavantaṃ corrected from bhagavante.
7 S1-3 ahesunti.
8 evaṃ vimuttā- is to be found in B1-2 only.
9 S1-3 panete.
10 evaṃvihārino- is missing in S1-3.
11 S1-3 evaṃvimuttan (S1 taṃ) te.

[page 160]
160 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
No hetam bhante || ||
6. Kim pana tyāhaṃ1 Sāriputta etarahi arahaṃ sammā-
sambuddho cetasā cetopariccavidīto || evaṃsīlo bhagavā iti
vā evaṃdhammo bhagavā iti vā evampañño bhagavā iti
vā evaṃvihārī bhagavā iti vā evaṃvimutto bhagavā iti
vā ti2 || ||
No hetam bhante || ||
7. Ettha ca te Sāriputta atītānāgatapaccuppannesu
arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu cetopariyāyañāṇaṃ natthi ||
atha kiṃcarahi tayā3 Sāriputta ulārā āsabhi vācā4 bhā-
sitā5 ekaṃso gahito sīhanādo nadito || Evam pasannoham6
bhante Bhagavati na cāhu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi
vijjati añño samaṇo va brāhmaṇo vā Bhagavato7 bhiyyo
bhiññataro yadidaṃ sambodhiyan ti ||
Na kho me tam bhante atītānāgatapaccuppannesu ara-
hantesu sammāsambuddhesu cetopariyāyañāṇam atthi ||
api ca dhammanvayo vidito || ||
8. Seyyathāpi bhante rañño paccantimaṃ nagaram daḷ-
huddāpaṃ daḷhapākāratoraṇam ekadvāraṃ || tatrassa do-
vāriko paṇḍito viyatto8 medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretvā
ñātānam pavesetā || || So9 tassa nagarassa samantā anu-
pariyāya10 patham anukkamamāno na passeyya pākāra-
sandhiṃ vā pākāravivaraṃ vā antamaso biḷāranissakkana-
mattam11 pi || tassa evam assa || Ye kho12 keci oḷarikā pāṇā
imaṃ nagaram pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā sabbe te iminā
va dvārena pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā ti || || Evam eva
kho me12 bhante dhammanvayo vidito || ||
9. Ye pi12 te bhante12 ahesum atītam addhānaṃ ara-
hanto sammāsambuddhā sabbe te bhagavanto pañcanī-
varaṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe13
catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacittā14 sattabojjhaṅge

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 tāyāhaṃ.
2 S1-3 omit vāti.
3 B1 tyāham.
4 S1-3 uḷāraṃ āsabhiṃ vācaṃ.
5 B1 bhāvitā.
6 B1 pasannāham.
7 S1 bhagavatā.
8 missing in S3 B1 adds byatto.
9 S3 yo.
10 S1 -pariyā.
11 S1-3 biḷālanikkamana- (S3 nikammana-).
12 missing in S1-3.
13 S3 dubbali-
14 S1 supaṭṭhita-

[page 161]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 161
yathābhūtam bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhim abhi-
sambujjhiṃsu || || Ye pi te bhante bhavissanti anāgatam
addhānam arahanto sammāsambuddhā sabbe te bhaga-
vanto1 pañcanīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya
dubbalīkaraṇe catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacittā2
sattabojjhaṅge yathābhūtam bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammā-
sambodhim abhisambujjhissanti || || Bhagavā pi bhante
etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pañcanīvaraṇe pahāya
cetaso uppakkilese3 paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe catusu sati-
paṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacitto4 sattabojjhaṅge yathābhūtam
bhāvetvā anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambuddhoti || ||
10. Sādhu sādhu Sāriputta tasmā ti ha tvaṃ Sāriputta
imam dhammapariyāyam abhikkhaṇam bhāseyyāsi5 bhik-
khūnam bhikkhūnīnam upāsakānam upāsikānam || yesam pi
hi Sāriputta moghapurisānam bhavissati Tathāgate kaṅkhā
vā vimati vā tesam pi mam dhammapariyāyam sutvā yā
tesaṃ6 Tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā sā pahīyissatī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).13. (3) Cuṇḍo.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati Jeta-
vane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā Sāriputto Maga-
dhesu viharati Nālagāmake7 || ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagi-
lāno || Cundo ca8 samaṇuddeso āyasmato Sāriputtassa
upaṭṭhāko9 hoti || ||
3. Atha āyasmā Sāriputto tena ābādhena parinibbāyi || ||
4. Atha kho Cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmato Sāriputtassa
pattacīvaram adāya yena Sāvatthi-Jetavanam Anātha-
piṇḍikassa ārāmo yenāyasmā Ānando tenupasaṅkami ||
upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam Ānandam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Cundo sama-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3
2 S1 supaṭṭhitacitto S3 supaṭṭhitacittā.
3 S1 inserts so.
4 S1-3 supaṭṭhitacitto (S1 -citte.).
5 S1 bhāveyyāsi.
6 S1-3 omit yā tesaṃ.
7 B1-2 nāḷa (B1 -lā) gāmake.
8 in S1 only.
9 B1 upaṭṭhako.

[page 162]
162 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
ṇuddeso āyasmantam Ānandam etad avoca || || Āyasmā
bhante Sariputto parinibbuto idam assa pattacīvaranti1 || ||
5. Atthi kho idam āvuso Cunda2 kathāpābhatam Bha-
gavantaṃ dassanāya || āyāmāvuso Cunda yena Bhagavā
tenupasaṅkamissāma || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavato3 etam
attham ārocessāmāti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho Cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmato Ānan-
dassa paccassosi || ||
6. Atha kho āyasmā ca Ānando Cundo ca samaṇuddeso
yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā Bhaga-
vantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nīsīdiṃsu || || Ekam antaṃ
nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
Ayam bhante Cundo samaṇuddeso evam āha || Āyasmā
bhante Sāriputto parinibbuto idam assa pattacīvaran ti1 || ||
Api ca4 me bhante madhurakajāto5 viya kāyo || disā pi
me na pakkhāyanti dhammā pi me6 na paṭibhanti āyasmā
Sāriputto parinibbuto ti sutvā ti7 || ||
7. Kinnu te8 Ānanda Sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya
parinibbuto || samādhikkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto ||
paññakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto9 || vimuttikkhandhaṃ
vā ādāya parinibbuto || vimuttiññanadassanakkhandhaṃ vā
ādāya parinibbuto ti || ||
Na ca4 kho me tam10 bhante āyasmā Sāriputto sīlak-
khandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto || pe || vimuttiññāṇadassa-
nakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto || Api ca me4 bhante
āyasmā Sāriputto ovādako ahosi otiṇṇo4 viññāpako
sandassako samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako akilāsu
dhammadesanāya anuggāhako sabrahmacārīnaṃ tam11
mayam āyasmato Sāriputtassa dhammojaṃ dhammabhogaṃ
dhammānuggaham anussarāmāti || ||
8. Nanu tam Ānanda mayā paṭigacceva12 akkhātaṃ
sabbehi piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo aññathā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -cīvaraṃ idaṃ dhātuparibhāvananti.
2 in B1-2 only.
3 S1 bhavato.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1 madhukaraka-
6 S1-3 maṃ.
7 B1 omits ti.
8 B1 kho.
9 this phrase omitted in S3.
10 in S1-3 only.
11 S1-3 ti.
12 B1-2 paṭikacceva.

[page 163]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 163
bhāvo || tam kutettha Ānanda labbhā || Yan taṃ jātam
bhūtaṃ saṅkhatam palokadhammaṃ1 taṃ vata mā palujjīti
netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
9. Seyyathāpi Ānanda mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāra-
vato yo mahantataro2 khandho so palujjeyya || evam eva
kho Ānanda mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa tiṭṭhato sāravato
Sāriputto parinibbuto taṃ kutettha Ānanda labbhā yan
taṃ jātam bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ taṃ vata
mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
10. Tasmā ti hānanda attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā
anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā || ||
Kathañcānanda bhikkhu attadīpo3 viharati attasaraṇo an-
aññasaraṇo dhammadīpo dhammasaraṇo anaññasaraṇo4 || ||
11. Idhānanda bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Evaṃ
kho Ānanda bhikkhu attadīpo viharati attasaraṇo anañña-
saraṇo dhammadīpo dhammasaraṇo anaññasaraṇo5 || ||
12. Ye hi keci Ānanda etarahi vā mamaccaye6 vā attadipā
viharissanti attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā dhamma-
saraṇā anaññasaraṇā || tamatagge7 pete8 Ānanda bhikkhū
bhavissanti ye keci sikkhākāmā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).14. (4) Ceḷam.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Vajjīsu viharati Ukkacelā-
yaṃ9 Gaṅgāya nadiyā10 tīre mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
saddhim aciraparinibbutesu Sāriputta-Moggalānesu || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Bhagavā bhikkhu-saṅgha-
parivuto ajjhokāse11 nisinno hoti || || Atha kho Bhagavā
tunhībhūtam12 bhikkhusaṅgham anuviloketvā bhikkhū
āmantesi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 -dhammānaṃ.
2 S1 mahattaro.
3 S1 -dīpā.
4 S3 omits dhammadīpo-
5 S1 anaññakaragge.
6 B1-2 -accayena.
7 B1 tadamatagge.
8 S1-3 B2 mete.
9 S3 ukkave- S1 ukkace corrected from ukkabe- (?)
10 B1-2 Gaṅganadiyā.
11 S1-3 abbhokāse.
12 repeated in S1.

[page 164]
164 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
3. Api myāyam1 bhikkhave parisā suññā viya khāyati ||
parinibbutesu Sāriputta-Moggalānesu2 suññā3 me bhikkhave
parisā hoti || anapekkhā tassam4 disāyam hoti yassaṃ dīsā-
yaṃ Sāriputta-Moggalānā viharanti || ||
4. Ye hi te bhikkhave ahesum atītamadhānam arahanto
sammāsambuddhā || tesam pi bhagavantānam etaparamam
yeva sāvakayugam ahosi || seyyathāpi mayhaṃ Sāriputta-
Moggalānā || || Ye pi te bhikkhave bhavissanti anāgatam
addhānam arahanto sammāsambuddhā || tesam pi bhaga-
vantānam etaparamaṃ yeva sāvakayugam bhavissati ||
seyyathāpi mayhaṃ Sāriputta-Moggalānā5 || ||
5. Acchariyam bhikkhave sāvakānam abbhutam bhik-
khave sāvakānam satthu ca nāma sāsanakarā6 bhavissanti
ovādapatikarā || catunnaṃ ca parisānam piyā bhavissanti
manāpā garū ca7 bhāvaniyā ca || || Acchariyam bhikkhave
Tathāgatassa abbhutam bhikkhave Tathāgatassa || evarūpe
pi nāma sāvakayuge8 parinibbute natthi Tathāgatassa
soko vā paridevo vā || tam kutettha bhikkhave9 labbhā ||
yantaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ10 taṃ
vata ma palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
6. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sā-
ravato ye9 mahantatarā11 khandhā te palujjeyyuṃ || Evam
eva kho bhikkhave mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa tiṭṭhato sā-
ravato Sāriputta-Moggalānā parinibbutā || taṃ kutettha12
bhikkhave labbhā || yan taṃ jātam bhūtam saṅkhatam
palokadhammaṃ taṃ vata mā palujjīti || netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
vijjati || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave attadīpā viharathā- -anañña-
saraṇā || ||
8. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī- -anañña-
saraṇo || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 api ca khvāyam.
2 S3 parinibbute- -lāne.
3 B1-2 aparinibbutesu- asuññā.
4 S1-3 tassa.
5 B1-2 -lāno.
6 S1 Satthusamānāmasāsanaṃtārā S3 Satthusamānānāmasāsanantarā.
7 S1-3 garu omitting ca.
8 S1 adds pi S3 su.
9 missing in S1-3
10 S1 -dhamma.
11 S1 mahattarā S3 mahanta or mahatta.
12 S1-3 insert labbhā.

[page 165]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 165
9. Ye hi keci bhikkhave etarahi vā mamaccaye1 vā
attadīpā viharissanti- -tamatagge1 bhikkhave bhikkhu bha-
vissanti ye keci sikkhākāmā ti2 || ||

SN_5,47(3).15. (15) Bāhiyo (or Bāhiko).
1. 3Sāvatthi nidanaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Bāhiyo4 yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā || [pe] || ekam antaṃ nisinno kho
āyasmā Bāhiyo Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Sādhu me
bhante saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu || yaṃ aham Bhaga-
vato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho apamatto ātāpī pa-
hitatto vihareyyanti ||
Tasmā ti ha tvam Bāhiya ādim eva visodhehi5 kusalesu
dhammesu || || Ko cādi kusalānaṃ6 dhammānaṃ || sīlañca
suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca7 ujukā || ||
3. Yato ca8 kho te Bāhiya sīlañca suvisuddham9 bha-
vissati diṭṭhi ca10 ujukā || tato tvam11 Bāhiya sīlam nissāya12
sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveyyāsi || katame
cattāro || ||
4. Idha tvam Bāhiya kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Yato
kho tvam Bāhiya sīlam nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ime cattāro
satipaṭṭhāne evam bhāvessasi13 || tato {tuyham} Bāhiya yā14
ratti vā divaso vā āgamissasi || vuddhi15 yeva paṭikaṅkhā
kusalesu dhammesu no parihānī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 as in number 12 of the preceding sutta.
2 The numbers 7, 8, 9 being identical with 10, 11, 12 of
the preceding sutta, I give only the beginning of them
and the ending words.
3 in B1-2 only.
4 S1-3 bāhiko-ka always.
5 S3 sodhehi.
6 S1 vādi-
7 S3 diṭṭhiñca.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 B1 -suddhi.
10 missing in S3.
11 B1 tasmā ti.
12 S1-3 -pe- instead of sīlaṃ ni-
13 S3 B1 bhāvessati; in the following sutta B1-3 have bhāveyyāsi.
14 S1-3 yaṃ.
15 B1 buddhi.

[page 166]
166 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
5. Atha kho āyasmā Bāhiyo Bhagavato bhāsitam abhi-
nanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā
padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi || ||
6. Atha kho āyasmā Bāhiyo eko vupakaṭṭho apamatto
ātāpī pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva yassatthāya kula-
puttā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyam pabbajanti tad
anuttaram brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ1 diṭṭheva dhamme
sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi || Khīnā
jāti vusitam brahmacariyam kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam
ittatthāyā ti abbhaññāsi || ||
7. Aññataro ca panāyasmā Bāhiyo2 arahatam ahosī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).16. (6) Uttiyo.
1. Sāvatthi nīdānam3 || ||
2--4. Atha kho āyasmā Uttiyo4 yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || [pe] || tato tvam Uttiya gamissasi maccudheyyassa
pāranti || pe || ||
5.6.7. Aññataro ca panāyasmā Uttiyo arahatam aho-
sī ti5 || ||

SN_5,47(3).17. (7) Ariyo.
1. Sāvatthi6 || ||
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā ariyā niyyānikā niyyanti7 takkarassa sammādukkhā-
kkhayāya || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassaṃ ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -cariyaṃpa-
2 B2 bāhīro.
3 in B1-2 only.
4 S1-3 Uttiko (-ka) always.
5 So S1-3, complete in B1-2; -- the same as the preceding sutta
with very little change.
6 in B2 only.
7 S1-3 nī (S1 ni) yati here and further on.

[page 167]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 167
4. Ime kho bhikkhave1 cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā ariyā niyyānikā niyyanti2 takkarassa sammā-
dukkhakkhayāyā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).18. (8) Brahmā.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā
Nerañjarāya tīre Ajapālanigrodhe pathamābhisambuddho || ||
2. Atha kho Bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ
cetaso parivitakko udapādi || || Ekāyano yam3 maggo
sattānam visuddhiyā sokaparidevānam4 samatikkamāya
dukkhadomanassānam atthagamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya
nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ||
katame cattāro || ||
3. Kāye vā bhikkhu5 kāyānupassī vihareyya || ātāpī sam-
pajāno satimā vinneyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Veda-
nāsu vā bhikkhu || Citte vā bhikkhu || || Dhammesu vā bhik-
khu dhammānupassī vihareyya || ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Ekāyano yam maggo
sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya
dukkhadomanassānam atthagamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya
nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṃ6 cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ti || ||
4. Atha kho Brahmā sahampati Bhagavato cetasā ceto-
parivitakkam aññāya7 seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso
sammiñjitaṃ8 vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ
sammiñjeyya8 || evam eva kho Brahmaloke antarahito Bha-
gavato purato pāturahosi || || Atha kho Brahmā sahampati
ekaṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena Bhagavā tenañjalim
paṇāmetvā Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
5. Evam etam Bhagavā evam etaṃ Sugata || ekāyano
yam bhante maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānam
samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānam atthagamāya ñāyassa
adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṃ cattāro

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 omit kho bhi-
2 S1-3 nīyyati.
3 B1-2 ekāyanvāyaṃ always.
4 S1-3 -paridda- always.
5 S1-3 insert kāye.
6 S1 yadime.
7 B1 maññāya.
8 B1-2 samañch-

[page 168]
168 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || || Kāye vā bhante bhikkhu
kāyanupassī vihareyya1 || ātāpī sampajāno satimā || vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Vedanāsu vā bhante bhikkhu ||
Citte vā bhante bhikkhu || Dhammesu vā bhante dhammā-
nupassī vihareyya || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke
abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Ekāyano yam bhante maggo sattā-
naṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānam samatikkamāya dukkha-
domanassānam atthagamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbā-
nassa sacchikiriyāya yad idam2 cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti || ||
6. Idam avoca Brahmā sahampati || idaṃ vatvā Brahmā
sahampati3 athāparam etad avoca || ||
Ekāyanaṃ4 jātikhayantadassī ||
Maggam pajānāti hitānukampi ||
Etena maggena atariṃsu5 pubbe ||
Tarissanti6 ye7 taranti ca7 oghan ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).19. (9) Sedakam or Ekantaka(?).
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sumbhesu8 viharati Seda-
kaṃ9 nāma Sumbhānaṃ nigamo || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || || Bhūta-
pubbam bhikkhave caṇḍālavaṃsiko caṇḍālavaṃsam ussā-
petvā Medakathālikam antevāsim10 āmantesi || Ehi tvaṃ
samma Medakathālike11 Caṇḍālavaṃsam abhirūhitvā mama
uparikhandhe titthāhī ti ||
Evam ācariyā ti kho bhikkhave Medakathālikā antevāsī
Caṇḍālavaṃsikassa paṭissutvā Caṇḍālavaṃsam abhirūhitvā
ācariyassa uparikhandhe aṭṭhāsi || ||
3. Atha kho bhikkhave Caṇḍālavaṃsiko12 Medakathāli-
kam antevāsim etad avoca || Tvaṃ samma Medakathālike
mamaṃ13 rakkha aham tvaṃ14 rakkhissāmi evaṃ mayam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 viharati.
2 S1 ime.
3 S1-3 omit Brahmā-
4 S2 ekāsaṃnā.
5 B1 ataṃsu S1 akariṃsu.
6 B2 karissanti.
7 B1-3 caranti omitting ca.
8 S1-3 subbhe--bhā-
9 S1 sekadakaṃ B2 pesakārakam.
10 S1 -vāsi.
11 B1 -thālika.
12 S3 caṇdāla- B1 caṇdālī.
13 S1 mama S3 bbabba(?).
14 S1-3 tava.

[page 169]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 169
aññamaññaguttā1 aññamaññarakkhitā1 sippāni ceva das-
sessāma2 lābhañ3 ca lacchāma sotthinā ca4 caṇḍālavaṃ-
sam5 orohissāmā ti || ||
4. Evaṃ vutte bhikkhave Medakathālikā6 antevāsī Caṇ-
ḍālavaṃsikam etad avoca || || Na kho panetam7 ācariya
evam bhavissati || tvam ācariya attānaṃ rakkha aham atta-
naṃ8 rakkhissāmi || || Evam mayam attaguttā attarakkhitā
sippāni ceva dassessāma lābhañca lacchāma sotthinā ca4
caṇḍalavaṃsā orohissāmā9 ti || || So tattha ñāyo ti || ||
5. Bhagavā10 avoca || || Yathā Medakathālikā antevāsī11
ācariyam avoca || Attānam bhikkhave rakkhissāmī ti sati-
paṭṭhānaṃ sevitabbaṃ || Param rakkhissamā ti satipaṭṭhā-
naṃ sevitabbaṃ || || Attānam bhikkhave rakkhanto paraṃ
rakkhati || paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati || ||
6. Kathañca bhikkhave attānam rakkhanto param rak-
khati || āsevanāya bhāvanāya bahulīkammena12 || || Evaṃ
kho bhikkhave attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati || ||
7. Kathañca bhikkhave paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ
rakkhati || khantiyā avihiṃsāya mettatāya13 anudayatāya14 || ||
Evaṃ kho bhikkhave paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati || ||
8. Attānaṃ bhikkhave rakkhissāmī ti satipaṭṭhānaṃ15
sevitabbam || Paraṃ rakkhissāmī ti satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevi-
tabbaṃ || attānam bhikkhave rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati ||
paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).20. (10) Janapada or Ekantaka(?).
1. Evam me sutam16 Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sum-
bhesu17 viharati Sedakam18 nāma Sumbhānaṃ nigamo || ||

7 S1-3 nāmetam.

9 S1-32 orohessāmā.

[page 170]
170 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || [pe] ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Janapadakalyāṇī janapada-
kalyāṇī ti kho bhikkhave mahājanakāyo sannipateyya || Sā
kho panassa1 janapadakalyāṇī paramapāsāvinī nacce pa-
ramapāsāvinī gīte || Janapadakalyāṇī naccati gāyatīti kho
bhikkhave bhiyyosomattāya mahā janakāyo sannipateyya || ||
Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukha-
kāmo dukkhapaṭikūlo tam enaṃ evaṃ2 vadeyyum3 || Ayan
te ambho purisa samatittiko4 telapatto antarena ca5
mahāsamajjam6 antarena ca5 janapadakalyāṇiṃ7 parihā-
tabbo8 || puriso ca te9 ukkhitāsiko piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anu-
bandhissati yattheva10 naṃ thokam11 pi chaddessati12 tat-
theva te siro pātessatī ti13 || || Taṃ kim maññatha bhik-
khave || api nu so puriso amum telapattam14 amanasikaritvā
bahiddhā pamādam āhareyyāti15 || ||
No hetam bhante || ||
4. Upamā kho myāyam bhikkhave katā atthassa viññā-
panāya || ayaṃ cevettha16 attho || Samatittiko telapatto ti
kho bhikkhave kāyagatāya etaṃ satiyā adhivacanaṃ || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave evam sikkhitabbaṃ || || Kāya-
gatā sati no17 bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānikatā
vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā18 ti || Evaṃ
hi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti || ||
Nāḷandavaggo dutiyo19 || ||
Tassa20 uddānaṃ || ||

CHAPTER III. SīLAṬṬHITIVAGGO TATIYO.

SN_5,47(3).21. (1) Sīlam.
1. Evam me sutaṃ6 Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā ca Ānando
āyasmā ca Bhaddo Pāṭaliputte viharanti Kukkuṭārāme || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Bhaddo sāyaṇhasamayam paṭi-
sallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā Ānando tenupasaṅkami || upa-
saṅkamitvā āyasmatā Ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi || pe ||
āyasmantam Ānandam etad avoca || ||
3. Yānimani āvuso Ānanda kusalāni sīlāni vuttāni Bha-
gavatā || imāni kusalāni sīlāni kimatthiyāni vuttāni Bhaga-
vatā ti ||
Sādhu sādhu āvuso Bhadda7 || bhaddako kho te āvuso
Bhadda7 ummaggo8 bhaddakam paṭibhānam kalyāṇī9 pa-
ripucchā || || Evaṃ hi tvam avuso Bhadda pucchasi ||
Yānimāni āvuso Ānanda kusalāni sīlāni vuttāni Bhagavatā ||
imāni kusalāni sīlāni kimatthiyāni vuttāni Bhagavatā ti || ||
Evam āvuso ti10 || ||
4. Yānimani āvuso Bhadda kusalāni sīlāni vuttāni Bha-
gavatā imāni kusalāni sīlāni yāvad eva catunnam sati-
paṭṭhānānam bhāvanāya vuttāni Bhagavatā || katamesam
catunnaṃ || ||
5. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye11 kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 adds ca.
2 S1 nāḷandā S3 nālandā.
3 missing in S1-3 .
4 S1-3 ce (S1 ve?) lo ca bāhiko.
5 S1-3 dve yekatanakena (S3 -yekantayena-) cāti instead of sedakaṃ-
6 this phrase in B1-2 only.
7 S1-3 bhaddaka.
8 S1 ummago.
9 S1 kalyāṇaṃ (S3 ṇiṃ).
10 B1 omits ti.
11 S1 kāyena.

[page 172]
172 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
Yānimanī āvuso Bhadda kusalāni sīlāni vuttāni Bhagavatā ||
imani kusalāni sīlāni yāvad eva imesaṃ catunaṃ satipaṭṭhā-
nānam bhāvanāya vuttāni Bhagavatā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).22. (2) Ṭhiti.
1. Taṃ yeva nidānaṃ1 || ||
2. Ekam antam nisinnam- -etad avoca2 || ||
3. Ko nu kho āvuso Ānanda hetu ko paccayo yena
tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti || ko
panāvuso hetu ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute
saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī ti || ||
Sādhu sādhu āvuso Bhadda || bhaddako kho te āvuso
Bhadda ummaggo3 bhaddakam4 paṭibhānaṃ kalyaṇī5
paripucchā || evaṃ hi tvam āvuso Bhadda pucchasi || Ko
nu kho āvuso Ānanda hetu ko paccayo yena tathāgate
parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti || ko panāvuso
Ānanda hetu ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute
saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī ti || ||
Evam āvuso ti || ||
4. Catunnaṃ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam abhāvitattā
abahulīkatattā Tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ci-
raṭṭhitiko hoti || Catunnaṃ ca kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā6 Tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo
ciraṭṭhitiko hoti || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Imesaṃ kho āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam abhāvitattā
abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ci-
raṭṭhitiko hoti || imesaṃ ca kho āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhā-
nānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute
saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So B1-2; S1-3 tayo suttā kukkuṭārāme.
2 in BI-2 only.
3 S1 ummage.
4 S1 -ka.
5 S1-3 -ṇi.
6 S1-3 -pe-

[page 173]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 173

SN_5,47(3).23. (3) Parihānaṃ.
1--2. Pāṭaliputte1 viharanti2 Kukkuṭārāme3 || ||
3. Ko nu kho āvuso Ānanda hetu ko paccayo yena
saddhammaparihānaṃ4 hoti || ko nu kho āvuso5 Ānanda
hetu ko paccayo yena saddhamma-aparihānaṃ4 hetu || ||
Sādhu sādhu āvuso Bhadda || bhaddhako kho te āvuso
Bhadda ummaggo6 bhaddakam7 paṭibhānaṃ kalyāṇī pari-
pucchā || evaṃ hi tvam āvuso Bhadda pucchasi || Ko nu
āvuso hetu ko paccayo yena saddhammaparihānaṃ4 hoti ||
ko panāvuso Ānanda hetu ko paccayo yena saddhamma-
aparihānaṃ4 hoti ti || ||
Evam āvuso ti || ||
4. Catunnaṃ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam abhāvitattā
abahulīkatattā saddhammaparihānaṃ8 hoti || catunnaṃ ca9
kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sad-
dhamma-aparihānaṃ10 hoti || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye11 kāyānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Imesaṃ kho āvuso12 catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam abhāvitattā
abahulīkatattā saddhammaparihānaṃ hoti || imesaṃ13 kho
āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā
saddhamma-aparihānaṃ8 hotī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).24. (4) Suddhakam.
1. Sāvatthinidānam14 || ||
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
ātāpi sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -puttake.
2 S1-3 viharati.
3 So S1-3, complete in B1-2 (S. 21).
4 S1-3 saddhammaṃ pari- apari-
5 S1-3 ko panāvuso.
6 S1 ummaṇgo.
7 S1-3 bhaddakānaṃ.
8 S3 saddhammaṃ-
9 missing in S1-3.
10 S1-3 saddhammo-
11 S1 kāyena.
12 S1 omits imesaṃ-
13 S1-3 imesaṅca.
14 in B1-2 only.

[page 174]
174 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).25. (5) Brāhmaṇa.
1. Evam me sutaṃ ekam samayam Bhagavā Sāvatthi-
yaṃ viharati Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme1 || ||
2. Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi ||
sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sārāṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ
nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo Bhaga-
vantam etad avoca || ||
3. Ko nu kho bho Gotama hetu ko paccayo yena Ta-
thāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti || ko
pana bho Gotama hetu ko paccayo yena tathāgate pari-
nibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī ti || ||
4. Catunnaṃ kho brāhmaṇa satipatthānānam abhāvitattā-
5. Idha brāhmaṇa bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī- -doma-
nassaṃ || Imesaṃ kho brāhmaṇa catunnaṃ- -ciraṭṭhitiko
hotī ti2 || ||
6. Evaṃ vutte so brāhmaṇo Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
Abhikkantam bho Gotama || la-pe || upāsakam mam bha-
vaṃ Gotamo dhāretu3 ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ
gatan ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).26. (6) Padesam.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā ca Sāriputto āyasmā ca
Mahā-Moggalāno āyasmā ca Anuruddho Sākete viharanti4
Kanṭakīvane5 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā ca Sāriputto āyasmā ca Mahā-
Moggalāno sāyaṇhasamayam patisallāṇā vuṭṭhito yenā-
yasmā Anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsa || upasaṅkamitvā āyas-
matā Anuruddhena saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu || sammodanīyaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This number in B1-2 only.
2 The number4,5 are the same as those of Ṭhiti 22 (p.172).
3 S1-3 omit upāsakaṃ-
4 B1-2 kaṇḍakī-
5 S1-3 viharati.

[page 175]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 175
Kathaṃ sārāṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || ||
Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Sāriputto āyasmantam
Anuruddham etad avoca || ||
3. Sekho sekho ti āvuso Anuruddha vuccati || kittāvatā
nu kho āvuso Sekho ti hotī ti || ||
Catunnam kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam padesaṃ bhāvi-
tattā sekho hoti || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyyyaloke abhijjhadomanassaṃ || Veda-
nāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Imesaṃ kho āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam padesam
bhāvitattā sekho hotī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).27. (7) Samattam.
1--2. Taṃ yeva nidānaṃ || || Ekam antam- -Anuruddham
etad avoca1 || ||
3. Asekho asekho ti āvuso Anuruddha vuccati || kittā-
vatā nu kho āvuso Asekho hotī ti || ||
Catunnaṃ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam samattam bhāvi-
tattā asekho hoti2 || || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ||
Imesaṃ kho āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samattā3
bhāvitattā asekho hotī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).28. (8) Loko.
1--2. 4 Taṃ yeva nidānaṃ || || Ekam antam nisinno-
-Anuruddham etad avoca || ||
3. Katamesam āyasmā5 Anuruddha dhammānam bhāvi-
tattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññatam6 patto ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 The whole is missing in S1-3 which have only tiṇṇaṃ
suttanti (S3-ta) kaṇṭavane.
2 S1-3 hotī ti.
3 B1-2 samattaṃ.
4 in B1-2 only.
5 B1-2 āvuso.
6 S3 viññātaṃ.

[page 176]
176 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
Catunnaṃ āvuso1 satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā bahulīka-
tattā mahābhiññatam2 patto || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Idhāham āvuso kāye kāyanupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampa-
jāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassaṃ || Vedanāsu ||
Citte || Dhammesu dhammanupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampa-
jāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Imesaṃ
khvāham3 āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā
bahulīkatattā mahabhiññatam patto || ||
5. Imesaṃ ca4 panāham āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānā-
nam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sahassaṃ lokam abhijānāmīti ||

SN_5,47(3).29. (9) Sirivaḍḍho.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Ānando Rājagahe viharati
Veḷuvane Kalandakanivāpe || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Sirivaḍḍho5 gahapati
ābādhiko hoti || dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || ||
3. Atha kho Sirivaḍḍho gahapati aññataram purisam
āmantesi || Ehi tvam ambho purisa yenāyasmā Ānando te-
nupasaṅkama || upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato
Ānandassa pāde sirasā6 vanda || Sirivaḍḍho bhante7 gaha-
pati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || so āyasmato Ānan-
dassa pāde sirasā vandatī ti evañca vadeti || Sādhu kira
bhante āyasmā Ānando yena8 Sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa9
nivesanaṃ || tenupasaṅkamatu anukampam upādāyāti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho so10 puriso Sirivaḍḍhassa gahapa-
tissa paṭissutvā yenāyasmā Ānando tenupasaṅkami || ||
4. Upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ Ānandam abhivādetvā
ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so puriso
āyasmantam Ānandam etad avoca || Sirivaḍḍho bhante
gahapati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || so āyasmato
Ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati || evañca vadeti11 || Sādhu
kira bhante āyasmā Ānando yena Sirivaḍḍhassa gahapa-
tissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampam upādāyā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S2-3 kho.
2 S3 -bhiññākaṃ
3 S1-3 kho aham.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 B1 sīri- always B2 siri- twice only.
6 S1-3 sirasā pāde.
7 missing in S1-3.
8 S1-3 insert ca.
9 S1-3 -patino.
10 missing in S1.
11 S1-3 vadesi.

[page 177]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 177
Adhivāsesi kho āyasmā Ānando tuṇhībhāvena || ||
5. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando1 nivāsetvā pattacīvaram ādā-
ya yena Sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanam upasaṅkami ||
upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi || || Nisajja kho āyas-
mā Ānando Sirivaḍḍham gahapatim etad avoca || ||
6. Kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīyaṃ
kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti2 no abhikkamanti pa-
ṭikkamosānam paññāyati no abhikkamo3 ti || ||
Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyam bāḷhā me
dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no4 paṭikkammanti abhik-
kamo sānam paññāyati no paṭikkamo ti || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha te gahapati5 evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ || ||
Kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vi-
neyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Vedanāsu || Citte || Dham-
mesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassan ti || || Evaṃ hi te gahapati
sikkhitabban ti || ||
8. Ye me bhante Bhagavatā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā desitā
saṃvijjanti te dhammā6 mayi ahaṃ ca7 tesu dhammesu
sandissāmi || ahaṃ hi8 bhante kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ9 || ||
9. Yāni cimāni bhante Bhagavatā pañcorambhāgiyāni
saṃyojanāni desitāni || nāhaṃ tesaṃ10 kiñci attani appahī-
naṃ samanupassāmī ti || ||
10. Lādhā11 te gahapati || suladdhaṃ te gahapati || anā-
gāmiphalaṃ12 tayā gahapati vyākatan ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 inserts pubbaṇha samayaṃ
2 S1 pakkamanti.
3 S1 abhikkhamo.
4 missing in S1.
5 S1-3 omit tegahapati.
6 S1-3 saṃvijjante ratanadhammā.
7 S3 va.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 S1 -nassa.
10 B1-2 bhante yaṃ instead of tesaṃ.
11 S3 lābho S1 hote (corrected from hoto) instead of lābhāte.
12 S1 ānāgā-

[page 178]
178 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.

SN_5,47(3).30. (10) Mānadinna.
1. Taṃ yeva nidānaṃ1 || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Mānadinno gahapati ābā-
dhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || ||
3--6. Atha kho Mānadinno gahapati aññataram pu-
risam āmantesi || pe2 || ||
7. Evarūpāya3 cāham bhante dukkhāya vedanāya puṭṭho
samāno kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Vedanāsu || Citte || Dham-
mesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
8. Yānicimāni4 bhante Bhagavatā pañcorambhāgiyani5
saṃyojanāni desitāni || nāham bhante yaṃ kiñci attani
appahīnaṃ samanupassāmīti || ||
9. Lābhā te gahapati || suladdhan te gahapati || anāgāmi-
phalaṃ tayā gahapati vyākatan ti || ||
Sīlavaggo tatiyo6 || ||
Tassa7 uddānam || ||
Sīlaṃ Ṭhiti8 Parihānam Suddhakaṃ ||
Brāhmaṇena ca Padesam9 ||
Samattam Loko ca10 Sirivaḍḍho11 ||
Mānadinnena te dasā ti12 || ||
Satipaṭṭhāna-saṃyuttassa13 Sīlaṭṭhitivaggo tatiyo || ||

CHAPTER [IV]. ANUSSUTA-VAGGO CATUTTHO.

SN_5,47(3).31. (1) Anussutam.
1--2. Sāvatthi nidānam14 || ||
3. Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā15 ti me bhikkhave pubbe

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 Eko sam- ā- Ānando Rā- vi- Ve- Kalandakanivāpe.
2 B1-2 ehi- purisa || la || na me bhante- -no patikkamo.
3 S1-3 evarūpā.
4 B1 yācini-
5 S1-3 -rambhāj-
6 missing in S1-3.
7 S1-3 tatr.
8 B2 Sīlati.
9 S1-3 pade.
10 S1-3 loke omitting ca.
11 B1 sīri- B2 sirivaḍho S1 sivaḍḍho.
12 S1-3 cāti instead of te dasā ti.
13 missing in S1-3.
14 in B1-2 only B2oniddānaṃ.
15 S1-3 kāyānupassi(S3 ssī) nā.

[page 179]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 179
ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam1 udapādi
vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi || || Sā kho panāyam kāye
kāyanupassanā2 bhāvetabbā ti me bhikkhave3 || bhavitā ti
me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum
udapādi ñāṇam udapādi4 vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi || ||
4. Ayam vedanānupassanā ti- ||
5. Ayaṃ citte cittānupassanā ti-
6. Ayaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā ti-5 || sā kho pa-
nāyaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā6 bhāvetabbā ti me
bhikkhave7 || bhāvitā ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu
dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi4 vijjā udapādi
āloko udapādīti8 || ||

SN_5,47(3).32. (2) Virāgo.
1--2. Sāvatthiyaṃ9 || ||
3. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya10 upasamāya
abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya {saṃvattanti} || katame
cattāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya
abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī ti11 || ||

SN_5,47(3).33. (3) Viraddho.
3. Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā vi-
raddhā || viraddho tesam ariyo12 maggo sammādukkhakkha-
yagāmī || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 paññā.
2 S1 -passinā, S3 -passa- corrected from passī-
3 S1-3 omit me bhi-
4 B1-2 insert paññā udapādi.
5 4,5,6 are altogether omitted in S1-3 which continue by sākho
panāyaṃ- without any sign of interruption or abbreviation.
6 S3 -passīnā corrected into passanā.
7 S1-3 insert pubbe.
8 B2 S3 udapādi.
9 in B1 only.
10 missing in S1.
11 B1 saṃvattanti.
12 B1-2 insert aṭṭhaṅgiko always.

[page 180]
180 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
4. Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ārad-
dhā || āraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhaya-
gāmī || || Katame cattāro || ||
5. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
pe || Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā viraddhā ||
viraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī || ||
Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ārad-
dhā || āraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhaya-
gāmī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).34. (4) Bhāvanā.
1--2. Sāvatthiyam1 || ||
3. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā aparāparaṅgamanāya2 saṃvattanti || katame cattāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
[pe] || Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viha-
rati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādoma-
nassaṃ || || Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhā-
vitā bahulīkatā aparāparaṅgamanāya2 saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).35. (5) Sato.
1--2. Sāvatthi3 || ||
3. Sato bhikkhave bhikkhu4 vihareyya sampajāno || ayaṃ
vo amhākam anusāsanī || ||
4. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu sato hoti || Idha bhik-
khave bhikkhu kāye kāyanupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || [pe] || || Evaṃ
kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sato hoti || ||
5. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu sampajāno hoti || || Idha
bhikkhave bhikkhuno viditā5 vedanā uppajjanti6 || viditā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B2 only.
2 B1-2 apārā-
3 B2 adds yaṃ; missing in S1-3.
4 missing in S1.
5 S1 viditaṃ corrected from viditā. 6. S1 uppati.

[page 181]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 181
upaṭṭhahanti || viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti || || Viditā vi-
takkā uppajjanti || viditā upaṭṭhahanti || viditā abbhattham
gacchanti1 || || Viditā saññā2 uppajjanti || viditā upaṭṭha-
hanti || viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti || || Evaṃ kho bhik-
khave bhikkhu sampajāno hoti || ||
6. Sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno || ayaṃ
vo amhākam3 anusāsanīti || ||

SN_5,47(3).36. (6) Aññam.
1--2. Sāvatthiyaṃ4 || ||
3. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || [pe] ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammanupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ||
Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā5 || ||
4. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam
bhavitattā bahulīkatattā6 dvinnam phalānam aññataram
phalam pāṭikaṅkhaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme aññā sati vā upā-
disese anāgāmitā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).37. (7) Chandam.
1. Sāvatthiyaṃ7 || ||
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati
ātāpi sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanas-
saṃ8 || || Tassa kāye kāyānupassino9 viharato yo kāyasmiṃ
chando so pahīyati || chandassa pahānāya amataṃ sacchi-
kataṃ hoti || ||
4. Vedanāsu- -yo10 vedanāsu chando11 so pahīyati || chan-
dassa pahānā12 amataṃ sacchikataṃ hoti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This article (vitakkā) is not to be found in S1-3.
2 B1 paññā?
3 missing in S1.
4 in B2 only.
5 S1-3 omit ime kho-
6 missing in S1-3.
7 in B2 only.
8 S3 inserts here tassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī- -domanassaṃ.
9 S1-3 -passī.
10 S1-3 so.
11 S1-3 vedanāya-
12 B1-2 pahānāya always.

[page 182]
182 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
5. Citte- -yo1 cittamhi2 chando so pahīyati || chandassa
pahānā amataṃ sacchikataṃ hoti || ||
6. Dhammesu3 dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || tassa dhammesu
dhammānupassino4 viharato yo dhammesu chando so pahī-
yati || chandassa pahānā5 amatam sacchikataṃ hotī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).38. (8) Pariññāya.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
tassa kāye kāyānupassino4 viharato6 kāyo pariññāto hoti ||
kāyassa pariññātattā amataṃ sacchikataṃ hoti || ||
4. Vedanāsu-1 vedanā pariññātā honti7 vedanānam8
pariññātattā amatam sacchikataṃ hoti || ||
5. Citte-1 -cittam pariññātām hoti || cittassa9 pariññātattā
amataṃ sacchikataṃ hoti || ||
6. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. || tassa dhammesu
dhammānupassino viharato dhammā pariññātā10 honti ||
dhammānam pariññātattā amataṃ sacchikatam hotī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).39. (9) Bhāvanā.
2. Catunnam bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvanaṃ de-
sissāmi || taṃ suṇātha || || Katamā ca11 bhikkhave catunnam
satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvanā || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyanupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 abridged in S1-2.
2 S1-3 cittasmiṃ.
3 S1-3 dhamme.
4 S1-3 -passīno.
5 S1 pahā.
6 S1 virato.
7 S1-3 hoti.
8 S1-3 vedanāya.
9 S1 tassa.
10 S1 pariññā.
11 missing in B1-2

[page 183]

ātāpī1 sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādoma-
nassaṃ || ||
4 Ayam2 bhikkhave catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhā-
vanā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).40. (10) Vibhaṅga.
2. Satipaṭṭhānañca vo bhikkhave desissāmi satipaṭṭhāna-
bhāvanañca satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāgaminiñca paṭipadaṃ || tam
suṇātha || ||
3. Katamañca bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānaṃ || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyanupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte3 || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānaṃ || ||
4. Katamā ca bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu samudayadhammānupassī kā-
yasmiṃ viharati4 || vayadhammānupassī kāyasmiṃ viharati4 ||
samudayavayadhammānupassī5 kāyasmim viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ||
Samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu viharati vayadhammā-
nupassī vedanāsu viharati || samudayavayadhammanupassī
vedanāsu viharati4 || || Tathā citte6 || Dhammesu viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā || ||
5. Katamā ca bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāgāminī
patipādā || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ
sammādiṭṭhi || [pe] || sammāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhik-
khave satipaṭṭhāna bhāvanāgāminī patipadā ti || ||
Ananussuta-vaggo7 catuttho || ||
Tassa8 uddānaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 āpī.
2 B inserts kho.
3 S1-3 cittesu; vedanāsu is more and citte altogether complete in B1.
4 S1-3 add ātāpī- -domanassaṃ.
5 S1-3 omit vaya in this compound.
6 complete in S1-3.
7 S1 anussati- S3 anusati- the whole being drawn back to the end.
8 S1-3 tatr.

[page 184]
184 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
Ananussutaṃ1 Virāgo ca ||
Viraddho2 Bhāvanā Sato ||
Aññam3 Chandam4 Pariññāya5 ||
Bhāvanā {Vibhaṅgena} te dasāti6 || ||

CHAPTER V. AMATAVAGGO PAÑCAMO.

SN_5,47(3).41. (1) Amatam.
1. Sāvatthi7 || ||
2. Catusu bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacittā vi-
haratha || mā vo amatam panassa || katamesu catusu || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ||
4. Imesu bhikkhave catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhita-
cittā viharatha || mā vo amatam panassā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).42. (2) Samudayo.
2. Catunnam bhikkhave satipaṭṭhānānam samudayañca
atthagamañca desissāmi || taṃ suṇātha || ||
3. Ko ca bhikkhave kāyassa samudayo || || Āhārasamu-
dayā kāyassa samudayo || āhāranirodhā kāyassa atthagamo || ||
4. Phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ8 samudayo || phassani-
rodhā vedanānam atthagamo || ||
5. Nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo || nāmarūpani-
rodhā cittassa atthagamo || ||
6. Manasikārasamudayā dhammānam samudayo || manasi-
kāranirodhā dhammānam atthagamo ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 anusayatā.
2 S1-3 viraddham.
3 S1 aññeca.
4 S1-3 chando B2 sandam.
5 S1-3 pariñño ca.
6 S1-3 cāti instead of te dasāti.
7 in B1 only.
8 S1-3 vedanā.

[page 185]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 185

SN_5,47(3).43. (3) Maggo.
1. Sāvatthi1 || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū amantesi2 || ||
Ekam idāham bhikkhave samayam Uruvelāyaṃ viharāmi
najjā Nerañjarāya3 tīre Ajapālanigrodhe pathamābhisam-
buddho || ||
3. Tassa mayham bhikkhave rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa
evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi || Ekāyanvāyam4 maggo
sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānam5 samatikkamāya
dukkhadomanassānam atthagamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya
nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ||
katame cattāro || || Kāye vā bhikkhu6 kāyānupassī viha-
reyya7 Vedanāsu vā bhikkhu vedanānupassī vihareyya || Citte
vā bhikkhu cittānupassī vihareyya || Dhammesu vā bhikkhu
dhammānupassī vihareyya || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || Ekāyanvāyam8 maggo sattānam
visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadoma-
nassānam atthagamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa
sacchikiriyāya yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ti || ||
4. Atha kho bhikkhave Brahmā sahampati mama ce-
tasā ceto parivitakkam aññāya || seyyathāpi nāma balavā
puriso sammiñjītaṃ9 vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritaṃ vā10
bāham sammiñjeyya11 || evam eva12 Brahmaloke antarahito
pi mama purato pātur ahosi || ||
5. Atha kho bhikkhave Brahmā sahampati ekaṃsam
uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yenāham tenañjalim paṇametvā mam
etad avoca || Evam etam Bhagavā evam etaṃ Sugata ||
ekāyanvāyam13 maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevā-
nam14 samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānam atthagamāya
ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yad idaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So B1 S1-3 Ek- sam- Bh- vih- Jet- An- ārāme.
2 B1-2 have only tatra.
3 S1 nerañjarā.
4 S1-3 ekāyanoyaṃ almost always.
5 S1-3 -pariddavānaṃ always.
6 S1 omits vā bhikkhu.
7 S1-3 add ātāpī-
8 S1-3 ekāyano.
9 B1 samañchitaṃ B1 samachitaṃ.
10 missing in S1.
11 B1-2 samañcheyya.
12 S1-3 evaṃ.
13 B1 adds bhante.
14 B1 adds devānam.

[page 186]
186 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || || Kāye vā bhante
bhikkhu kāyānupassī vihareyya1 || Vedanāsu vā2 || Citte vā2 ||
Dhammesu vā bhante {bhikkhu} dhammānupassī vihareyya ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Ekāyanvāyam bhante maggo sattānam visuddhiyā soka-
paridavānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ attha-
gamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya3 nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya
yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ti || ||
6. Idam avoca bhikkhave Brahmā sahampati || idaṃ
vatvā4 athāparam etad avoca || ||
Ekāyanaṃ jātikhayantadassī ||
maggam pajānāti hitānukampī ||
Etena maggena ataṃsu5 pubbe ||
tarissanti ye ca taranti oghan ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).44. (4) Sato.
1. Sāvatthiyaṃ6 || ||
2. Sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya || ayam vo amhā-
kam anusāsanī7 || ||
3. Kathañca bhikkhave {bhikkhu} sato hoti || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati8 ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ||
Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sato hoti || ||
4. Sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya || ayaṃ vo amhā-
kam anusāsanī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).45. (5) Kusalarāsi.
2. Kusalarāsī ti bhikkhave vadamāno cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
sammāvadamāno vadeyya || ||
Kevalo hāyam9 bhikkhave kusalarāsī yad idaṃ cattāro
satipaṭṭhānā || katame cattāro || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ātāpī- -domanassaṃs
2 complete in S1-3.
3 S1-3 omit ñāyassa-
4 B2 adds ca.
5 B2 atariṃsu.
6 in B2 only.
7 B1 S3 -sāsani.
8 S1-3 add ātāpī- -domanassaṃ
9 S1-3 cāyaṃ.

[page 187]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 187
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
4. Kusalarāsī ti bhikkhave vadamāno ime cattāro sati-
paṭṭhāne sammāvadamāno vadeyya || || Kevalo hāyam1
bhikkhave kusalarāsī yad idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).46. (6) Pātimokkha.
2. Atha kho aññataro2 bhikkhu yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkami || la || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bha-
gavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Sādhu me bhante saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu yam
aham Bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appa-
matto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyanti ||
Tasmā ti ha tvam bhikkhu ādim eva visodhehi kusalesu
dhammesu || || Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ || ||
4. Idha tvam bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto vi-
harāhi ācāragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayad-
assāvī samādāya sikkhasu3 sikkhāpadesu || || Yato kho
tvam bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharissasi ācā-
ragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samā-
dāya4 sikkhissasi5 sikkhāpadesu || tato tvam bhikkhu sīlaṃ
nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveyyāsi ||
katame cattāro || ||
5. Idha tvam bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi6 || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
6. Yato7 kho tvam bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya
ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evam bhāvessasi || tato tuyham
bhikkhu yā ratti8 vā divāso vā āgamissati9 vuddhi10 yeva
pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihānīti || ||
7. Atha kho so bhikkhu Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ- || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 kevalohaṃ S1 kevalāhaṃ.
2 S1 inserts bhikkhave.
3 B2 sikkhassu- S1 -si S3- ti.
4 B2 sammādāya.
5 S1-3 sikkhasi B1-su.
6 S1-3 add ātāpī- domanassaṃ.
7 S3 inserts ca.
8 S1-3 rattim omitting yā.
9 S1-3 āgamissasi.
10 B1 buddhi.

[page 188]
188 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
8. Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakattho- -abbhaññāsi1 || ||
9. Aññataro capana so bhikkhu arahatam2 ahosī ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).47. (7) Duccaritam.
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā || la || pe3 || ||
3. Sādhu me bhante Bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ
desetu || yam aham Bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpa-
kaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyanti || ||
Tasmā ti ha tvam bhikkhu ādim eva visodhehi4 kusalesu
dhammesu || ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ || ||
4. Idha tvam bhikkhu kāyaduccaritam pahāya5 kāyasu-
caritam bhāvessasi || vacī- || mano- sucaritam bhāvessasi || ||
Yato kho tvam bhikkhu kāyaduccaritam pahāya kāya-
sucaritam bhāvessasi || vacī- || mano- -sucaritam bhāvessasi6 ||
tato tvam bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro
satipaṭṭhāne bhāvessasi7 || katame cattāro || ||
5. Idha tvam bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi8 || Ve-
danāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
6. Yato kho tvam bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya
ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evam bhāvessasi || tato tuyham
bhikkhu yā ratti9 vā divaso vā āgamissati10 vuddhi11 yeva
pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihānī ti || ||
7--8. ||la12 || ||
9. Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ13 ahosī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 The numbers 7,8 are complete in B1-2 suppressed in S1-3.
(S. the numbers 5,6 of the sutta 15 Bāhiyo, p. 166).
2 S1-3 arahattam.
3 More complete in the singhalese than in the burmese MSS.
4 S1 vise-
5 S1-3 have here -pe- suppressing the rest till here under noted
bhāsessasi.
6 S1-3 bhāsessasi.
7 S1-3 bhāveyyāsi.
8 S1-3 add ātāpī-- domanassaṃ.
9 S1-3 yaṃ (corrected from yā in S1) rattiṃ.
10 S1-3 -missasi.
11 B2 buddhi.
12 S1-3 have nothing.
13 S1-3 arahattaṃ.

[page 189]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 189

SN_5,47(3).48. (8) Mittā.
1. Sāvatthiyam1 || ||
2. Ye bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca2 sotabbam
maññeyyuṃ mittā vā3 amaccā vā ñāti vā sālohitā vā || te
vo bhikkhave catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvanāya samā-
dapetabbā4 nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā5 || katamesaṃ ca-
tunnaṃ || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati6
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
4. Ye bhikkhave anukampeyyātha ye ca sotabbam mañ-
ñeyyum mittā va amaccā vā ñati vā7 sālohitā vā || te vo
bhikkhave imesaṃ catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvanāya
samādapetabbā8 nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).49. (9) Vedanā.
1. Sāvatthiyam1 || ||
2. Tisso imā bhikkhave vedanā || katamā tisso || || Sukhā
vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhāvedanā || || Imā kho
bhikkhave tisso vedanā9 || ||
3. Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāya
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā || katame cattāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
5. Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannaṃ vedanānam pariñ-
ñāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā ti || ||

SN_5,47(3).50. (10) Āsava.
2. Tayo10 bhikkhave āsavā || katame tayo || || Kāmāsavo ||
bhavāsavo || avijjāsavo || || Ime kho bhikkhave tayo āsavā || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B2 only.
2 B1 adds kho.
3 S3 ṭa S1 adds amattā vā.
4 B2 sammādape- S1-3 samādāpe-
5 B1 adds ti.
6 more abbreviated in S1-3 which omit Vedanāsu-
7 S1-3 omit vā.
8 B2 sammāda- S1 samādā-
9 This phrase is missing in S1-3. B1-2 insert me.

[page 190]
190 {Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam} XLVII.
3. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam āsavānam pahānāya
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā || katame cattāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
5. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave tiṇṇannam āsavānam pahā-
nāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā ti || ||
Amatavaggo pañcamo1 || ||

Sato kusalarāsiyā4 ||
Pāṭimokkhaṃ Duccaritaṃ ||
Mittā5 Vedanā Āsavena6 cāti7 || ||

CHAPTER VI. GAṄGAPEYYĀLA.

SN_5,47(3).51--62. (1--12).
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī8 pācīnaninnā- -evam
eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu cattaro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvento-
-nibbānapubbhāro || ||
3. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu- -nibbānapabbhāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī- -abhij-
jhādomanassam || vedanāsu || citte || dhammesu- || || Evam
eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu- -nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||
[Uddānaṃ]
Cha pācīnato ninnā || cha9 ninnā ca10 samuddato ||
Ete10 dve cha11 dvādasa12 honti || vaggo tena pavuccati || ||
Gaṅgapeyyāla satipaṭṭhānavasena vitthāretabbaṃ13 || ||

1 Drawn back to the end in S1-3.
2 S3 tatru-; missing in B1.
3 S1-3 amakaṃ samudayaṃ.
4 S1-3 -rāsī ca (S1 va).
5 S1-3 metta B2 mettaṃ.
6 B1 āsane s3 āsave.
7 B1-2 put this uddāna after the Gangāpeyyalī and other similar
chapters.
8 No more in S1-3 which abridge exceedingly.
9 S3 ca.
10 missing in S1-3.
11 S1-3 capañca.
12 S1-3 dvādasā.
13 This mention and the following uddānas and mentions in S1-3 only.

Vatthena dasamam padam3 || ||

tabbo vaggo || ||

Akāseṭṭhena vā Āgantukā Nadī ||
Balakaraṇīya-vaggo || ||

Dukkhatañca tisso Khila5 ||
Mala ca Nigho ca Vedanā ||
Taṇhāyenavā Esanavaggo || ||
Satipaṭṭhānavasena vitthāretabbā6-- vaggo || ||
CHAPTER X. OGHA-VAGGO.

SN_5,47(3).103. (10) Uddhambhāgiyāni.7
2. Pañcimani bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || Rūparāgo arūparāgo8 māno uddhaccam

2 S1 vassi.
3 S1 daṃ omitting pa.
4 S3 bījaca.

found in all the MSS.

192 Satipaṭṭhāna-Saṃyuttam XLVII.
avijjā || || Imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃ-
yojanāni || ||
3. Imesam kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgiyā-
nam saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā ||katame cattāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam ||
Vedanāsu || Citte || Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke1 abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
5. Imesam kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgiyā-
nam saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya ime cattāro satipatthānā bhāvetabbāti || ||
[Uddānam]
Ogho Yogo Upādānaṃ || Gantha-Anusayena ca ||
Kāmaguṇā Nīvaranaṃ || Khandham Oruddhabhāgiyāni || ||
Oghavaggo ||
Satipaṭṭhānavasena vitthāretuvaggo2 || ||
Yathā Maggasaṃyuttam vitthāritaṃ || evam Satipaṭṭhā-
nasamyuttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ3 || ||
Satipaṭṭhānasaṃyuttaṃ tatiyaṃ samattaṃ4 || ||

1 S1 loko.
2 This mention as well as the Uddāna is to be found in S1-3 only,
but put before the last text of the vaggo (uddambhāgiyāni).
3 This summing up mention is in B1-2 only instead of the mention of
the chapters V11-X.
4 This word added in S1-3 only.
To be noticed. The sixth text of this Saṃyutta (the sakuṇagghī
pages 146-147) occurs frequently. See particularly Milinda
(pāli) p. 365;-- Julien's avadānas N.99--Lane's arabian
nights.2.58.
