SN_5,48(4).129. (1).
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī- || ||

rāgavinayapariyosānaṃ dosavinayapariyosānaṃ mohavina-
yapariyosānaṃ || la || paññindriyaṃ- -evamo -bhikkhu- -hoti
nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro3 || ||

CHAPTER XVII. OGHA-VAGGO (Rāga-).

SN_5,48(4).176--184. (1--9).

SN_5,48(4).185. (10) Uddhambhāgiyani.
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanā-
naṃ || katamāni pañca || || Ruparāgo arūparāgo māno
uddhaccam avijjā || || Imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddham-
bhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañ-
cannam uddhambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam abhiññāya
pariññāya3 parikkhayāya pahānāya pañcindriyāni bhāve-
tabbāni || katamāni pañca || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhindriyam bhāveti rāga-
vinaya- dosavinaya- mohavinayapariyosānam4 viriyi- sati-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 inserts pā.
2 The Appamāda-balakaraṇīya-esanā vaggā are not even mentioned in
the MSS. evidently by abbreviation.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 instead of rāgavinaya- S1-3 have viveka- virāga-
nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.

[page 243]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 243
samādhi- paññindriyam bhāveti rāgavinaya- dosavinaya-
mohavinayapariyosānaṃ1 || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcan-
nam uddhambhāgiyānaṃ samyojanānam abhiññaya pariñ-
ñāya2 parikkhayāya pahānāya imāni pañca indriyāni3
bhāvetabbānīti4 || ||
[Uddānaṃ]
Ogha Yogo Upādānaṃ Ganthā Anusayena ca ||
Kāmaguṇā Nīvaraṇa-Khandhā Oruddhabhāgiyāni || ||
Oghavaggo indriyasaṃyuttassa rāgavinayavasena
vitthāretabbo || ||
Indriya-saṃyuttaṃ catutthaṃ || ||5

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 keeping here rāga ete add amatogadhaṃ amatapariyosānaṃ
nibbāna-ninnam-poṇaṃ-pabbhāraṃ.
2 missing in S3.
3 S1-3 pañcin-
4 B1-2 add here yathā maggasaṃyutte evam bhavati indriyasamyutte ||
tassa udānaṃ || and rehearse the uddāna of the chapter VII; that of
the chapter XVII (the second Ogha) is to be found in S1-3 only,
but coming before the tenth sutta which it ought to follow.
5 S1-3 --yutto catuttho.

BOOK V.
SAMMAPPADHĀNA-SAṂYUTTAM.

CHAPTER I. GAṄGĀPEYYALĪ.

SN_5,49(5).1--12. (1--12).
1--2. Sāvatthi1 || || Tatra kho Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
Cattāro me bhikkhave sammappadhānā2 || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anuppannānam pāpakānam
akusalānaṃ dhammānam anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti
vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || ||
4. Uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānaṃ dhammānam
pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam
paggaṇhāti padahati || ||
5. Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānam uppādāya
chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇ-
hāti padahati || ||
6. uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammo-
sāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chan-
daṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti
padahati || ||
7. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro sammappadhānāti || ||
8. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī pācīnaninnā pācina-
poṇā pācīnapabbharā || evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
cattāro samappadhāne bhāvento cattāro sammappadhāne
bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbāna-
pabbhāro || || Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu cattāro sam-
mappadhāne bhāvento- -bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti-
-nibbānapabbhāro || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 B1 sama- always.

[page 245]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 245
9. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anuppannānam pāpakānaṃ
akusalānaṃ dhammānam anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti
vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || ||
Uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam pahā-
nāya chandam janeti- -padahati || || Anuppannānaṃ kusa-
lānam dhammānam uppādāya chandaṃ janeti- -padahati || ||
Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya
bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ
janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti pada-
hati || ||
10. Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu cattāro sammappa-
dhāne bhāvento- -bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbāna-
poṇo nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||
[Uddānaṃ]
Cha pācinato ninnā || Cha1 ninnā ca2 samuddato ||
ete2 dve cha dvādasa3 honti || vaggo tena pavuccatīti4 || ||
Sammappadhānasaṃyuttassa5 Gaṅgāpeyyālī sammappa-
dhānavasena vitthāretabbā || || vaggo6 || ||

CHAPTER II. APPAMĀDAVAGGO.

SN_5,49(5).13--22. (1--10).
Tathāgatam7 Padaṃ Kūṭam || Mūḷam Sārena8 Vassikam ||
Rājā9 Candimasuriyā10 Vatthena dasamaṃ padaṃ11 || ||
Appamādavaggo sammappadhānavasena vitthāretabbo || ||
vaggo12 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 chāpācīna.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S3 cagaṇgādasa S1 maggaṅgādasā instead of cha dvādasa.
4 S1-3 pavuccati.
5 S1-3 sammappadhāne (S3 adds na).
6 S1-3 vitthāretabbavaggo.
7 S1-3 -gata.
8 S1 sārañca.
9 S3 rāja.
10 S1 -suriyo and adds ete, S3 suriye and adds ca. -- Here the sheet
ti in B2 is wanting.
11 S1-3 add vaggo.
12 missing in S3. All the MSS. give merely the uddāna of this chapter.

[page 246]
246 Sammappadhāna-Saṃyuttam XLIX.

CHAPTER III. BALAKARAṆĪYAVAGGO.

SN_5,49(5).23--34. (1--12).
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā
kayiranti || sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviyam patiṭṭhāya ||
evam ete balakaraṇīyā kammantā kayiranti || || Evam eva
kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro
sammappadhāne bhāveti cattāro sammappadhāne bahulī
karoti || ||
3. Kathaṃ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle
patiṭṭhāya cattāro samappadhāne bhāveti cattāro sam-
mappadhāne bahulīkaroti || ||
4--7. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anuppannānam1 pāpa-
kānam2 akusalānaṃ dhammānam anuppādāya chandaṃ
janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti pada-
hati || la || pe3 || Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānam ṭhitiyā
asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā
chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇ-
hāti padahati || ||
8. Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle pa-
tiṭṭhāya cattāro samappadhāne bhāveti cattāro sammappa-
dhāne bahulīkarotī ti || ||
[Uddānaṃ]
Bala Bījañca Nāgo ca Rukkha-Kumbhena Suriyaṃ ||
Ākāsena dve Meghā Navā Āgantukā Nadī4 || ||
Evam5 balakaraṇīyavaggo sammappadhānavasena
vitthāretabbo6 || ||

CHAPTER IV. ESANĀ PĀḶI.

SN_5,49(5).35--44. (1--10).
2. Tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || katamā tisso || Kāmesanā
bhavesanā brahmacariyesanā || || Imā7 kho bhikkhave tisso
esanā || ||

1 S1 uppannānam.
2 S1 pāpākānam missing in S1-3.

6 S1-3 add vaggo ti.
7 S3 ime.

[page 247]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 247
3. Imāsaṃ1 kho bhikkhave tissannam esanānam abhiñ-
ñāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya cattāro sammappa-
dhānā bhāvetabbā || katame cattāro || ||
4--7. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anupannānam || pa-pe ||
uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ thitiyā asammosāya
bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ
janeti vāyamati viriyaṃ ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti pada-
hati || ||
8. Imāsaṃ kho bhikkhave tissannam esanānam abhiññāya
pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ime cattaro sammappa-
dhānā bhāvetabbā ti || ||
Esanā Vidhā Āsavo Dukkhatañca Tisso ||
Khilam Malaṃ ca Nīgho ca Vedanā Taṇhāyayenā ti || ||
Esanavaggo sammappadhānavasena vitthāretabbo vaggo2 || ||

CHAPTER V. OGHA-VAGGO.

SN_5,49(5).45--53. (1--10).

SN_5,49(5).54. (10) Uddhambhāgiyāni.
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccam
avijjā || imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃ-
yojanāni || ||
3. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgiyā-
naṃ saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya cattāro samappadhānā bhāvetabbā || || Katame
cattāro || ||
4--7. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ || pa ||
uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya
bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ

add immediately that of the last Ogha-vaggo and afterwards

the uddāna afterwards.

248 Sammappadhāna-Saṃyuttam XLIX.
janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti pada-
hati || ||

BALA-SAṂYUTTAM CHAṬṬHAM.

CHAPTER I. GAṄGĀPEYYĀLĪ (viveka-).

SN_5,50(6).1. (1).
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave balāni || katamāni pañca || ||
Saddhābalam viriyabalam satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññā-
balam || || Imāni kho bhikkhave pañcabalānī ti || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī pācīnaninnā pācī-
napoṇā pācīnapabbharā evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
pañcabalāni bhāvento pañcabalāni1 bahulīkaronto nibbāna-
ninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro || || Kathañca
bhikkhave bhikkhu pañcabalāni bhāvento pañcabalāni ba-
hulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbāna-
pabbhāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhābalam bhāveti viveka-
nissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitam vossagganissitaṃ
vossagga parināmiṃ || viriyabalaṃ || satibalaṃ || samādhiba-
laṃ || paññābalam bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu pañcabalāni bhā-
vento pañcabalāni bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbā-
napoṇo2 nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||

CHAPTER V. OGHA-VAGGO (viveka-).

SN_5,50(6).47--55. (1--9).

SN_5,50(6).56. (10) Uddhambhāgiyāni1.
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccam
avijjā || imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃ-
yojanāni || || Imesamo abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya pañcabalāni bhāvetabbāni || katamāni pañca || ||
3. Idha2 bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhābalam bhāveti viveka-
virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || viriyabalam ||
satibalam || samādhibalaṃ || paññābalam bhāveti vivekanissi-
taṃ- -vossaggaparināmiṃ || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañ-
cannam uddhambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam abhiññāya
pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya imāni pañcabalāni bhā-
vetabbānī ti3 || ||
[Uddānaṃ]
Ogho Yogo Upādānam Hatthā Anusayena ca ||
Kāmaguṇā Nīvaraṇā Khandhā Oruddhambhāgiyāni4 || ||
Oghavaggo balasaṃyuttavasena vitthāretabbo vaggo || ||

CHAPTER VI. GAṄGĀPEYYĀLO (Rāga-).

SN_5,50(6).57. (1).
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave balāni || katamāni pañca5 || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅga nadī pācīnaninnā-6

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 this sutta comes in S1-3 after the second udāna of the vaggo
(chapter X).
2 instead of viveka- S1-3 have rāgā- dosa-
mohavinayapariyosānaṃ and add amatogadham amataparāyanam
amatapariyosānaṃ nibbānaninnaṃ- ponaṃ -pabbhāraṃ.
3 B1-2 add evam esanāpāli vittharetabbā vivekanissite,
S1-3 yathā pi maggasaṃyuttaṃ tathāpi indriyasaṃyuttam
vitthāretabbaṃ sattarasavaggo.
4 this udāna and the following mention are to be found in S1-3 only.
5 this number in S1-3 only.
6 S1-3 -pe-; the remnant is missing.

[page 252]
252 Bala-Saṃyuttam L.
-evam eva bhikkhave bhikkhu- -hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbāna-
pabbhāro || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu- -hoti nibbāna-
poṇo -pabbhāro || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhābalam bhāveti rāga-
vinaya- dosavinaya- mohavinayapariyosānaṃ || evaṃ kho
bhikkhave bhikkhu pañcabalāni bhāvento pañcabalāni
bhāvento- -bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo
nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||

SN_5,50(6).58--68. (2--12).
[Uddānam]
Cha pācīnato ninnā samuddato dve ca Gaṅgā
dasā honti vaggo tena pavuccati1 || ||
Gaṅgāpeyyāla balasaṃyuttassa rāgavinayavasena vitthāre-
tabbo vaggo || ||

CHAPTER VII. APPAMĀDAVAGGO (Rāga-).

SN_5,50(6).69--78. (1--10).
Tathāgatam Padam Kūṭam Mulam Sārañca Vassikaṃ ||
Rājā Candimasuriyo ca Vatthena dasamam padaṃ || ||
Appamādavaggo balasaṃyuttassa rāgavinayavasena
vitthāretabbo || ||

CHAPTER VIII. BALA-VAGGO (Rāga-).

SN_5,50(6).79--90. (1--12).
Balaṃ Bījañca Nāgo ca Rukkham Kumbhena Suriyaṃ ||
Ākāsena dve Meghā Navā Āgantukā Nadī || ||
Balakaraṇīyavaggo balasaṃyuttassa rāgavinayavasena
vitthāretabbaṃ || ||

CHAPTER IX. ESANĀ-VAGGO (Rāga-).

SN_5,50(6).91--100. (1--10).
Esanā Vidhā Āsavo Bhavo Dukkhā ca Tisso ca ||
Khila-Malañca Nīgho ca Vedanaṃ Taṇhāyena ca ti || ||
Esanavaggo balasaṃyuttassa vasena vitthāretabbo vaggo || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 so S1-3; this uddāna and the following ones are not to
be found in B1-2.

[page 253]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 253

CHAPTER X. OGHA-VAGGO (Rāga-).

SN_5,50(6).101--109. (1--9).

SN_5,50(6).110. (10) Uddhambhāgiyāni.
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccam
avijjā || || Imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃ-
yojanāni || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave- -abhiññāya pariññāya
parikkhayāya pahānāya pañcabalāni bhāvetabbāni || kata-
māni pañca1 || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhābalam bhāveti || la2 ||
paññābalam bhāveti rāgavinaya- dosavinaya- mohavinaya-
pariyosānaṃ3 || ||
4. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgiyā-
nam samyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya4 imāni pañcabalāni bhāvetabbānī ti || ||
[Uddānaṃ]
Ogho Yogo Upādānaṃ Ganthā Anusayena ca ||
Kāmaguṇā Nīvarana-Khandhā Oruddhabhāgiyāni || ||
Oghavaggo balasaṃyuttassa vasena vitthāretabbo vaggo
dasamo || ||
Balasaṃyuttaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ5 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Here the gap of the sheet ti in B2 is over.
2 S1-3 viveka- nissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ viriyabalam- sati-
samādhibalam bhāveti.
3 S1-3 add amatapariyosānaṃ nibbānaninnaṃ- poṇam- pabbhānaṃ.
4 S1-3 pahānāyā ti omitting the remnant.
5 this mention is in S1-3 sammappadhānasamyuttanti balasaṃyuttanti
(S3 adds ca) samattaṃ.

[page 254]
254

BOOK VII.
IDDHIPĀDA-SAMYUTTAM SATTAMAM.

CHAPTER I. CĀPĀLAVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,51(7).1. (1) Aparā.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
aparāparaṃ gamanāya {saṃvattanti} || Katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhipa-
dhānasaṅkharasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || cittasa-
mādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam1 iddhipādam bhāveti ||
vīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipā-
dam bhāveti || || Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro iddhipādā
bhāvitā bahulīkatā aparāparaṅgamanāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).2. (2) Viraddho.
2. Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave cattāro iddhipadā viraddhā
viraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī ||
yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave cattāro iddhipādā āraddhā
āraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī || ||
Katama cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 cittasamādhipadhā (S1 dā) nasamannāgataṃ.

[page 255]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 255
4. Yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ime cattāro iddhipādā
viraddhā viraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkha-
yagāmī || yesaṃ kesañci bhikkhave ime cattāro iddhipādā
āraddhā || āraddho tesam ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkha-
yagāmī || ||

SN_5,51(7).3. (3) Ariyā.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
ariyā niyyānikā niyyanti1 takkarassa sammādukkhakkha-
yāya || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā ariyā niyyānikā niyyanti takkarassa sammādukkhakkha-
yāyā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).4. (4) Nibbidā.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abbhiññā-
ya2 sambodhāya3 nibbānāya saṃvattanti || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhāna-
saṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipadaṃ bhāveti ||viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya
abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).5. (5) Padesam.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā iddhipadesam abhinipphādesuṃ || sabbe te
catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || Ye hi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 niyyāti.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S3 repeats upasamāya sambodhāya.

[page 256]
256 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānam samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
vā iddhipadesam abhinipphādessanti || sabbe te catunnam
iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || || Ye hi keci
bhikkhave etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā iddhipadesam
abhinipphādenti || sabbe te catunnam iddhipadānam bhavi-
tattā bahulīkatattā || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam1 iddhipādam bhāveti || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā iddhipadesam abhipphādesuṃ ||pe || abhinipphā-
dessanti || abhinipphādenti || sabbe te imesaṃ yeva2 catun-
nam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).6. (6) Samatta.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā samattam iddhim abhinipphādesuṃ3 sabbe
te catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || ||
Ye hi keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānam samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā samattam iddhim abhinipphādessanti4 || sabbe
te catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || ||
Ye hi keci bhikkhave etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā
samattam iddhim abhinipphādenti sabbe te5 catunnam
iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || katamesaṃ ca-
tunnaṃ || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkharasamannāga-
tam iddhipādam bhāveti || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā samattaṃ iddhiṃ abhinipphādesuṃ || pe ||
abhinipphādessanti || abhinipphādenti || sabbe te imesaṃ
yeva catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 vīmaṃsamādhi-
2 missing in S1-3.
3 B1 abhinipphādiṃsu.
4 S1 -nippā-
5 S1-3 insert here imesaṃ.

[page 257]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 257

SN_5,51(7).7. (7) Bhikkhū.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam bhikkhū
āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ
diṭṭhevadhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
vihariṃsu || sabbe te catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā
bahulīkatattā || || Ye hi keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhā-
nam bhikkhū āsavānam khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ
paññavimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā1 sacchi-
katvā upasampajja viharissanti || sabbe te catunnam iddhi-
pādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || || Ye hi keci bhikkhave
etarahi bhikkhū āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim
paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭhevadhamme sayam abhiññā sacchi-
katvā upasampajja viharanti || sabbe te catunnam iddhippā-
dānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam2 bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam3 bhāveti || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam bhikkhū4
āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ
diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā1 sacchikatvā upasam-
pajja vihariṃsu ||pe || viharissanti || viharanti5 sabbe te ime-
saṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).8. (8) Buddha or Arahaṃ.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā || katame cattāro || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhāra-
samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi || citta-
samādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam
iddhipādam bhāveti || || Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro iddhi-
pādā || ||
3. Imesam kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato arahaṃ {sammāsam-
buddho} ti vuccatī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ya.
2 S1-3 iddhipādā.
3 S1 iddhipādā S3 iddhipāda.
4 S1 bhikkha S3 bhikku.
5 missing in S3.

[page 258]
258 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.

SN_5,51(7).9. (9) Ñāṇa.
4. Ayam chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato
iddhipādo ti me1 bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
cakkhum udapādi || ñānam udapādi || paññā udapādi || vijjā
udapādi2 || āloko udapādi || || So kho panāyam chandasa-
mādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabbo
ti me bhikkhave || bhāvito ti me bhikkhave3 pubbe ana-
nussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi || pe || āloko udapādi || ||
5. Ayaṃ viriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato
iddhipādo ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
cakkhum udapādi || pe || āloko udapādi || so kho panāyam
viriyasamādhi- -samannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabbo ti me
bhikkhave pubbe || pe || bhāvito ti me bhikkhave pubbe
ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi || pe || āloko
udapādi4 || ||
6. Ayam cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato id-
dhipādo ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu cakkhum
udapādi || pe || aloko udapādi || || So kho panāyaṃ cittasa-
madhi- -samannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabbo ti me bhikkhave
pubbe || pe || bhāvito ti me bhikkhave pubbe || pe || cakkhum
udapādi || pe || āloko udapādi || ||
7. Ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato
iddhipādo ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
cakkhum udapādi ||pe || āloko udapādi || || So kho panāyaṃ
vīmaṃsāsamādhi- -samannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabbo ti
me bhikkhave || pe [pa] || bhāvito ti me bhikkhave pubbe
ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ||pe || āloko uda-
pādī ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).10. (10) Cetiya.
1. Evam me sutaṃ5 Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Vesāliyaṃ
viharati Mahāvane Kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 kho.
2 S1-3 have -pe- S1 instead of pañña-, S3 instead of vijjā-
3 S1 omits bhāvitoti.
4 the last part of this number (so kho panāyam-) is not to be
found in B1 by mistake I think.
5 these words in B1-2 only.

[page 259]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 259
2. Atha kho Bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā
pattacīvaram ādāya Vesāliyaṃ1 piṇḍāya pāvisi2 || Vesāli-
yam piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
āyasmantam Ānandam āmantesi || Gaṇhāhi Ānanda nisī-
danaṃ yena Cāpālacetiyam3 tenupasaṅkamissāmi divāvi-
hārāyati || ||
Evam bhante ti kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavato paṭis-
sutvā nisīdanam ādāya Bhagavantam piṭṭhito piṭṭhito
anubandhi4 || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavā yena Cāpālacetiyaṃ tenupasaṅkami ||
upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi || || Āyasmā pi kho
Ānando Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ||
4. Ekam antam nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantam Ānandam
Bhagavā etad avoca || || Ramaṇiyā Ānanda Vesālī ramaṇiyam
Udenacetiyam5 ramaṇiyaṃ Gotamakacetiyaṃ6 ramaṇiyaṃ
Sattambacetiyaṃ ramaṇiyam Bahuputtakacetiyaṃ7 ramaṇi-
yaṃ Sārandadam8 cetiyaṃ ramaṇiyaṃ Cāpālacetiyaṃ || ||
Yassa kassaci Ānanda cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā yānikatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā ||
so ākaṅkhamāno kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā || ||
Tathāgatassa kho Ānanda cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā ba-
hulīkatā yānikatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamā-
raddhā || ākaṅkhamāno Ānanda Tathāgato kappaṃ vā
tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā ti || ||
5. Evam pi kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavatā oḷārike ni-
mitte kayiramāne9 oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne nāsakkhi
paṭivijjhituṃ || na Bhagavantam yāci Tiṭṭhatu bhante Bha-
gavā kappam tiṭṭhatu Sugato kappāvasesaṃ10 bahujana-
hitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya11 atthāya hitāya
sukhāya devamanussānan ti || yathā tam Mārena12 pariyuṭ-
ṭhitacitto13 || ||
6--7. Dutiyam pi kho bhagavā14 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 Vesāli.
2 B1-2 pāvīsi.
3 S1-3 Cāpālaṃ-
4 S3 -baddhi.
5 S3 omits ramaṇiyam Udena-
6 S1-3 gotamakaṃ-
7 S1-3 bahuputtacetiyaṃ.
8 B1-2 ānanda.
9 B1 kariya-
10 S1-3 kappaṃ.
11 S1-3 -kampakāya.
12 S3 yaṭācārena.
13 S1-3 add -pe-
14 S1-3 add āy- Ān- etad av- ram- Ān- Vesālī -pe-

[page 260]
260 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
8. Tatiyam pi kho Bhagavā1 āyasmantam Ānandam
āmantesi2 || Ramaṇiyā Ānanda Vesālī ramaṇiyam Udeṇa-
cetiyaṃ ramaṇiyaṃ Gotamakacetiyam ramaṇiyaṃ Sattam-
bacetiyaṃ ramaṇiyam Bahuputtakacetiyaṃ3 ramaniyaṃ
Sārandadam4 cetiyam ramaṇiyaṃ Cāpālacetiyaṃ5 || || Yassa
kassaci Ānanda cattāro iddhipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
yānikatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā || so
ākaṅkhamāno6 kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā ||
Tathāgatassa kho Ānanda cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā ba-
hulīkatā yānikatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamā-
raddhā || so ākaṅkhamāno Ānanda Tathāgato kappaṃ vā
tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā ti || ||
9. Evam pi kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavatā oḷārike ni-
mitte kayiramāne7 oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne8 nāsakkhi
paṭivijjhituṃ || na Bhagavantaṃ9 yāci Tiṭṭhatu Bhagavā
kappaṃ tiṭṭhatu Sugato kappāvasesaṃ10 bahujanahitāya
bahujanasukhāya11 lokanukampāya12 atthāya hitāya sukhāya
devamanussānan ti || yathā tam Mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto || ||
10. Atha kho Bhagavā āyasmantam Ānandam āman-
tesi || Gaccha kho tvam Ānanda yassa dāni tvaṃ13 kālam
maññasī ti || ||
Evam bhante ti āyasmā Ānando Bhagavato paṭissutvā
uṭṭhāyāsanā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā14
avidūre15 aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi || ||
11. Atha kho Māro pāpimā acīrapakkante āyasmante
Ānande16 yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā
etad avoca || Parinibbātu dāni bhante Bhagavā parinibbātu
dāni Sugato parinibbānakālo dāni bhante Bhagavato || ||
Bhāsitā kho panesā bhante Bhagavatā vācā || na tāvāham17

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 S1-3 etad avoca.
3 S1-3 Udenaṃ- Gotamakaṃ- Sattambaṃ- Bahuputtam-
4 B1-2 ānanda.
5 S1-3 cāpālaṃ.
6 S1-3 insert Ānanda tathāgato.
7 B1 kariya-
8 B2 kariya-
9 S1 bhavantaṃ.
10 S1-5 kappaṃ.
11 there is here a gap in B2 the sheet tū wanting.
12 S1-3 -kampakāya.
13 in S1-3 only.
14 B1-2 omit padak-
15 S1-3 avidūrato corrected from avidūreto in S3.
16 S1-3 omit acīra-
17 S1-3 tāvahaṃ.

[page 261]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 261
Pāpima parinibbāyissāmi yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā
bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā pattayogakkhemā1 ba-
hussutā dhammadharā dhammānudhammapaṭipannā sāmī-
cipaṭipannā anudhammacārino2 sakam ācariyakam3 ugga-
hetvā ācikkhissanti desissanti paññāpessanti paṭṭhapessanti
vivarissanti4 vibhajissanti uttanīkarissanti5 || uppannam
parappavādam sahadhammena suniggahītaṃ niggahetvā
sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammam desissantī ti6 || || Santi kho pana
bhante etarahi bhikkhū Bhagavato sāvakā viyattā vinītā
visāradā pattayogakkhemā1 bahussutā dhammadharā
dhammānudhammapaṭipannā sāmīcipaṭipannā7 anudham-
macārino sakam ācariyakam uggahetvā ācikkhanti desenti
paññāpenti8 vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti5 || uppannam
parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahītaṃ niggahetvā
sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desenti || ||
12. Parinibbātu dāni bhante Bhagavā parinibbātu dāni
Sugato parinibbanakālo dāni bhante Bhagavato || || Bhāsitā
kho panesā bhante Bhagavatā vācā || Na tāvāham9 Pāpima pa-
rinibbāyissami yāva me bhikkhuniyo na sāvikā bhavissanti ||
pe10 || ||
13. Yāva me upāsakā na sāvakā bhavissanti11 || yāva me
upāsikā na sāvikā bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā
pattayogakkhemā1 bahussutā dhammadharā dhammānu-
dhammapaṭipannā sāmīcipaṭipannā anudhammacāriniyo ||
sakam ācariyakam uggahetvā ācikkhissanti desissanti
paññāpessanti paṭṭhapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti
uttānīkarissanti12 uppannam parappavādaṃ sahadhammena
suniggahītam niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ de-
sissantī ti12 || || Santi13 kho pana bhante etarahi upāsakā14 ||
upāsikā Bhagavato sāvikā15 viyattā vinītā vīsāradā pattayo-
gakkhemā12 bahussutā dhammadharā dhammānudhamma-

2 S1 inserts sakaṃ anudhammacārino.

4 S1 viharissanti.

6 B1 desessantī ti.

262 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
paṭipannā sāmīcipaṭipannā anudhammacāriniyo sakam āca-
riyakam1 uggahetvā ācikkhanti desenti paññāpenti paṭṭha-
penti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti2 || uppannam
parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahītaṃ niggahetvā
sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desenti || ||
14. Parinibbātu dāni bhante Bhagavā parinibbātu dāni3
Sugato || parinibbānakālo dāni bhante Bhagavato || || Bhāsitā
kho panesā4 Bhagavatā vācā || Na tāvāham5 Pāpima pari-
nibbāyissāmi yāva me idam brahmacariyam na iddhaṃ
ceva6 bhavissati7 || phītaṃ ca vitthāritaṃ8 bāhujāññaṃ
puthubhutaṃ yāvad eva manussehi supakāsitan ti || || Tay-
idam9 bhante Bhagavato brahmacariyam iddham ceva
phitañca vitthāritam8 bahujaññam puthubhūtam yāvad eva
manussehi supakāsitaṃ || || Parinibbātu dāni bhante Bhaga-
vā10 parinibbātu dāni3 Sugato parinibbānakālo dāni bhante
Bhagavato ti || ||
15. Evaṃ vutte Bhagavā Māram pāpimantam etad
avoca11 || || Apossukko tvam Pāpima hohi || na ciraṃ12
Tathāgatassa parinibbānam bhavissati || ito tiṇṇam māsā-
nam accayena Tathāgato parinibbāyissatī ti || ||
16. Atha kho Bhagavā Cāpāle cetiye sato sampajāno
āyusaṅkhāram ossaji13 || || Ossaṭṭhe14 pana15 Bhagavatā
āyusaṅkhāre mahābhūmicālo ahosi bhiṃsanako lomahaṃso ||
devadundubhiyo16 ca caliṃsu17 || ||
17. Atha kho Bhagavā etam atthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ
velāyam imam udānam udānesi || ||

2 S3 desissanti.

Tulam atulañca sambhavam ||
bhavasaṅkhāram avassaji1 muni ||
ajjhattarato2 samāhito3 ||
abhindi4 kavacam ivattasambhavan ti5 || ||
Cāpālavaggo pathamo || ||

Ariyā Nibbidā yathā9 || ||

Buddha-Ñāṇena Cetiyā ti12 || ||

CHAPTER II. PĀSĀDAKAMPANA-VAGGO DUTIYO.

SN_5,51(7).11. (1) Pubbe or Hetu.
1. Sāvatthi || ||
2. Pubbeva13 me bhikkhave sambodhāya anabhisam-
buddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etad ahosi || Ko nu kho
hetu ko paccayo iddhipādabhāvanāyā ti || || Tassa mayham
bhikkhave etad ahosi || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhāra-
samannāgatam iddhipadam bhāveti || || Iti me chando na
ca atilīno14 bhavissati || na ca atipaggahīto bhavissati || na
ca15 ajjhattaṃ16 saṅkhitto bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā
vikkhitto bhavissati || paccāpuresaññi ca viharati || yathā
pure tathā pacchā yathā pacchā tathā pūre || yathā adho
tathā uddhaṃ yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā
rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā || || Iti vivaṭena cetasā
apariyonaddhena cetasā sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 avassajaṃ.
2 S1 ajjharato S3 ajjhettaro.
3 S1 samāhi.
4 S1 abhida S3 abhinoda.
5 S1-3 iva- (S1 vā-) yambhavam.
6 in S1-3 only.
7 S1-3 aparā.
8 S1-3 viraddhā.
9 S1-3 nibbidāya omitting yathā B1 nibbuti.
10 S1-3 sappattaṃ.
11 S1-3 add ca.
12 B1 has Phuddha-, the whole pada is in S1-3 arahaṃ ñaṇamatiyā ti
and they rehearse Cāpālavaggo paṭhamo.
13 B1 omits va.
14 here the gap in B1-1 is over.
15 S1-3 omit na ca.
16 S1-3 ajjhatta.

[page 264]
264 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
4. Viriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhi-
pādam bhāveti || || Iti me viriyaṃ na ca atilīnam bhavis-
sati || na ca atipaggahītam bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ
saṅkhittam bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittam bha-
vissati || pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati yathā pure tathā
pacchā yathā pacchā tatthā pure || yathā adho tathā
uddhaṃ || yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā
rattiṃ || yathā rattiṃ tathā divā || || Iti vivaṭena cetasā
apariyonaddhena1 sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
5. Cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipā-
dam bhāveti || || Iti me cittam na ca atilīnam bhavissati
na ca atipaggahītam bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhit-
tam bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittam bhavissati ||
pacchāpuresaññī ca2 viharati yathā pure tathā pacchā
yathā pacchā tathāpure || yatha adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā
uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ
tathā divā || || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena1 sappa-
bhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
6. Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam id-
dhipādam bhāveti || || Iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bha-
vissati || na ca atipaggahitā bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ
saṅkhittā bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati ||
pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati yathā pure tathā pacchā
yathā pacchā tathā pure || yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā
uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ
tathā divā || || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappa-
bhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
7. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhu catusu iddhipādesu
evam3 bahulīkatesu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanu-
bhoti || eko pi hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhā pi hutvā eko
hoti || āvibhāvam tirobhāvam tirokuḍḍam4 tiropākāraṃ
tiropabbatam asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse ||
pathaviyam5 pi ummujja nimujjaṃ karoti seyyathāpi udake6 ||
udake abhijjamāno7 gacchati seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ5 ||ākāsepi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -nandhena.
2 S1-3 -visaññī omitting ca.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 B1 tirokuṭam.
5 B2 puthu- S1-3 paṭhaviyā.
6 missing in S1.
7 B2 -mānā S1-3 -māne.

[page 265]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 265
pallaṅkena caṅkamati1 seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo || ime pi2
candimasuriye evam mahiddhike evam mahānubhāve pāṇinā
parimasati3 parimajjati || yāva4 brahmalokā pi5 kāyena
vasam pavatteti6 || ||
8. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhu7 catusu iddhipādesu
evam bahulīkatesu dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atik-
kantamanussakāya8 ubho sadde suṇāti dibbe ca mānusse9
ca ye dūre santike vā ti || ||
9. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhu catusu iddhipādesu
evam bahulīkatesu parasattānam parapuggalānam cetasā
ceto10 paricca pajānāti || || Sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ Sarāgaṃ
cittanti pajānāti || vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ Vītarāgaṃ11 cit-
tanti pajānāti || || Sadosaṃ vā cittaṃ Sadosaṃ cittanti
pajānāti || vītadosaṃ vā cittaṃ Vītadosaṃ cittan ti pajānā-
ti || || Samohaṃ vā cittaṃ Samohaṃ cittan ti pajānāti ||
vītamohaṃ vā cittam Vītamohaṃ cittan ti pajānāti || ||
Saṅkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ Saṅkhittaṃ cittan ti pajānāti || vik-
khittaṃ vā cittaṃ Vikkhittaṃ cittan ti pajānāti || || Ma-
haggataṃ12 vā cittaṃ Mahaggataṃ12 cittan ti pajānāti ||
amahaggataṃ vā cittam Amahaggataṃ cittan ti pajānāti || ||
Sauttaraṃ vā cittaṃ Sauttaraṃ cittan ti pajānāti || anutta-
raṃ vā cittaṃ Anuttaraṃ cittan ti pajānāti || || Asamāhitaṃ
vā cittaṃ Asamāhitaṃ cittan ti pajānāti || samāhitaṃ vā
cittaṃ Samāhitaṃ cittan ti pajānāti || || Avimuttam vā cittaṃ
Avimuttaṃ cittanti pajānāti || vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ Vimuttaṃ
cittan ti pajānāti || ||
10. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhu catusu iddhipādesu
evam bahulīkatesu anekavihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati ||
seyyathīdam ekam pi jātim dve pi13 jātiyo tisso pi jātiyo
catasso pi jātiyo pañca pi jātiyo dasa pi jātiyo vīsam14
pi jātiyo tiṃsam pi jātiyo cattālisam15 pi jātiyo paññāsam

266 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
pi jātiyo jātisatam pi jātisahassam pi jātisatasahassam pi
aneke pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke pi
saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe amutrāsiṃ evam nāmo || evaṅgotto ||
evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedī evam
āyupariyanto || so tato cuto amutra uppādiṃ1 || tatravāsim2
evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukha-
dukkhapaṭisaṃvedī evam āyupariyanto || so tato cuto idhu-
papanno ti || iti sākāraṃ sauddesam anekavihitaṃ pubbe-
nivāsam anussarati || ||
11. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhu3 catusu iddhipādesu
evam bahulīkatesu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkan-
tamānussakena4 satte passati || cavamāne upapajjamāne
hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathā-
kammupage satte pajānāti || Ime vata bhonto sattā kāya-
duccaritena samannāgatā vacīducaritena samannāgatā ma-
noduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānam upavādakā micchā-
diṭṭhikā5 micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā || te kāyassa bhedā
param maraṇā6 apāyaṃ duggatim vinipātaṃ nirayam upa-
pannā7 || || Ime kho pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena8
sammannāgatā vacīsucaritena9 samannāgatā manosucaritena9
samannāgatā ariyānam anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sam-
mādiṭṭhikammasamādānā || te kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā
sugatiṃ saggam lokam upapannā10 ti || || Iti dibbena
cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānussakena satte11 passati ||
cavamāne upapajjamāne12 hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe ||
sugate duggate yathākammupage satte pajānāti || ||
12. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhu13 catusu iddhipādesu
evam bahulīkatesu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim
paññāvimuttim diṭṭhevadhamme sayam abhiññā14 sacchi-
katvā upasampajja viharatī ti || ||

3 S1-3 bhikkhave.
4 S1-3 -mānusa- always.

6 S1 paraṇā instead of param-
7 S1 uppannā S3 uppajjanti.
8 S3 -duccaritena S1 -vuccaritena.
9 S1-3 -duccaritena.

12 S1-3 uppaj-
13 S1-3 bhikkhave.
14 S1-3 add ya.

[page 267]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 267

SN_5,51(7).12. (2) Mahapphala.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā || || Katham bhāvitā ca1
bhikkhave cattāro2 iddhipādā katham bahulīkatā maha-
pphalā honti mahānisaṃsā || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || Iti kho3 me
chando na ca atilīno bhavissati || na ca atipaggahīto bha-
vissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto4 bhavissati || na ca ba-
hiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati || pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati
yathāpure tathā pacchā yathā pacchā tathāpure || yathā
adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā
tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā || iti vivaṭena cetasā
apariyonaddhena5 sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
4--5. Viriyasamādhi || pe [la] || Cittasamādhi || ||
6. Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkharasamannāgatam id-
dhipādham bhāveti || Iti kho6 me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā
bhavissati || na ca atipaggahitā bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ-
saṅkhittā bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā7 bhavissati ||
pacchāpure saññī ca viharati yathāpure tathā pacchā
yathā pacchā tathāpure || yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā
uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ
tathā divā || || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappa-
bhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || || Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave
cattāro iddhipādā evam bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti
mahānisaṃsā || ||
7--11. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave bhikkhu9 catusu
iddhipādesu evam bahulīkatesu anekavihitam iddhividham
paccanubhoti || eko pi hutvā bahudhā hoti || la-pe || yāva
brahmalokā pi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti || pe || [la] || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 omit kho.
2 S1 insert me bhikkhave.
3 missing in B1.
4 B1 ajjhatta-
5 B1 -nandhena always.
6 missing in B1-2.
7 S3 ajjhattasaṅkhittam.
8 B1 vikkhattā S1-3 vikkhittaṃ.
9 missing in S1-3.

[page 268]
268 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
12. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catusu
iddhipādesu evam bahulīkatesu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavam
cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayam
abhiññā1 sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).13. (3) Chando.
2. Chandaṃ ce2 bhikkhave bhikkhu nissāya3 labhati
samādhiṃ labhati cittassa ekaggataṃ4 || ayam vuccati
chandasamādhi || || So anuppannānam pāpakānam akusa-
lānaṃ dhammānam anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati
viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Uppan-
nānaṃ pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya
chandam janeti vāyamati viriyam āravhati cittam paggaṇ-
hāti padahati || Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānam
uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam ārabhati
cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ
dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati viriyam
ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Ime vuccanti
padhānasaṅkhārā5 || ||
Iti ayaṃ ca chando ayaṃ ca chandasamādhi ime ca
padhānasaṅkhārā || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave chandasamādhi-
padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo || ||
3. Viriyaṃ ce6 bhikkhave bhikkhu nissāya7 labhati sa-
mādhim labhati8 cittassa ekaggatam4 || ayaṃ vuccati viri-
yasamādhi || || So anuppannānaṃ || la9 || Uppannānaṃ kusa-
lānam dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya
vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati
viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Ime
vuccanti padhānasaṅkharā10 || ||
Iti idaṃ ca viriyam ayañca viriyasamādhi ime ca padhā-
nasaṅkhārā || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave viriyasamādhipadhā-
nasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ya.
2 S3 ca.
3 S1-3 nissā(S3 ssa) yaṃ.
4 S1-3 cittasseka-
5 B1-2 add ti.
6 S1-3 ca.
7 S1-3 nissayam.
8 S3 omits samādhiṃ-
9 S1-3 pāpa- akusa- dham- anuppadāya -pe-
10 B1 adds ti.

[page 269]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 269
4. Cittaṃ ce1 bhikkhave bhikkhu nissāya2 labhati sa-
mādhiṃ labhati cittassa ekaggatam || ayaṃ vuccati citta-
samādhi || || So anuppannānam pāpakānaṃ3 || la || uppannānaṃ
kusalānaṃ dhammānam ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya
vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandam janeti vāyamati
viriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Ime
vuccanti padhānasaṅkhārā ti || ||
Iti4 idaṃ ca cittaṃ ayaṃ ca cittasamādhi ime ca padhā-
nasaṅkharā || ayam vuccati bhikkhave cittasamādhi padhā-
nasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo || ||
5. Vīmaṃsaṃ ce bhikkhave bhikkhu nissāya2 labhati
samādhiṃ labhati cittassa ekaggataṃ5 || ayam vuccati
vīmaṃsāsamādhi || || So anuppannānam pāpakānam4 aku-
salānaṃ dhammānam anuppādāya || pe6 || uppannānaṃ
kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya
vepullāya bhāvanāya paripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati
viriyam ārabhati7 cittam paggaṇhāti padahati || || Ime
vuccanti padhānasaṅkhārā || || Iti ayaṃ ca vīmaṃsā ayaṃ
ca vīmaṃsāsamādhi ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā || Ayaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaman-
nāgato iddhipādoti || ||

SN_5,51(7).14. (4) Moggalāno.
1. Evam me sutaṃ8 Ekaṃ samayaṃ Bhagavā Sāvatthi-
yaṃ viharati Pubbārāme Migāramātupāsāde || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū heṭṭhā
Migāramātupāsāde viharanti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā
mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā
vibbhantacittā9 pākatindriyā || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavā āyasmantam Mahā-Moggalānam
āmantesi || || Ete kho10 Moggalāna sabrahmacāriyā11 heṭṭhā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ca.
2 S1 nissayam.
3 S1-3 aku- dha- anu- -pe-
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 cittasseka.
6 B1-2 have chandaṃ- -padahati || la || but instead of || la || B2 has
uppannānaṃ || pa || anuppannānaṃ || pa ||
7 S3 -pe- instead of chandam- -ārabhati.
8 this phrase in B1-2 only.
9 B1 bhanta-
10 S1-3 te.
11 B1 -cāriyo S1-3 -cārayo.

[page 270]
270 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
Migāramātupāsāde viharanti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā
vikiṇṇavācā1 muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhanta-
cittā2 pākatindriyā || gaccha Moggalāna te bhikkhū saṃ-
vejehīti3 || ||
Evam bhante ti kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno Bhaga-
vato paṭissutvā tathārūpam iddhābhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅ-
khāresi4 || yathā pādaṅguṭṭhakena Migāramātupāsādam
saṅkampesi5 sampakampesi sampacālesi || ||
4. Atha kho te bhikkhū {saṃviggā} lomahaṭṭhajātā ekam
antam aṭṭhaṃsu || Acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata
bho nivātañca vata ayaṃ ca Migaramatupāsādo gambhira-
namo6 sunikhāto acalo asampakampi7 || atha ca pana
saṅkampito sampakampito sampacālitoti || ||
5. Atha kho Bhagavā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami ||
upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū Bhagavā etad avoca || || Kiṃ nu
tumhe bhikkhave {saṃviggā} lomahaṭṭhajātā ekam antaṃ
ṭhitā ti || ||
Acchariyam bhante abbhutam bhante nivātañca vata
ayaṃ ca Migāramātupāsādo gambhīranemo8 sunikhāto
acalo asampakampi7 || atha ca pana saṅkampito sampa-
kampito sampacālito ti || ||
6. Tumheva kho bhikkhave saṃvejetukāmena9 Mogga-
lānena bhikkhunā pādaṅguṭṭhakena10 Migāramātupāsādo
saṅkampito sampakampito sampacālito || || Taṃ kim11
maññatha bhikkhave || katamesaṃ dhammānam bhāvitattā12
bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu evam mahiddhiko evam
mahānubhāvo ti || ||
Bhagavaṃmūlakā no bhante dhammā Bhagavaṃnettikā-
-Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 tikiṇṇa-
2 B1 bhanta-
3 B1-2 saṃvejehi S1 saṃvedehī.
4 S1-3 -saṅkhāsi-B2 -saṅkharoti.
5 S3 kampesi B1 inserts sampasi (or -siṃ).
6 S3 has -namo corrected from nevo.
7 S1-3 -kampī.
8 S3 -neco.
9 S1-3 insert mahā.
10 S1-3 -guṭṭhena.
11 S1-3 haṃ instead of taṃ kiṃ.
12 B1 bhavittā.

[page 271]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 271
7. Tena bhikkhave suṇātha1 || || Catunnaṃ kho bhikkhave
iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu
evam mahiddhiko evam mahānubhāvo || katamesaṃ ca-
tunnaṃ || ||
8. Idha bhikkhave Moggalano bhikkhu chandasamādhi-
padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti2 || viri-
yasamādhi || cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhā-
rasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || || Iti me vīmaṃsā
na ca atilīnā bhavissati na ca atipaggahītā bhavissati || na
ca ajjhattaṃsaṅkhittā bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā
bhavissati || pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati yathā pure tathā
pacchā yathā pacchā tathā pure || yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ
yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā
rattiṃ tathā divā || || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena3
sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
9. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu evam ma-
hiddhiko evam mahānubhāvo || ||
10. Imesaṃ ca pana bhikkhave catunnam4 iddhipādānam
bhavitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu anekavihitam
iddhividham paccanubhoti || la-pe || yāva brahmalokā pi5
kāyena vasaṃ vatteti || ||
11. imesaṃ ca pana bhikkhave catunnam iddhipadānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu āsavānaṃ
khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim ||pe || upasampajja viharatīti || ||
12. Evaṃ cāpi abhiññā6 vitthāretabbā7 || ||

SN_5,51(7).15. (5) Brāhmaṇa.
1. Evam me sutaṃ8 Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Ānando
Kosambiyaṃ viharati Ghositārāme || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This part from Bhagavaṃnettikā is missing in S1-3
without any sign of abridgment.
2 somewhat developed in S1-3.
3 B1 -nandhena always.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 yāva- is missing in S1-3.
6 B1 inserts abhiññāyo.
7 this number is not to be found in S1-3.
8 this phrase in B1-2 only.

[page 272]
272 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
2. Atha kho Uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā Ānando
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā Ānandena sad-
dhim sammodi || sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sārāṇīyaṃ vītisā-
retvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho
Uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ Ānandam etad avoca || ||
3. Kim atthi yaṃ1 nu kho bho Ānanda samaṇe Go-
tame3 brahmacariyaṃ vussatī ti || ||
Chandapahānatthaṃ kho brāhmaṇa Bhagavati3 brahma-
cariyaṃ vussatī ti || ||
4. Atthi pana bho4 Ānanda maggo atthi paṭipadā
etassa chandassa pahānāyā ti || ||
Atthi kho brāhmaṇa maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa
chandassa pahānāyā ti || ||
5. Katamo pana bho Ānanda maggo katamā paṭipadā
etassa chandassa pahānāyā ti || ||
Idha brāhmaṇa bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhā-
rasamannāgatam5 iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || ayaṃ kho brāhmaṇa maggo
ayam paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā ti || ||
6. Evaṃ sante6 kho7 Ānanda santakaṃ8 hoti no asan-
takam9 chandena ca10 chandam pajahissatī ti netam thā-
naṃ vijjatīti11 || ||
Tena hi brāhmaṇa taññevettha12 paṭipucchissāmi || yathā
te khameyya tathā taṃ vyākareyyāsi || ||
7. Taṃ kim maññasi brāhmaṇa || ahosi te pubbe chando
Ārāmaṃ gamissāmīti || tassa te ārāmagatassa yo tajjo
chando so paṭippassadho13 ti || ||
Evam bho || ||
Ahosi te14 pubbe viriyaṃ Ārāmam gamissāmīti || tassa te
ārāmagatassa yaṃ tajjaṃ viriyaṃ tam paṭipassaddhanti15 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 -yā.
2 S1-3 samaṇo Gotamo.
3 B1 S1-3 bhagavāti corrected from bhagavati in S3.
4 S1-3 kho.
5 S1 -padāna-
6 B1 bhante.
7 B1-2 bho.
8 S1-3 anantakam B2 ānandakam.
9 B2 S1-3 santakam.
10 S1-3 chandeneva B1 chande ca.
11 B1-2 vijjati.
12 S1-3 tvaññevettha.
13 S1 paṭissaddhoti.
14 in B1-2 only.
15 B1 -passaddhinti.

[page 273]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 273
Evam bho || ||
Ahosi te pubbe cittaṃ Ārāmaṃ gamissāmī ti || tassa te
ārāmagatassa yam tajjaṃ cittaṃ tam paṭippassaddhanti1 || ||
Evam bho || ||
Ahosi te pubbe vīmaṃsā Ārāmaṃ gamissāmīti || tassa
te ārāmagatassa yā tajjā vīmaṃsā sā paṭippassaddhā ti2 || ||
Evam bho || ||
8. Evam eva kho brāhmaṇa yo so bhikkhu arahaṃ
khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasa-
dattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto ||
tassa yo pubbe3 chando ahosi arahattapattiyā arahatte4
patte yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho || || Yam pubbe
viriyam ahosi arahattapattiyā arahatte patte yaṃ tajjaṃ
viriyaṃ tam paṭippassaddhaṃ || || Yam pubbe cittam ahosi
arahattapattiyā5 arahatte patte yaṃ6 tajjaṃ cittaṃ tam
paṭippassaddhaṃ || || Yā pubbe vīmaṃsā ahosi arahatta-
pattiyā arahatte patte yā tajjā vīmaṃsā sā paṭippassaddhā || ||
9. Taṃ kim maññasi brāhmaṇa || Iti evaṃ sante santa-
kam vā hoti7 asantakaṃ8 vā ti || ||
Addhā bho Ānanda evaṃ sante santakaṃ hoti no
asantakaṃ8 || ||
10. Abhikkantam bho Ānanda || pe || ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ
saraṇaṃ gatanti || ||

SN_5,51(7).16. (6) Samaṇabrāhmaṇā1 or Mahiddhi.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā mahiddhikā ahesuṃ mahānubhāvā || sabbe te
catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || ||
3. Ye hi9 keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānam samaṇā
vā brāhmaṇā vā mahiddhikā bhavissanti- -bahulīkatattā || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhave etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
vā mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā sabbe te catunnam iddhi-
pādānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || || Katamesam catunnaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 paṭissaddhanti.
2 S1-3 paṭissaddhāti.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 B1-2 arahatta always.
5 S1 -patti.
6 S3 yyaṃ.
7 B1-2 insert no.
8 S1-3 B2 anantakaṃ.
9 B2 ye pi hi S1-3 ye hi pi.

[page 274]
274 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
5. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || ||
6. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā mahiddhikā ahesuṃ mahānubhāvā || pe ||
mahiddhikā bhavissanti mahānubhāvā || [pe] || etarahi
mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā || sabbe te imesaṃ yeva catunnam
iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).17. (7) Samaṇabrāhmaṇā2 or Vidhā.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhosuṃ ||
eko pi hutvā bahudhā ahesuṃ || bahudhā hutvā eko ahesuṃ ||
āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ tirokuḍḍam1 tiropākāraṃ tiropabba-
taṃ2 asajjamānā agamaṃsu seyyathāpi ākāse || pathaviyam3
pi ummujjanimujjam4 akaṃsu5 seyyathāpi udake || udake
pi abhijjamānā6 agamaṃsu seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ || akāse7
pi8 pallaṅkena agamiṃsu9 seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo || ime
pi candimasuriye10 evam mahiddhike evam mahānubhāve
pāṇinā parimasiṃsu parimajjiṃsu || yāva Brahmalokā pi
kāyena vasaṃ vattesaṃ || sabbe te catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā || ||
3. Ye hi keci bhikkhave aṇāgatam addhānaṃ samaṇā
vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhos-
santi || eko pi hutvā bahudhā bhavissanti || bahudhā pi hutvā
eko bhavissanti || āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvam tirokuḍḍam tiro-
pākāraṃ tiropabbatam asajjamānā11 gamissanti12 seyyathāpi
ākāse || pathaviyam13 pi ummujjanimujjaṃ14 karissanti

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 tirokuṭaṃ always.
2 S1 -jabbataṃ.
3 S1 paṭhaviyā.
4 S1 ummajja-
5 three words from seyyathāpi are missing in S3.
6 S1-3 -māne.
7 S1 adds na.
8 missing in S3.
9 B1 kamiṃsu.
10 S1-3 -suriyā.
11 B2 asamajja-
12 S1-3 bhavissanti.
13 S1-3 paṭhaviyā.
14 S3 ummajja- S1 ummajjaṃ omitting nimujjaṃ.

[page 275]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 275
seyyathāpi udake || udake pi abhijjamānā1 gamissanti
seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ || akāse pi pallaṅkena bhavissanti2
seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo || ime pi3 candimasuriye evam
mahiddhikke evam mahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasissanti
parimajjissanti yāva Brahmalokā pi kāyena vasaṃ vattes-
santi4 || sabbe te catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulī-
katattā || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhave etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
vā anekavihitam iddhividam paccanubhonti || eko pi hutvā
bahudhā honti || bahudhā pi hutvā eko5 honti || āvibhāvaṃ
tirobhāvaṃ tirokuḍḍam tiropākāram tiropabbatam asajja-
mānā gacchanti seyyathāpi6 ākāse || pe || yāva Brahmalokā
pi kāyena vasaṃ vattenti || sabbe te catunnam iddhipādānam
bhavitattā bahulīkatattā7 || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti8 || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsasamādhipaḍhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam bhāveti || ||
6. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhosuṃ ||
pe || paccanubhossanti || [pe] || paccanubhonti || [pe]|| sabbe
te imesaṃ yeva catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā ba-
hulīkatattā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).18. (8) Bhikkhu.
2. Catunnam bhikkhave iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bahulī-
katattā bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim
paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchi-
katvā upasampajja viharati || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vimaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave
catunnam iddhipādānam bhāvitattā bhikkhu āsavānaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 asajja-
2 B2 gami- B1 kamissanti.
3 missing in S1.
4 B1 vatti-
5 S1-3 add pi.
6 S1-3 insert bhikkhave.
7 S1-3 add ti.
8 S1 bhāvoti.

[page 276]
276 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
khayā anāsavam cetovimuttim paññāvimuttim diṭṭheva
dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihara-
tī ti1 || ||

SN_5,51(7).19. (9) Desanā or Bhāvanā.
2. Iddhiṃ vo2 bhikkhave desissāmi iddhipādaṃ ca
iddhipādabhāvanaṃ ca iddhipādabhāvanāgāminiṃ ca paṭi-
padaṃ || taṃ suṇātha || ||
3. Katamā ca bhikkhave iddhi || || Idha bhikkhave
bhikkhu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti || eko pi
hutvā bahudhā hoti || pe-la || yāva brahmalokā pi kāyena
vasaṃ vatteti || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhi || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave iddhipādo || || Yo3 bhikkhave
maggo yā4 paṭipadā iddhilābhāya5 iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃ-
vattati || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave6 iddhipādo || ||
5. Katamā ca bhikkhave iddhipādabhāvanā || || Idha
bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaman-
nāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi || cittasamādhi ||
vimaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipā-
dam bhāveti || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhipādabhāvanā || ||
6. Katamā ca bhikkhave iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭi-
padā || ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdam
sammāditthi || pe || sammāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).20. (10) Vibhaṅga.
I.
2. Cattāro me6 bhikkhave iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā || || Katham bhāvitā ca
bhikkhave cattāro iddhipādā katham bahulīkatā mahapphalā
honti mahānisaṃsā || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || Iti me chando

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 viharanti.
2 S1-3 ca kho instead of vo.
3 B1 adds so.
4 S3 add va (or ca).
5 missing in S3; S1 has iddhipaṭipadā.
6 missing in S3.

[page 277]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 277
na ca atilīno1 bhavissati || na ca atipaggahīto bhavissati ||
na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto2 bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā
vikkhitto bhavissati || pe || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyona-
ddhena3 sappabhāsam cittam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vimaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || Iti me4 vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā
bhavissati || na ca atipaggahītā5 bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ
saṅkhittā bhavissati na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati ||
pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati || yathā pure tathā pacchā
yathā pacchā tathā pure || yatha adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā
uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ
tathā divā || iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena3 sappa-
bhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
II.
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave atilīno chando || || Yo bhikkhave
chando kosajjasahagato kosajjasampayutto || ayaṃ vuccati
bhikkhave atilīno chando || ||
5. Katamo ca bhikkhave atipaggahīto chando || || Yo
bhikkhave chando6 uddhaccasahagato uddhaccasampayutto ||
ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave atipaggahīto chando || ||
6. Katamo ca bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ7 saṅkhitto chando || ||
Yo8 bhikkhave chando9 thīnamiddhasahagato thīnamiddha-
sampayutto || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ7 saṅkhitto
chando || ||
7. Katamo ca bhikkhave bahiddhā vikkhitto chando ||
yo10 bhikkhave chando bahiddhā pañcakāmaguṇe ārabbha
anuvikkhito anuvisaṭo11 || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bahiddhā
vikkhitto chando || ||
8. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu pacchāpuresaññī12 ca
viharati yathā pure tathā pacchā yathā pacchā tathāpure || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 atalīno.
2 S1 saṃkhittā S3 -khittaṃ.
3 B1 -nandhena always B1 -naddhena always, corrected from -nandhe-
here only.
4 missing in S1 S3 pi.
5 S3 -gahito, the phrase is missing in S1.
6 S1-3 omit yo bhi-
7 S1-3 ajjhatta.
8 S1 insert hi.
9 S3 omits yo-
10 S1-3 insert hi.
11 S1-3 anusavo.
12 S1 adds here puresaññī.

[page 278]
278 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno1 pacchāpure saññā suggahītā
hoti sumanasikatā supadhāritā suppaṭividdhā paññāya ||
Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu pacchāpure saññī ca2 viha-
rati yathā pure tathā pacchā yathā pacchā tathā pure || ||
9. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu yathā adho tathā
uddham yatha uddhaṃ tathā adho viharati || || Idha
bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam uddham pādatalā
adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantam pūram nānappakārassa
asucino paccavekkhati || Atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā
nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nahārū3 aṭṭhī aṭṭhimiñjā4
vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakam pihakam papphā-
sam5 antaṃ antaguṇam udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pittaṃ semhaṃ
pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghānikā
kasikā6 muttan ti || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu yathā
adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho viharati || ||
10. Kathañ ca bhikkhave bhikkhu yathā divā tathā
rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā viharati || || Idha bhikkhave
bhikkhu yehi ākārehi yehi liṅgehi yehi nimittehi divā
chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipādam
bhāveti || so tehi ākārehi tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehi rattiṃ
chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam7 iddhipādam
bhāveti || || Yehi vā pana8 ākārehi yehi9 liṅgehi yehi ni-
mittehi rattiṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāga-
tam iddhipādam bhāveti || so tehi ākārehi tehi liṅgehi tehi
nimittehi divā chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāga-
tam iddhipādam bhāveti || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā viharati || ||
11. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apari-
yonaddhena10 sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || || Idha bhik-
khave bhikkhuno ālokasaññā suggahītā hoti divāsaññā
svādhiṭṭhitā11 || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu vivaṭena
cetasā apariyonaddhena10 sappabhāsam cittam bhāveti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 bhikkhu.
2 in B1-2 only
3 B1-2 nhāru
4 B1-2 -miñcaṃ.
5 B1-2 pabbāsaṃ.
6 missing in S1.
7 S1-3 -saṅkhāraṃ sama-
8 S1 omits vā pana S3 has keci.
9 missing in S3.
10 B1 -nandhena.
11 S3 suvā (S1 sava-) diṭṭhitā, B2 -saññāya adhiṭṭhitā.

[page 279]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 279
III.
12. Katamañca bhikkhave atilīnaviriyaṃ1 || || Yam
bhikkhave viriyaṃ kosajjasahagataṃ kosajjasampayuttaṃ ||
idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave atilīnaviriyaṃ1 || ||
13. Katamañca bhikkhave atipaggahītaviriyaṃ2 || Yam
bhikkhave viriyaṃ uddhaccasahagatam uddhaccasampayut-
taṃ || idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave atipaggahītaṃ viriyaṃ || ||
14. Katamañca bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittaṃ3 viri-
yam || || Yam bhikkhave viriyaṃ thīnamiddhasahagataṃ
thīnamiddhasampayuttaṃ || idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ
saṅkhittaṃ3 viriyaṃ || ||
15. Katamañca bhikkhave bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ viriyaṃ || ||
Yam bhikkhave viriyaṃ bahiddhā pañcakāmaguṇe ārabbha
anuvikkhittam4 anuvisaṭaṃ || || Idam vuccati bhikkhave
bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ viriyaṃ || ||
16--19. Peyyālo || || Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu vivaṭena
cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsam bhāveti || || Idha
bhikkhave bhikkhuno ālokasaññā sugahitā hoti divāsaññā
svādhiṭṭhitā5 || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu vivaṭen ce-
tasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti6 || ||
IV.
20. Katamañca bhikkhave atilīnaṃ cittaṃ || yam pi
bhikkhave cittaṃ kosajjasahagataṃ kosajjasampayuttaṃ ||
idam vuccati bhikkhave atilīnaṃ cittaṃ || ||
21. Katamañca bhikkhave atipaggahītaṃ cittaṃ || || Yam
bhikkhave cittam uddhaccasahagatam7 uddhaccasampa-
yuttaṃ || idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave atipaggahītaṃ cittaṃ || ||
22. Katamañca bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittaṃ cittaṃ || ||
Yam bhikkhave cittaṃ thīnamiddhasahagatam8 thīnamid-
dhasampayuttaṃ || idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ saṅ-
khittaṃ cittaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 atilīnaṃ vi-
2 S1-3 atipaggahītaṃ vi-
3 S1-3 ajjhattasaṃ-
4 S1-3 anukkhittaṃ.
5 B2 -saññāya adhiṭṭhitā.
6 So B1-2; S1-3 have only -pe- omitting all the paragraph.
7 missing in S3.
8 missing in S3; B1 and S1 have thīnamiddhaṃ-

[page 280]
280 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
23. Katamañca bhikkhave bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ cittaṃ || ||
Yam bhikkhave cittam bahiddhā pañcaguṇe ārabbha
anuvikkhittam anuvisaṭaṃ || idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ba-
hiddhā1 vikkhittaṃ cittaṃ || ||
24--27. Peyyālam || evam kho bhikkhave bhikkhu vivaṭena
cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti2 || ||
V.
28. Katamā3 ca bhikkhave atilīṇā4 vīmaṃsā || || Yā
bhikkhave vīmaṃsā kosajjasahagatā kosajjasampayuttā ||
ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave atilīnā vīmaṃsā || ||
29. Katamā3 ca bhikkhave atipaggahītā vīmaṃsā || || Yā
bhikkhave vīmaṃsā uddhaccasahagatā4 uddhaccasampa-
yuttā || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave atipaggahītā vīmaṃsā || ||
30. Katamāca bhikkhave ajjhattaṃ5 saṅkhittā vīmaṃsā || ||
Yā bhikkhave vīmaṃsā thīnamiddhassahagatā thīnamiddha-
sampayuttā || ayam vuccati bhikkhave ajjhattaṃsaṅkhittā
vīmaṃsā || ||
31. Katamā3 ca bhikkhave bahiddhā vikkhittā vīmaṃsā || ||
Yā bhikkhave vīmaṃsā bahiddhā pañcakāmaguṇe ārabbha
anuvikkhittā anuvisaṭā || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bahiddhā
vikkhittā vīmaṃsā || ||
32--35. la6 || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu vivaṭena
cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsam cittam bhāveti || ||
36. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave cattāro iddhipādā
evam bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā || evam
bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catusu iddhipādesu evam
bahulīkatesu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti || ||
Eko pi hutvā bahudhā hoti || bahudhā pi hutvā eko hoti7 ||
la || yāva Brahmalokā pi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti || pe || ||
37. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catusu iddhi-
pādesu evam bahulīkatesu8 āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 insert bahiddhā.
2 So B1-2 S1-3 have only -pe-.
3 S1-3 katamañ.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 ajjhatta.
6 Complete in S1-3 kathañca bhi- bhikkhu pacchāpuresaññī-
7 S1-3 omit bahudhā pi-
8 S1-3 add iddhipādesu.

[page 281]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 281
cetovimuttim paññāvimuttim diṭṭheva dhamme sayam
abhiññā1 sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī ti || ||
38. Cha pi abhiññāyo vitthāretabbā2 || ||
Pāsādakampanavaggo dutiyo3 || ||
Imassa vaggassa4 uddānaṃ || ||
Pubbe5 Mahapphalā6 Chando ||
Moggalāno ca Brāhmaṇo ||
Dve Samaṇabrāhmaṇā7 Bhikkhu8 ||
Desanā9 Vibhaṅgena cā ti || ||

CHAPTER III. VAGGO TATIYO.

SN_5,51(7).21. (1) Maggo.
1. Sāvatthi || ||
2. Pubbe10 me bhikkhave sambodhā1 anabhisambuddhassa
bodhisattasseva etad ahosi || Ko nu kho maggo kā paṭipadā
iddhipādabhāvanāyā ti || || Tassa mayham bhikkhave etad
ahosi || ||
3. So bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannā-
gatam iddhipādam bhāveti || || Iti me chando na atilīno
bhavissati || pe || sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||
4--5. Viriyasamādhi || cittasamādhi || ||
6. Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam id-
dhipādam bhāveti || || Iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bha-
vissati || na ca atipaggahītā11 bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ
saṅkhittā bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati ||
pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati || yathāpure tathā pacchā
yathā pacchā tathā pure || yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ yathā
uddhaṃ tathā adho || yathā divā tathā rattiṃ12 yathā
rattiṃ12 tathā divā || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena13
sappabhāsaṃ cittam bhāveti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ya.
2 this phrase in B1-2 only.
3 S1 pāsādampana-
4 S1-3 tatra instead of imassa-
5 S1-3 hetu.
6 S1-3 mahapphalo ca.
7 S1-3 mahiddhiyā vidhā instead of dve-
8 B1 ti instead of bhikkhu.
9 S1-3 bhāvanā.
10 S1-3 add va.
11 S1-3 -gahītaṃ.
12 S1 ratti.
13 B1 -nandhena always.

[page 282]
282 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
7. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave1 bhikkhu2 catusu
iddhipādesu evam bahulīkatesu anekavihitam iddhividham3
paccanubhoti || eko pi hutvā bahudhā hoti || bahudhā pi
hutvā eko hoti || pe || la || yāva Brahmalokā pi4 kāyena va-
saṃ vatteti5 || ||
8. Evam bhāvitesu kho bhikkhave1 bhikkhu2 catusu
iddhipādesu evam bahulīkatesu āsavānam khayā6 anāsavaṃ
cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā
sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī ti || ||
9. Cha pi abhiññāyo vittharetabbā7 || ||

SN_5,51(7).22. (2) Ayoguḷo.
1. Sāvatthi8 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando
Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Abhijānāti nu kho bhante Bhagavā iddhiyā mano-
mayena kāyena Brahmalokam upasaṅkamitā ti9 || ||
Abhijānāmi10 khvāham Ānanda4 iddhiyā manomayena
kāyena Brahmalokam upasaṅkamitā ti11 || ||
4. Abhijānāti kho12 pana bhante Bhagavā iminā cātu-
mahābhūtikena kāyena4 iddhiyā Brahmalokam upasaṅka-
mitā ti9 || ||
Abhijānāmi khavāham Ānanda iminā cātumahābhūtikena
kāyena4 iddhiyā Brahmalokam upasaṅkamitā ti9 || ||
5. Yaṃ ca kho13 opapāti14 ha15 bhante Bhagavā iddhiyā
manomayena kāyena Brahmalokam upasaṅkamituṃ || yaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B2.
2 missing in B1.
3 S1 iddhipādam.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S3 adds -pe-
6 S1-3 omit āsavānaṃ-
7 this phrase in B1-2 only.
8 B2 adds yaṃ; missing in S1-3.
9 S1-3 mittāti.
10 B2 -jānāmava.
11 S1 -mittāti.
12 missing in B1-2.
13 These words in B1-2 only.
14 S1 opāti B1-2 omāti.
15 in S1-3 only.

[page 283]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 283
ca1 kho abhijānāti2 bhante Bhagavā2 iminā cātumahā-
bhūtikena kāyena iddhiyā Brahmalokam upasaṅkamitā3 ||
tayidam bhante Bhagavato acchariyaṃ ceva4 abbhutaṃ
cāti || ||
Acchariyā ceva5 Ānanda tathāgatā acchariyadhamma-
samannāgatā6 ca abbhutā7 ceva Ānanda tathagatā ab-
bhutadhammasamannāgatā ca || ||
6. Yasmiṃ Ānanda samaye Tathāgato kāyam pi citte
samādahati8 cittam pi ca9 kāye samādahati10 || sukhasañ-
ñañca11 lahusaññañca kāye12 okkamitvā viharati || tasmiṃ
Ānanda samaye Tathāgatassa kāyo lahutaro ceva hoti
mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca || ||
7. Seyyathāpi ānanda ayoguḷo divasaṃ13 santatto lahu-
taro ceva hoti mudutaro ca2 kammaniyataro ca pabhassa-
rataro ca || evam eva kho2 Ānanda yasmiṃ samaye Tathā-
gato kāyam pi citte samādahati8 || cittam pi kāye samāda-
hati10 || sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca14 kāye okkamitvā
viharati || tasmim Ānanda samaye Tathāgatassa kāyo
lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca
pabhassarataro ca || ||
8. Yasmim Ānanda samaye Tathāgato kāyam pi citte
samādahati || cittam pi kāye samādahati || sukhasaññañca
lahusaññañca15 kāye16 okkamitvā viharati || tasmim Ānanda
samaye Tathāgatassa kāyo appakasireneva pathaviyā17
vehāsam abbhuggacchati || so anekavihitam iddhividham
paccanubhoti || eko pi hutvā bahudhā hoti || pe || la || yāva
Brahmalokā pi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti || ||

7 S1-3 abbhutañceva.

[page 284]
284 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
9. Seyyathāpi Ānanda tūlapicu1 vā kappāsapicu1 vā
lahuko vātupādāno appakasireneva pathaviyā2 vehāsam
abbhuggacchati || evam eva kho Ānanda yasmiṃ samaye
Tathāgato kāyam pi3 citte samādahati || cittam pi3 kāye
samādahati || sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca4 kāye okkamitvā
viharati5 || tasmim Ānanda6 samaye Tathāgatassa kāyo
appakasireneva pathaviyā vehāsam abbhuggacchati || so
anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti || eko pi hutvā ba-
hudhā hoti || la || pe || yāva Brahmalokā pi6 kāyena vasaṃ
vattetī ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).23. (3) Bhikkhu.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipadā || katame cattāro || ||
Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhāra-
samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi || citta-
samādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam
iddhipādam bhāveti || || Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro iddhi-
pādā || ||
3. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam bhā-
vitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ
cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayam
abhiññā7 sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatīti || ||

SN_5,51(7).24. (4) Suddhakam.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā- || Ime kho bhikkhave
cattāro iddhipādā ti8 || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -picuṃ (S1 pivuṃ?).
2 S1-3 puthaviyā.
3 S1-3 kāyasmiṃ . . . cittasmim without pi.
4 B1 lahukasaññañca.
5 B1 insert yaṃ B2 || la ||
6 missing in S1-3.
7 S1-3 abhiññāya.
8 This text is the same as the number 2 of the preceding and
the following sutta; it is, on account of this, I think,
suppressed in B1; nevertheless somewhat (a number 3) ought
to want in S1-3, since there is nothing about suddhi.

[page 285]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 285

SN_5,51(7).25. (5) Phalā 1.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā- || || Ime- cattāro
iddhipādā1 || ||
3. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam bhā-
vitattā bahulīkatattā2 dvinnam phalānam aññataram pha-
laṃ3 pātikaṅkhaṃ4 diṭṭheva dhamme aññā sati vā upādisese
anāgāmitāti || ||

SN_5,51(7).26. (6) Phalā2.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave iddhipādā- || || -Ime kho bhik-
khave cattāro iddhipādā5 || ||
3. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam bhā-
vitattā bahulīkatattā satta phalā sattānisaṃsā pātikaṅkhā || ||
Katame sattaphalā sattānisaṃsā || ||
4. Diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca6 aññam ārādheti || || No
ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca aññam ārādheti || atha6
maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti7 || || No ce maraṇakāle aññam
ārādheti || atha pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam
parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti || upahaccaparinibbāyī
hoti8 || asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti || sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
hotī || uddhaṃsoto hoti akaniṭṭhagāmī || ||
5. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam bhā-
vitattā bahulīkatattā ime9 sattaphalā sattānisaṃsā pati-
kaṅkhā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).27. (7) Ānando1.
1. 10 Sāvatthi nidānaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā || pe || ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā
Ānando Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Katamā nu kho

1 This number is the same as in 23.
2 B1-2 insert bhikkhu.
3 missing in S1; B1-2 add vā.
4 S1-3 pātikaṅkhā.
5 as in the three preceding suttas.
6 B1-2 paṭikacca.
7 B1-2 repeats here no ce diṭṭheva- ārādheti.
8 this phrase in B1-2 only.
9 missing in S1. 1O in B1-2 only.

286 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.
bhante iddhi || katamo iddhipādo || katamā iddhipāda-
bhāvanā || katamā iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadāti || ||
3. Idhānanda bhikkhu anekavihitam iddhividham pacca-
nubhoti || Eko pi hutvā bahudhā1 hoti || la [-pe] Yāva
Brahmalokā2 pi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti || ayam vuccati
Ānanda3 iddhi || ||
4. Katamo cānanda4 iddhipādo || || Yo Ānanda maggo
yā paṭipadā iddhilābhāya5 iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati ||
ayaṃ vuccatānanda iddhipādo || ||
5. Katamā cānanda iddhipādabhāvanā || || Idhānanda
bhikkhu Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam
iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi || cittasamādhi || vīmaṃ-
sāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipadam bhā-
veti || ayam vuccati Ānanda6 iddhipādabhāvanā || ||
6. Katamā cānanda4 iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā ||
ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seyyathīdaṃ sammā-
diṭṭhi || la-pe || sammāsamādhi || ayaṃ vuccatānanda iddhi-
pādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).28. (8) Ānando2.
2. Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantam Ānandam
Bhagavā etad avoca || || Katamā nu kho Ānanda iddhi ||
katamo iddhipādo || katamā iddhipādabhāvanā || || Katamā
iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā ti || ||
Bhagavaṃmūlakā no bhante7 dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā ||
la8 || ||

paccanubhoti || || Ayam vuccatānanda iddhipādabhāvanāgā-
minī paṭipadā ti9 || ||

4, 5, 6 in B1-2.

Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 287

SN_5,51(7).29. (9) Bhikkhū 1.
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkamiṃsu || pe || ekam antaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū
Bhagavantam etad avocuṃ || || Katamā nu kho bhante iddhi ||
katamo iddhipādo || katamā1 iddhipādabhāvanā || katamā2
iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā ti || ||
3--6. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anekavihitam iddhividhaṃ
paccanubhoti eko pi hutvā || pe3 || yāva Brahmalokāpi- ||
Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhipādagaminī paṭipadā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).30. (10) Bhikkhū2.
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkamiṃsu || pa || ekam antaṃ nisinne4 kho te bhikkhū
Bhagavā etad avoca || katamā nu kho bhikkhave iddhi ||
katamo iddhipādo || katamā iddhipādabhāvanā || katamā
iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī patīpadā ti || ||
Bhagavaṃmūlakā nu bhante dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā ||
la || ||
3. Katamā bhikkhave iddhi5 || || Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu
anekavihitam iddhividam paccanubhoti || eko pi hutvā ba-
hudhā hoti || la [pe] || yāva Brahmalokā pi kāyena vasaṃ
vatteti || || Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhi || ||
4. Katamo ca6 bhikkhave iddhipādo || || Yo bhikkhave
maggo yā paṭipadā iddhilābhāya7 iddhipaṭilābhāya8 saṃ-
vattati || ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhipādo || ||
5. Katamā ca bhikkhave iddhipāda bhāvanā || || Idha
bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaman-
nāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi || cittasamādhi ||
vimaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipā-
dam bhāveti || || Ayam vuccati bhikkhave iddhipādabhāvanā || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 adds ca S3 omits the phrase by blunder.
2 S1-3 add ca.
3 S1-3 bahudhā hoti -pe- followed by the last phrase of the sutta.
4 So S1-3 B1 nisinno.
5 missing in S1-3 from bhagavaṃnettikā.
6 missing in B2.
7 missing in S1-3
8 S1-3 iddhipādaṭi-

288 Iddhipāda-Saṃyuttam LI.

padā || ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ ||
sammādiṭṭhi || la [pe] || sammāsamādhi || || Ayaṃ vuccati
bhikkhave iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī patipadā ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).31. (11) Moggalāno.
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi1 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || || Katamesaṃ dham-
mānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu evam
mahiddhiko evam mahānubhāvo ti || ||
Bhagavaṃmūlakā no bhante dhammā Bhagavaṃnettikā ||
pa2 || ||
4. Catunnaṃ kho bhikkhave iddhipādānam bhavitattā
bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu evam mahiddhiko evam
mahānubhāvo || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Idha bhikkhave Moggalāno bhikkhu chandasamādhi-
padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipadam bhāveti || Iti
me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati || pe || sappabhāsam
bhāveti || ||
6--7. Viriyasamādhi || Cittasamādhi || ||
8. Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam id-
dhipādam bhāveti || || Iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bha-
vissati || na ca atipaggahitā bhavissati || na ca ajjhattaṃ
saṅkhittā bhavissati || na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati3 ||
la-[pe] || Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena4 sappabhā-
saṃ5 cittam bhāveti || ||
9. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu evam ma-
hiddhiko evam mahānubhāvo || ||
10. Imesañca pana bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu evam aneka-
vihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti || eko pi hutvā bahudhā
hoti || bahudhā pi hutvā eko hoti || la-[pe] || yāva Brahma-
lokā pi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B1-2 only.
2 S1-3 omit Bhagavaṃnettikā || pa ||
3 S1-3 omit na ca ajjhattaṃ- -bhavissati na ca bahiddhā.
4 B1 -nandhena.
5 S1 sappasaṃ.

[page 289]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 289
11. Imesaṃ ca pana bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Moggalāno bhikkhu āsavānaṃ
khayā anāsavam1 cetovimuttim paññavimuttiṃ diṭṭheva-
dhamme2 sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viha-
ratī ti || ||

SN_5,51(7).32. (12) Tathāgato.
2. 3 Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamesaṃ dhammā-
nam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato evam mahiddhiko
evam mahānubhāvo ti4 || ||
Bhagavammūlakā no bhante dhammā || la || pe5 || ||
4. Catunnam kho bhikkhave iddhipādānam bhāvitattā
bahulīkatattā Tathāgato evam mahiddhiko evam mahānu-
bhāvo || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Idha bhikkhave Tathāgato chandasamādhipadhāna-
saṅkhārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || Iti me chando
na ca atilīno bhavissati || na ca atipaggahīto bhavissati ||
[pe] || iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena6 sappabhāsam
cittam bhāveti || ||
6--7. Viriyasamādhi || cittasamādhi || ||
8. Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatam7 id-
dhipādam bhāveti || Iti me vīmaṃsā nā ca atilīnā bhāvissati ||
na ca atipaggahītā bhavissati || na ca ajjhattam || la8 || Iti
vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittam
bhāveti || ||
9. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam bhā-
vitattā bahulīkatattā Tathāgato evam mahiddhiko evam
mahānubhāvo || ||
10. Imesañca pana bhikkhave catunnam iddhipādānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā Tathāgato anekavihitam iddhi-
vidham paccanubhoti || Eko pi hutvā bahudhā hoti9 || la

CHAPTER IV. GAṄGĀPEYYĀLI.

napoṇā pācīnapabbhārā || evam8 eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
cattāro iddhipāde bhāvento cattāro iddhipāde bhāvento

thañca bhikkhave bhikkhu cattāro iddhipāde bhāvento-

khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsasamādhi padhānasamannāgatam id-
dhipādam bhāveti || || Evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu cattāro

CHAPTER V. APPAMĀDAVAGGO.

SN_5,51(7).45--54. (1--10).
Yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dipadā vā catuppadā
vā || || Vitthāretabbaṃ || ||
Tathāgatam Padaṃ Kūṭam || Mūlaṃ Sārena Vassikam ||
Rājā Candimasuriyo ca || Vatthena dasamam padaṃ || ||
Appamādavaggo iddhipādavāsena vitthāretabbaṃ || ||
Vaggo pañcamo || ||

CHAPTER VI. BALAKARAṆĪYA VAGGO.

SN_5,51(7).55--66. (1--12).
Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā
kayiranti || || Vitthāretabbaṃ || Vaggo chaṭṭho || ||
Balaṃ Bījañca Nāgo ca Rukkha Kumbhena Sūriyaṃ ||
Ākāsena dve Meghā || Navā Āgantukā Nadī ti || ||
Balakaraṇīyavaggo iddhipādavasena vitthāretabbaṃ || ||

Tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || katamā tisso || || Vitthāre-
tabbaṃ || ||

in the Singhalese MSS.

CHAPTER VIII. OGHA-VAGGO.

SN_5,51(7).77. (1) Ogho.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave oghā || katame3 cattāro kām-
ogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho || || Vitthāretabbaṃ4 || ||

SN_5,51(7).79--85. (2--9).

SN_5,51(7).86. (10) Uddhambhāgiyāni.
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamāni pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo mano uddhaccam
avijjā || Imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyo-
janāni || ||
3. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhā-
giyānam saṃyojanānam abhiññaya pariññāya parikkha-
yāya pahānāya cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbā || katame
cattaro.
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅ-
khārasamannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti || viriyasamādhi ||
cittasamādhi || vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāga-
tam iddhipādam bhāveti5 ||
5. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgi-
yanaṃ saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbā ti || ||
Oghavaggo iddhipādavasena vitthāretabbo || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 vidhāsavā.
2 S1 bilamamī.
3 S1 katamo S3 katame corrected from katamo.
4 this number in S1-3 only.
5 the numbers 3,4 are omitted in S3.

[page 293]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 293
Yadipi1 satipaṭṭhānā tad api iddhipādaṃ vitthāre-
tabbaṃ || ||
[Uddānam]
Ogho Yogo Upādānaṃ Ganthā Anusayena ca ||
Kāmaguṇā Nīvaraṇa-Gandhā Oruddhambhāgiyāni2 || ||
Iddhipādasamyuttaṃ sattamaṃ3 || ||

1 So S1; S3 yadīpi || -- These two ending mentions are to be
found in S1-3; B1-2 have: Yathā maggasaṃyuttaṃ vitthāritaṃ
(B1 vitthārikaṃ) || || Evaṃ Gaṅgāpeyyālo yāva esanāpāli
iddhipādesu vitthāretabbā || ||
2 This uddāna in S1-3 only.
3 B2 niṭṭhitaṃ S3 samattaṃ S1 samatti; -- this ending mention
is followed in S1-3 by the uddāna of the third vaggo.
