BOOK VIII.
ANURUDDHA-SAṂYUTTAM.

CHAPTER I. RAHOGATAVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,52(8).1. (1) Rahogata1.
1. Evam me sutaṃ1 Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Anuruddho
Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmato Anuruddhassa rahogatassa paṭi-
sallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi || || Yesaṃ
kesañci cattāro satipaṭṭhānā viraddhā || viraddho tesam
ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī || Yesaṃ kesañci
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā āraddhā || āraddho tesam ariyo maggo
sammādukkhakkhayagāmī ti2 || ||
3. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno āyasmato Anu-
ruddhassa cetasā cetoparivitakkam aññāya seyyathāpi nāma
balavā3 puriso sammiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritaṃ
vā bāham sammiñjeyya4 || evam eva5 āyasmato Anurud-
dhassa sammukhe6 pātur ahosi || ||
4. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno āyasmantam
Anuruddham etad avoca || || Kittāvatā nu kho āvuso Anu-
ruddha bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā āraddhā hontīti || ||
5. Idhāvuso bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye samudayadhammā-
nupassī viharati || pa [pe] || ajjhattaṃ kāye vayadhammānu-
passī viharati || ajjhattam kāye samudayavayadhammānupassī

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B1 only; the beginning of this saṃyutta is not to be
found in B2 on account of the loss of the sheet thi.
2 S1-3 -nī.
3 S1-3 add pi.
4 B1-2 samañchitaṃ -cheyya
5 S1-3 evaṃ.
6 S1-3 pamukhe.

[page 295]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 295
viharati || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādo-
manassaṃ || ||
6. Bahiddhā kāye vayadhammānupassī viharati || la [pe] ||
bahiddhā kāye samudayavayadhammānupassī viharati ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
7. Ajjhattabahidhā kāye samudayadhammānupassī viha-
rati || ajjhattabahiddhā kāye vayadhammānupassī viharati ||
ajjhattabahiddhā kāye samudayavayadhammānupassī viha-
rati || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādoma-
nassaṃ || ||
8. So sace ākaṅkhati Appatikkūle1 paṭikkūlasaññī viha-
reyyan ti || paṭikkūlasaññī tattha2 viharati || || Sace ākaṅ-
khati Paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyyan ti || appaṭikūla-
saññī tattha viharati || || Sa ce ākaṅkhati Appaṭikkule ca
paṭikkule ca paṭikkūlasaññī vihareyyanti patikkūlasaññī
tattha viharati || || Sa ce ākaṅkhati Patikkūpe ca appaṭik-
kūle ca appatikkūlasaññī vihareyyan ti || appatikkūlasaññī
tattha viharati || || Sa ce ākaṅkhati Appaṭikkūlañca paṭik-
kūlañca tadubhayam abhinivajjetvā upekhako vihareyyaṃ3
sato sampajāno ti || upekhako tattha4 viharati sato sampa-
jāno5 || ||
9. Ajjhattaṃ vedanāsu samudayadhammanupassī viha-
rati6 || ajjhattaṃ7 vedanāsu vayadhammānupassī viharati ||
ajjhattaṃ7 vedanāsu samudayavayadhammānupassī8 viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyyaloke abhijjhādomanassaṃ9 || ||
10. Bahiddhā vedanāsu samudayadhadhammānupassī
viharati || bahiddhā vedanāsu vayadhammānupassī viharati ||
bahiddhā vedanāsu samudayavayadhammānupassī viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyyaloke abhijjhādomanassaṃ9 || ||
11. Ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu samudayadhammānupassī
viharati || ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vayadhammānupassī
viharati || ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu samudayavayadhammā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 paṭikkū- B1 patiku- both always.
2 S1-3 tathā always.
3 S1 vihareyya S3 vihareyyanti.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 add ti.
6 S1-3 add -pe-
7 S1-3 ajjhatta.
8 S1 B1 omit -vaya-
9 S1-3 omit ātāpī etc.

[page 296]
296 Anuruddha-Saṃyuttam LII.
nupassī1 viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke
abhijjhādomanassam || ||
12. So sa ce ākaṅkhati pe || ||
13. Ajjhattaṃ citte || la || ||
14. Bahiddhā citte || la || ||
15. Ajjhattabahiddhā citte samudayadhammānupassī vi-
harati || ajjhattabahiddhā citte vaya- || ajjhattabahiddhā citte
samudayavayadhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī || la || abhijjhā-
domanassaṃ2 || ||
16. So sa3 ce ākaṅkhati || pe || ||
17. Ajjhattaṃ dhammesu || la || ||
18. Bahiddhā dhammesu || la || ||
19. Ajjhattabahiddhā dhammesu samudayadhammānu-
passī viharati || ajjhattabahiddhā dhammesu vayadhammānu-
passī viharati || ajjhattabahiddhā dhammesu samudayavaya-
dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
20. So4 sa ce ākaṅkhati Appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viha-
reyyan ti paṭikūlasaññī tattha5 viharati || la || upekhako tattha
viharati sato sampajāno || ||
21. Ettāvatā kho āvuso bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
āraddhā hontī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).2. (2) Rahogata2.
1. Sāvatthi nidānaṃ6 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmato Anuruddhassa rahogatassa paṭi-
sallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi || || Yesaṃ
kesañci cattāro satipaṭṭhānā viraddhā viraddho tesam
ariyo maggo sammādukkhakkhayagāmī || || Yesaṃ kesañci
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā āraddhā āraddho tesam ariyo maggo
sammādukkhakkhayagāmī ti || ||
3. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno āyasmato Anu-
ruddhassa cetasā ceto parivitakkam aññāya7 seyyathāpi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 omits -vaya-
2 B1 -domanassa.
3 S1-3 omit la- S1 omits se S3 sa.
4 missing in S1-3
5 S1-3 tathā.
6 S1-3 Ekam samayam āy- Anu- Sāvatthiyaṃ vi- Je- Anātha- ārame.
7 S1 omits ya.

[page 297]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 297
nāma balavā puriso || pe || || Evam eva1 āyasmato Anurud-
dhassa pamukhe2 pātur ahosi || ||
4. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno āyasmantam
Anuruddham etad avoca || || Kittāvatā nu kho āvuso Anu-
ruddha bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā āraddhā honti3 || ||
5. Idhāvuso bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viha-
rati || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādoma-
nassaṃ || || Bahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī ||
la-pe4 || Ajjhattabahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī ||
abhijjhadomanassam || ||
6. Ajjhattaṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī-
-abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī
viharati ātāpī -abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Ajjhattam5 bahiddhā6
vedanāsu7 vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
7. Ajjhattaṃ5 citte || bahiddhā citte || ajjhattabahiddhā
citte8 cittānupassī viharati || ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
8. Ajjhattaṃ dhammesu9 || bahiddhā dhammesu9 || ajjhat-
tabahiddhādhammesu dhammānupassī viharati: ātāpī sam-
pajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
9. Ettāvatā kho āvuso bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
āraddhā hontī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).3. (3) Sutanu.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Anuruddho Sāvatthiyaṃ
viharati Sutanutīre || ||
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā Anuruddho
tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā Anuruddhena
saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu || || Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sārāṇīyam
vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 evam.
2 B1 samukhe.
3 hoti || ti || in B2 whose the text reappears here with sheet thī.
4 much more abridged in S1-3 than in B1-2.
5 S1-3 ajjhatta.
6 S1-3 bahiddhāsu.
7 S1 add --ajjhatta bahiddhā vedanāsu and nothing more
8 S1-2 omit the surplus.
9 S1-3 add dhammanupassī viharati ātāpī -pe-

[page 298]
298 Anuruddha-Saṃyuttam LII.
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam
Anuruddham etad avocuṃ || || Katamesaṃ āyasmā Anu-
ruddho dhammānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññā-
tam1 patto ti || ||
4 Catunnam khvāham2 āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvi-
tattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññātam1 patto || katamesaṃ
catunnaṃ || || Idhāham āvuso kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
vedanāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ||
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Imesaṃ khvāham3 āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam bhā-
vitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññātam1 patto || ||
5. Imesaṃ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā hīnaṃ dhammaṃ hīnato abbhañ-
ñāsiṃ || majjhimaṃ dhammam majjhimato abbhaññāsiṃ ||
paṇītaṃ dhammam paṇītato abbhaññāsin ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).4. (4) Kaṇṭakī1.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Anuruddho āyasmā ca Sāri-
putto āyasmā ca Mahā-Moggalāno Sākete viharanti4
Kaṇṭakīvane5 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā ca Sāriputto āyasmā ca Mahā-
Moggalāno sāyaṇhasamayam paṭisallāṇā vuṭṭhitā yenāyasmā
Anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā
Anuruddhena saddiṃ sammodiṃsu || sammodanīyaṃ katham
sārāṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Sāriputto āyasman-
tam Anuruddham etad avoca || || Sekhenāvuso Anuruddha
bhikkhunā katame6 dhammā upasampajja vihātabbā7 ti || ||
Sekhenāvuso Sariputta bhikkhunā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
upasampajja vihātabbā7 || katame cattaro || ||
4. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampājāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ8 ||

3 S1-3 kho.

6 S3 corrected from katamo.
7 S1-3 vihātabbo omitting ti.
8 B1-2 omit ātāpī-

vedanāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati || ātāpī ||
sampajāno1 satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Sekhenāvuso Sāriputta ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā upasam-
pajja vihātabbā2 ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).5. (5) Kaṇṭakī2.
1--2. Sākete nidānaṃ || Ekam antaṃ ni- kho ā- Sāriputto
ā- Anuruddham etad avoca3 || ||
3. Asekhenāvuso Anuruddha bhikkhunā katame dhammā
upasampajja vihātabbā ti || ||
Asekhenāvuso Sāriputta bhikkhunā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
upasampajja vihātabbā || katame cattāro4 || ||
4. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye5 kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || ve-
danāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī-
-domanassaṃ || || Asekhenāvuso Sāriputta bhikkhunā ime
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā upasampajja vihātabbā ti6 || ||

SN_5,52(8).6. (6) Kaṇṭakī3.
1--2. 7 Sāketanidānaṃ || Ekam antaṃ- -etad avoca || ||
3. Katamesaṃ āyasmā Anuruddho dhammānaṃ bhāvi-
tattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññātam8 patto ti || ||
Catunnaṃ khvāham āvuso satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā
bahulīkatattā mahābhiññatam8 patto || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Idhāham āvuso kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi9 ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ve-
danāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi9 ātāpī-
-abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Imesaṃ khvāham āvuso catunnam
satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññātam8
patto || ||
5. Imesañca panāham āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sahassaṃ lokam abhijānāmī ti || ||

suttānaṃ || ||

SN_5,52(8).7. (7) Taṇhakkhaya.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ1 || ||
2. Tatra kho āyasmā Anuruddho bhikkhū āmantesi || || pe || ||
3. Cattāro me āvuso satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkata
taṇhakkhayāya saṃvattanti2 || katame cattāro || ||
4. Idhāvuso bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati || pe [pa] ||
vedanāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyyaloke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Ime3
kho āvuso cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇ-
hākkhayāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).8. (8) Salaḷāgāram.
1. Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā Anuruddho Sāvatthiyaṃ vi-
harati Salaḷāgāre4 || ||
2. Tatra kho āyasmā Anuruddho bhikkhū āmantesi ||
la5 || etad avoca || ||
3. Seyyathāpi āvuso Gaṅgā nadī pācinaninnā pācinapoṇā
pācinapabbhārā || atha mahājanakāyo āgaccheyya kuddāla-
piṭakam6 ādāya Mayam imam Gaṅgānadim pacchāninnaṃ
karissāma pacchāpoṇam pacchāpabbharan ti || Taṃ kim
maññathāvuso api nu7 so mahājanakāyo Gaṅgānadim
pacchāninnaṃ kareyya pacchāpoṇam pacchāpabbhāranti || ||
No hetam āvuso || ||
Taṃ kissa hetu || Gaṅgā āvuso8 nadī pācinaninnā pācī-
napoṇā pācīnapabbharā sā9 na sukarā pacchāninnam kā-
tum pacchāpoṇam pacchāpabbhāram || yāvad eva ca pana
so mahājanakāyo kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā ti || ||
4. Evam eva kho āvuso bhikkhuṃ10 cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
bhāventam cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkarontaṃ rājāno11
vā rājamahāmattā12 vā mittā vā amaccā vā ñātisālohitā13

Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 301
vā1 bhogehi abhihaṭṭhum pavāreyyuṃ Ehambho2 purisa
kin te ime kāsāvā anudahanti || kim muṇḍokapālam anusaṃ-
carasi3 || ehi hīnāyāvattitvā4 bhoge ca bhuñjassu puññāni
ca karohī ti || || So vata āvuso bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
bhāvento cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkaronto sikkham
paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī ti5 netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
Taṃ kissa hetu || yañ hi taṃ6 āvuso cittaṃ dīgharattaṃ
vivekaninnaṃ vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbharaṃ taṃ vata7
hīnāyāvattissatī ti8 netaṃ thānaṃ vijjati || ||
5. Kathañcāvuso9 bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveti
cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkaroti || || Idhāvuso bhikkhu
kāye kāyanupassī viharati || vedanāsu || citte || dhammesu
dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Evaṃ kho āvuso bhikkhu
cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveti cattāro satipatthāne bahulī-
karotī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).9. (9) Sabbam or Ambapāla.
1. Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca Anuruddho āyasmā ca
Sāriputto Vesāliyaṃ viharanti Ambapālivane || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto sāyaṇhasamayam paṭi-
sallāṇā vuṭṭhito || la || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Sāriputto āyasman-
taṃ Anuruddham etad avoca || || Vippasannāni kho te
āvuso Anuruddha indriyāni parisuddho mukhavaṇṇo pari-
yodāto || katamenāyasmā Anuruddho vihārena etarahi ba-
hulaṃ viharatī ti || ||
Catusu khvāham āvuso satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacitto11
etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmi || katamesu catusu || ||
4. Idhāham āvuso kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi || pe || ve-
danāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī

2 S1-3 hambho.

9 S1-3 kiñcāvuso.

sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Imesu
khvāham āvuso catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacitto eta-
rahi bahulaṃ viharāmi || ||
5. Yo so āvuso bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā
katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho {parikkhīṇa-
bhavasaññojano} sammadaññā vimutto || so imesu catusu
satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacitto1 bahulaṃ viharatī ti || ||
6. Lābhā vata2 no āvuso suladdhaṃ vata2 no āvuso ye
mayam āyasmato Anuruddhassa sammukhā va assumha
āsabhim3 vācam4 bhāsamānassā ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).10. (10) Bāḷhagilāyam or Gihīnayo.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Anuruddho Sāvatthiyaṃ vi-
harati Andhavanasmiṃ5 ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || ||
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā Anuruddho
tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam Anurud-
dham etad avocuṃ || Katamenāyasmato Anuruddhassa vi-
hārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā6 vedanā cittaṃ
na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī ti || ||
Catūsu me āvuso satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhitacittassa7 vi-
harato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyā-
dāya tiṭṭhanti || || Katamesu catusu || ||
3. Idhāham āvuso kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi8 || Veda-
nāsu || citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
Imesu kho me āvuso catusu satipaṭṭhānesu supatiṭṭhita-
cittassa7 viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittam
na9 pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī ti || ||
Rahogatavaggo10 pathamo11 || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ12 || ||

2 missing in S1-3.

4 S3 vācā.
5 B2 adhava-

8 S1-3 add ātāpī- -domanassaṃ.

Rahogatena1 dve vuttā2 || Sutanu Kaṇṭakī3 tayo ||

CHAPTER II. VAGGO-DUTIYO.

SN_5,52(8).11. (1) Sahassa.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Anuruddho Sāvatthiyaṃ vi-
harati Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme || ||
2--3. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā Anu-
ruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā Anu-
ruddhena saddhiṃ6 || la-pe || āyasmantam || Anuruddham etad
avocuṃ || || Katamesam āyasmā Anuruddho dhammānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññatam patto ti7 ||
Catunnaṃ khvāham8 āvuso || pe || mahābhiññatam9 patto ||
katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Idhāham āvuso kāye kāyanupassī viharāmi || vedanāsu ||
citte || dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyyaloke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Imesaṃ khvā-
ham āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvitattā bahulī-
katattā mahābhiññatam patto || ||
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānam
bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā kappasahassam10 anussarāmī ti11 || ||

SN_5,52(8).12. (2) Iddhi1.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhanānam
bhā- bahu- anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhomi || eko
pi hutvā bahudhā homi || la || yāva Brahmalokāpi kāyena
vasaṃ vattemī ti12 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 raho (S1 hā) gateneva.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 B1-2 kaṇḍakī S1-3 kaṇṭaki.
4 B2 saḷalā- B1 salaḷhā S1-3 salaḷāgataṃ.
5 B2 ampaṃbāḷa- S1-3 ambapālagihīnayā (S1 -yo) ti instead of sabbamo
6 S1-3 add sammodiṃsu.
7 S1 omit (by blunder) mahā- till the followingm -pe-.
8 S3 kho.
9 S3 -bhiññātam.
10 B1 kappasatasahassam.
11 B1 anussarāmi.
12 B1 vattemi B2 vattemiti.

[page 304]
304 Anuruddha-Saṃyuttam LII.

SN_5,52(8).13. (3) Iddhi 2 (?).
5. Imesaṃ ca panāham avuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā-
bahu- dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānussi-
kāya1 ubho sadde suṇāmi dibbe ca mānusse2 ca ye dūre
santike cā ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).14. (4) Cetoparicca.
5. Imesañ ca panāham avuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā- bahu-
parasattānam parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānā-
mi || sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ Sarāgaṃ cittan ti pajānāmi || la ||
vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ Vimuttaṃ cittan ti pajānāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).15. (5) Ṭhāna.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā- bahu-
ṭhānañ ca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtam pa-
jānāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).16. (6) Ṭhāna2 (?).
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnam || sati- bhā- bahu-
atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso
hetuso vipākam yathābhūtam pajanāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).17. (7)3 Paṭipadā.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnam sati- bhā- bahu-
sabbatthagāminipaṭipadaṃ4 yathābhūtam pajanāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).18. (8) Loka5.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā- bahu-
anekadhātum6 nānādhātuṃ7 lokam yathābhūtam pajānā-
mī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 manussa-; S1-3 manusi-; S1 omits ya.
2 S1-3 mānuse.
3 to be found in B1-2 only.
4 B1 padā.
5 The titles of 17 and 18 are afforded by the texts only and
seem to be pointed out in the uddāna by the strange reading
paṭido (or de) liko.--But 17 is missing in S1-3.
6 B1 S1-3 -dhātu.
7 B1 S3 -dhātu S1 -dhātunā.

[page 305]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 305

SN_5,52(8).19. (9) Nānādhimutti.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā- bahu-
sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikaṃ1 yathābhūtam pajanāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).20. (10) Indriyam.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnam sati- bhā- bahu-
parasattānam parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattiṃ2 yathā-
bhūtam pajānāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).21. (11) Jhānam (?).
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā- bahu-
jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṅkilesaṃ vodānaṃ
vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtam pajānāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).22. (12) Vijjā1.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnam sati- bhā- bahu-
anekavihitam pubbenivāsam anussarāmi3 || seyyathīdam ekam
pi4 jatiṃ dve pi jātiyo || peyyālo || iti sākāram sauddesam
anekavihitam5 pubbenivāsam anussarāmī ti6 || ||

SN_5,52(8).23. (13) Vijjā2.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnam sati- bhā- bahu-
dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānussakena7 || pe ||
yathā kammūpage satte pajānāmī ti || ||

SN_5,52(8).24. (14) Vijjā3.
5. Imesañ ca panāham āvuso catunnaṃ sati- bhā- bahu-
āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavam cetovimuttim8 paññāvimuttim

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 nādhi- S1-3 -muttikataṃ.
2 S1-3 -pariyantam (S1 -yattam).
3 S1-3 -sarāmī ti.
4 missing in B1.
5 So B1-2 S1-3 have -jātim || pe || anekavihitaṃ-
6 B1-2 anussarāmi.
7 S1-3 -mānusa-
8 S1 cete-

[page 306]
306 Anuruddha-Saṃyuttam LII.
diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā1 sacchikatvā upasampajja
viharāmī ti || ||
Tatruddānam || ||
Sahassa ca Iddhi atha ca2 pana ||
Cetoparicca Ṭhānam etī ti ||
Paṭidoliko3 Nānāvimutti4 ||
Indriyam Jānan5 tisso Vijjā ti6 || ||
Anuruddhasaṃyuttam aṭṭhamam7 || ||

BOOK IX.
JHĀNA-SAṂYUTTAM-NAVAMAM.

CHAPTER I. GAṄGĀPEYYĀLO.

SN_5,53(9).1. (1) Pathamasuddhiyam.
1--2. Sāvatthi || Tatra kho1 cattāro me bhikkhave jhānā ||
katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca
akusalehi dhammehi2 savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajam pīti-
sukhaṃ pathamam jhānam3 upasampajja viharati || ||
4. Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ4 sampasāda-
naṃ5 cetaso ekodibhāvam avitakkam avicāraṃ samādhijam
pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānam6 upasampajja viharati || ||
5. Pītiyā ca virāgā upekhako ca viharati sato ca sampa-
jāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti || Yan tam ariyā
ācikkhanti upekhako satimā sukhavihārī ti tatiyaṃ jhānam7
upasampajja viharati || ||
6. Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva
somanassadomanassānam atthagamā adukkham asukham
upekhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānam upasampajja vi-
harati || ||
7. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro jhānā ti || ||
8. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Gaṅgā nadī8 pācīnaninnā pā-
cīnapoṇā pācīnapabbhārā || evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 omit Sāvatthi-
2 missing in S1.
3 S1-3 pathamajjhānam.
4 S1 ajjhatta.
5 S1-3 sampasādaṃ S3 adds na.
6 S1-3 dutiyajjhānam.
7 S1-3 tatiyajjhānam.
8 S1-3 stop here and pass immediately to the last suttam of
the saṃyutta.

[page 308]
308 Jhāna-Saṃyuttam LIII.
cattāro jhāne bhāvento cattāro jhāne bahulīkaronto nibbā-
naninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro || || Kathañca
bhikkhave bhikkhu cattāro jhāne bhāvento- -nibbāna-
pabbhāro || ||
9. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca
akusalehi dhammehi savitakkasavicāram vivekajam pīti-
sukham pathamaṃ jhānam upasampajja viharati || vitakka-
vicārānaṃ vūpasamā || la || dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ || tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ ||
catutthaṃ jhānam upasampajja viharati || Evam kho bhik-
khave bhikkhu cattāro jhāne bhāvento cattāro jhāne bahulīka-
ronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro ti || ||
Jhānasaññuttassa pathamasuddhiyam suttantaṃ1 || ||
Yad api satipaṭṭhānaṃ tad api vitthāretabbaṃ2 || ||

SN_5,53(9).2--12. (2--12).
Gaṅga-peyyālo3 || ||
Cha pācīnato ninnā chā ninnā samuddato ||
dve ca Gaṅgā dasā4 honti vaggo tena pavuccati || ||
Jhānasaṃyuttassa Gaṅgāpeyyāli pathamo || ||

CHAPTER II. APPAMĀDA-VAGGO.

SN_5,53(9).13--22. (1--10).
Tathāgataṃ Padam Kūṭam Mūlaṃ Sārena Vassikaṃ ||
Rājā Candima-suriyo ca Vatthena dasamam padaṃ || ||
Appamādavaggo dutiyo || ||

CHAPTER III. BALAKARAṆIYA-VAGGO.

SN_5,53(9).23--34. (1--12).
Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ye keci balakaraṇīyā kamantā
kayiranti || || Vitthāretabbaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 this mention put (in S1-3 only) at the end of the last text
seems to be here at the right place as well as the following
one which goes before it in S1-3.
2 B1-2 have evam yāva esanā pāḷi vitthāretabbā.
3 this mention is in B1-2, but the following uddāna and all
the others are to be found in S1-3 only.
4 So S1-3.

[page 309]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 309
Bala Bījañca Nāgo ca Rukkho Kumbhena Sūriyaṃ
Akāsena dve Meghā Navā Agantukā Nadī || ||
Balakaraṇīyavaggo tatiyo || ||

CHAPTER IV. ESANĀ-VAGGO.

SN_5,53(9).35--44. (1--10).
Tisso imā bhikkhave esanā || katamā tisso || || Kāmesanā
bhavesanā brahmacariyesanā || pe || ||
Esanā Vidhā Āsavā Bhavo Dukkhatā ca tisso ||
Khila-Malañca Nīgho ca Vedanā Taṇhayena cā ti || ||

CHAPTER V. OGHA-VAGGO.

SN_5,53(9).45. (1).
Cattāro me bhikkhave oghā || katame cattāro ||
Kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho || || Vitthāretabbaṃ || ||

SN_5,53(9).46--53. (2--9).

SN_5,53(9).54. (10) Uddhambhāgiyāni1.
2. Pañcimāni bhikkhave uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ||
katamani pañca || || Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccam
avijjā || || Imāni kho bhikkhave pañcuddhambhāgiyāni
saṃyojanāni || || Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam udd-
hambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya pa-
rikkhayāya pahānāya cattāro jhānā bhāvetabbā || katame
cattāro || ||
3--6. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca
akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajam pīti-
sukham pathamaṃ jhānaṃ || dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ || tatiyaṃ
jhānaṃ || catutthaṃ jhānam upasampajja viharati || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This last sutta of the samyutta is subjoined to the first
in S1-3 and put before the uddānas.

[page 310]
310 Jhāna-Saṃyuttam LIII.
7. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannam uddhambhāgiyā-
naṃ saṃyojanānam abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya
pahānāya ime cattāro jhānā bhāvetabbā ti || ||
Ogho Yogo Upādānaṃ Gantham Anusayena ca
Kāmaguṇā Nīvarana Bandha Oruddhabhāgiyāni || ||
Oghavaggo pañcamo1 || ||
Gaṅgāpeyyālo || || Yathā Maggasamyuttaṃ evam Jhānaṃ
Saṃyuttam vitthāretabbam || yāva esanā pāḷi2 || ||
Jhānasaṃyuttaṃ navamaṃ3 || ||

1 This mention and the uddāna in S1-3 only.
2 This mention in B1-2 only.

BOOK X.
ĀNĀPĀNA-SAṂYUTTAM.

CHAPTER I. EKADHAMMAVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,54(10).1. (1) Ekadhammo.
1. Sāvatthi || ārāme1 || ||
2. Tatra kho || la || etad avoca2 || ||
3. Ekadhammo3 bhikkhave bhāvito bahulīkato maha-
pphalo hoti4 mahāṇisaṃso || katamo ekadhammo5 || Ānāpāna-
sati || || Katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpānasati || katham
bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā6 || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūla-
gato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā7
ujuṃ kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā
so sato va assasati sato va8 passasati || ||
5. Dīghaṃ vā assasanto Dīgham assasāmī ti pajānāti ||
dīghaṃ vā passasanto Dīgham passasāmī ti pajānāti ||
Rassaṃ vā assasanto Rassam assasāmī ti pajānāti || rassaṃ
vā9 passasanto Rassam passāmī ti pajānāti || ||
6. {Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī} Assasissāmīti sikkhati || sabba-
kāyapaṭisaṃvedī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Passambhayaṃ
kāyasaṅkhāram Assāsissāmīti sikkhati || passambhayam
kāyasaṅkhāram Passissāmīti sikkhati || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in S1-3 only.
2 S1-3 tatra -- voca --
3 S1-3 eko dhammo.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 eko.
6 B1 mahapphalo . . . mahānisaṃso; S3 adds hoti.
7 B1 ābhū- always, S1 ābhuñjitvā.
8 S1 omits va S3 sato va.
9 missing in S1.

[page 312]
312 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
7. Pītipaṭisaṃvedī Assasissāmīti sikkhati || pītipaṭisaṃvedī
Passasissamīti sikkhati || || Sukhapaṭisaṃvedī Assasissāmīti
sikkhati || sukhapatisaṃvedī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || ||
8. {Cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī} Assasissāmīti sikkhati || cit-
tasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Passam-
bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ Assāsissāmīti sikkhati || passam-
bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāram Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Citta-
paṭisaṃvedī Assasissāmīti sikkhati || {cittapaṭisaṃvedī}
Passasissamīti sikkhati1 || ||
9. Abhippamodayaṃ2 cittam Assasissāmīti sikkhati ||
abhippamodayaṃ cittam Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Samā-
dahaṃ cittaṃ Assasissāmīti sikkhati || samādahaṃ cittaṃ
Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Vimocayaṃ cittam Assasissāmīti
sikkhati || vimocayaṃ cittam Passasissāmīti sikkhati || ||
10. Aniccānupassī Assasissāmīti sikkhati || aniccānupassī
Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Virāgānupassī Assasissāmīti
sikkhati || virāgānupassī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || || Nirodhā-
nupassī Assasissāmīti sikkhati || nirodhānupassī Passasissā-
mīti sikkhati || || Paṭinissaggānupassī Assasissāmītī || paṭi-
nissaggānupassī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || ||
11. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānasati evam
bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti || ||

SN_5,54(10).2. (2) Bojjhaṅgo.
1.2. 3 Sāvatthi || ārāme || tatra || voca || ||
3. Ānāpānasati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā
hoti mahānisaṃsā || katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpāna-
sati katham bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu ānāpānasatisahagataṃ
satisambojjhaṅgam4 bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ
vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ānāpānasatisahagatam5 dhamma-
vicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ || viriya || pīti || passaddhi || samādhi ||

1 S1 repeats here the first number of this number
cittasaṅkhāra.
2 S1 -modeyaṃ.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 S1-3 upekhāsamboj-
5 S1-3 have -pe- instead of this word till samādhi.

[page 313]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 313
ānāpānasatisahagatam upekkhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggaparināmiṃ || ||
5. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānasati1 evam
bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā ti2 || ||

SN_5,54(10).3. (3) Suddhakam.
1--2. 3 Sāvatthi || ārāme || tatra || voca || ||
3. Ānāpānasati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā
hoti mahānisaṃsā || katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpāna-
sati katham bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūla-
gato vā4 suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā
ujuṃ kāyam paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satim upaṭṭhapetvā
so sato va assasati sato va5 passasati6 || ||
5--10. Vitthāretabbā || yāva paṭinissaggānupassī Assa-
sissamī ti sikkhati || paṭinissaggānupassī Passasissāmīti
sikkhati || ||
11. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānasati evam ba-
hulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).4. (4) Phalā1.
3. Ānāpānasati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā
hoti mahānisaṃsā || kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpāna-
sati katham bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā || ||
4--10. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkha-
mūlagato7 vā nisīdati- osato passati || vitthāro || yāva8
paṭinissaggānupassī Assasissāmīti sikkhati || paṭinissaggā-
nupassī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || ||
11. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānasati evam
bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 inserts kathaṃ.
2 S1-3 omit ti.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 S1-3 omit the sequel till yāva but S3 adds suññāgāragato vā
between the lines.
5 missing in B1.
6 B2 passasatīti.
7 B1 -mūle gato.
8 S1-3 have -pe- instead of nisīdati- -yāva.

[page 314]
314 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
12. Evam bhāvitāya kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatiyā evam
bahulīkatāya dvinnam phalānam aññataram phalam pāṭi-
kaṅkhaṃ || diṭṭheva dhamme1 aññā sati vā upādisese2 anāgā-
mitā ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).5. (5) Phalā2.
3. Ānāpānasati bhikkhave bhā- bahu- mahapphalā hoti
mahānisaṃsā || katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave katham bahu-
mahapphalā hoti mahanisaṃsā || ||
4--10. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkha-
mūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati- vitthāro || yāva-
-sikkhati3 paṭinissaggānupassī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || ||
11. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānasati evamba-
hulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā || ||
12. Evam bhāvitāya kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatiyā evam
bahulīkatāya satta phalā sattānisaṃsā paṭikaṅkhā || katame
satta phalā sattānisaṃsā || ||
13. Diṭṭheva dhamme patihacca4 aññam ārādheti || || No
ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭihacca4 aññam ārādheti || atha
maraṇakāle aññam ārādheti || || No ce maraṇakāle aññam
ārādheti || atha pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam
parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti || upahaccaparinibbāyī
hoti || asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti || sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
hoti || uddhaṃsoto hoti akaniṭṭhāgāmī || ||
14. Evam bhāvitāya kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatiyā evam
bahulīkatāya ime satta phalā sattānisaṃsā paṭikaṅkhā ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).6. (6) Ariṭṭho.
1--2. Sāvatthi5 || || Tatra kho Bhagavā || la || etad avoca6 || ||
Bhāvetha no tumhe bhikkhave ānāpānasatin ti || ||
3. Evaṃ vutte āyasmā Ariṭṭho Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
Ahaṃ kho bhante bhāvemi ānāpānasatin ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 dhammo.
2 B1 udādi-
3 instead of nisīdati- sikkhati S1-3 have -pe-.
4 B1-2 paṭihacca.
5 B2 sāvatthiyaṃ.
6 S1-3 have only sāvatthi--voca--

[page 315]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 315
Yathā katham pana tvam1 Ariṭṭha bhāvesi ānāpāna-
satinti || ||
4. Atītesu me bhante kāmesu kāmacchando pahīno ||
anāgatesu me kāmesu kāmacchando vigato || ajjhattam2
bahiddhā ca me dhammesu3 paṭighasaññā4 suppaṭivinītā ||
so sato5 assasissāmi sato passasissāmi6 || Evam khvāham
bhante bhāvemi ānāpānasatin ti || ||
5. Atthesā Ariṭṭha ānāpānasati nesā natthī ti vadāmi ||
api ca Ariṭṭha yathā ānāpānasati vitthārena paripuṇṇā
hoti || taṃ suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi || bhāsissāmi || ||
Evam bhante ti kho āyasmā- opaccassosi || ||
6. Bhagavā etad avoca7 || Kathañca Ariṭṭha ānāpānasati
vitthārena paripuṇṇā hoti || ||
7--13. Idha Ariṭṭha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamū-
lagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkamo oDīgham
assassāmīti pajānāti || la || yāva8 paṭinissaggānupassī Assa-
sissamī ti sikkhati || paṭinissaggānupassī Passasissāmīti
sikkhati || ||
14. Evaṃ kho Ariṭṭha ānāpānasati vitthārena paripuṇṇā
hotī ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).7. (7) Kappino.
1--2. Sāvatthi9 || voca10 || ||
3. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā Mahākappino avi-
dūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkam ābhujitvā uruṃ kāyam paṇi-
dhāya parimukhaṃ satim upaṭṭhapetvā || ||
4. Addasā kho Bhagavā āyasmantam Mahākappinam
avidūre nisinnam pallaṅkam abhujitvā ujuṃ kāyam paṇi-
dhāya parimukhaṃ satim upaṭṭhapetvā || disvāna bhikkhū
amantesi || || Passatha no tumhe4 bhikkhave etassa bhik-
khuno kāyassa iñjitattaṃ vā phanditattaṃ vā ti || ||
5. Yadā pi mayam bhante tam āyasmantam passāma
saṅghamajjhe vā nisinnam ekaṃ vā raho nisinnaṃ || tadā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 katha tvaṃ S3 kathañca, instead of yathā-.
2 S1-3 ajjhatta.
3 S3 dhamme.
4 missing in S3.
5 B1-2 add va.
6 S1-3 assasāmi passasāmi.
7 S1-3 omit tamsuṇāhi- -etad avoca.
8 S1-3 have only -pe- instead of nisīdati- -yāva.
9 B2 add yaṃ.
10 in S1-3 only.

[page 316]
316 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
pi mayaṃ tassa āyasmato na passāma kāyassa iñjitattaṃ
vā phanditattam vā ti || ||
6. Yassa bhikkhave samādhissa bhavitattā bahulīkatattā
neva kāyassa iñjitattaṃ va hoti phanditattaṃ vā || na cit-
tassa iñjitattam vā hoti phanditattaṃ vā || tassa1 so bhik-
khave bhikkhu samādhissa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī aka-
siralābhī || ||
7. Katamassa ca bhikkhave samādhissa bhavitattā
bahulīkatattā neva kāyassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti phanditattaṃ
vā || na cittassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti phanditattaṃ vā || Ānā-
pānasatisamādhissa bhikkhave bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā
neva kāyassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti2 phanditattaṃ vā na
cittassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti phanditattaṃ vā || ||
8. Katham bhāvite ca bhikkhave ānāpanasatisamādimhi
katham bahulīkate neva kāyassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti phan-
ditattam vā || na3 cittassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti phanditattaṃ
vā4 || ||
9--15. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkha-
mūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati- || vitthāretabbā || yāva-
-sikkhati5 || paṭisissaggānupassī Passasissāmīti sikkhati || ||
16. Evam bhāvite ca kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamā-
dimhi evam bahulīkate neva kāyassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti
phanditattaṃ va || na cittassa iñjitattaṃ vā hoti phandi-
tattam vā ti6 || ||

SN_5,54(10).8. (8) Dīpo.
1--2. 7 Sāvatthi -- voca || ||
3. Ānāpānasatisamādhi8 bhikkhave bhavito9 bahulīkato9
mahapphalo9 hoti māhānisaṃso9 || || Katham bhāvito ca
bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi katham bahulīkato maha-
pphalo10 hoti mahānisaṃso || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Tassa--- till ānāpānasati- in the following number is missing
in S1-3.
2 missing in S3.
3 S1 omits na.
4 S3 repeats hoti phanditattaṃ vā.
5 S1-3 nisīdati -pe-.
6 S1-3 omit ti.
7 in S1-3 only.
8 B1 ānāpānaṃ sati-
9 S1-3 -tā -lā -sā.
10 S1 -phalā.

[page 317]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 317
4--10. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkha-
mūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkam- -Dīgham
assassāmīti pajānāti || {vitthāretabbaṃ}1 || -patinissaggānu-
passī2 Passissāmīti sikkhati || ||
11. Evam bhāvito kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi
evam bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso || ||
12. Aham pi sudam bhikkhave pubbeva sambodhā ana-
bhisambuddho bodhisatto va samāno iminā vihārena ba-
hulaṃ3 viharāmi || tassa mayham bhikkhave iminā vihārena
bahulaṃ3 viharato neva kāyo kilamati4 na cakkhunī ||
anupādāya ca5 me āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati || ||
13. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi6 ākaṅkheyya ||
Neva7 kāyo kilameyya na ca cakkhunī || anupādāya ca8
me āsavehi cittaṃ vimucceyyā ti || || Ayam eva ānāpāna-
satisamādhi sādhukam manasi kātabbo9 || ||
14. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce10 pi ākaṅkheyya ||
Ye me gehasitasarasaṅkappā11 te pahīheyyunti12 || ayam
eva13 anāpānasatisamādhi sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbo || ||
15. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce10 pi ākaṅkheyya
Appaṭikkūle paṭikkūlasaññī vihareyyan ti || ayam eva ānā-
pānasatisamādhi sādhukam manasi kātabbo || ||
16. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce10 pi ākaṅkheyya
Paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyyan ti || ayam eva ānāpā-
nasatisamādhi sādhukam manasi kātabbo || ||
17. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce10 pi ākaṅkheyya
Appaṭikkūle ca paṭikkūle ca14 paṭikkūlasaññī vihareyyan ti ||
ayam eva || pe || ||
18. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce10 pi ākaṅkheyya

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 vitthāretabbā.
2 as usual S1-3 have -pe- instead of nisīdati-
3 S1-3 bahuṃ.
4 B2 kilameyya S1-3 kilami.
5 S1-3 anupādānañca.
6 S1-3 omit ce pi.
7 S1-3 insert me.
8 S1-3 ce.
9 S1-3 kattabbo always.
10 missing in S1-3.
11 B1 -sitāta (or -tha) ra- B2 -sitāpara-
12 B2 and perhaps B1 -heyyanti.
13 S1-3 add ca.
14 S1-3 omit patikkūle ca B1 has patikulo ca.

[page 318]
318 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
Paṭikkūle ca appaṭikkūle ca appatikkūlasaññī1 viharey-
yan ti || ayam eva || pe || ||
19. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce2 pi ākaṅkheyya
Appaṭikkūlañca patikkūlañca tad ubhayam abhinivajjetvā
upekhako vihareyyaṃ sato sampajāno ti || ayam eva || pe || ||
20. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce2 pi ākaṅkheyya
Vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ
savicāraṃ vivekajam pītisukham pathamaṃ3 jhānam upa-
sampajja vihareyyanti || ayam eva || [pe] || ||
21. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce4 pi akaṅkheyya
vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattam sampasādanaṃ ce-
taso ekodibhāvam avitakkam avicāraṃ samādhijam pīti-
sukhaṃ dutiyaṃ5 jhānam upasampajja vihareyyanti || ayam
eva || pe || ||
22. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce4 pi akaṅkheyya
Pītiyā ca virāgā upekhako ca vihareyyaṃ6 sato7 sampajāno
sukhaṃ ca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeyyaṃ8 yan tam ariyā ācik-
khanti upekhako satimā sukhavihārī ti tatiyaṃ9 jhānam
upasampajja vihareyyan ti || || Ayam eva || [pe] || ||
23. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi ākaṅkheyya ||
Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva do-
manassānam atthagamā adukkham asukham upekhāsati-
parisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ10 jhānam upasampajja viharati ||
ayam eva || pe || ||
24. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi ākaṅkheyya
sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānam
atthagamā nānattasaññānam amanasikārā Ananto ākāso
ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyan ti || ayam
eva || pe || ||
25. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi ākaṅkheyya ||
Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma11 Anantaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 omits ca appaṭikkūlasaññī S3 has patikkūle ca paṭikkūle
vihareyyanti -pe- omitting the numbers 19 and 20.
2 missing in S1.
3 S1-3 pathamaj-
4 missing in S1-3 always.
5 S1-3 dutiyaj-
6 S1-3 vihareyyanti.
7 B1-2 add ca.
8 S1 -vedeyya.
9 S1-3 tatiyaj-
10 S1-3 catutthaj-
11 B1 -kkama always.

[page 319]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 319
viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyan ti ||
ayam eva || pe || ||
26. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi ākaṅkheyya ||
Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma Natthi kiñci
ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyan ti || Ayam eva ||
pe || ||
27. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi ākaṅkheyya.
Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma Nevasaññānā-
saññāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyan ti || ayam eva ānā-
pānasamadhi sādhukam manasi kātabbo || ||
28. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave bhikkhu ce pi ākaṅkheyya ||
Sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatānaṃ samatikkamma sañña-
vedayitanirodham upasampajja vihareyyan ti || || Ayam eva
ānāpānasatisamādhi sādhukam1 manasi kātabbo || ||
29. Evam bhāvite kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādimhi
evam bahulīkate sukhañ ce vedanaṃ2 vediyati3 Sā aniccā ti
pajānāti4 || Anajjhositā ti pajānāti || Anabhinanditā ti pa-
jānāti || dukkhañ ce vedanaṃ vediyati || Sā aniccā ti pajānāti ||
Anajjhositā ti pajānāti || Anabhinanditā ti pajānāti || aduk-
khaṃ asukhañ ce vedanam vediyati3 Sā aniccā ti pajānāti ||
Anajjhositā ti pajānāti || Anabhinanditā ti pajānāti || ||
30. So sukhañ ce vedanaṃ vediyati visaṃyutto nām
vediyati || dukkhañ ce vedanaṃ vediyati visaṃyutto nam
vediyati || adukkham asukhañ ce vedanaṃ vediyati visaṃyutto
naṃ vediyati || || So kāyapariyantikam vedanaṃ vedaya-
māno5 kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti6 pajānāti
jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno jīvitapariyantikam
vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānāti || || Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ
jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni7 anabhinanditāni8
sītibhavissantī ti9 pajānāti || ||
31. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave telañca paticca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca
telapadīpo jhāyeyya || tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyā-
dānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya || evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 S1 vedaniyaṃ.
3 S1-3 vedeti B1 vedīyati.
4 B1 jānāti.
5 S3 vedi-
6 B1 veda- B2 vedī-
7 S3 sabbe-
8 S1 anibhi- always.
9 B2 pīti- always.

320 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
kāyapariyantikam vedanaṃ vediyamāno1 Kāyapariyantikaṃ
vedanaṃ vedayāmī ti pajānāti || jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ
vediyamāno Jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajā-
nāti || || Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva
sabbavedayitāni1 anabhinanditāni1 sītibhavissantī ti1 pajā-
nātī ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).9. (9) Vesālī.
1. Evam me sutaṃ2 ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Vesāliyaṃ
viharati Mahāvane Kuṭāgārasālāyaṃ || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Bhagavā bhikkhūnam
anekapariyāyena asubhakathaṃ katheti3 || asubhāya vaṇṇam
bhāsati asubhabhāvanāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati4 || ||
3. Atha kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || || Icchāmaham
bhikkhave addhamāsaṃ patisalliyituṃ5 || namhi kenaci
upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena ti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū Bhagavato paṭissutvā
nāssudha6 koci Bhagavantam upasaṅkamati7 aññatra ekena
piṇḍapātanīhārakena || ||
4. Atha kho te bhikkhū Bhagavā8 anekapariyāyena
asubhakatham kathesi9 asubhāya vaṇṇam bhāsati || asubha-
bhāvanāya vaṇṇam bhāsatī ti || anekākāravokāram asubha-
bhāvanānuyogam anuyuttā viharanti || || Te iminā kāyena
aṭṭiyāmānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā satthahārakam pari-
yesanti || {dasa} pi bhikkhū ekāhena sattham āharanti ||
vīsam10 pi || la11 || tiṃsam pi ekāhena sattham āharanti || ||
5. Atha kho Bhagavā tassa uḍḍhamāsassa accayena
paṭisallaṇā vuṭṭhito āyasmantam Ānandam āmantesi || ||
Kiṃ12 nu kho13 Ānanda tanubhūto viya bhikkhusaṅgho ti || ||
6. Tathā hi pana bhante Bhagavā bhikkhūnam aneka-
pariyāyena asubhakatham kathesi3 asubhāya vaṇṇam
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 veda- always.
2 this phrase in B1-2 only.
3 S1-3 kathesi.
4 B1 katheti.
5 S1 B2 -sallituṃ.
6 S1-3 nāssu.
7 S1-3 upasaṅkamīti.
8 B1 inserts bhikkhūnaṃ.
9 B1 katheti.
10 S1-3 vīsatim B2 vīsati.
11 B2 S1-3 bhikkhū S1-3 add ekāhena sa- āha-
12 S1 na-
13 S1 inserts tvaṃ.

[page 321]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 321
bhāsati asubhabhāvanāya vaṇṇam bhāsati1 || [te ca bhante
bhikkhū Bhagavā kho anekapariyāyena asubhakathaṃ
kathesi || asubhāya vaṇṇambhāsati asubhabhāvanāya vaṇṇam
bhāsatī ti] anekākāravokāram asubhabhāvanānuyogam
anuyuttā viharanti || || Te2 iminā kāyena aṭṭiyamānā harā-
yamānā satthahārakam pariyesanti dasa3 pi bhikkhū vīsam-
pi-4 tiṃsam pi bhikkhū ekāhena sattham āharanti || || Sādhu
bhante Bhagavā aññam pariyāyam ācikkhatu tathā yathā-
yam bhikkhusaṅgho aññāya saṇṭhaheyyā ti5 || ||
7. Tenhānanda yāvatikā bhikkhū Vesālim6 upanissāya
viharanti || te sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannipātehī ti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavato paṭis-
sutvā yāvatikā bhikkhū Vesālim6 upanissāya viharanti ||
te sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyam sannipātetvā yena Bhagavā
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bagavantam etad avoca ||
Sannipatito bhante7 bhikkhusaṅgho yassa dāni8 Bhagavā
kālam maññatī ti || ||
8. Atha kho Bhagavā yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami ||
upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi || nisajja kho Bhagavā
bhikkhū āmantesi || ||
9. Ayam pi kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi bhāvito
bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako9 sukho ca
vihāro uppannuppanne10 ca pāpake11 akusale dhamme12
ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti13 vūpasameti14 || ||
10. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave gimhānam pacchime māse
ūhataṃ rajojallaṃ tam enam mahā akālamegho ṭhānaso
antaradhāpeti vūpasamati || Evam eva kho bhikkhave
ānāpānasati samādhi bhāvito bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto

1 B1-2 bhāsatī ti; the part between [ ] is not to be found
in B1-2; the sequel till bhikkhu sangho is missing in S1.
2 missing in S3.
3 B1 dasam.
4 S3 vīsatim pi B2 visati pi and S3 adds ekāhena sa- āha-
5 We give this number as it is in S3; the other MSS omit some
parts pointed out before.
6 S1-3 Vesāliyam.
7 missing in S1-3.
8 B1 yassādāni.
9 S1-3 asevanako ca.
10 S1 uppanno.
11 S1 pāpako; missing in S3.
12 S1 akusalodhammo.
13 S1 -dhāpesi.
14 S1-3 -sametī ti.

ca asecanako1 ca sukho ca2 viharo uppannuppanne pāpake
akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti3 vūpasameti || ||
11. Katham bhāvito ca2 bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi
katham bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako4 ca5
sukho6 ca vihāro uppannuppanne ca pāpake akusale
dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti3 vūpasameti || ||

mūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā || pe || vitthāretabbaṃ7 || paṭi-
nissaggānupassī passasissāmī ti sikkhati || ||

evam bahulīkato8 santo ceva9 paṇīto10 ca asecanako11 sukho
ca12 vihāro uppannuppanne ca pāpake13 akusale dhamme
ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti3 vūpasametī ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).10. (10) Kimbila.
1. Evam me sutam14 ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Kimbi-
lāyam15 viharati Veḷuvane || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā āyasmantaṃ Kimbilam16 āman-
tesi || Katham bhāvito nu2 kho Kimbila ānāpānasatisamādhi
katham bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso ti || ||
Evaṃ vutte āyasmā Kimbilo tuṇhī ahosi || ||
3. Dutiyam pi kho Bhagavā17 || ||
4. Tatiyam pi kho Bhagavā āyasmantam Kimbilam
āmantesi || Katham bhāvito nu2 kho Kimbila ānāpānasati-
samādhi katham bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃ-
so ti || ||
Tatiyam pi kho āyasmā Kimbilo tuṇhī ahosi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 aseva-
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S1 -dhapesī ti.
4 S3 aseva- S1 āseva-
5 missing in B1-2.
6 S1-3 add katham S3 pubbe omitting ca.
7 this in B1-2 which abridge a little less.
8 S1 inserts ceva.
9 S1 ca.
10 S1 paṇītataro.
11 S1-3 asevanakā (S3 -ko).
12 S1 sukha omitting ca.
13 S1-3 omit ca pāpaka.
14 this phrase in B1-2 only.
15 B1-2 kimilāyam.
16 B1-2 kimilaṃ -lo always.
17 more complete in S1-3.

[page 323]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 323
5. Evaṃ vutte āyasmā Ānando Bhagavantam etad
avoca || || Etassa Bhagavā kālo || etassa Sugata kālo yam
Bhagavā ānāpānasatisamādhim1 bhāveyya || Bhagavato sutvā
bhikkhū dhāressantī ti || ||
Tenahānanda suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissā-
mī ti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavato pac-
cassosi || ||
6. Bhagavā etad avoca || || Katham bhāvito ca Ānanda
ānāpānasatisamādhi katham bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti
mahānisaṃso || ||
7--13. Idhānanda bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato
vā2 suññāgāragato vā --pe-- paṭinissaggānupassī passa-
sissāmī ti sikkhati3 || ||
14. Evam bhāvito kho Ānanda ānāpānasatisamādhi evam
bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso || ||
15. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu dīghaṃ vā assa-
santo Dīgham assasāmīti pajānāti || dīghaṃ vā passasanto
Dīgham passasāmīti pajānā ti || rassaṃ vā assasanto Rassam
assasāmīti pajānāti || rassam vā passasanto Rassam passa-
sāmīti pajānā ti || sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī Assasissāmī ti
sikkhati || sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī Passasissāmī ti sikkhati ||
passam bhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāram Assasissāmī ti sikkhati ||
passam4 bhayam kāyasaṅkhāram Passasissāmī ti sikkhati ||
kāye kāyanupassī Ānanda bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam ||
taṃ kissa hetu || ||
16. Kāyaññatarāham Ānanda etaṃ vadami yadidam
assāsapassāsaṃ5 || tasmā ti hānanda kāye kāyānupassī
bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati || ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
17. Tasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu {pītipaṭisaṃvedī}
Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || pītipaṭisaṃvedī Passasissāmī ti
sikkhati || sukhapaṭisaṃvedī Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || {sukha-
paṭisaṃvedī} Passasissāmī ti sikkhati || cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃ-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ānāpānasatiṃ (S1 -ti).
2 missing in S1.
3 S. 8, 4-10.
4 B1 yassaṃ.
5 S1 assāpasassaṃ.

[page 324]
324 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
vedī Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī Passa-
sissāmī ti sikkhati || passam bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāram Assa-
sissāmī ti sikkhati || passam bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāram1 Passa-
sissāmī ti sikkhati || Vedānāsu vedanānupassī Ānanda
bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpi sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || taṃ kissa hetu || ||
18. Vedanāññatarāham Ānanda etam vadāmi yad idaṃ
assāsapassāsaṃ2 sādhukam manasikāraṃ || tasmā ti hānanda
vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
19. Yasmiṃ3 samaye Ānanda bhikkhu cittapaṭisaṃvedī
Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || cittapaṭisaṃvedī Passasissāmī ti
sikkhati || abhippamodoyaṃ cittam || la4 || samādaham cittam4 ||
vimocayaṃ cittam Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || vimocayaṃ
cittam Passasissāmī ti sikkhati || || Citte cittānupassī Ānan-
da bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassam || taṃ kissa hetu || ||
20. Nāham Ānanda muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānā-
pānasatisamādhibhāvanaṃ vadāmi || tasmā ti hānanda
citte cittānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
21. {Yasmiṃ}3 samaye Ānanda bhikkhu aniccānupassī5
Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || la || virāgānupassī4 || nirodhānupassī4 ||
paṭinissaggānupassī Assasissāmiti sikkhati || paṭinissaggānu-
passī Passasissāmī ti sikkhati6 || dhammesu7 dhammānu-
passī Ānanda bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī
sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || so
yaṃ taṃ hoti abhijjhādomanassānam pahānam tam pañ-
ñāya divā sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || tasmā ti hānanda
dhammesu dhammānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viha-
rati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādoma-
nassaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 cittaṃsaṇ- S1 kāyasaṇ-
2 S1-3 -passāsanaṃ.
3 S1-3 tasmiṃ.
4 complete in S1-3.
5 B2 omits bhikkhu. -- We have here another gap in B2 by the want
of the sheets taṃ-tah.
6 missing in S1.
7 S1 dhamme.

[page 325]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 325
22. Seyyathāpi Ānanda catumahāpathe mahāpaṃsupuñjo1
puratthimāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya sakaṭam vā ratho
vā upahanateva2 tam paṃsupuñjaṃ || pacchimāya ce pi
disāya āgaccheyya || pe [pa] uttarāya ce pi3 disāya || dak-
khiṇāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya sakaṭaṃ vā ratho vā
upahanateva2 tam paṃsupuñjaṃ || evam eva kho Ānanda
bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharanto pi upahanateva2 pā-
pake akusale dhamme || vedanāsu || la [pe] || citte || dham-
mesu dhammānupassī viharanto pi upahanateva2 pāpake
akusale dhamme4 ti || ||
Ānāpānasaṃyuttassa5 ekadhammavaggo pathamo || ||
Tassa uddānaṃ6 ||
Ekadhammo ca Bojjhaṅgo ||
Suddhakañ ca duve7 Phalā8 ||
Ariṭṭho9 Kappino Dīpo ||
Vesālī10 Kimbilena cā ti11 || ||

CHAPTER II. VAGGO DUTIYO.

SN_5,54(10).11. (1) Icchānaṅgalam.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Icchānaṅgale12 viharati
Icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe13 || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || Icchāmaham
bhikkhave temāsam paṭisalliyituṃ14 || namhi kenaci upa-
saṅkamitabbo || aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanihārakenā ti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū Bhagavato paṭissutvā
nāssudha koci Bhagavantam upasaṅkamati aññatra ekena
piṇḍapātanihārakena || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -puñjam.
2 S1-3 upahanotheva.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 S1-3 dhammesū.
5 missing in B1.
6 S1-3 tatruddānaṃ.
7 S1-3 dve corrected to ve in S3.
8 S1-3 phalaṃ.
9 S3 ariṭṭhano S1 -ino.
10 S1-3 asuddhā.
11 B1 kimilena- S1-3 kimbiloyatā (S3 sanā) ti.
12 S1-3 icchānaṃkale (S3 -kāle).
13 S1 icchānaṃvanasaṇḍe S3 icchānaṃkalavana-
14 S1 -sallituṃ S3 -sallīyituṃ.

[page 326]
326 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
3. Atha kho Bhagavā tassa temāsassa accayena paṭi-
sallānā vuṭṭhito bhikkhū āmantesi || || Sa ce vo bhikkhave
aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evam puccheyyuṃ || Katamena āvu-
so1 vihārena Samaṇo Gotamo vassāvāsam bahulaṃ vihāsī ti ||
evam puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesam aññatitthiyānam
paribbājakānam evam vyākareyyātha || Ānāpānasatisamā-
dhinā kho āvuso Bhagavā vassāvāsam bahulaṃ vihāsī ti || ||
4. Idhāham bhikkhave sato assasāmi2 sato passassāmi || ||
5--10. Dīgham vā3 assasanto Dīgham assasāmī ti pajā-
nāmi4 || dīghaṃ vā passasanto Dīgham passasāmī ti pajā-
nāmi || pe5 || paṭinissaggānupassī Assasissāmī ti pajānāmi ||
paṭinissaggānupassī Passasissāmī ti pajānāmī6 || ||
11. Yañ hi tam bhikkhave sammāvadamāno vadeyya
ariyavihāro iti pi brahmavihāro iti pi tathagātavihāro
iti pi7 || ānāpānasatisamādhiṃ8 sammāvadamāno vadeyya
ariyavihāro iti pi brahmavihāro iti pi tathāgatavihāro iti pi || ||
12. Ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū sekhā appattamānasā
anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti || tesam
ānāpānasatisamādhi9 bhāvito bahulīkato āsavānaṃ khayāya
saṃvattati || ye ca kho te bhikkhave10 bhikkhū arahanto
khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppatta-
sadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā11 sammadaññā vimut-
tā12 || tesam ānāpānasatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato diṭṭheva13
dhamme sukhavihārāya ceva saṃvattati satisampajaññāya
ca || ||
13. Yañ hi tam bhikkhave sammāvadamāno vadeyya
ariyavihāro iti pi11 brahmavihāro iti pi tathāgatavihāro iti
pi || ānāpānasatisamādhi14 sammāvadamāno vadeyya ariya-
vihāro iti pi brahmavihāro iti pi tathāgatavihāro iti pī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 katamonāvuso.
2 S3 assasāmī ti S1-3 omit sato passasāmi.
3 missing in B1.
4 B1 pajānāti.
5 B1 has rassaṃ- -sabbakāyapaṭisamvedī- -pajānāmi || vitthāro || ||
6 S1-3 stap here omitting the remnant.
7 S1 pīti.
8 S1-3 samādhi.
9 S1 ānāpanasamādhi.
10 missing in S1-3.
11 S1-3 parikkhīnā-
12 S1 vimutto.
13 B1-2 diṭṭha-
14 So all the MSS.

[page 327]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 327

SN_5,54(10).12. (2) Kaṅkheyyam.
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā Lomasavaṅgīso1 Sakkesu
viharati Kapilavatthusmiṃ Nigrodhārāme || ||
2. Atha kho Mahānāmo sakko yenāyasmā Lomasavaṅ-
gīso tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam Loma-
savaṅgīsam abhivādetvā ekam antam nisīdi || ekam antaṃ
nisinno kho Mahānāmo sakko āyasmantam Lomasavaṅgīsam
etad avoca || ||
3. So eva2 nu kho bhante sekho vihāro so3 tathāgata-
vihāro udāhu añño4 sekho vihāro añño tathāgatavihāro ti || ||
Na kho āvuso Mahānāma sveva sekho vihāro so tathā-
gatavihāro || añño kho āvuso Mahānāma sekho vihāro añño
tathāgatavihāro || ||
4. Ye te āvuso Mahānāma bhikkhū sekhā appattamā-
nasā anuttaraṃ5 yogakkhemam patthayamānā viharanti ||
te pañcanīvaraṇe pahāya viharanti || katame pañca || || Kā-
macchandanīvaraṇam pahāya viharanti || || Vyāpādanīvara-
ṇaṃ || la-pe || Thīnamiddhanīvaraṇam || Uddhaccakukkucca-
nīvaraṇaṃ || Vicikicchānīvaraṇam pahāya viharanti || || Ye
pi6 te āvuso Mahānāma bhikkhū sekhā appattamānasā
anuttaraṃ yogakkhemam patthayamānā viharanti || te ime
pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya viharanti || ||
5. Ye ca kho te āvuso Mahānāma bhikkhū arahanto
khīnāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppatta-
sadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā sammadaññā vimuttā
tesam pañcanīvaraṇā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā
anabhāvakatā7 āyatim anuppādadhammā8 || katame pañca || ||
Kāmacchandanīvaraṇam pahīnam ucchinnamūlam tālā-
vatthukatam anabhāvakatā7 āyatim anuppādadhammaṃ ||
Vyāpādanīvaraṇam pahīnaṃ || la-pe || Thīnamiddhanīvara-
ṇaṃ || Uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ || || Vicikicchānīvaraṇam
pahīnam ucchinnamūlam talāvatthukatam anabhāvakatam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 lomasakambhiyo -yam always.
2 S1-3 evaṃ.
3 missing in B1.
4 S1-3 aññeca.
5 S1 anuppannaṃ (or -pattaṃ?).
6 missing in S1-3.
7 B1 anabhāvaṃ- always.
8 S1 anuppada-

[page 328]
328 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
āyatim anuppādadhammaṃ || || Ye te1 āvuso Mahānāma
bhikkhū arahanto khīnāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā2
ohitabharā3 anuppattasadatthā parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojanā
sammadaññā vimuttā || tesam ime pañcanīvaraṇā pahīnā
ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvakatā āyatim anuppā-
dadhammā || ||
6. Tad aminā petam āvuso Mahānāma pariyāyena vedi-
tabbaṃ || yathā añño va sekho vihāro4 añño tathāgatavi-
hāro || ||
7 (1). Ekam idāham5 āvuso Mahānāma samayam Bha-
gavā Icchānaṅgale6 viharati Icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe7 || ||
8 (2). Tatra kho āvuso Mahānāma8 Bhagavā bhikkhū
āmantesi-9 || ||
9 (3). Atha kho Bhagavā- ||
10 (4). Idhāham bhikkhave- ||
11--16 (5--10). Dīghaṃ vā assasanto- ||
17 (11). Yañ hi tam bhikkhave- ||
18 (12). Ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū sekhā- ||
19 (13). Yañ hi tam bhikkhave- -tathāgatavihāro iti pī ti || ||
20. Iminā kho etam āvuso Mahānāma pariyāyena vedi-
tabbaṃ || yathā añño va10 sekho vihāro añño tathāgata-
vihāro ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).13. (3) Ānanda1.
1--2. Savatthi11 || || Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena
Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami || pe || ekam antaṃ nisinno kho
āyasmā Ānando Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 tam.
2 S1 -yo.
3 S1 -ro.
4 the words añño va- are repeated in S1.
5 B1 idaṃ.
6 S1-3 icchānaṃkale (S1 -kāle).
7 S1 icchānaṃvana- S3 icchānaṃkalavana-
8 missing in S1-3.
9 as we have here a mere repetition of the preceding sutta 11,
I give only the beginning of the similar numbers. subjoining
the numbers of that sutta. -- In this number 8 after bhante
ti kho all the MSS. have āvuso and B1-2 māhānāma instead of
te bhikkhū.
10 S1-3 ca.
11 in B1 only.

[page 329]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 329
3. Atthi nu kho bhante eko dhammo1 bhāvito bahulīkato
cattāro dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhāvitā ba-
hulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā dve dhamme paripūrentī ti || ||
Atthi2 kho Ānanda eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato
cattāro dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā bhā-
vitā bahulīkatā dve dhamme paripūrentī ti || ||
4. Katamo pana3 bhante ekodhammo bhāvito bahulīkato
cattāro dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti || sattā dhammā
bhāvitā bahulīkatā dve dhamme paripūrentī ti || ||
Ānāpānasatisamādhi kho Ānanda eko dhammo bhāvito
bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || cattāro sati-
paṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti ||
satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripū-
renti || ||
I.
5. Katham bhāvito ānāpānasatisamādhi katham bahulī-
kato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || ||
6--12. Idhānanda bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamula-
gato vā suññāgāragato vā || pe || vitthāro4 || patinisaggānupassī
Passasissāmī ti sikkhati5 || ||
13. Yasmiṃ6 samaye Ānanda bhikkhu dīghaṃ vā assa-
santo Dīgham assasāmī ti pajānāti || dīghaṃ vā passasanto
Dīgham passasāmī ti7 pajānāti || pe8-la-|| passambhayam
kāyasaṅkhāram assāsissāmī ti sikkhati || passambhayam
kāyasaṅkhāram passasissāmī ti sikkhati || kāye kāyānupassī
Ānanda bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
14. Kāyaññatarāham Ānanda etam vadāmi yad idam

1 B1-2 ekadhammo always.
2 S1-3 insert nu.
3 missing in B1.
4 this word in B1 less abbreviating.
5 S. sutta 8, 4-10.
6 B1 tasmin.
7 S1-3 assasissāmī ti . . . passasissāmī ti.
8 B1 has here rassaṃ vā || la || S1-3 -pe- sabbakāyapaṭisamvedī --
by abbreviation.

330 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
assāsapassāsaṃ || tasmā ti ha Ānanda1 kāye kāyānupassī
bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyyaloke abhijjhadomanassaṃ || ||
15. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu pītipaṭisaṃvedī
Assasissāmī ti sikkhati2 || sukhapaṭisaṃvedī || cittasaṅkhāra-
{paṭisaṃvedī} || passam bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāram Assasissāmī ti
sikkhati || passam bhayam cittasaṅkhāram Passasissāmī ti
sikkhati || Vedanāsu vedanānupassī Ānanda bhikkhu tasmiṃ
samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyyaloke abhij-
jhādomanassaṃ || taṃ kissa hetu || ||
16. Vedanāññatarāham Ānanda etaṃ3 vadāmi yad idam
assāsapassāsānam4 sādhukam manasikāraṃ || tasmā ti ha
Ānanda1 vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye
viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādo-
manassaṃ || ||
17. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu {cittapaṭisaṃvedī}
Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || pe || abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ ||
samodahaṃ cittaṃ Assasissāmī ti sikkhati5 || vimocayaṃ
cittam Assasissāmi ti sikkhati5 || vimocayaṃ cittam Passa-
sissāmī ti sikkhati || citte cittānupassī Ānanda bhikkhu
tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhadomanassam || taṃ kissa hetu || ||
18. Nāham Ānanda muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānā-
pānasatisamādhibhāvanaṃ vadāmi || tasmā ti hānanda citte
cittānupassī bhikkhu6 tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sam-
pajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādemanassaṃ || ||
19. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu aniccānupassī7 ||
la-pe || virāgānupassī || nirodhānupassī || paṭinissaggānupassī
assasissāmī ti sikkhati || paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmī ti
sikkhati || dhammesu dhammānupassī Ānanda bhikkhu
tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || || So yan taṃ hoti abhijjhādo-
manassānam pahānaṃ tam paññāya disvā8 sādhukam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -tihānanda.
2 S1-3 omit these two words.
3 S1-3 evam.
4 B1 passāsaṃ.
5 this phrase in B1 only.
6 S1 bhi-
7 S1-3 adds assasissāmīti sik-
8 S1-3 repeat disvā S1 has disva the first time.

[page 331]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 331
ajjhupekkhitā hoti || tasmā ti hānanda dhammesu dhammā-
nupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno
satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
20. Evam bhāvito kho Ānanda ānāpānasatisamādhi evam
bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne1 paripūreti || ||
II.
21. Katham bhāvitā ca Ānanda2 cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
katham bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti || ||
22. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī
viharati upaṭṭhitasati3 tasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno4
sati hoti asammuṭṭhā || yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno5
upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā6 satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ sa-
maye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || satisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ
samaye Ānanda7 bhikkhu bhāveti || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ
samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || so8 tathā-
sato viharanto taṃ dhammam paññāya pavicinati9 pavi-
carati10 parivīmaṃsam āpajjati || ||
23. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu tathā sato viha-
ranto tam dhammam paññāya pavicinati parivīmaṃsam
āpajjati11 || dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || || Dhammavicayasam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno12 bhāvanāpāripūrim
gacchati || tassa taṃ dhammam paññāya pavicinato pavi-
carato13 parivīmaṃsam āpajjato āraddhaṃ hoti viriyam
asallīnaṃ || ||
24. Yasmim samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno taṃ dhammam
paññāya pavicinato14 pavicarato15 parivīmaṃsam āpajjato

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -paṭṭhānā.
2 S1-3 cānanda instead of ca ā-
3 S1-3 upaṭṭhita (S3 -tā) tassa.
4 S1-3 omit ānanda-
5 S1 bhikkhū.
6 S1-3 add sati.
7 S1-3 omit tasmiṃ samaye S3 ānanda.
8 S1 se.
9 S1 pavicinanto; missing in S3.
10 S1-3 pavicaranto.
11 this phrase missing in S1-3.
12 S1-3 put bhikkhuno before tasmiṃ samaye.
13 S1 pavicaranato always S3 pavirato.
14 S3 pavicanato.
15 S1 pavicaranato.

[page 332]
332 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
āraddhaṃ hoti viriyam asallīnaṃ || viriyasambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || viriyasambojjhaṅ-
gaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || viriyasambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati ||
āraddhaviriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā || ||
25. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno āraddhaviriyassa
uppajjati pīti nirāmisā || pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
Ānanda bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmim
samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || pītima-
nassa kāyo pi1 passambhati cittam pi passambhati || ||
26. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno pītimanassa
kāyo pi passambhati || cittam pi passambhati || passaddhi-
sambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno2 āraddho hoti ||
passaddhisambojjhaṅgam tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti ||
passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā
pāripūriṃ gacchati || passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṃ
samādhiyati || ||
27. Yasmiṃ3 samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno passaddha-
kāyassa sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati || samādisambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhune āraddho hoti || samādhisamboj-
jhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || samādhisam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ
gacchati || || So tathā samāhitaṃ cittam sādhukam ajjhu-
pekkhitā hoti || ||
28. Yasmiṃ4 samaye Ānanda bhikkhu5 tathā samāhitaṃ
cittaṃ sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgam tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu6 bhāveti7 || upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūrim
gacchati || ||
29. Yasmiṃ4 samaye Ānanda bhikkhu vedanāsu citte ||
dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati upaṭṭhitasati8 tasmiṃ
samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno9 sati hoti asammuṭṭhā || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 put before tasmiṃ in S1-3.
3 B1 tasmiṃ.
4 S1-3 tasmiṃ.
5 S1-3 bhikkhuno.
6 B1 inserts ānanda.
7 S1 bhāve.
8 S1-3 upaṭṭhitā-
9 S1 omits ānanda bhikkhuno S3 the whole phrase.

[page 333]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 333
30. Yasmim1 samaye Ānanda bhikkhuno upatthitā2 sati
hoti asammuṭṭhā || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhik-
khuno āraddho hoti || satisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye
bhikkhu bhāveti || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhik-
khuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || || Yathā pathamaṃ
satipaṭṭhānam evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ3 || || So tathā samā-
hitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || ||
31. Yasmiṃ samaye Ānanda bhikkhu tathā samāhitaṃ4
cittaṃ sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti5 || upekhasambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || upekhāsam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno6 bhāvanā pāripūriṃ
gacchati || ||
32. Evam bhāvitā kho Ānanda cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
evam bahulīkatā sattabojjhaṅge paripūrenti || ||
III.
33. Katham bhāvitā ca7 sattabhojjhaṅgā8 katham9 ba-
hulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrenti || ||
34. Idhānanda bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti vive-
kanissitam || pe || upekhāsambojjhaṅgam bhāveti vivekanissi-
taṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitam vossaggapariṇāmiṃ || ||
35. Evam bhāvitā kho Ānanda sattabojjhaṅgā evam
bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrentī ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).14. (4) Ānanda2.
2. Atha kho ā- Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami ||
pe || ekam antaṃ ni- Ānandam Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3. Atthi nu kho Ānanda eko10 dhammo bhāvito bahulī-
kato cattāro dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā
bhāvitā bahulīkatā dve dhamme paripūrentī ti || ||
Bhagavammūlakā no bhante11 dhammā || la [pe] || ||
Atthānanda eko11 dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato cattāro

1 S1-3 tasmiṃ.
2 S1-3 upaṭṭhita.
3 S1-3 have only -pe-.
4 S1-3 samāhita.
5 missing in S3.
6 S1 bhikkhū.
7 B1-2 ānanda.
8 S1 sattambho-
9 S1 evam.
10 B1 S1 eka.
11 missing in S1-3.

334 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
satta dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā dve dhamme paripūrenti || ||
I.
4. Katamo cānanda eko1 dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato
cattāro dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhāvitā
bahulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā
bhāvitā bahulīkatā dve dhammā paripūrenti || ||
Ānāpānasatisamādhi Ānanda2 eko1 dhammo bhāvito
bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || cattāro sati-
paṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti ||
satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripū-
rentī ti || ||
II--III.
5. Katham bhāvito cānanda ānāpānasatisamādhi katham
bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || ||
6--34. Idhānanda bhikkhu araññagato vā || la-pe || ||
35. Evam bhāvitā3 kho Ānanda satta bojjhaṅgā evam
bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrentī ti4 || ||
36. 5Yathā purimasuttanto evam vitthāretabbaṃ || ||

SN_5,54(10).15. (5) Bhikkhū1.
2. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā || pe || ekam antaṃ nisinnā
kho te bhikkhū Bhagavantam etad avocuṃ || ||
3. Atthi nu kho bhante eko6 dhammo bhā- bahu-
cattāro dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhā- bahu-
satta dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā bhā- bahu-
dve dhamme paripūrentī ti || ||
Atthi7 kho bhikkhave eko1 dhammo bhā- bahu- cattāro
dhamme paripūreti8 || cattāro dhammā bhā- bahu- satta

2 S1-3 -samādhānanda.
3 S1 -to.
4 S1-3 paripūrenti.

6 B1 S1 eka.
7 S3 inserts me.
8 S3 paripūrenti.

Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 335
dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā bhā- bahu- dve dhamme
paripūrentī ti || ||
4. Katamo pana bhante eko1 dhammo bhā- bahu- cattāro
dhamme paripūreti || cattāro dhammā bhā- bahu- satta
dhamme paripūrenti || satta dhammā bhā- bahu- dve dhamme
paripūrentīti || ||

bahu- cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
bhā- bahu- sattabojjhaṅge paripūrenti || sattabojjhaṅgā bhā-
bahu- vijjāvimuttim paripūrenti3 || ||
I--III.

katham bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || ||

bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrentī ti || ||

SN_5,54(10).16. (6) Bhikkhū2.
2. 6 Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū- ||
Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3. Atthi nu kho bhikkhave eko dhammo || ||
Bhagavammūlakā no bhante dhammā- || ||
Atthi bhikkhave eko dhammo- || ||
4. Katamo ca bhikkhave eko dhammo- -vijjāvimuttim
paripūrentī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 eka.
2 S1 ānāpānasamādhi.
3 B1 S1 paripūrentī ti.
4 S1-3 ānāpānasati.
5 These words are indeed in S1-3, but they become the numbers 6-12
of the next text, the end of this (No. 34) and the beginning of
the following one being suppressed, I think, by mistake, since
the sutta appearing here as single is noticed as double in the
uddāna.
6 as the beginning of this text is omitted by S1-3, although,
I think, by blunder, and is the same as the preceding one
with slight changes, I give only the beginning of the
numbers 2-4.

[page 336]
336 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
I.
5. Katham bhāvito ca bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi
katham bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti1 || ||
6--12. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato va rukkha-
mūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā
ujuṃ kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā
so sato va assasati sato passasati || pa-pe || || Paṭinissaggā-
nupassī assasissāmī ti sikkhati || paṭinissaggānupassī passa-
sissāmī ti sikkhati || ||
13. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu dīghaṃ vā
assasanto Dīgham assasāmīti pajānāti || dīghaṃ vā passa-
santo Dīgham passasāmī ti pajānāti2 || rassaṃ vā assasanto ||
pa-pe || sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī || la-pe || passambhayaṃ kāya-
saṅkhāram Assasissāmī ti sikkhati3 || passambhayaṃ kāya-
saṅkhāram Passasissāmīti sikkhati || kāye kāyanupassī
bhikkhave bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampa-
jāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || taṃ kissa
hetu || ||
14. Kāyāññatarāham bhikkhave etam vadāmi yad idam
assāsapassāsaṃ || tasmā ti ha bhikkhave kāye kāyanupassī
bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno4 satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
15. Yasmiṃ5 samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu {pītipaṭisaṃvedī} ||
pa || sukhapatisaṃvedī6 cittasaṅkhārapatisaṃvedī || passam-
bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāram Assasissāmī ti sikkhati || passam-
bhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāram Passasissāmī ti sikkhati || vedanāsu
vedanānupassī bhikkhave7 bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ ||
taṃ kissa hetu || ||
16. Vedanāññatarāhaṃ7 bhikkhave etaṃ vedāmi yad
idam assāsapassāsānam9 sādhukam manasikāraṃ || tasmā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 the first numbers (2-5) are omitted in S1-3 as it is above
mentioned; the beginning of 6 is the end of the preceding sutta.
2 this second part is omitted by S1-3.
3 missing in S1.
4 repeated in S1.
5 B1 tasmiṃ.
6 S1-3 omit || pa || sukha-
7 in B1 only.
8 S1 vedanaññatāhaṃ.
9 B1 -passāsaṃ.

[page 337]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 337
ti ha bhikkhave vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ
samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhij-
jhadomanassaṃ || ||
17. Yasmiṃ1 samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu cittapaṭisaṃ-
vedī abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ || samādahaṃ cittaṃ2 || vimo-
cayaṃ cittaṃ Assasissāmīti sikkhati || vimocayaṃ cittam
Passasissāmī ti sikkhati || citte cittānupassī bhikkhave
bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā
vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || tam kissa hetu || ||
18. Nāham bhikkhave muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa
ānāpānasatisamādhibhāvanaṃ vadāmi || tasmā ti ha bhik-
khave citte cittānupassī bhikkhu3 tasmiṃ samaye viharati
ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
19. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu aniccānupassī ||
pā4 || virāgānupassī || nirodhānupassī || paṭinissaggānupassī
Assasissāmīti sikkhati5 || paṭinissaggānupassī Passasissāmīti
sikkhati || dhammesu dhammānupassī bhikkhave bhikkhu
tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyyaloke
abhijjhādomanassaṃ || so yan taṃ hoti abhijjhādomanassā-
nam6 pahānaṃ tam paññāya disvā sādhu7 ajjhupekkhitā hoti ||
tasmā ti ha bhikkhave dhammesu dhammānupassī bhikkhu
tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ || ||
20. Evam bhāvito kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi
evam bahulīkato cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti || ||
II.
21. Katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
katham bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti || ||
22. Yasmiṃ1 samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānu-
passī viharati upaṭṭhitasati8 || tasmiṃ samaye sati hoti
asammuṭṭhā || yasmiṃ1 samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno

1 B1 tasmiṃ.
2 this article is complete in B1.
3 S1-3 put bhikkhave before citte.
4 S1-3 have nothing here.
5 S1-3 omit this phrase.
6 S1-3 -domanassaṃ.
7 B1 sādhukam.
8 S1-3 upaṭṭhitassa.

[page 338]
338 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
upaṭṭhitā1 sati hoti asammuṭṭhā2 || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ
samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || satisambojjhaṅgaṃ tas-
miṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ
samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati || so tathā
sato3 viharanto taṃ dhammam paññāya pavicinati4 pavi-
carati parivīmaṃsam āpajjatī || ||
23. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā sato viha-
ranto taṃ dhammam paññāya pacinati pavicarati parivī-
maṃsam āpajjati || dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo5 tasmiṃ
samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || dhammavicayasambojjhaṅ-
gam tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || dhammavicayasam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūrim
gacchati || tassa taṃ dhammam paññāya pavicinato pavi-
carato parivīmaṃsam āpajjato āraddham hoti viriyam
asallīnaṃ || ||
24. Yasmim6 samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno tam7 dham-
mam paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṃsam āpajjato
araddhaṃ hoti viriyam asallīnaṃ || viriyasambojjhaṅgo8
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti {viriyasambojjhaṅ-
gaṃ}9 tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || viriyasambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati ||
āraddhaviriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā || ||
25. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddhaviri-
yassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā || pītisambojjhaṅgo10 tasmim
samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ tas-
miṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ
samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati || || Pītima-
nassa kāyo pi3 passambhati cittam pi passambhati11 || ||
26. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno pītimanassa kāyo pi
passambhati cittam pi passambhati || passaddhisambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || passaddhisam-
