1 S1-3 upaṭṭhita.
2 S1-3 asammuṭṭhita.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 S1-3 pavicināti.
5 this beginning of
23 is not to be found in S1-3 as well as in the sutta 13.
6 S1-3 tasmiṃ.
7 in B1 only.
8 S1-3 -ṅgaṃ.
9 S1-3 -ṅgo.
10 S1 omits pīti.
11 S1-3 omit cittam-

[page 339]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 339
bojjhaṅgaṃ1 tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || passaddhi-
sambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ
gacchati || || Passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati || ||
27. Yasmim samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno passaddha-
kāyassa sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati || samādhisambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || samādhisamboj-
jhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu2 bhāveti || samādhisam-
bojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūrim
gacchati || || So tathā samāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukam ajjhu-
pekkhitā hoti || ||
28. Yasmim samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā samāhitaṃ
cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || upekhāsamboj-
jhaṅgam tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || upekhā-
sambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye3 bhikkhu bhāveti || upekhā-
{sambojjhaṅgo} {tasmiṃ} samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ
gacchati || ||
29. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu vedanāsu || citte ||
dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati upaṭṭhitasati || tasmiṃ
samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā || ||
30. Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā
sati hoti asammuṭṭhā || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || {satisambojjhaṅgaṃ} tasmiṃ sa-
maye bhikkhu bhāveti || satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye
bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati || pa || || So tathā
samāhitaṃ cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || ||
31. Yasmim samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā samāhitaṃ
cittaṃ sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti || upekhāsambojjhaṅ-
gaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti || upekhāsambojjhaṅgo
{tasmiṃ} samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchati4 || ||
32. Evam bhāvitā5 kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
evam bahulīkatā sattabojjhaṅge paripūrenti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 -ṅgo.
2 S1 bhikkhuno.
3 S1-3 insert bhikkhave.
4 The numbers 29, 3O, 31 are not to be found in S1-3.
5 S1-3 bhāvito.

[page 340]
340 Ānāpāna-Saṃyuttam LIV.
III.
33. Katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā katham
bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrenti || ||
34. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapa-
riṇāmiṃ || dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti viveka-
virāga- nirodha- vossaggapariṇamiṃ || pa-pe || upekhāsam-
{bojjhaṅgam} bhāveti viveka- virāga- nirodhanissitaṃ vossag-
gapariṇāmiṃ || ||
34. Evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā evam
bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttim paripūrentī ti1 || ||

SN_5,54(10).17. (7) Saṃyojanam.
2. Ānāpānasatisamādhi bhikkhave bhāvito bahulīkato
saṃyojanapahānāya2 saṃvattati || ||

SN_5,54(10).18. (8) Anusayam.
2. Anusayasamugghātāya saṃvattati || ||

SN_5,54(10).19. (9) Addhānam.
2. Addhānapariññāya saṃvattati || || Vitthāretabbaṃ3 || ||

SN_5,54(10).20. (10) Asavakkhaya.
2. Āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattati || ||
3. Katham bhāvito ca4 bhikkhave5 ānāpānasatisamādhi
katham bahulīkato6 saṃyojanapahānāya saṃvattati || anu-
sayasamugghātāya saṃvattati || addhānapariññāya saṃ-
vattati || āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattati || ||
4--10. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkha-
mūlagato vā suññāgaragato vā7 || la-pe || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 paripūrenti.
2 S1 saṃyojanāya.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 S3 kho S1 nothing.
5 S1-3 bhikkhu corrected from bhikkhave in S3.
6 S1 -karo.
7 suññā- in S1-3 only.

[page 341]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 341
Yathā dutiyaṃ veyyākaranaṃ tathā bhikkhūnam kā-
tabbaṃ1 || || Paṭinissaggānupassī Assasissāmī ti sikkhati2 ||
paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmī ti sikkhati || ||
11. Evam bhāvito kho bhikkhave ānāpānasatisamādhi evam
bahulīkato saṃyojanapahānāya saṃvattati || pa3 || anusaya-
samugghātāya saṃvattati || pa3 || addhānapariññāya sam-
vattatī ti || pa3 || āsavānam khayāya {saṃvattatī} ti || ||
12. 4Ime cattāri suttā || ||
Ānāpānasaṃyuttam5 dasamam6 || ||
Vaggo dutiyo7 || ||
Tassa3 uddānaṃ || ||
Icchānaṅgalaṃ8 Kaṅkheyyaṃ9 ||
Ānanda apare duve10 ||
Bhikkhave11 bhikkhu12 dve vuttā ||
Saṃyojanam Anusayaṃ ||
Addhānam Āsavakkhayā ti13 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 this mention in B1-2 only.
2 this phrase in B1-2 only.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 in S3 only.
5 S1-3 -samyutti.
6 S1-3 samatti (drawn back to the end).
7 S1-3 dutiyo before vaggo.
8 S1-3 icchānaṃkālam.
9 S1-3 aheyyaṃ.
10 S1-3 ānando- -dve.
11 in B1 only.
12 S1-3 bhikkhuhi.
13 S1-3 āsavakkhayo ti.

[page 342]
342

BOOK XI.
SOTĀPATTI-SAṂYUTTAM.

CHAPTER I. VEḶUDVĀRAVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,55(11).1. Rājā.
1--2. 1 Sāvatthi || || Tatra kho etad avoca || ||
3. Kiñcāpi bhikkhave2 rājā cakkavatti catunnaṃ dīpā-
nam issariyādhipaccam rajjaṃ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā pa-
rammaraṇā sugatim saggaṃ lokam upapajjati3 devānaṃ
Tāvatiṃsānaṃ4 sahavyataṃ || so tattha Nandane5 vane
accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
samappito {samaṅgibhūto} paricāreti6 || so catuhi dhammehi
asamannāgato7 || || Atha kho so8 aparimutto ca nirayā
aparimutto ca tiracchānayoniso || aparimutto ca pettivisayā9 ||
aparimutto ca10 apāyaduggativinipātā11 || ||
4. Kiñcāpi12 bhikkhave ariyasāvako piṇḍiyā lopena13
yāpeti nantakāni ca10 dhāreti || so catuhi dhammehi samannā-
gato || || Atha kho so parimutto ca10 nirayā || parimutto
ca10 tiracchayoniyā14 || parimutto ca10 pittivisayā || parimutto
ca10 apāyaduggativinipātā || || Katamehi catuhi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B1 only.
2 S1 insert dve.
3 S1-3 uppajjati.
4 S1 devātiṃsānaṃ instead of devānaṃ.
5 B1 nanda.
6 S1-3 parivāreti.
7 S1-3 samannāgato.
8 missing in S1-3; S1 omits the following word till pettivisayā.
9 B1 pitti-
10 missing in S1-3.
11 S1 vinipātato S3 vinipāto.
12 S3 inserts so.
13 S1 lokena.
14 S1 ticchaneyoniyā pajimutto aparimutto va nirayā aparimutto
tiracchānayoniyā aparimutto pittivisāyā.

[page 343]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 343
5. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe avecca pasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti piso Bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsam-
buddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro
purisadhammasārathi satthā devamanussānam buddho
bhāgavā ti || ||
6. Dhamme avecca pasādena samannāgato hoti || || Svāk-
khāto Bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko
opanayiko1 paccattam veditabbo viññāhī ti || ||
7. Saṅghe avecca2 pasādena samannāgato hoti || || Suppaṭi-
panno Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho || ujupaṭipanno Bhagavato
sāvakasaṅgho || ñāyapaṭipanno Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ||
sāmīcipaṭipanno Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho || yad idaṃ cattāri
purisayugāni aṭṭhapurisapuggalā esa Bhagavato sāvaka-
saṅgho || āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalīkaraṇīyo
anuttaram puññakhettaṃ lokassā ti || ||
8. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samaññāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi
acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhūjissehi3 viññūpa-
satthehi4 aparāmaṭṭhehi samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
9. Imehi catuhi dhammehi samannāgato hoti || ||
10. Yo ca bhikkhave catunnam dīpānam paṭilābho yo
ca5 catunnaṃ dhammānam paṭilābho || || Catunnaṃ dīpā-
nam paṭilābho catunnaṃ dhammānam paṭilābhassa kalaṃ
nagghati6 soḷasinti || ||

SN_5,55(11).2. (2) Ogadha or Saṭayhaṃ.
3. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako
sotāpanno hoti avinīpātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano || ||
Katamehi catuhi || ||
4. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || || Iti pi so Bhagavā arahaṃ || pe || satthā
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || ||
5--6. 7 Dhamme || {Saṅgho} || ||
7. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti || akhaṇḍehi ||
la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 opaneyyiko.
2 S1 avecaca (or avevava).
3 S1-3 bhuñjissehi.
4 B1 -saṭṭhehi.
5 in S1-3 only.
6 S1-3 na (S3 nā-) gghanti.
7 more complete in S1-3.

[page 344]
344 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
8. Imehi kho bhikkhave catuhi dhammehi samannāgato
ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sam-
bodhiparāyano ti || ||
9. Idam avoca Bhagavā idam vatvā1 Sugato etad avoca
satthā || ||
Yesaṃ saddhā2 ca sīlañca || pasādo3 dhammadassanaṃ ||
te ve kāle na paccanti4 || brahmacariyogadhaṃ sukhan ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).3. (3) Dighāvu.
1. Ekaṃ samayaṃ Bhagavā Rājagahe viharati Veḷuvane
Kalandakanivāpe || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Dīghāvu upāsako ābādhiko
hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || ||
3. Atha kho Dīghāvu upāsako pitaraṃ Jotikaṃ gaha-
patim āmantesi || Ehi tvaṃ gahapati yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkama || upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena Bhagavato
pāde sīrasā vanda || Dīghāvu bhante upāsako ābādhiko
hoti5 dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || so Bhagavato pāde sirasā
vandati6 || || Evaṃ ca vadehi Sādhu kira bhante Bhagavā
yena Dīghāvussa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu
anukampam upādāyāti || ||
Evaṃ tātā ti kho Jotiko7 gahapati Dīghāvussa upāsa-
kassa paṭissutvā yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅka-
mitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ||
4. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Jotiko gahapati Bhagavan-
tam etad avoca || Dīghāvu bhante upāsako ābādhiko hoti
dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || || So Bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati ||
evañca vadeti Sādhu kira bhante Bhagavā yena Dīghā-
vussa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampam
upādāyāti || ||
Adhivāsesi Bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena || ||
5. Atha kho Bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaram ādāya
yena Dīghāvussa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 vatvāna.
2 S1-3 saddhaṃ.
3 S1-3 pasādaṃ.
4 B1 paccenti.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 B1 vandatī ti.
7 in B1-2 only.

[page 345]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 345
upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi || nisajja kho Bhagavā
Dīghāvum upāsakam etad avoca || || Kacci te Dīghāvu
khamanīyam kacci yāpanīyaṃ kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭi-
kkamanti no abhikkamanti patikkamo sānam paññāyati no
abhikkamoti || ||
Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ baḷhā me
dukkhā abhikkamanti no patikkamanti abhikkamo sānam
paññāyati no paṭikkamo ti || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha te Dīghāvu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ || Buddhe
aveccappasādena samannāgato bhavissāmi || Iti pi so Bha-
gavā arahaṃ || pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā
ti || pe [pa] || || Dhamme || pe [pa] || Saṅghe || pe [pa] || Ariya-
kantehi sīlehi samannāgato bhavissāmi akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi1 || || Evañhi te Dīghāvu sikkhi-
tabban ti || ||
7. Yānimāni bhante Bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni
desitāni || saṃvijjante te dhammā mayi ahañ ca tesu2 san-
dissāmi || ahañ hi bhante buddhe aveccappasādena samannā-
gato || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānam
buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || Ariyakantehi sīlehi
samannāgato akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehī ti || ||
Tasmā ti ha tvam Dīghāvu imesu catusu sotāpattiyaṅgesu
patiṭṭhāya cha vijjābhāgiye dhamme {uttariṃ bhāveyyāsi}3 || ||
8. Idha tvam Dīghāvu4 sabbesaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī
viharāhi || anicce dukkhasaññī dukkhe anattasaññī pahāna-
saññī virāgasaññī nirodhasaññī ti || || Evaṃ hi te Dīghāvu
sikkhitabban ti || ||
Ye me bhante Bhagavatā cha vijjābhāgiyā dhammā
desitā || saṃvijjante te dhammā mayi ahaṃ ca tesu dham-
mesu sandissāmi || ahañhi bhante sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccā-
nupassī viharāmi || anicce dukkhasaññī dukkhe anattasaññī
pahānasaññī virāgasaññī nirodhasaññī || ||
9. Api ca me bhante evaṃ hoti māhevāyaṃ5 Jotiko
gahapati mamaccayena vighātam āpajjīti6 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 B1 -saṃvattanikehī ti.
2 S1-3 add dhammesu.
3 B1 uttari-
4 S1 Dīghāvuṃ.
5 S1 hevāhaṃ.
6 S1-3 āpajjati.

[page 346]
346 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
Mā tvaṃ tāta Dīghāvu evam manasākāsi || || Iṅgha1
tvaṃ tāta Dīghāvu yad eva te2 Bhagavā āha tad eva tvaṃ
sādhukam manasi karohī ti || ||
10. Atha kho Bhagavā Dīghāvum upāsakam iminā ovā-
dena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi || ||
11. Atha kho Dīghāvu upāsako acirapakkantassa Bha-
gavato kālam akāsi || ||
12. Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā
ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || ekam antaṃ nisinnā kho te bhik-
khū Bhagavantam etad avocuṃ || Yo so bhante Dīghāvu
nāma upāsako Bhagavatā saṅkhittena ovādena ovādito so
kālaṅkato3 || tassa kā gati ko abhisamparāyo ti || ||
Paṇḍito bhikkhave Dīghāvu upāsako ahosi paccapādi4
dhammassānudhammaṃ5 na ca6 dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihe-
sesi || ||
13. Dīghāvu bhikkhave upāsako pañcannam orambhāgi-
yānaṃ samyojanānam parikkhayā opapātiko hoti7 tattha
parinibbāyi anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).4. (4) Sāriputta1.8
1. Ekaṃ samayam āyasmā ca Sāriputto ayasmā ca
Ānando Sāvatthiyaṃ viharanti Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa
ārāme || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando sāyaṇhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā
vuṭṭhito || la9 || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando
āyasmantaṃ Sāriputtam etad avoca || ||
3. Katīnam10 nu kho āvuso Sāriputta dhammānam sa-
mannāgamanahetu evam ayam pajā Bhagavatā vyākatā
sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 ighaṃ S1 igha.
2 in B1 only.
3 S1-3 omit so-
4 B1 saccavādī.
5 S1-3 dhammāssā-
6 S1-3 inserts maṃ.
7 missing in B1.
8 this first Sāriputta is the second in the Singhalese MSS. and
the fifth of the chapter.
9 S1-3 have yenāyasmā Sāriputto- -nisīdi.
10 S1 katinaṃ S3 katinnaṃ.

[page 347]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 347
Catunnaṃ kho āvuso dhammānaṃ samannāgamanahetu
evam ayam pajā Bhagavatā vyākatā sotāpannā avinipāta-
dhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Idhāvuso ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena sa-
mannāgato hoti || || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || ari-
yakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi1 || ||
5. Imesaṃ kho āvuso2 catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ samannā-
gamanahetu evam ayam pajā Bhagavatā vyākatā sotā-
pannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).5. (5) Sāriputta2.3
2. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ4 kho āyasmantaṃ
Sāriputtam Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3. Sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgan ti hidaṃ Sāriputta
vuccati || katamaṃ nu kho Sāriputta sotapattiyaṅgan ti || ||
Sappurisasaṃsevo hi bhante sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ || saddham-
masavanaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ || yonisomanasikāro sotāpatti-
yaṅgaṃ || dhammānudhammapaṭipatti sotāpattiyaṅgan ti || ||
Sādhu Sāriputta sādhu Sāriputta || sappurisasaṃsevo-
-dhammānudhammapaṭipatti sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ5 || ||
4. Soto soto ti ha6 Sāriputta vuccati || katamo nu kho
Sāriputta soto ti || ||
Ayam eva hi bhante ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto ||
seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || pe || sammāsamādhī ti || ||
Sādhu sādhu Sāriputta || ayam eva hi Sāriputta ariyo
aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe ||
sammāsamādhi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -nikehī ti.
2 S1-3 bhikkhave.
3 This second Sāriputta is the first in the Singhalese MSS. and
the fourth of the chapter.
4 S1 nisinnā.
5 S1-3 have only -pe- instead of sādhu sariputta-
6 S1 haṃ B1 hidaṃ.

[page 348]
348 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
5. Sotāpanno sotāpanno ti hidaṃ Sāriputta vuccati ||
katamo nu kho Sāriputta sotāpanno ti || ||
Yo hi bhante iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena
samannāgato || ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno yoyam1 āyasmā
evaṃ nāmo evaṃ gotto ti || ||
Sādhu sādhu Sāriputta yo hi Sāriputta iminā ariyena
aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotā-
panno yoyaṃ1 āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).6. (6) Thapatayo.
1. Sāvatthi nidānaṃ2 || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū Bhaga-
vato cīvarakammam karonti Niṭṭhitacīvaro Bhagavā temā-
saccayena cārikam pakkamissatī tī3 || ||
3. Tena kho pana samayena Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo
Sādhuke paṭivasanti kenacid eva karaṇīyena || assosuṃ kho
Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo Sambahulā kira bhikkhū Bhaga-
vato cīvarakammaṃ karonti Niṭṭhitacīvaro Bhagavā temā-
saccayena cārikam pakkamissatī ti || ||
4. Atha kho Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo magge purisaṃ
ṭhapesuṃ || Yadā tvam ambho purisa passeyyāsi4 Bhaga-
vantam āgacchantam arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ || atha
kho5 amhākam āroceyyāsī ti || ||
5. Dvīhatīhaṃ6 ṭhito kho so puriso addasa Bhagavantaṃ
dūrato va āgacchantam || disvā yena Isidattapurāṇā thapa-
tayo tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Isidattapurāṇe7 thapa-
tayo etad avoca || Ayaṃ so bhante Bhagavā āgacchati
arahaṃ sammāsambuddho || yassa dāni kālam maññathā ti || ||
6. Atha kho Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo yena Bhagavā
tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivā-
detvā Bhāgavantam piṭṭhito pitthito anubandhiṃsu || ||
7. Atha kho Bhagavā maggā okkamma8 yena aññata-
raṃ9 rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā paññatte

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 svāyaṃ.
2 in B1 only.
3 S1-3 pakkamī ti.
4 S1-3 passeyyasi.
5 in S1-3 only.
6 B1 -tihi.
7 S1-3 -purāṇā.
8 S1-3 ukkamma.
9 S1-3 yenañña-

[page 349]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 349
āsane nisīdi || Isidattapurāṇā pi kho1 thapatayo Bhaga-
vantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || || Ekam
antaṃ nisinnā kho te2 Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo Bhaga-
vantam etad avocuṃ || ||
8. Yadā mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ3 suṇāma Sā-
vatthiyā Kosalesu cārikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no tas-
miṃ samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no
Bhagavā bhavissatī ti || Yadā pana mayam bhante Bhaga-
vantaṃ suṇāma4 Sāvatthiyā Kosalesu cārikam pakkanto
tī || hoti no tasmiṃ samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ
Dūre no Bhagavā ti || ||
9. Yadā5 mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ suṇāma Kosalehi
Malle6 cārikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no {tasmiṃ} samaye
anattamatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no Bhagavā bhavissatī
ti || Yadā pana mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ suṇāma Ko-
salehi Malle6 cārikam pakkanto ti || hoti no tasmiṃ samaye
anattamanatā7 hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no Bhagavā ti || ||
10. Yadā8 mayam bhante suṇāma Bhagavantaṃ Malle-
hi9 Vajjim10 cārikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no tasmiṃ
samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no Bhagavā
bhavissatī ti || || Yadā pana mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ
suṇāma Mallehi9 Vajjiṃ10 cārikam pakkanto ti || hoti no
tasmiṃ samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no
Bhagavā ti || ||
11. Yadā8 mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ suṇāma Vajjīhi
Kāsiṃ11 cārikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no tasmiṃ samaye
anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no Bhagavā bha-
vissatī ti || || Yadā pana mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ
suṇāma Vajjīhi Kāsim11 cārikam pakkanto ti || hoti no
tasmiṃ samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no
Bhagavā ti || ||
12. Yadā8 mayam bhante Bhagavantam suṇāma Kāsīhi
Magadhe cārikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no tasmiṃ samaye

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 omit pi kho.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S1 bhagavataṃ.
4 S3 sunāma further on, S1-3 suṇoma always.
5 B1 adds pana.
6 B1 mallim.
7 S1 -manataṃ.
8 B1 add pana.
9 B1 mallīhi.
1O S1-3 vajji.
11 S1 kāsi S3 kāsī.

[page 350]
350 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ Dūre no Bhagavā bha-
vissatī ti1 || || Yadā pana mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ
suṇāma Kāsīhi Māgadhe cārikam pakkanto ti hoti2 anap-
pakā3 no tasmiṃ samaye anattamanatā hoti anappakaṃ
domanassaṃ Dūre no Bhagavā ti || ||
13. Yadā4 mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ suṇāma Mā-
gadhehi Kāsiṃ5 carikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no tasmiṃ
samaye attamanatā hoti somanassaṃ Āsanne6 no Bhagavā
bhavissatī ti || || Yadā pana mayam bhante Bhagavantaṃ
suṇāma Māgadhehi Kāsim7 cārikam pakkanto ti || hoti no
tasmiṃ samaye attamanatā hoti somanassaṃ Āsanne6 no
Bhagavā ti || ||
14. Yadā8 mayam bhante suṇoma Kāsīhi Vajjī || pe || ||
15. Vajjīhi [Malle] || ||
16. Mallehi Kosale9 || ||
17. Yadā pana bhante Bhagavantaṃ {suṇāma}10 Kosalehi
Sāvatthiṃ11 cārikam pakkamissatī ti || hoti no tasmiṃ sa-
maye attamanatā hoti somanassam Āsanne6 no Bhagavā
bhavissatī ti || Yadā pana mayam bhante12 Bhagavantaṃ13
sunāma Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa
ārāme ti || anappakā no tasmiṃ samaye attamanatā hoti
anappakaṃ somanassam Āsanne6 no Bhagavā ti || ||
18. Tasmā ti ha thapatayo14 sambādho gharāvāso15
rajāpatho abbhokāso16 pabbajā alañca pana vo thapatayo
appamādāyā ti || ||
19. Atthi kho no bhante etamhā sambādhā añño sam-
bādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cāti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 insert here the repetition of the second part of the
number 11 and the first part of this number 12.
2 missing in S3.
3 S1-3 anappikā.
4 B1 add pana.
5 S1-3 kāsī.
6 S1-3 āsanno.
7 S1 kāsī missing in S3.
8 S1 adds pana.
9 the numbers 14,15,16 are complete in B1.
10 these words in B1-2 only.
11 S1 sāvatthi S3 adds yaṃ.
12 missing in S1-3.
13 S1 adds gotamaṃ.
14 S3 papatayo.
15 S1 vāso omitting gharā.
16 S1-3 ajjhokāso.

[page 351]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 351
Katamo pana vo thapatayo etamhā sambādhā añño
sambādho sambādhataro ceva1 sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā
ti || ||
20. Idha mayam bhante yadā rājā Pasenadī Kosalo
uyyānabhūmiṃ niyyātukāmo hoti || ye te rañño Pasenadissa
Kosalassa nāgā opavayhā2 te kappetvā yā tā rañño Pa-
senadissa Kosalassa pajāpatiyo piyā manāpā tā3 ekam
purato ekam pacchato nisīdāpema || || Tāsaṃ kho pana
bhante bhāginīnam evarūpo gandho hoti seyyathāpi nāma
gandhakaraṇḍakassa tāvad eva vivariyamānassa yathā taṃ
rājakaññānaṃ4 gandhena vibhūsitānaṃ || tāsaṃ kho pana
bhante bhaginīnam evarūpo kāyasamphasso hoti seyyathāpi
nāma thulapicuno vā yathā taṃ rājakaññānaṃ sukhedhi-
tānaṃ5 || tasmiṃ kho pana bhante samaye nāgo6 pi rakkhi-
tabbo7 hoti || tā pi bhaginiyo rakkhitabbā || attā pi rakkhi-
tabbo8 hoti || ||
21. Na kho pana mayam bhante abhijānāma tāsu bha-
ginīsu pāpakaṃ cittam uppādetā || ayaṃ kho no bhante
etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva
sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā ti || ||
22. Tasmā ti ha thapatayo sambādho gharāvāso rajā-
patho abbhokāso9 pabbajā alaṃ ca10 pana vo11 thapatayo
appamādāya || ||
23. Catuhi kho thapatayo dhammehi samannāgato ariya-
sāvako sotāpanno hoti12 avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhi-
parāyano || katamehi catuhi || ||
24. Idha thapatayo ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā de-
vamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || pe [pa] ||
Saṅghe || vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāram ajjhāvasati13 ||
muttacāgo payatapāṇī vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃ-
vibhāgarato14 || || Ime hi kho thapatayo catuhi dhammehi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 ce.
2 B1 opavuyhā.
3 S3 te S1 mā te.
4 S1-3 rājārahena.
5 S1 sukheṭhi-
6 S1-3 nāṅgo.
7 S3 rakkhipitabbo S1 parikkhipitabbo instead of pirak-
8 S1-3 -tabbā.
9 S1-3 ajjho-

11 S1 adds dha.
12 missing in B1.
13 B1 ajjhāgāram vasati instead of agāram-.
14 B1 S1 dānaṃ-

352 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo
niyato sambodhiparāyano || ||
25. Tumhe1 kho thapatayo Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti2 Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānaṃ buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || Yaṃ
kho pana kiñci kule deyyadhammaṃ sabban tam appaṭivi-
bhattaṃ sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehi || ||
26. Taṃ kim3 maññatha thapatayo4 || katividhā5 te Ko-
salesu6 manussā7 ye tumhākaṃ samasamā yad idaṃ dāna-
{saṃvibhāge} ti || ||
27. Lābhā no bhante suladdhaṃ no bhante yesaṃ no
Bhagavā evam pajānātī8 ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).7. (7) Veḷudvāreyyā.
1. Evam me sutam9 ekam samayam Bhagavā Kosalesu
cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhim yena
Veḷudvāraṃ nāma Kosalānam brāhmaṇagāmo tad avasari || ||
2. Assosuṃ kho te10 Veḷudvāreyyakā brāhmaṇagahapa-
tikā Samaṇo khalu bho Gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā
pabbajito Kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhu-
saṅghena saddhiṃ Veḷudvāram anuppatto || || Taṃ kho
pana Bhagavantam Gotamam evaṃ kalyāṇakittisaddo
abbhuggato || Iti pi so Bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho
vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadam-
masārathi satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || so
imaṃ lokam sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakam sassa-
maṇabrāhmaṇim pajam sadevamanussaṃ sayam abhiññā
sacchikatvā pavedeti || so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇam
majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāṇakalyānam sāttham savyañjanaṃ
kevalaparipuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti || ||
Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānam arahataṃ dassanaṃ hoti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add hi.
2 missing in B1.
3 S1 kaṃ.
4 S3 tapatayo.
5 B1 kativiya.
6 S1-3 kosale.
7 Here begins a gap in S1, the fourth part of the sheet nai,
the whole no and the half of nau being a blank.
8 S3 jānātī.
9 this phrase in B1 only.
10 missing in S3.

[page 353]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 353
3. Atha kho te1 Veḷudvāreyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā
yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā appekacce
Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || appe-
kacce Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu || sammodaniyaṃ
katham sārāṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu ||
appekacce yena Bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || appekacce Bhagavato santike nāmagot-
taṃ sāvetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || appekacce tunhībhūtā
ekam antaṃ nisīdiṃsu || ||
4. Ekam antaṃ nisinnā kho te1 Veḷudvareyyākā brāh-
maṇagahapatikā Bhagavantam etad avocuṃ || || Mayam
bho Gotama evaṃkāmā evaṃchandā evamadhippāyā ||
puttasambādhasayanam ajjhāvaseyyāma || kāsikacandanam
paccanubhaveyyāma || mālāgandhavilepanam dhāreyyāma ||
jātarūparajataṃ2 sādiyeyyāma || kāyassa bhedā param ma-
raṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokam upapajjeyyāma3 || || Tesaṃ no
bhavaṃ Gotamo amhākam evaṃkāmānam evaṃchandānam
evamadhippāyānaṃ tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā mayaṃ
puttasambādhasayanam ajjhāvaseyyāma || la || sugatiṃ
saggam lokam upapajjeyyāmā ti3 || ||
5. Attūpanāyikaṃ4 vo gahapatayo dhammapariyāyaṃ
desissāmi || tam suṇātha || sādhukam manasi karotha bhā-
sissāmī ti || ||
Evam bho ti kho te Veḷudvāreyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā
Bhagavato paccassosuṃ || ||
Bhagavā etad5 avoca || || Katamo gahapatayo attūpanā-
yiko dhammapariyāyo || ||
6. Idha gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati ||
Ahaṃ kho smi6 jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo
dukkhapaṭikkūlo || yo kho maṃ jīvitukāmam amaritukāmaṃ
sukhakāmaṃ dukkhapaṭikkūlam jīvitā voropeyya na me
tam assa piyam1 manāpaṃ || || Ahañceva kho pana paraṃ
jīvitukāmam amaritukāmam sukhakāmam dukkhapaṭikūlaṃ
jīvitā voropeyyam || parassa tam assa appiyam amanāpaṃ || ||
Yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo appiyo amanāpo parassa peso

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S3.
2 S3 insert vā.
3 S3 uppaj-
4 B1 atthu-
5 S3 evaṃ.
6 B1 smiṃ.

[page 354]
354 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
dhammo appiyo amanāpo || yo kho myāyam dhammo appiyo
amanāpo kathāhaṃ paraṃ tena saṃyojeyyan ti || || So iti
paṭisaṅkhāya attanā ca pānātipātā paṭivirato hoti || paraṃ
ca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti || pāṇātipātā vera-
maṇiyā vaṇṇam bhāsati || || Evam assāyaṃ kāyasamācāro
ti koṭiparisuddho hoti || ||
7. Puna ca param gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti paṭisañ-
cikkhati || || Yo kho me adinnam theyyasaṅkhātam ādiyeyya ||
na me tam assa piyam2 manāpam || ahaṃ ce va kho pana
parassa adinnam theyyasaṅkhātam ādiyeyyaṃ || parassa pi
tam assa appiyam amanāpaṃ || || Yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo
appiyo amanāpo parassa peso dhammo appiyo amanāpo ||
yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo appiyo amanāpo kathāham paraṃ
tena saṃyojeyyanti || || So iti paṭisaṅkhāya attānañca adinnā-
dānā paṭivirato hoti || parañca adinnādānā veramaṇiyā
samādapeti || adinnādānā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇam bhāsati || ||
Evam assāyam kāyasamācāro ti koṭiparisuddho hoti || ||
8. Puna1 ca param gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti paṭisañ-
cikkhati || || Yo kho me dāresu cārittam āpajjeyya || na me
tam assa piyam2 manāpam || ahaṃ ceva kho pana parassa
dāresu cārittam āpajjeyyaṃ || parassa pi tam assa appiyam
amanāpaṃ || yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo appiyo amanāpo
parassa peso3 dhammo appiyo amanāpo || kathāham paraṃ
tena saṃyojeyyan ti || so iti paṭisaṅkhāya attanā ca kāmesu
micchācārā paṭivirato hoti || paraṃ ca kāmesu micchācārā
veramaṇiyā samādapeti || kāmesu micchācārā veramaṇiyā
ca vaṇṇam bhāsati || || Evam assāyaṃ kāyasamācāro ti
koṭiparisuddho ti || ||
9. Puna ca paraṃ gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti patisaṃ-
cikkhati || || Yo kho me musāvādena attham bhañjeyya4 na
me tam assa piyam2 manāpaṃ || ahañ ceva kho pana
parassa musāvādena attham bhañjeyyam parassa pi tam
assa appiyam amanāpaṃ || || Yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo
appiyo amanāpo || parassa peso3 dhammo appiyo amanāpo ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Here the great gap in B2 is momentally interrupted by
the presence of the sheet du not even entire, but mutilated.
2 missing in S3.
3 B1-2 meso.
4 S3 bhaje-

[page 355]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 355
yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo appiyo amanāpo || kathāham paraṃ
tena saṃyojeyyan ti || || So iti paṭisaṅkhāya attanā ca mu-
sāvādā paṭivirato hoti || parañ ca musāvādā veramaṇiyā
samādapeti || musāvādā veramaṇiyā vaṇṇam bhāsati || || Evam
assāyam vacīsamācāro ti koṭiparisuddho hoti || ||
10. Puna ca paraṃ gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti paṭi-
sañcikkhati || || Yo kho maṃ pisuṇāya vācāya mittehi bhe-
deyya1 na me tam assa piyam2 manāpam || ahañ ceva kho
pana paraṃ pisuṇāya vācāya mittehi bhedeyyaṃ3 parassa
pi4 tam assa appiyam amanāpam || la || Evaṃ assāyaṃ
vācīsamācāro ti koṭiparisuddho hoti || ||
11. Puna ca paraṃ gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti paṭisañ-
cikkhati || || Yo kho mam pharusāya vācāya samudācareyya
na me tam assa piyam manāpam || ahañ ceva kho pana
param pharusāya vācāya samudācareyyam parassa pi tam
assa appiyam amanāpaṃ || || Yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo ||
pa || || Evam assāyaṃ vacīsamācāro ti koṭiparisuddho hoti || ||
12. Puna ca paraṃ gahapatayo ariyasāvako iti paṭisañ-
cikkhati || Yo kho mam sampabhāsena5 samphappalāpa-
bhāsena6 samudācareyya na me tam assa piyam2 manāpaṃ ||
ahañ ceva kho pana param sampabhāsena5 samphappalā-
pabhāsena6 samudācareyya || parassa pi tam assa appiyam
amanāpaṃ || || Yo kho myāyam dhammo appiyo amanāpo
parassa peso7 dhammo appiyo amanāpo || yo myāyam
dhammo appiyo amanāpo kathāham paraṃ tena saṃyojey-
yanti || || So iti patisaṅkhāya attanāca samphappalāpā paṭivi-
rato hoti || paraṃ ca samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā samāda-
peti || samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇam bhāsati || ||
Evam assāyam vacīsamācāro ti koṭiparisuddho hoti || ||
13. So Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || Iti
pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || sattha devamanussānaṃ buddho
bhagavā ti || ||

2 missing in S3.

6 S3 sappamantābhāsena.
7 B1 meso.

[page 356]
356 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
14. Dhamme || ||
15. Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || supaṭi-
panno Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho1 || la-pe || anuttaram puñ-
ñakkhettam lokassā ti || ||
16. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi ||
la || {samādhisaṃvattanikehi}2 || ||
17. Yato kho gahapatayo ariyasāvako imehi sattahi
saddhammehi samannāgato hoti || imehi catuhi3 ākaṅkhi-
yehi4 ṭhānehi so ākaṅkhamāno attanā vā5 attānaṃ vyākareyya
Khīṇanirayo mhi khīṇatiracchānayoniko6 khīṇapittivisayo7
khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto || sotāpanno ham asmi avinipāta-
dhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||
18. Evaṃ vutte Veḷudvāreyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā
Bhagavantam etad avocuṃ || || Abhikkantaṃ bho Gotama ||
la-pe || ete mayam bhagavantaṃ Gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ
gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca || Upāsake no
bhavaṃ Gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pānupete8 saraṇaṃ
gate ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).8. (8) Giñjakāvasatha1.
1. Evam me sutam ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Ñātike
viharati Giñjakāvasathe || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam etad avoca || Sāḷho
nāma bhante bhikkhu kālakato9 tassa kā gati ko abhisam-
parāyo || Nandā nāma bhante bhikkhunī kālakatā tassā kā
gati ko abhisamparāyo || Sudatto nāma bhante upāsako
kālakato tassa kā gati ko abhisamparāyo || Sujātā nāma
bhante upāsikā kālakatā tassā kā gati ko abhisamparāyo ti || ||
3. Sāḷho Ānanda bhikkhu kālakato asavānaṃ khayā
anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi || || Nandā
Ānanda bhikkhunī kālakatā pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 adds ujupaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasangho.
2 this number is missing in S3.
3 S3 catīhi.
4 B1 ākaṅkha- (B2 ākaṅkhati-) yehi.
5 S3 attānañca.
6 S3 -yoniyo.
7 S3 -petti-
8 B1-2 -petaṃ.
9 B1 kālaṃkato -tā always.

[page 357]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 357
saṃyojanānam parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī1
anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā || || Sudatto Ānanda upāsako
kālakato tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānam parikkhayā rāgadosamo-
hānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī sakid2 eva imaṃ lokam āgantvā
dukkhassantaṃ karissati || || Sujātā Ānanda upāsikā kāla-
katā tiṇṇam saññojañānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpannā avini-
pātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā || ||
4. Anacchariyaṃ kho panetam Ānanda yaṃ manussa-
bhūto3 kālaṃ kareyya || tasmim tasmiṃ ce4 maṃ kālakate
upasaṅkamitvā etam attham paṭipucchissatha || vihesā pesā5
Ānanda assa Tathāgatassa || tasmā ti hānanda dhammā-
dāsaṃ6 nāma dhammapariyāyaṃ desissāmi || yena samannā-
gato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanā vā attānaṃ vyā-
kareyya Khīṇanirayo mhi khīṇatiracchānayoniko7 khīna-
pittivisayo10 khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto || sotāpanno hamasmi
avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano || ||
5. Katamo ca so Ānanda dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo ||
yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanā va
attānaṃ vyākareyya || Khīṇanirayo mhi sotāpanno hamasmi
avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano || ||
6. Idha Ānanda8 ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || || Iti pi so Bhagavā || pa-pe || satthā
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || dhamme || saṅghe ||
ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
7. Ayaṃ kho so Ānanda dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo ||
yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanā va
attānaṃ vyākareyya khīṇanirayo mhi khīṇatiracchānayoniko9
khīnapittivisayo10 khīnāpāyaduggativinipāto || sotāpanno
ham asmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||
8. Tīṇi pi suttāni11 ekanidānāni || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 parinibbayi.
2 B1-2 sakiṃd.
3 S3 mayassabhūto.
4 S3 ca and omits maṃ.
5 S3 cesā.
6 B1 dhammāudāsaṃ.
7 S3 -tiracchānayoniyo.
8 S3 idhānanda.
9 S3 -yoniyo.
10 S3 -petti-
11 B1 suttantāni.

[page 358]
358 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.

SN_5,55(11).9. (9) Giñjakāvasatha 2.
2. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavan-
tam etad avoca || Asoko nāma bhante bhikkhu kālakato
tassa kā gati ko abhisamparāyo || Asokā nāma1 bhante
bhikkhunī kālakatā || la || Asoko nāma bhante upāsako
kālakato || la || Asokā nāma bhante upāsikā kālakatā tassā
kā gati ko abhisamparāyo ti2 || ||
3--6. Asoko Ānanda bhikkhu kālakato āsavānaṃ khayā
anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi || || Purima-
veyyākaraṇena ekanidānaṃ3 || ||
7. Ayaṃ1 kho so Ānanda dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo
yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkamāno attanā va
attānam vyākareyya Khīṇanirayomhi || khīṇatiracchāyoniko
khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto || sotāpanno ham
asmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).10. (10) Giñjakāvasatha3.
2. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando Bhagavan-
tam etad avoca || || Kakkaṭo4 nāma5 bhante Ñātike upāsako
kālakato tassa kā gati kho abhisamparāyo || Kāḷiṅgo7 nāma
bhante Ñātike upāsako7 || Nikato8 nāma bhante Ñatike
upāsako || Kaṭissaho9 nāma bhante || Tuṭṭho nāma bhante ||
Santuṭṭho nāma bhante || Bhaddo nāma bhante10 || Subhaddo
nāma bhante Ñātike upāsake kālakato tassa kā gati ko
abhisamparāyo ti || ||
3. Kakkaṭo11 Ānanda upāsako kālakato pañcannam
orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam parikkhayā12 opapātiko
tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā || Kaḷiṅgo13

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S3.
2 S3 omits ti.
3 S3 has -- purimasuttantaṃ -- peyyālo.
4 S3 kakkuṭo.
5 the gap in S1 is over now.
6 B1-2 kaḷibho.
7 S1-3 add kālakato -pe-.
8 S3 nikkho S1 nikkhā.
9 S1 kaṭissaṅgo S3 kaṭissabho.
10 B1-2 add always ñātike upāsako after bhante.
11 S1-3 kakkuṭo.
12 S1-3 add ya.
13 S3 kāliṅgo B1-2 kaḷibho.

[page 359]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 359
Ānanda1 || Nikato2 Ānanda || Kaṭissaho3 Ānanda || Tuṭṭho
Ānanda || Santuṭṭho Ānanda || Bhaddo Ānanda || Subhaddo
Ānanda upāsako kālakato pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ
saṃyojanānam parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī
anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā || sabbe ekagatikā kātabbā4 || ||
4. Paropaññāsa5 Ānanda Ñātike upāsakā kālakatā pañ-
cannam orambhāgiyānaṃ samyojanāṇam parikkhayā opa-
pātikā tattha parinibbāyino6 anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā || ||
Sādhikanavuti7 Ānanda Ñātike upāsakā kālakatā tiṇṇaṃ
saṃyojanānam parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sa-
kadāgāmino sakid eva imaṃ lokam āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ
karissanti || || Cha atirekāni8 kho Ānanda pañcasatāni9
Ñātike upāsakā kālakatā tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānam parikkhayā
sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā || ||
5. Anacchariyaṃ kho panetam Ānanda yam manussa-
bhūto kālaṃ kareyya || || Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ce maṃ kāla-
kate10 {upasaṅkamitvā} etam attham11 paṭipucchissatha12 ||
vihesā hesā13 Ānanda assa Tathāgatassa || tasmā ti hānanda
dhammādāsaṃ14 nāma dhammapariyāyaṃ desissāmi || yena
samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanā va attānam
vyākareyya || Khīṇanirayo mhi15 || khīṇatiracchānayoniko16
khīnapittivisayo17 khīnāpāyaduggativinipāto || sotāpanno
ham asmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano || ||
6. Katamo ca so Ānanda dhammādāso18 dhammapari-
yāyo yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanā
va attānaṃ vyākareyya || pe || niyato sambodhiparāyano || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add upāsako kālakato -pe-
2 B2 nikaṭo S3 nikkho S1 nikkhā.
3 S1 kaṭissaṅgo B1 kassaho.
4 this mention in B1-2 only.
5 S1-3 -paññāsā.
6 S1 -nibbāyīno.
7 S1-3 yānidvenavuti or yāniñce-
8 S1 chārikāni S3 chādhikhāni.
9 S3 pañcasatā S1 pañcasatāpañcasatāni.
10 S1 -kato.
11 S1-3 omit etamo
12 S1-3 paṭipucchatha.
13 B1-2 pesā.
14 S1 dhammādāsamannāmaṃ.
15 S1-3 -pe-
16 S1-3 -yoniyo.
17 S1-3 petti-
18 S3 dhammodāso.

[page 360]
360 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
7. Idhānanda ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena sa-
mannāgato hoti1 || || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā de-
vamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe ||
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi2 || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
7. Ayaṃ kho so Ānanda dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo
yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanā va
attānaṃ3 vyākareyya || || Khīṇanirayo mhi || khīṇatiracchāna-
yoniko3 khīṇapittivisayo3 || khīnāpāyaduggativinipāto || sotā-
panno ham asmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparā-
yano ti || ||
Veḷudvāravaggo pathamo4 || ||
Tassa1 uddānaṃ || ||
Rājā Ogadha5 Dīghāvu || Sāriputtāpare6 duve7 ||
Thapatayo8 Veḷudvāreyyā9 || Giñjakāvasathe tayo ti || ||

CHAPTER II.
SAHASSAKA-OR RĀJAKĀRAMA-VAGGO-DUTIYO.

SN_5,55(11).11. (1) Sahassa.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati Rāja-
kārāme || ||
2. Atha kho sahassabhikkhunisaṅgho10 yena Bhagavā
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā
ekam antam aṭṭhāsi || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo Bhagavā
etad avoca || Catuhi kho bhikkhuniyo dhammehi samannā-
gato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato
sambodhiparāyano || katamehi catuhi || ||
4. Idha bhikkhuniyo ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasā-
dena samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 B1 adaṇḍehi.
3 S3 attanā . . . -yoniyo . . . -petthi-
4 S1-3 sotāpattisaṃyutte pathamo vaggo.
5 S1-3 saṭayhañca.
6 B1 apare.
7 S1-3 dve.
8 S1-3 thapataṃ.
9 S1-3 -reyya.
10 S1-3 sahasso-

[page 361]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 361
5. 6. Dhamme || Saṅghe || ||
7. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-
[pe] || samādhisaṃvattanikehi1 || ||
8. Imehi kho bhikkhuniyo2 catuhi dhammehi samannāgato
ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sam-
bodhiparāyano ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).12. (2) Brāhmaṇā.
1. 2. 3Sāvatthi nidānam || ||
3. Brāhmanā bhikkhave udayagāminiṃ nāma paṭipadam
paññāpenti || te sāvakam evaṃ samādapenti || || Ehi tvam
ambho purisa kālasseva uṭṭhāya pācīnamukho4 yāhi || so
tvam mā semhaṃ5 parivajjehi || mā papātaṃ || mā6 khāṇum ||
mā7 kaṇṭakaṃ8 ṭhānam9 || mā candanikaṃ10 || mā oḷigallaṃ11 ||
yattha papāteyyāsi12 tattheva maraṇam āgaccheyyāsi13 ||
Evaṃ14 tvam ambho purisa kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā
sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissasīti15 || ||
4. Taṃ kho panetam bhikkhave16 brāhmaṇānaṃ bāla-
gamanam17 etam mūḷhagamanam etam na nibbidāya na
virāgāya na nirodhāya18 na upasamāya na abhiññāya na
sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati || || Ahañ ca kho
bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye19 udayagāminim paṭipadam20
paññāpemi || yā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upa-
samāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya {saṃvattati} || ||
Katamā ca yā bhikkhave udayagāminī paṭipadā || yā21
ekantanibbidāya || la-pe || nibbānāya saṃvattati || ||

1 S. 1, 5-8.
2 B1 bhikkhūnīyo B2 bhikkhuniyo.

5 B1-2 sombham.

7 S1 vā.
8 B1-2 kaṇḍakaṃ.

362 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
5. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || pe-la || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || ||
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
6. Ayaṃ kho sā bhikkhave udayagāminī patipadā yā1
ekantanibbidāya || la || nibbānāya saṃvattatī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).13. (3) Ānanda.
1. Ekam samayam āyasmā ca Ānando2 āyasmā ca Sāri-
putto3 Sāvatthiyaṃ viharanti4 Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa
ārāme || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto sāyaṇhasamayam paṭi-
sallāṇā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā Ānando tenupasaṅkami || upa-
saṅkamitvā āyasmatā Ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi || sam-
modanīyaṃ katham sārāṇīyaṃ vītisāretva ekam antaṃ
nisīdi || ekam antam nisinno kho āyasmā Sāriputto āyas-
mantam Ānandam etad avoca || ||
3. Katīnam5 kho āvuso Ānanda dhammānam pahānā
katīnam5 dhammānaṃ samannāgamanahetu evam ayam
pajā6 Bhagavatā vyākatā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā
niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||
4. Catunnaṃ kho āvuso dhammānam pahānā7 catunnam8
dhammānaṃ samannāgamanahetu evam ayam pajā Bha-
gavatā vyākatā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sam-
bodhiparāyanā ti || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Yathārūpena kho āvuso Buddhe apasādena9 saman-
nāgato assutāvā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā
āpāyam duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ10 nirayam upapajjati11 || tathā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ya.
2 S1-3 Sāriputto.
3 S1-3 Ānando.
4 S3 viharati.
5 B1 katinaṃ S1-3 katinnam.
6 missing in B1.
7 missing in S1 which puts pahānāhanda before catunnaṃ kho
S3 omits the whole.
8 S1-3 insert here kho āvuso.
9 S1-3 aveccappasādena.
10 missing in S1.
11 S uppajjati always.

[page 363]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 363
rūpassa Buddhe appasādo1 na hoti || || Yathārūpena2 ca
kho1 avuso Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato sutavā
ariyasāvako kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ
lokam upapajjati || tathārūpassa Buddhe aveccappasādo
hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || pa-pe || satthā devamanussānam
buddho bhagavā ti || ||
6. Yathārūpena kho āvuso dhamme appasādena3 sa-
mannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhe- pa- ma-
apāyaṃ dug- vinipātaṃ4 nirayam upapajjati || tathārupassa
dhamme aveccappasādo5 na hoti || || Yathārūpena ca kho
āvuso dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato sutavā ari-
yasāvako kāyassa bhe- pa- ma- sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokam
upapajjati || tathārūpassa dhamme aveccappasādo hoti ||
svākhyāto6 Bhagavatā dhammo7 || la-pe || viññūhīti || ||
7. Yathārūpena kho āvuso saṅghe appasādena3 saman-
nāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhe- pa- ma- apāyam
duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayam upapajjati || tathārūpassa
saṅghe aveccappasādo5 na hoti || || Yathārūpena ca kho
āvuso saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato sutavā ariya-
sāvako kāyassa bhe- pa- ma- sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokam
upapajjati || tathārūpassa saṅghe aveccappasādo hoti || su-
paṭipanno Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho || la-pe || anuttaram
puññakkhettaṃ lokassā ti || ||
8. Yathārūpena kho āvuso dussīlyena8 samannāgato
assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhe- pa- ma- duggatiṃ vinipā-
taṃ nirayam uppajjati || tathārūpassa dussīlena9 hoti || ||
Yathārūpehi ca kho āvuso ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato
sutavā ariyasāvako kāyassa bhe- pa- ma- sugatiṃ saggaṃ
lokam upapajjati || tathārūpassa10 ariyakantāni sīlāni honti
akhaṇḍāni || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikāni || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 so all the MSS. S1-3 omit buddhe.
2 S1-3 -rūpe.
3 S1-3 aveccappasādena.
4 missing in S1.
5 B1-2 appasādo.
6 S1-3 svākkhāto.
7 S1-3 insert paccattaṃ veditabbo.
8 S1-3 dussīlena.
9 B1-2 dussīlyaṃna.
10 S3 tathārūpāssa S1 yathārūpassa B1-2 tathārūpānissa.

ayam pajā Bhagavatā vyākatā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā
niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).14. (4) Duggati.
3. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasā-
vako sabbaduggatibhayam2 samatikkanto hoti || katamehi
catuhi || ||
4--7. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappa-
sādena samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe ||
satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Dhamme || ||
Saṅghe || || Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgāto hoti akhaṇ-
ḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
8. Ime hi kho bhikkhave catuhi dhammehi samannāgato
ariyasāvako sabbaduggatibhayaṃ2 samatikkanto hotī ti3 || ||

SN_5,55(11).15. (5) Duggati2.
3. Catuhi- -ariyasāvako sabbaduggativinipātabhayaṃ4
samatikkanto hoti || ||
4--7. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe-5 || ||
8. Imehi- ariyasāvako sabbaduggativinipātabhayaṃ2 sa-
matikkanto hotī ti6 || ||

SN_5,55(11).16. (6) Mittenāmaccā1.
3. Ye hi7 bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca sotabbam
maññeyyum mittā vā amaccā vā ñāti vā sālohitā vā || te
kho8 bhikkhave catusu sotāpattiyaṅgesu samādapetabbā
nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā9 || katamesu catusu || ||

2 S1 -duggatiṃ-

4 S1-3 -duggatiṃ-
5 the phrase about buddha is complete in S1-3.
6 S3 hoti; -- duggati
2 differs from duggati
1 only by the insertion of the word vinipāta.
7 B1-2 te.
8 in S1-3 only.
9 S1-3 patiṭṭha-

[page 365]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 365
4. Buddhe aveccappasāde samādapetabbā || [pe] || Iti pi
so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho bha-
gavā ti || Dhamme1 || Saṅghe1 || Ariyakantesu sīlesu samāda-
petabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā akhaṇḍesu || la || sa-
mādhisaṃvattanikesu || ||
5. Ye2 bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca sotabbam
maññeyyum mittā vā amaccā vā ñāti vā sālohitā vā te
vo3 bhikkhave imesu4 catusu sotāpattiyaṅgesu samādape-
tabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).17. (7) Mittenāmaccā2.
3. Ye5 bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca6 sotabbam
maññeyyum mittā vā amaccā7 vā ñātīvā8 sālohitā9 vā || te
vo3 bhikkhave catusu sotāpattiyaṅgesu samādapetabbā
nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā || katamesu catusu || ||
4. Buddhe aveccappasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā
patiṭṭhāpetabbā || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Siyā bhikkhave ca-
tunnam mahābhūtānam aññathattam10 pathavīdhatuyā āpo-
dhātuyā tejodhātuyā vāyodhātuyā || na tveva Buddhe
aveccappasādenasamannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā añña-
thattaṃ || tatridam aññathattaṃ || || So vata Buddhe avec-
cappasādena samannāgato ariyasāvako nirayaṃ vā tiracchā-
nayonim vā pittivisayaṃ11 vā upapajjissatī ti12 || netaṃ
ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
5--6. Dhamme || || {Saṅghe}13 || ||
7. Ariyakantesu sīlesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā pa-
tiṭṭhapetabbā || akhaṇḍesu || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikesu || ||
Siyā bhikkhave catunnam mahābhūtānam aññathattam
pathavidhatuyā āpo- tejo- vāyodhātuyā || na tveva ariya-

1 almost complete in S1-3.
2 B1 insert te.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 in B1-2 only.
5 B1-2 add te.
6 S1 save instead of ye ca.
7 S1-3 vāmaccā instead of vā a-
8 B1 S3 ñātivā.
9 S3 lohitā.
10 B1-2 aññatattaṃ (or -tatthaṃ) always.
11 S1-3 petti-
12 S1-3 uppaj- always.
13 S1-3 add aveccap- samāda- ni- patiṭṭhā- -pe-

[page 366]
366 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
kantehi sīlehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā añña-
thattam || tatridam aññathattam || || So vata ariyakantehi
sīlehi samannāgato ariyasāvako nirayaṃ vā tiracchāna-
yoniṃ vā pittivisayaṃ vā uppajjissatī ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
vijjati || ||
8. Ye1 bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca sotabbam
maññeyyum mittā vā amaccā vā ñatī2 vā sālohitā vā || te
vo3 bhikkhave imesu catusu sotāpattiyaṅgesu samādape-
tabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā ti4 || ||

SN_5,55(11).18. (8) Devacārika1.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ5 || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno seyyathāpi nāma
balavā puriso sammiñjitaṃ vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritaṃ
vā bāhaṃ sammiñjeyya6 || evam eva Jetavane antarahito
devesu Tāvatiṃsesu pātur ahosi || ||
3. Atha kho sambahulā Tāvatiṃsakāyikā7 devatāyo
yenāyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅ-
kamitvā āyasmantam Mahā-Moggalānam abhivādetvā ekam
antam aṭṭhaṃsu || || Ekam antaṃ ṭhitā kho tā devatāyo
āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno etad avoca8 || ||
4. Sādhu kho āvuso Buddhe aveccappasādena samannā-
gamanaṃ hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la || satthā devama-
nussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgamanahetu kho āvuso evam idhekacce sattā
kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggaṃ lokam
upapajjatī ti9 || ||
5.6. Sādhu kho āvuso dhamme || Saṅghe10 || ||
7. Sādhu kho āvuso ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgama-
naṃ hoti ākhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattānikehi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 add te.
2 B1-3 S3 ñāti.
3 in S1-3 only.
4 S1-3 tīti.
5 S1-3 Eko sa- ā- Mahā-Mog- sā- vi- Jet- Anā- ārāme.
6 B1 samiñj- B2 samañch-
7 S1-3 tāvatiṃsā-
8 S1-3 have tā (S1 sā) devatā āyasmantam M-Moggalānam etad avocuṃ || ||
9 S1-3 uppaj- always.
10 5 and 6 are complete in S1-3.

[page 367]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 367
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho āvuso evam
idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatiṃ
saggaṃ lokam upapajjantī ti || ||
8. Sādhu kho mārisa Moggalāna Buddhe aveccappasā-
dena samannāgamanaṃ hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe ||
satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Buddhe
aveccappasādena samannāgamana hetu kho mārisa Mogga-
lāna evam idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā
sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokam upapajjanti || ||
9--11. Sādhu kho mārisa Moggalāna dhamme || pe-[la] ||
{saṅghe} || ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇ-
ḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Ariyakantehi sīlehi
samannāgamanahetu kho mārisa Moggalāna evam idhe-
kacce sattā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ
lokam upapajjantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).19. (9) Devacārika2.
1. Ekam samayaṃ āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno Sāvatthiyaṃ
viharati Jetavane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārame1 || ||
2--7. Atha kho āyasmā Mahā-Moggalāno2 seyyathāpi
nāma balavā puriso || pe || ||
8--11. Sādhu kho mārisa- osattā kāyassa bhedā param
maraṇā sugatiṃ saggam lokam upapannā ti3 || ||

SN_5,55(11).20. (10) Devacārika3.
2. Atha kho Bhagavā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso ||
pe || evam eva Jetavane antarahito devesu Tāvatiṃsesu
pātur ahosi || ||
3. Atha kho sambahulā Tāvatiṃsakāyikā4 devatāyo yena
Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 have only sāvatthinidānaṃ.
2 B1 -moggalāne.
3 S1-3 uppannā ti || So S1-3'; the sutta is complete in B1-2;
it differs only from Devacārika 1, by the participle upapannā
(or uppannā) instead of upapajjanti (or uppajjanti).
4 S1 has tāvatiṃsā- corrected to tāvatiṃsa- in S3.

[page 368]
368 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
abhivādetvā ekam antam aṭṭhaṃsu || || Ekam antaṃ ṭhitā
kho tā1 devatāyo Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
4--7. Sādhu kho āvuso Buddhe aveccappasādena sa-
mannāgamanaṃ hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Buddhe aveccap-
pasādena samannāgamanahetu kho āvuso evam idhekacce
sattā2 sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparā-
yanā || || Sādhu kho āvuso Dhamme || pe [pa] || Saṅghe || ||
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanam hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-
pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Ariyakantehi sīlehi3 sa-
mannāgamana hetu kho āvuso evam idhekacce sattā2
sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||
8--11. Sādhu kho mārisa Buddhe aveccappasādena sa-
mannāgamanaṃ hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Buddhe aveccap-
pasādena samannāgamanahetu kho mārisa4 evam ayam pajā2
sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā || ||
Sādhu kho mārisa Dhamme || || {Saṅghe} || ariyakantehi
sīlehi5 samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhi-
saṃvattanikehi || || Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu
kho mārisa evam ayam pajā6 sotāpannā avinipātadhammā
niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||
Sahassakavaggo7 dutiyo8 || ||
Uddānaṃ || ||
Sahassa Brāhmaṇā Ānando9 || Duggati apare duve8 ||
Mittenāmaccā10 dve vuttā || tayo ca2 Devacārikā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 sā.
2 in B1-2 only.
3 missing in S1.
4 S1 adds Moggallāna.
5 S1 and S3 have ariyakante, both omitting hi sīlehi.
6 missing in S1-3.
7 S1-3 sahassakāra- B1 rājakārāma-
8 missing in S1-3.
9 B1-2 Ānanda.
10 omitted by S1-3.

[page 369]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 369

CHAPTER III. SARAṆĀNIVAGGO TATIYO.

SN_5,55(11).21. (1) Mahānāma1.
1. Evam me sutaṃ1 ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sakkesu
viharati Kapilavatthusmiṃ Nigrodhārāme || ||
2. Atha kho Mahānāmo sakko yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Mahānāmo sakko
Bhagavantam etad avoca2 || ||
3. Idam bhante Kapilavatthu3 iddhaṃ4 ceva5 phitañca
bahujanam6 ākiṇṇamanussam7 sambādhavyūhaṃ8 || || So
khvāham bhante Bhagavantaṃ vā {payirupāsitvā} mano-
bhāvanīye vā bhikkhū9 sāyaṇhasamayaṃ Kapilavatthum
pavisanto bhante na pi hatthinā samāgacchāmi || bhante
na pi assena samāgacchāmi || bhante na pi rathena10 samā-
gacchāmi || bhante na pi sakaṭena samāgacchāmi || bhante
na pi purisena samāgacchami || tassa mayham bhante
{tasmiṃ} samaye mussateva Bhagavantam ārabbha sati ||
mussati dhammam arabbha sati11 || mussati saṅgham
ārabbha sati12 || || Tassa mayham bhante evaṃ hoti ||
Imamhi cāhaṃ samaye kālaṃ kareyyaṃ kā mayhaṃ13
gati ko abhisamparāyo ti || ||
4. Mā bhāyi14 Mahānāma mā bhāyi Mahānāma || apā-
pakaṃ te maraṇam bhavissati apāpikā kālaṃkiriyā || ||
Yassa kassaci Mahānāma dīgharattaṃ saddhāparibhāvitaṃ
cittaṃ sīlaparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ sutaparibhāvitaṃ15 cittaṃ
cāgaparibhāvitaṃ cittam paññaparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ ||
tassa yo hi khvāyaṃ16 kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 this phrase in B1-2 only.
2 B1 avocuṃ.
3 S1-3 -vatthuṃ.
4 S1 B1 idam.
5 S1 eva.
6 B1-2 bahujaññam.
7 S1-3 -manussā.
8 S1 -vyūgaṃ.
9 S1-3 -vanīyaṃ vā bhikkhuṃ (S1 -kkhu).
10 B1 parithena B2 para- both instead of pira-
11 This phrase is not to be found in S3.
12 S1-3 add mussati.
13 S1-3 mamassa.
14 S1 bhāya.
15 S1 -pāri-
16 S3 khvāhaṃ.

[page 370]
370 Sotāpatti-Samyuttam LV.
pittikasambhavo1 odanakummāsupacayo aniccucchādana-
parimaddana-bhedana-viddhaṃsanadhammo2 tam idheva
kākā vā khādanti gijjhā vā khādanti kulalā vā khādanti
sunakhā3 vā khādanti sigālā va khādanti vividhā vā
pāṇakajātā khādanti || || Yañca khvassa cittaṃ dīgharattaṃ
saddhāparibhāvitam sīla-suta-cāga-paribhāvitaṃ4 || tam
uddhagāmi5 hoti visesagāmi6 || ||
5. Seyyathāpi Mahānāma7 puriso sappikumbham vā
telakumbham vā gambhīram udakarahadam ogāhetvā8
bhindeyya || tatra yā assa9 sakkharā vā kaṭhalā vā sā adho-
gāmī assa || yañca khvassa tatra sappi vā telaṃ vā tam
uddhaṃgāmī assa visesāgamī || || Evam eva kho Mahānāma
yassa kassaci dīgharattaṃ saddhāparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ sīla-
suta-cāga-paññāparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ || tassa hoti khvāyam
kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpittikasambhavo1 odana-
kummāsupacayo aniccucchādana-parimaddana-bhedana-
viddhaṃsanadhammo10 || tam idheva kākā vā11 khādanti ||
gijjhā vā khā- || kulalā vā khā- || sunakhā12 vā khā- || sigālā
vā khā- || vividhā vā pāṇakajātā khādanti || || Yañca
khvassa13 taṃ14 cittaṃ dīgharattaṃ saddhāparibhāvitaṃ
sīla-suttacāgapaññā paribhāvitaṃ15 || tam11 uddhaṃgāmī16
hoti visesagāmī || ||
6. Tuyhaṃ kho pana Mahānama dīgharattaṃ15 saddha-
paribhāvitaṃ cittam sīla-suta-cāga-paññāparibhāvitaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -petti-
2 B1 aniccacchā- S1 aniccupacchā- B2 -vidhaṃsana-
B1 -vimaṃsana-
3 S1 supaṇṇā S3 suvaṇṇā.
4 S1-3 add paribhāvitam after each word.
5 B1-2 uddhaṃ-
6 B1 -gamī.
7 S1 balavā S3 nāma balavā instead of Mahānāma.
8 S1 ogātetvā B1-2 ogāhetvā.
9 S1-3 yāssa instead of yā assa.
10 B2 aniccacchā- S1 aniccupacchā- S1 -viddhasana- B1 vimaṃsana.
11 missing in S3.
12 S1 supaṇṇā S3 supāṇā.
13 S1-3 khvāssa.
14 missing in B1.
15 S1-3 sīlaparibhāvitam -pe- tam paribhāvitaṃ.
16 S1-3 uddha- B2 -gāmi always.

[page 371]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 371
cittam || mā bhāyi1 Mahānāma mā bhāyi Mahānāma apā-
pakaṃ te maraṇam bhavissati apāpikā kālakiriyā2 ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).22. (2) Mahānāma2.
1. Evaṃ me sutaṃ-3 || ||
2. Atha kho Mahānamo- || ||
3. Idam4 bhante Kapilavatthu-5 || ||
4. Mā bhāyi Mahānāma ma bhāyi Mahānāma apāpa-
kaṃ te6 maraṇam bhavissati apāpikā kālakiriyā || || Catuhi
kho Mahānāma dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako
nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro || kata-
mehi catuhi || ||
5. Idha Mahānāma ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || ||
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti || akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
6. Seyyathāpi Mahānāma rukkho pācinaninno7 pācīna-
poṇo pācīnapabbhāro || so mūle chinne8 katamena papa-
teyyā ti9 || ||
Yena bhante ninno yena poṇo yena pabbhāro ti || ||
Evam eva kho Mahānāma imehi catuhi dhammehi sa-
mannāgato ariyasāvako nibbhānaninno nibbānapoṇo nibbā-
napabbhāro ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).23. (3) Godhā (or Mahānāma3).
1. Kapilavatthunidānaṃ10 || ||
2. Atha Kho Mahānāmo sakko yena Godhā sakko tenu-
pasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Godhaṃ11 sakkam etad avoca || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 bhāyī.
2 S3 -kiriyāyā B1-2 kālaṃ- always.
3 this phrase in B1-2 only. -- The numbers 1,2,3 do not differ from
those of the preceding sutta.
4 S1-3 idha.
5 B2 kappīla- always S1-3 -vatthuṃ.
6 put after maraṇaṃ in S1-3.
7 S1 rūpocīnaninno instead of rukkho pācī-
8 S1-3 chinno.
9 S3 pateyyā ti.
10 B2 kappīya- -- S1-3 Ek- sa- Bha- sak- vi- ka- ni-
11 S1 godha.

[page 372]
372 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
3. Katīhi tvam Godhe1 dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotā-
pannam puggalam ājānasi || avinipātadhāmmaṃ niyataṃ
sambodhiparāyanan ti || ||
Tīhi khvāham Mahānāma dhammehi samannāgataṃ
sotāpannam puggalam ājānāmi avinipātadhammam niyatam
sambodhiparāyanaṃ2 || || Katamehi tīhi || ||
4. Idha Mahānāma ariyāsavako Buddha aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} avec-
cappasādena samannāgato hoti3 || supaṭipanno Bhagavato
sāvakasaṅgho || la-[pe] || anuttaram puññakhettaṃ lokassā
ti || || Imehi khvāham4 Mahānāma3 tīhi dhammehi sa-
mannāgataṃ sotāpannam puggalam ājānāmi || avinipāta-
dhammam niyataṃ sambodhiparāyanaṃ || ||
5. Tvam pana Mahānāma katīhi dhammehi samannāga-
taṃ sotāpannaṃ puggalam ājānāsi avinipātadhammaṃ
niyatam sambodhiparāyanan ti || ||
Catuhi khvāham bho5 Godhe dhammehi samannāgatam
sotāpannam puggalam ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ
sambodhiparāyanaṃ2 || katamehi catuhi || || Idha Godhe
ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || ||
Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho
bhagavā ti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || Ariyakantehi sīlehi sa-
mannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
Imehi khvāham Godhe catuhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ
sotāpannam puggalam ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ
sambodhiparāyanan ti || ||
6. Āgamehi6 tvam Mahānāma āgamehi tvam Mahānāma7 ||
Bhagavā va8 etaṃ jāneyya etehi dhammehi samannāgatam
vā9 asamannāgataṃ vā ti || ||
Āyāma Godhe yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkameyyāma10 ||
upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavato etam attham ārocessāmā ti11 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 godha.
2 S1-3 -parāyananti.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 S3 khoham.
5 in S1-3 only.
6 S1 āhaimehi S3 āhamehi.
7 S1-3 -pe- instead of the repetition āgamehi-
8 S1-3 ca.
9 missing in B1.
10 S1-3 upasaṅkamāma.
11 B1-2 āroci- S1 āroca-

[page 373]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 373
7. Atha kho Mahānāmo1 sakko Godhā ca sakko yena
Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam
abhivādetvā ekam antam nisīdiṃsu || Ekam antaṃ nisinno
kho Mahānāmo sakko Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
8. Idhāham bhante yena Godhā sakko tenupasaṅkamiṃ ||
upasaṅkamitvā Godhaṃ2 sakkam etad avocaṃ || katīhi
tvaṃ Godhe dhammehi samannāgatam sotāpannam pugga-
lam ājānāsi avinipāta- ni- sambodhi- || || Evam vutte bhante
Godhā sakkho mam etad avoca || || Tīhi khvāham Mahā-
nāma dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannam puggalam
ājānāmi avi- ni- sambodhi- || katamehi tīhi || || Idha Mahā-
nāma ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato
hoti || || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānam
buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || supaṭipanno Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ||
la-pe || anuttaram puññakkhettaṃ lokassā ti || || Imehi
khvāham3 Mahānāma tīhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotā-
pannam puggalam ājānāmi avi- ni- sambodhi- || || Tvam
pana Mahānāma katīhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotā-
pannam puggalam ājānāsi avini- ni- sambodhiparāyanan ti || ||
9. Evaṃ vuttāham4 bhante Godham5 sakkam etad
avocam || || Catuhi khvāham Godhe6 dhammehi samannā-
gatam sotāpannam puggalam ājānāmi avi- ni- sambodhi- || ||
Katamehi catuhi || || Idha Godhe ariyasāvako Buddhe
aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || || Iti pi so Bhagavā ||
la-pe || satthā devamanussānam Buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme ||
Saṅghe || ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || ||
la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Imehi khvāhaṃ3 Godhe
catuhi dhammehi samannāgatam sotāpannam puggalam
ājānāmi avini- ni- sambodhiparāyanan ti || || Evam vutte
bhante Godhā sakko mam etad avoca || Āgamehi tvam
Mahānāma āgamehi tvam Mahānāma || Bhagavā va7 etam
jāneyya8 etehi dhammehi samannāgatam vā asamannāga-
taṃ vā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ca.
2 S3 godha S1 godhi.
3 S1-3 khoham.
4 S1-3 vutteham.
5 S1-3 Godha.
6 S1-3 kho instead of khvāham godhe.
7 S3 ca; missing in B1.
8 S1-3 evaṃ jāneyyum.

[page 374]
374 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
10. Idha bhante kocid eva dhammasamuppādo1 uppaj-
jeyya || ekato assa2 Bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho3 || yeneva4
Bhagavā tenevāham assaṃ5 evam pasannam mam bhante
Bhagavā dhāretu || ||
11. Idha bhante kocid eva dhammasamuppādo uppaj-
jeyya || ekato assa Bhagavā6 ekato bhikkhusaṅgho7 bhikkhu-
nīsaṅgho ca yeneva Bhagavā8 tenevāham assam2 evam
pasannam mam bhante Bhagavā dhāretu || ||
12. Idha bhante kocid eva dhammasamuppādo uppaj-
jeyya || ekato9 assa Bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho10 bhik-
khunīsaṅgho11 upāsakā ca yeneva Bhagavā tenevāham
assam1 evam pasannam mam bhante Bhagavā dhāretu || ||
13. Idha bhante kocid eva dhammasamuppādo uppaj-
jeyya || ekato assa Bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhu-
{nīsaṅgho} upāsakā upāsikāyo ca12 yeneva13 Bhagavā tene-
vāham assaṃ || evam pasannam mam bhante Bhagavā
dhāretu || ||
14. Idha bhante kocid eva dhammasamuppādo uppaj-
jeyya || ekato assa Bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhu-
{nīsaṅgho} upāsakā upāsikāyo sadevako ca14 loko samārako15
sabrahmako15 sassamaṇabrāhmaṇapajā16 sadevamanussā ||
yeneva13 Bhagavā tenevāham assam evam pasannaṃ mam
bhante14 Bhagavā dhāretū ti || ||
15. Evaṃvādiṃ17 tvam Godhe Māhānāmaṃ18 sakkaṃ
kiṃ vadesī ti || ||
Evaṃvādāham19 bhante Mahānāmaṃ18 sakkaṃ na kiñci
vadāmi aññatra kalyāṇā20 aññatra kusalā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 dhamme here only B1-2 dhammo always.
2 B1-2 ayam always.
3 B1-2 add ca.
4 S1-3 yena always.
5 B1 ayaṃ.
6 S3 omits ekato-
7 S1 adds ekato.
8 S1-3 omit yeneva Bhagavā.
9 S1 eto.
10 S1 inserts ekato.
11 missing in S3.
12 S1-3 omit bhikkhunī sangho-
13 S1-3 yena.
14 missing in S1-3.
15 B1 add ca.
16 S1-3 B2 -brahmanī- (B2 -ṇi).
17 B2 -vādī S1 B1 -vādi.
18 S1-3 -nāmakaṃ.
19 S1 evaṃvādā-
20 S3 omits aññatrakalyāṇā.

[page 375]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 375

SN_5,55(11).24. (4) Sarakāni or Saraṇāni 1.
1. Kapilavatthu nidānaṃ1 || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Sarakāni2 sakko kālakato
hoti so3 Bhagavatā vyākato sotāpanno avinipātadhammo
niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||
3. Tatra sudam sambahulā Sakkā saṅgamma samā-
gamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti || Acchariyam vata
bho abbhutaṃ vata bho etthadāniko na3 sotāpanno bha-
vissati || yatra hi nāma Sarakāni sakko kālakato so Bhaga-
vatā vyākato sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhi-
parāyano ti || ||
Sarakāni sakko sikkhādubbalyam āpādi majjapānam
apāyī ti4 || ||
4. Atha kho Mahānāmo sakko yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antam nisīdi || ek- an- ni- kho Mahānamo sakko Bhaga-
vantam etad avoca || ||
5. Idha bhante Sarakāni sakko kālakato so Bhagavatā
vyākato sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparā-
yano ti || || Tatra sudam bhante sambahulā Sakkā saṅ-
gamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti bhīyanti vipācenti Accha-
riyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho etthadāniko na5 sotā-
panno bhavissati || yatra hi nāma Sarakāṇi sakko kālakato
so Bhagavatā vyākato sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato
sambodhiparāyano ti || || Sarakāni6 sakko sikkhādubbalyam
āpādi7 majjapānam apāyīti8 || ||
Yo so Mahānāma dīgharattam upāsako Buddhaṃ sara-
ṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ sa- gato saṅghaṃ sa- gato kathaṃ
vinipātam gaccheyya || ||
6. Yañ hi tam Mahānama sammāvadamāno vadeyya
Dīgharattam upāsako buddham- dhammam- saṅghaṃ- sa-
raṇaṃ gato ti9 || Sarakānisakkaṃ sammāvadamāno vadeyya || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B2 kappīla- niddānaṃ -- S1-3 Ek- sa- Bh- Sak- vi- Ka-
nigrodhārāme.
2 B1-2 saraṇāni always S1 saratāni here only.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 B1 āpāyī ti.
5 missing in S1-3 B2.
6 S1-3 put here tatrasudaṃ.
7 S3 āpādī.
8 B1 S1-3 āpā-
9 S3 omit ti.

[page 376]
376 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
Sarakāni Mahānāma sakko dīgharattam upāsako Buddhaṃ-
dhammaṃ- saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato so kathaṃ vinipātam
gaccheyya || ||
7. Idha Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe aveccappa-
sādena samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || ||
Hāsapañño1 javanapañño vimuttiyā ca samannāgato || || So
āsavanānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttim paññāvimuttim
diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
viharati || Ayam pi kho Mahānāma puggalo parimutto
nirayā || parimutto tiracchānayoniyā || parimutto pittivisayā ||
parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā || ||
8. Idha pana2 Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe
aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā ||
la-pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti ||
Dhamme || Saṅghe || hāsapañño1 javanapañño na ca vi-
muttiyā samannāgato || || So pañcannam orambhāgiyānam
saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinib-
bāyī3 anāvattidhammo4 asmā5 lokā || || Ayam pi kho Ma-
hānāma puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchāyo-
niyā || parimutto pittivisayā || parimutto apāyaduggati vini-
pātā || ||
9. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe avec-
cappasādena samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe ||
satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme ||
Saṅghe || na2 hāsapañño6 na javanapañño na ca7 vimuttiyā
samannāgato || so tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā rāga-
dosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmi8 hoti sakid9 eva imaṃ
lokam āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti || || Ayam pi kho
Mahānāma puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchā-
nayoniyā || parimutto pittivisayā parimutto apāyaduggati-
vinipātā10 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 hāsu- always.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S3 -yi B2 -yiṃ (?).
4 S1 anāvatthidhamme.
5 S1-3 tasmā.
6 S1-3 hāsu- S3 -paññe.
7 in B1-2 only.
8 S1-3 adds no.
9 B1-2 sakiṃd.
10 S1 apāyā-

[page 377]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 377
10. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe
aveccappasadena- || Dhamme || Saṅghe || na hāsapañño na1
javanapañño na2 vimuttiyā samannāgato || so tiṇṇaṃ sam-
yojanānam parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo
sambodhiparāyano ti || || Ayam pi kho Mahānāma puggalo
parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā3 parimutto
pittivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā || ||
11. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo na heva kho
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || na dhamme ||
na4 {saṅghe} || na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā
samannāgato || api cassa ime dhammā honti || saddhindriyaṃ
viriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ5 samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ ||
tathāgatapaveditā6 cassa dhammā paññāya mattaso nijjhā-
naṃ khamanti7 || || Ayam pi kho Mahānāma puggalo
agantā8 nirayaṃ agantā9 tiracchānayoniṃ10 agantā pitti-
visayam11 agantā12 apāyaduggativinipātaṃ13 || ||
12. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo na heva kho
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || na Dhamme ||
na Saṅghe || na hāsapañño na javanapañño || na ca vimuttiyā
samannāgato || api cassa dhammā honti saddhindriyaṃ ||
la-pe || paññindriyaṃ || Tathāgate cassa14 saddhāmattam
hoti pemamattaṃ || || Ayam pi kho puggalo agantā15 nira-
yam agantā tiracchānayonim agantā pittivisayaṃ16 agantā17
apāyaduggativinipātaṃ || ||
13. Ime ce pi Mahānāma mahāsālā subhāsitaṃ dubbhā-
sitam ājāneyyuṃ18 || ime cāham19 mahāsāle vyākareyyaṃ
Sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti ||
kimaṅga20 pana21 Sarakāniṃ22 sakkaṃ || Sarakāni Mahā-
nāma sakko maraṇakāle sikkhaṃ samādiyī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B2.
2 B1 ca instead of na, B2 na ca.
3 pari- tirac- is repeated in S1.
4 missing in S3.
5 missing in S1.
6 B1 -vedatā corrected from veditā.
7 S1-3 khamati.
8 So B1-2 ag- always S1-3 āgantvā.
9 S3 āgatā S1 āgantā.
10 S1 -yoni S3 -yoniyaṃ āgantā.
11 B2 petti-
12 S1 āgantaṃ S3 āgantā.
13 S1 apāyaṃ-
14 S1-3 vassa.
15 S1 attā or antā.
16 S3 omits agantā pitti-
17 S1 āgantā.
18 S1-3 -neyyaṃ.
19 B1 imesaṃham.
20 B1-2 -aṅgaṃ.
21 missing in S1-3.
22 B1 S3 -ni S3 sāra-

378 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.

SN_5,55(11).25. (5) Sarakāni or Saraṇāni 2.
1. Kapilavatthunidānaṃ1 || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Sarakāni- || ||
3. Tatra sudaṃ sambahulā sakkā- -Etthadaniko na2
sotāpanno bhavissati || -sambodhisamparāyano ti || ||
Sarakāni sakko sikkhāya aparipūrakārī ahosī ti || ||
4. Atha kho Mahānāmo -etad avoca || ||
5. Idha bhante Sarakāni sakko- -etthadāniko na sota-
panno bhavissati- -sambodhiparāyano ti || || Sarakāni sakko
sikkhāya aparipūrakārī ahosī ti || ||
Yo so Mahānama- -kathaṃ vinipātam gaccheyya || ||
6. Yañ hi tam Mahānama sammāvadamano- -so katham
vinipātaṃ gaccheyya || ||
7. Idha Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe ekantagato3
hoti abhippasanno4 || Iti pi so Bhagavā- -parimutto apāya-
duggativinipātā || ||
8. Idha pana5 Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe ekan-
tagato hoti abhippasanno || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā
devamanussāṇam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || ||
Hāsapañño javanapañño vimuttiyā ca samannāgato || so
pañcannam orambhāgiyānam parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī
hoti || upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti || {sasaṅkhārapavirinibbāyī}6
hoti || asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī7 hoti || uddhaṃsoto hoti aka-
niṭṭhagāmī || || Ayam pi kho Mahānāma puggalo parimutto
nirayā || pe || parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā || ||
9. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe ekan-
tagato hoti abhippasanno || Iti pi so Bhagavā || Dhamme ||
{Saṅghe} || na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā
samannāgato || so8 tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānam parikkhayā rāga-
dosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakid eva imaṃ
lokam āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti || ayam pi kho Mahā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 Ekaṃ sa- Bha- Sak- vi- Kapi- ni- -- As this sutta
is parallel to the preceding one,I give only
the differing parts.
2 So all the MSS.
3 S1-3 ekanti- always.
4 S1 abhisampanno.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 B1-2 asankhāra-
7 sasankhāra-
8 S3 hoti.

[page 379]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 379
nāma puggalo parimutto nirayā || pe || parimutto apāya-
duggativinipātā || ||
10. Idha pana Mahānama ekacco puggalo Buddhe
ekantagato1 hoti abhippasanno || Iti pi so Bhagavā ti || pe ||
Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca
vimuttiyā samannāgato2 || so tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parik-
khayā sotapanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhi-
parāyano || ayam pi kho Mahānāma puggalo parimutto
nirayā || pe || parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā || ||
11. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo Buddhe na
heva kho Buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno || na
Dhamme || na {Saṅghe} || na hāsa- || api cassa ime dhammā honti
saddhindriyam || la || pe || paññindriyaṃ || -nijjhānaṃ kha-
manti || ayam pi kho Mahānāma puggalo agantā3 nirayaṃ-
-apāyaduggativinipātaṃ4 || ||
12. Idha pana Mahānāma ekacco puggalo na heva kho
Buddhe5 ekantagato hoti abhippasanno6 || na Dhamme ||
na {Saṅghe}- || -na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato || api cassa
ime dhammā honti || saddhindriyaṃ || la || pe || paññindriyaṃ ||
Tathāgate cassa saddhāmattam hoti pemamattaṃ || ayam
pi kho Mahānāma ayantā- || -apāyaduggatinininipātaṃ7 || ||
13. Seyyathāpi Mahānāma dukkhettaṃ dubbhūmi8 avi-
hatakhānukam bījāni cassu9 khaṇḍāni pūtini vātātapaha-
tām asārāni10 asukhasayitāni11 || devo ca12 na5 sammā-
dhāram anupaveccheyya13 || || Api nu tāni bījāni vuddhiṃ
viruḷhiṃ vepullam āpajjeyyum tī || ||
No hetam bhante || ||
Evam eva kho Mahānama idha dhammo dvākkhāto hoti
duppavedito anīyāniko anupasamasaṃvattanike14 asammā-
sambuddhappavedito || idam aham15 dukkhettasmiṃ vadāmi ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ekantigatiko.
2 S1-3 add hoti.
3 agantā everywhere.
4 B1 apāyaṃ.
5 missing in S1-3
6 B1 -pasanto.
7 S1 B1 apāyam B2 omits agantā apāyam.
8 B1 -dubbhūmiṃ S1-3 dubbhūmam.
9 S1-3 cassa.
10 S1-3 asāradāni.
11 B1 asukhāpassitāni.
12 missing in B1.

15 S3 idhamahā.
