380 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
tasmiṃ ca dhamme sāvako viharati dhammānudhamma-
paṭipanno sāmīcipaṭipanno anudhammacārī idam ahaṃ
dubbījasmiṃ vadāmi || ||
14. Seyyathāpi Mahānāma sukhettaṃ subhūmi1 suvihata-
khāṇukaṃ bījāni cassu2 akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni
sārāni3 sukhasahitāni4 || devo ca sammādhāram5 anupa-
veccheyya6 || || Api nu tāni bījāni vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ ve-
pullam āpajjeyyun ti || ||
Evam bhante || ||
Evam eva kho Mahānāma idha dhammo svākkhāto
hoti supavedito nīyāniko upasamasaṃvattaniko sammāsam-
buddhapavedito idam ahaṃ sukhettasmiṃ vadāmi || tasmiṃ
ca dhamme sāvako viharati dhammānudhammapaṭipanno
sāmīcipaṭipanno anudhammacārī idam aham7 subījasmiṃ
vadāmi8 || {kimaṅga}9 pana Sarakānisakkaṃ10 || Sarakāni Ma-
hānāma sakko maraṇakāle sikkhāya paripūrakarī ahosī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).26. (6) Dussilya1 or Anāthapiṇḍika1.
1. 11 Sāvatthi nidānaṃ || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati
ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || ||
3. Atha kho Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati aññataram puri-
sam āmantesi || Ehi12 tvam ambho purisa yenāyasmā Sāri-
putto tenupasaṅkama13 || upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena
āyasmato Sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vanda || Anāthapiṇḍiko
bhante11 gahapati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || so
āyasmato Sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandatī ti || evañca
vadeti || || Sādhu kira bhante āyasmā Sāriputto yena Anā-
thapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasaṅkamatu
anukampam upādāyā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -bhūmiṃ S1-3 -bhūmaṃ.
2 S1-3 cassa.
3 B1 nisārāni S1-3 sāradāni.
4 B1 sukhāpassitāni.
5 B1 samācāram.
6 B1 -vaccheyya.
7 S1-3 imāham.
8 S3 vadāmī.
9 B1 kimaṇgaṃ B kiṃmaṇgaṃ.
10 B2 saraṇāniṃ- B1 repeats saraṇānisakkaṃ.
11 in B1-2 only.
12 B1 evahi.
13 B2 -saṅkami.

[page 381]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 381
Evam bhante ti kho so puriso Anāthapiṇḍikassa gaha-
patissa patissutvā yenāyasmā Sāriputto tenupasaṅkami ||
upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ Sāriputtam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || ||
4. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ
Sāriputtam etad avoca || || Anāthapiṇḍiko bhante gahapati
ābā- duk- bāla- || so āyasmato Sāriputtassa pāde si- van- ||
evañca vadeti1 || Sādhu kira bhante āy- Sāriputto yena
Anā- gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampam
upādāyā ti || ||
Adhivāsesi kho āy- Sāriputto tuṃhībhāvena || ||
5. Atha kho āy- Sāriputto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā
pattacīvaram ādāya āyasmatā Ānandena pacchā samaṇena
yena Anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesananaṃ tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi || || Nisajja
kho āyasmā Sāriputto Anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatim etad
avoca || || Kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīyaṃ
kacci2 dukkhā vedanā patikkamanti no abhikkamati pa-
ṭikkamo sānam paññāyati no abhikkamo3 ti || ||
Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ bāḷhā me
dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkamo4
sānam paññāyati no paṭikkamo ti || ||
6. Yathārūpena kho gahapati Buddhe appasādena sa-
mannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paramma-
raṇā apāyaṃ5 duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayam upapajjati6 ||
tathārūpo7 te Buddhe appasādo natthi atthi ca8 kho te9
gahapati Buddhe aveccappasādo || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-
pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Tañ
ca pana te Buddhe aveccappasādam attani samanupassato
ṭhānaso vedanā paṭipassambheyyuṃ10 || ||
7. Yathārūpena kho gahapati dhamme appasādena
samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā param

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 vadati.
2 B1 kicci.
3 S1 abhikkhamo.
4 S1-3 abhikkhamo.
5 B1 apāya.
6 S1-3 uppajjati always.
7 S3 yathā-
8 missing in S1.
9 missing in S1-3.
10 B1-2 paṭipassambheyyaṃ.

[page 382]
382 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
maraṇā apā- dug- vini- nirayam upapajjati || tathārūpo1 te
dhamme appasādo natthi || atthi2 ca kho te gahapati
dhamme aveccappasādo || Svākkhāto Bhagavatā dhammo ||
la-pe || paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti || || Tañ ca pana te
dhamme aveccappasādam attani samanapassato ṭhānaso
vedanā paṭippassambheyyuṃ3 || ||
8. Yathārūpena kho gahapati saṅghe appasādena sa-
mannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā param
maraṇā apā- dug- vi- nirayam uppajjati || tathārūpo te
saṅghe4 appasādo natthi || atthi ca5 kho te5 gahapati
saṅghe aveccappasādo || Supaṭipanno Bhagavato sāvaka-
saṅgho || la-pe || anuttaram puññakkhettaṃ lokassā ti || ||
Tañ ca pana te saṅghe aveccappasādam attani samanu-
passato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyyuṃ6 || ||
9. Yathārūpena kho gahapati dussīlyena7 samannāgato
assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apā-
dug- vini- nirayam uppajjati || tathārupan8 te dussīlyaṃ
natthi || atthi ca kho te gahapati ariyakantāni sīlāni9 || la-
pe || samādhisaṃvattanikāni || || Tāni ca pane te ariyakan-
tāni sīlāni attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭi-
passambheyyuṃ3 || ||
10. Yathārupāya kho gahapati micchādiṭṭhiyā samannā-
gato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā pa- ma- apā- dug-
vi- nirayam uppajjati || tathārūpā10 te micchādiṭṭhi natthi ||
atthi ca kho te gahapati sammādiṭṭhi || || Tañ ca pana te
sammādiṭṭhim attani samanupassato thānaso vedanā passam-
bheyyuṃ3 || ||
11. Yathārūpena kho gahapati micchāsaṅkappena sa-
mannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam
uppajjati || tathārūpo te {micchāsaṅkappo} natthi || atthi ca
kho te gahapati sammāsaṅkappo || || Tañ ca pana te
{sammāsaṅkappam} attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā
paṭipassambheyyuṃ3 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 yathā-
2 S1-3 api.
3 B2 -bheyya B1 -bheyyaṃ.
4 S1 saṅgho.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 B2 -bheyya B1 -bheyyaṃ.
7 S1-3 dussīlena.
8 S1-3 yathā-
9 S1-3 add akhaṇḍāni.
10 S1 yathā-

[page 383]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 383
12. Yathārupāya kho gahapati micchāvācāya samannā-
gato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam upa-
pajjati || tathārūpā te micchāvācā natthi || atthi ca kho te
gahapati sammāvācā || || Tañ ca pana te sammāvācam1
attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭipassambheyyuṃ || ||
13. Yathārūpena kho gahapati micchākammantena sa-
mannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam
upapajjati || tathārūpo2 te micchākammanto natthi || atthi
ca kho te gahapati sammākammanto3 || tañ ca pana te
sammākammantam attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā
paṭipassambheyyuṃ4 || ||
14. Yathārūpena kho gahapati micchā-ājīvena samannā-
gato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam upa-
pajjati ti || tathārūpo te micchā-ājīvo natthi || atthi ca kho
te gahapati sammā-ājīvo || || Tañ ca pana te sammā-ājīvam
attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭipassambheyyuṃ5 || ||
15. Yathārūpena kho gahapati micchāvāyāmena saman-
nāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam
uppajjati || tathārūpo te micchāvāyāmo natthi || atthi ca
kho te gahapati sammāvāyāmo || || Tañ ca pana te sammā-
vāyāmam attani samanupassato ṭhanaso vedanā paṭipassam-
bheyyuṃ6 || ||
16. Yathārūpāya kho gahapati micchāsatiyā samannā-
gato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam upa-
pajjati || tathārupā te micchāsati natthi || atthi ca kho te
gahapati sammāsati || etañ ca pana7 te8 sammāsatim attani9
samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭipassambheyyuṃ10 || ||
17. Yathārūpena kho gahapati micchāsamādhinā sa-
mannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam
upapajjati || tathārūpo te micchāsamādhi natthi || || Atthi
ca kho te gahapati sammāsamādhi || || Tañ ca pana te
sammāsamādhim attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā
paṭipassambheyyuṃ10 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -vācā.
2 S1 -rūpe.
3 S3 kammā-
4 B2 -bheyya B1 -bheyyaṃ.
5 B1-2 -bheyya.
6 B1 -bheyya B2 -bheyyaṃ.
7 S3 kho.
8 S3 inserts gahapati.
9 B2 attini.
10 B1 -bheyyaṃ.

[page 384]
384 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
18. Yathārūpena1 kho gahapati micchāñāṇena samannā-
gato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam upa-
pajjati || tathārūpaṃ te micchāñāṇaṃ natthi || || Atthi ca
kho te gahapati sammāñāṇam || || Tañ ca pana te sammā-
ñānam attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭipassam-
bheyyuṃ2 || ||
19. Yathārūpāya kho gahapati micchāvimuttiyā {saman-
nāgato} assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā- -nirayam upa-
pajjati || tathārūpā te micchāvimutti natthi || || Atthi ca kho
te gahapati sammāvimutti || tañ ca pana te sammāvimuttim3
attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyyun-
ti4 || ||
20. Atha kho Anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa ṭhānaso
vedanā paṭipassambhiṃsu5 || ||
21. Atha kho Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati āyasmantaṃ ca
Sāriputtam āyasmantaṃ ca Ānandaṃ sakeneva thālipākena
parivisi || ||
22. Atha kho Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati upasaṅkamitvā6
āyasmantaṃ Sāriputtam bhuttāviṃ onitapattapānim añña-
taraṃ nīcam āsanaṃ gahetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi || ||
23. Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ kho Anāthapiṇḍikam gaha-
patim āyasmā Sāriputto imāhi gāthāhi anumodi || ||
Yassa saddhā7 Tathāgate || acalā supatiṭṭhitā || ||
sīlañca yassa8 kalyāṇaṃ || ariyakantam pasaṃsitaṃ ||1||
Saṅghe pasādo yassatthi || ujubhūtañ ca dassanaṃ ||
Adaliddo ti tam āhu || amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ ||2||
Tasmā saddhaṃ9 ca sīlañca || pasādaṃ dhammadassanaṃ ||
anuyuñjetha medhāvī || saram10 buddhānasāsanan ti ||3||
24. Atha kho āyasmā Sāriputto Anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gaha-
patim imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -rūyena.
2 B1 -bheyyaṃ.
3 S1 -vimutti.
4 B1 -bheyyāti.
5 S3 -sambhi S1 sambheyyuṃ.
6 in B2 only.
7 B1 yathā santi B2 yassa saddā.
8 B1 yassassa.
9 B1 saddaṃ.
10 S1 sarasaṃ B1 saddhaṃ.

[page 385]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 385
25. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantam
Ānandam Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
26. Handa kuto nu tvam Ānanda āgacchasi divādi-
vassā ti || ||
Āyasmatā bhante Sāriputtena Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati1
iminā ca iminā ca ovādena ovadito ti2 || ||
Paṇḍito Ānanda Sāriputto mahāpañño Ānanda Sāri-
putto || || Yatra hi nāma cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni dasahi
ākarehi3 vibhajissatī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).27. (7) Dussīlyam2 or Anāthapiṇḍika2.
1. Sāvatthinidānaṃ4 || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati
ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno || ||
3.4. Atha kho Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati aññataram pu-
risam āmantesi || || Ehi tvam ambho purisa yenāyasmā
Ānando tenupasaṅkama5 || upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena
āyasmato Ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda || pe6 || ||
5. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ7 nivā-
setvā pattacīvaram ādāya Anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa
nivesanam tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane
nisīdi || nisajja kho āyasmā Ānando Anāthapiṇḍīkaṃ gaha-
patim etad avoca || ||
Kacci te gahapati khamanīyam kacci yāpanīyaṃ kacci
dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti paṭikkamo
sānam paññāyati no abhikkamo8 ti || ||
Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ9 bāḷhā me
dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkamo
sānam paññāyati no patikkamo ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -piṇdikam -patim.
2 S1 ca.
3 B1-2 dasahākārehi.
4 in B1-2 only.
5 S3 -saṅkami.
6 So S1-3 which add upasaṅkamanaṃ kātabbaṃ, complete in B1-2 --
See the preceding sutta.
7 in B1 only.
8 S1 abhikkhamo.
9 S1-3 -pe- instead of na yā-

[page 386]
386 Satāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
6. Catuhi kho gahapati dhammehi samannāgatassa assu-
tavato puthujjanassa hoti uttāso hoti chambhitattaṃ hoti
samparāyikam1 maraṇabhayaṃ || katamehi catuhi || ||
7. Idha gahapati assutavā puthujjano buddhe appasādena
samannāgato hoti || tañ ca panassa Buddhe appasādam
attani samanupassato hoti uttāso hoti chambhitattaṃ hoti
samparāyikam maraṇabhayam || || Puna ca param gahapati
assutavā puthujjano Dhamme appasādena samannāgato
hoti || tañ ca panassa dhamme appasādam attani samanu-
passato hoti uttāso hoti chambhitattaṃ hoti samparāyikam
maraṇabhayaṃ || || Puna ca paraṃ gahapati assutavā put-
hujjano Saṅghe appasādena samannāgato hoti || tañ ca panas-
sa saṅghe appasādam attani samanupassato hoti uttāso hoti
chambhitattam hoti samparāyikam maraṇabhayam || || Puna
ca param gahapati assutavā puthujjano dussīlyena2 sa-
mannāgato hoti || tañ ca panassa dussīlyam attani samanu-
passato hoti uttāso hoti chambhitattaṃ hoti samparāyikam
maraṇabhayaṃ || || Imehi kho gahapati catuhi dhammehi
samannāgatassa assutavato puthujjanassa hoti uttāso hoti
chambhitattam hoti samparāyikam maraṇabhayaṃ || ||
8. Catuhi kho gahapati dhammehi samannāgatassa su-
tavato ariyasāvakassa na hoti uttāso na hoti chambhi-
tattam na hoti samparāyikam maraṇabhayaṃ || katamehi
catuhi || || Idha3 gahapati sutavā ariyasāvako Buddhe
aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā ||
la-pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || tañ ca
panassa buddhe aveccappasādam attani samanupassato na
hoti uttāso na hoti chambhitattaṃ na hoti samparāyikam
maraṇabhayaṃ || || Puna ca paraṃ gahapati sutavā ariya-
sāvako Dhamme || [pe] 4 || {Saṅghe} [pe] 4 || Ariyakantehi sīlehi
samannāgato hoti akaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi ||
tāni5 ca panassa ariyakantāni sīlāni attani samanupassato

1 S1 -yika.
2 S1-3 dussilenaßī̀ñere with the end of the sheet dhā opens a very
great gap in B2 as nine sheets (dhi- dhaṃ) are wanting.
3 missing in S1.
4 more complete in B1.
5 S1-3 tañ.

na hoti uttāso na hoti chambhitattaṃ na hoti samparāyi-
kam maraṇabhayaṃ || || Imehi kho gahapati catuhi dhammehi
samannāgatassa sutavato ariyasāvakassa na hoti uttāso na
hoti chambhitattaṃ na hoti samparāyikam maraṇabhayan
ti || ||
9. Nāham bhante Ānanda bhāyāmi || kyāham bhāyissā-
mi || ahañhi bhante Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato
homi1 || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānaṃ
buddha bhagavā ti || Dhamme || pe || {Saṅghe} || pe || Yāni
cimāni2 bhante Bhagavatā gihisāmīcikāni3 sikkhāpadāni
desitāni4 nāhaṃ tesaṃ kiñci attani khaṇḍaṃ samanu-
passāmī ti || ||
10. Lābhā te gahapati || suladdhan te gahapati || sotā-
pattiphalam tayā gahapati vyākatan ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).28. (8) Duveram or Anāthapiṇḍika3.
1. 5 Sāvatthi nidānaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena Bhagavā
tenupa- || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi6 || || Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ kho Anāthapiṇ-
ḍikam Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3. Yato7 kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa pañcabhayāni8
verāni vūpasantāni ca1 honti || catuhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi
samannāgato hoti || ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho9
hoti supaṭividdho || so ākaṅkhamāno10 attanā va attānaṃ
vyākareyya Khīṇanirayo mhi khīṇatiracchānayoniyo khīṇa-
pittivisayo11 khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto sotāpanno ham asmi
avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano || || Katamāni
pañcabhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti || ||
4. Yaṃ gahapati pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭha-
dhammikam pi bhayaṃ veram pasavati samparāyikam pi1

2 S1-3 yānimāni.

6 this part in S1-3 only.

388 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
bhayaṃ veram pasavati1 cetasikam pi dukkhaṃ doma-
nassam paṭisaṃvediyati || pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa evan tam2
bhayam veraṃ vūpasantaṃ hoti || ||
Yaṃ gahapati adinnādāyī || ||
Yaṃ gahapati kāmesu micchācārī || ||
Yaṃ gahapati musāvādī3 || ||
Yaṃ gahapati surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī surāmera-
yamajjapamādaṭṭhānapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikam pi bhayaṃ
veram pasavati samparāyikam pi bhayaṃ veram pasavati
cetasikam pi dukkhaṃ domanassam paṭisaṃvediyati || su-
rāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evan tam2 bha-
yam veram vūpasantaṃ hoti || ||
Imāni pañcabhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti || ||
5. Katamehi catuhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti || ||
Idha gahapati ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā de-
vamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} ||
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
Imehi catuhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti || ||
6. Katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti
supaṭividdho || ||
Idha gahapati ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādam yeva
sādhukam yoniso manasi karoti || Iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ
hoti || imassuppadā idam uppajjati || Iti4 imasmim asati
idaṃ na hoti || imassa nirodhā idam nirujjhati yad idam
avijjapaccayā saṅkhārā || saṅkhārapaccayā viññānaṃ || la5 || ||
Evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti || ||
Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā6 saṅkhāranirodho7 || la6 || ||
Evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti8 || ||

1 S1 pavasati.
2 S1-3 etaṃ instead of evan tam.
3 S1-3 add adi- -dānapaccayā -pe- kā- micchācārapaccayā
musāvādapaccayā.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 give at large the enumeration.
6 S1-3 -nirodho.
7 S1-3 saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho viññāṇanirodhā -pe-.
8 S1-3 hotī ti.

Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 389
Ayam assa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti supaṭi-
viddho || ||
7. Yato kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa imāni pañcabhayāni
verāni vūpasantāni honti || imehi catuhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi
samannāgato hoti || ayaṃ cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho
hoti supaṭividdho || so ākaṅkhamāno attanā va attānaṃ
vyākareyya Khīṇanirayo mhi khīṇatiracchānayoniyo khīṇa-
pittivisayo1 khīnāpāyaduggativinipāto sotāpanno ham asmi2
avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).29. (9) Bhayam or Bhikkhu.
1. 3 Sāvatthinidānam || ||
2. 4 Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena Bhagavā tenupa- ||
upasaṅkamitvā || pe || ekam antam nisīdiṃsu || || Ekam antaṃ
nisinnā5 kho te bhikkhū Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
3--6. ||pe || la || ||
7. Yato kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca-
bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti || imehi catuhi sotāpatti-
yaṅgehi samannāgato hoti || ayaṃ cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya
sudiṭṭho hoti supaṭividdho || || So ākaṅkamāno attanā va
attānaṃ vyākareyya Khīṇanirayo mhi khīṇatiracchānayoniyo
khīṇapittivisayo1 khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto sotāpanno ham
asmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).30. (10) Licchavi or Nandaka.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Vesāliyaṃ viharati Mahā-
vane Kuṭāgārasālāyaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho Nandako licchavimahāmatto yena Bhagavā
{tenupasaṅkami} || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā
ekam antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ kho Nanda-
kaṃ6 licchavimahāmattam Bhagavā etad avoca || || Catuhi
kho Nandaka dhammehi7 samannāgato ariyasāvako sotā-

2 B1 asmiṃ.
3 in B1 only.
4 in S1-3 only.
5 So S1-3 corrected from nisinno in S3.
6 S1 nandaka.
7 S1 dhamme.

[page 390]
390 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
panno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano1 ||
katamehi catuhi || ||
3. Idha Nandaka2 ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || Ari-
yakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Imehi kho Nandaka catuhi
dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avini-
pātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano1 || ||
4. Imehi ca pana Nandaka catuhi dhammehi samannā-
gato ariyasāvako āyunā samyutto hoti dibbena pi mā-
nussena pi || vaṇṇena saṃyutto hoti || pe || sukhena saṃyutto
hoti3 || yasena saṃyutto hoti3 || adhipateyyena samyutto hoti
dibbena pi mānussena pi || ||
5. Taṃ kho panāhaṃ Nandaka nāññassa samaṇassa vā
brāhmaṇassa vā sutvā vadāmi || api ca yad eva mayā sāmaṃ
ñātaṃ sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sāmaṃ viditaṃ tad evāhaṃ vadā-
mī ti || ||
6. Evam vutte aññataro puriso Nandakaṃ licchaviṃ
mahāmattaṃ4 etad avoca || Nahānakālo bhante ti || ||
Alaṃ dāni bhaṇe etena bāhirena nahānena alam idam
ajjhattaṃ5 nahānaṃ bhavissati yad idam Bhagavati
pasādo ti || ||
Sarakānivaggo6 tatiyo ||
Tassa7 uddānaṃ || ||
Mahānāmena dve vuttā
Godhā ca Saraṇā duve.
Dussīlyena dve vuttā || ||
Duverena Bhayena ca ||
Licchavidasamo vutto ||
Vaggo tena pavuccatī ti8 || ||

5 S1 ajjhatta.
6 B1 saraṇāni-
7 missing in B1.
8 So B1; The uddāna in S1-3 is thus: Mahānāmo tayo Sarakā te apare
dve Anāthapiṇḍikena tayo vuttā Bhikkhu Nandakena cā ti.

[page 391]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 391

CHAPTER IV. PUÑÑABHISANDAVAGGO CATUTTHO.

SN_5,55(11).31. (1) Abhisanda1.
1. 1 Sāvatthinidānaṃ || ||
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā2
sukhassāhārā || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || ayam pathamo puññā-
bhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro || ||
4. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako Dhamme
aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti || Svākkhāto Bhagavatā
dhammo || la-pe || paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī ti || ayam
dutiyo puññābhisando kusalābhisando3 sakhassāhāro || ||
5. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako saṅghe avec-
cappasādena samannāgato hoti || supaṭipanno Bhagavato
sāvakasaṅgho || pa-pe || anuttaram puññakkhettaṃ lokassā
ti || ayam tatiyo puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassā
hāro || ||
6. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako Ariyakantehi
sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃ-
vattanikehi || ayaṃ catuttho puññābhisando4 kusalābhisando-
sukhassāhāro || ||
7. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro puññābhisandā5 kusalā-
bhisandā {ukhassāhārā}6 ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).32. (2) Abhisanda2.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā
sukhassāhārā || katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 in B1 only.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 B1 kulābhi-
4 S1-3 -sando S3 -sandā corrected from -sando.
5 S1 -sando (corrected to sandā in S3).
6 S1 sukhassāhāro.

[page 392]
392 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
devamanussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Ayam pathamo
puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro || ||
4.5. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako || pe || Dham-
me || {Saṅghe} || ||
6. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako vigatamala-
maccherena1 cetasā agāram ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payata-
pāṇī vossaggarato yācayogo {dānasaṃvibhāgarato} || ayaṃ
catuttho puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro || ||
7. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro puññābhisandā kusalā-
bhisandā sukhassāhārā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).33. (3) Abhisanda3.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā
sukhassāhārā2 || katame cattāro || ||
3--5. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe- -Iti pi so
Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā- -bhagavāti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe}3 || ||
6. Paññavā4 hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannā-
gato hoti ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammādukkhakkhayagāmi-
niyā || || Ayam catuttho puññābhisando kusalābhisando
sukhassāhāro || ||
7. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro puññābhisandā kusalā-
bhisandā sukhassāhārā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).34. (4) Devapada1.
1. 5 Sāvatthinidānaṃ || ||
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave devānaṃ devapadāni avisud-
dhānam sattānam visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ
pariyodapanāya || || Katamāni cattāri || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Idam pathamaṃ devā-
nam devapadam avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apari-
yodātānaṃ sattānam pariyodapanāya || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 -maccherena.
2 S1 -āhāro.
3 as in the preceding sutta.
4 S3 paññāvā.
5 missing in S1-3.

[page 393]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 393
4--6. Puna ca bhikkhave ariyasāvako Dhamme || {Saṅghe}1 ||
Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Idaṃ catutthaṃ devānaṃ deva-
padam avisuddhānaṃ2 sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ
sattānam pariyodapanāya || ||
7. Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri devānam devapadāni
avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattā-
nam pariyodapanāyā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).35. (5) Devapadam2.
2. Cattārimani bhikkhave devānaṃ devapadāni avisud-
dhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānam
pariyodapanāya || katamāni cattāri || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavāti || || So iti paṭisañcikkhati ||
Kiṃ nu kho devānaṃ devapadan ti || so evam pajānati3 ||
Abyāpajjha4 parame khvāham etarahi deve suṇāmi na ca5
kho panāham kiñci byābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā ||
addhāhaṃ devapadadhammasamannāgato viharāmī ti || ||
Idam pathamaṃ devānam devapadam avisuddhānaṃ sattā-
naṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ {pariyodapanāya} || ||
4.5. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako Dhamme ||
{Saṅghe} || ||
6. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-
pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || So iti paṭisañcikkhati || Kiṃ
nu kho devānaṃ devapadan ti || || So evam pajānāti abyā-
pajjha6 parame khvāhaṃ7 etarahi deve8 suṇāmi na kho
panāhaṃ kiñci vyābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā || addhā-
ham9 devapadadhammasamannāgato10 vihārāmī ti || || Idaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So B1; nearly complete in S1-3.
2 S1 visuddhānaṃ.
3 B1 jānāti.
4 S1-3 abyāpajja.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 B1 abyāpajja S1 abyā only.
7 S1-3 paramā (S3 -vā) haṃ instead of parame-
8 S3 devā S1 deva.
9 S1 addhāhi.
10 S1 devapadaṃ.

[page 394]
394 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
catutthaṃ devānam devapadam avisuddhānam sattānaṃ1
visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānam {pariyodapanāya} || ||
7. Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri devānam devapadāni
avisuddhānam sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattā-
nam pariyodapanāyā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).36. (6) Sabhāgatam.
2. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataṃ2 atta-
manā3 devā sabhāgataṃ4 kathenti || || Katamehi catuhi || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānaṃ buddho bhagavā ti || || Yā tā devatā Buddhe
aveccappasādena samannāgatā5 ito cutā6 tatrūpapannā ||
tāsam evaṃ hoti || Yathārūpena kho mayam Buddhe avec-
cappasādena samannāgatā7 tato cutā idhūpapannā || ariya-
sāvako8 pi tathārūpena9 Buddhe aveccappasādena saman-
nāgato hoti10 Ehī ti devānaṃ santike ti || ||
4.5. Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako Dhamme ||
{Saṅghe} || ||
6. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-
pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Yā tā11 devatā ariyakantehi
sīlehi samannāgatā12 ito cutā tatrūpapannā || tāsam evaṃ
hoti || || Yatharūpehi kho mayam ariyakantehi sīlehi sa-
mannāgatā tato cutā idhūpapannā ariyasāvako pi tathā-
rūpehi13 ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato Ehī ti devānaṃ
santike ti || ||
7. Imehi kho bhikkhave catuhi dhammehi samannāgatam
attamanā14 devā sabhāgataṃ kathentī ti15 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1.
2 S3 -gatā corrected from -gato.
3 S1 attaṃnā S3 seems to have attanaṃ corrected from attānā.
4 S1-3 sabhāgatā.
5 S1 -gato.
6 S1 adds ti.
7 S1-3 -gato.
8 B1 -sāviko.
9 S1-3 yathā-
10 in S1-3 only.
11 missing in S1-3.
12 B1 -gataṃ.
13 S3 yathā.
14 S1 attanā S3 attanaṃ (?) corrected from attānā.
15 S1-3 kathenti.

[page 395]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 395

SN_5,55(11).37. (7) Mahānāmo.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sakkesu viharati Kapila-
vatthusmiṃ Nigrodhārāme || ||
2. Atha kho Mahānāmo sakko yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || pe || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Mahānāmo sakko
Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hotī ti || ||
Yato kho Mahānāma Buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti ||
dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti || saṅghaṃ saraṇam gato
hoti || ettāvatā kho Mahānāma upasako hotī ti || ||
4. Kittāvatā1 pana bhante upāsako sīlasampanno hotī ti || ||
Yato kho Mahānāma upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti ||
adinnādāna paṭivirato hoti || kāmesu micchācārā paṭivirato
hoti || musāvadā paṭivirato hoti || surāmerayamajjapamā-
daṭṭhānā paṭivirato2 hoti || ettāvatā kho Mahānāma upāsako
sīlasampanno hotī ti || ||
5. Kittāvatā pana bhante upāsako saddhāsampanno
hotī ti || ||
Idha Mahānāma upāsako saddho hoti saddahati Tathā-
gatassa bodhim || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la || satthā devama-
nussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || Ettāvatā kho Mahānāma
upāsako saddhāsamannāgato hotī ti || ||
6. Kittāvatā pana bhante upāsako cāgasampanno hotī ti || ||
Idha Mahānāma upāsako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā
agāram ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇī vossaggarato
yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato || ettāvatā kho Mahānāma
upāsako cāgasampanno hotī ti || ||
7. Kittāvatā pana bhante upāsako paññāsampanno hotī
ti || ||
Idha Mahānāma upāsako paññavā hoti udayatthagāmi-
niyā paññāya samannāgato3 ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā-
dukkhakkhayagāminiyā || ettāvatā kho Mahānāma upāsako
paññāsampanno hotī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 insert nu kho.
2 S1 paṭirato.
3 B1 adds hoti.

[page 396]
396 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.

SN_5,55(11).38. (8) Vassam.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave upari pabbate thullaphusitake
deve1 vassante tam udakaṃ yathāninnam pavattamānam
pabbatakandarapadarasākhā2 paripūreti || pabbatakandara-
padarasākhā3 paripūrā kussubbhe4 paripūreti || kussubbhā
paripūrā mahāsobbhe5 paripūrenti || mahāsobbhā6 paripūrā
kunnadiyo paripūrenti || kunnadiyo paripūrā mahānadiyo
paripūrenti || mahānadiyo paripūrā mahāsamuddasāgaram
paripūrenti || ||
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa yo ca Buddhe
aveccappasādo || yo ca dhamme aveccappasādo yo ca saṅghe
aveccappasādo || yāni ca ariyakāntāni sīlāni || ime dhammā
sandamānā pāraṃ gantvā āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).39. (9) Kāḷi.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sakkesu viharati Kapila-
vatthusmiṃ Nigrodhārāme || ||
2. Atha kho Bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā patta-
cīvaram ādāya yena Kāḷigodhāya7 sākiyāniyā nivesanaṃ
tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi || ||
3. Atha kho Kāḷigodhā7 sākiyānī yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || || Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ8 kho Kāligodham
sākiyānim9 etad avoca || || Catuhi kho Godhe dhammehi
samannāgatā ariyasāvikā sotapannā hoti avinipātadhammā
niyatā sambodhiparāyanā || || Katamehi catuhi || ||
4. Idha Godhe ariyasāvikā Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgatā10 hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavāti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || || Vi-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 insert su.
2 so S1; after -kandara S3 has padavarasākhā B1 pasākhā.
3 same readings as before, but S3 has padara (not padavara)
and S1 adds ya.
4 B1 kusombhe -bhā.
5 B1 -sombhe.
6 S1 -subbhā B1 sombhā.
7 S1-3 -godhāyaṃ.
8 S1 nisinno S3 nisinnā.
9 B1 -sakyānaṃ.
10 B1 S1 -gato.

[page 397]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 397
gatamalamaccherena cetasā agāram1 ajjhāvasati mutta-
cāgā2 payatapāṇī vossaggaratā yācayogā dānasaṃvibhāga-
ratā || || Imehi kho Godhe catuhi dhammehi samannāgatā
ariyasāvikā sotāpannā hoti avinipātadhammā niyatā sam-
bodhiparāyanā ti || ||
5. Yānimāni3 bhante Bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni
desitāni saṃvijjante4 te dhammā mayi ahañca tesu dham-
mesu sandissāmi || ahaṃ hi bhante Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgatā || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devama-
nussānaṃ buddho bhagavā ti || || Dhamme || Saṅghe || || Yaṃ5
kho pana kiñci kule deyyadhammaṃ sabbaṃ tam appaṭi-
vibhattaṃ sīlavantehi6 kalyāṇadhammehī ti || ||
6. Lābhā te Godhe suladdhan te Godhe sotāpattiphalam
tayā Godhe vyākatan ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).4O. (10) Nandiya.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Sakkesu viharati Kapila-
vatthusmiṃ Nigrodhārāme || ||
2. Atha kho Nandiyo sakko yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅ-
kami || pe || || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Nandiyo sakko
Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
3. Yasseva nu kho bhante ariyasāvakassa cattāri sotā-
pattiyaṅgāni || sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ natthi so
evaṃ7 nu kho bhante ariyasāvako Pamādavihārī ti vuc-
cati || ||
Yassa kho Nandiya cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena
sabbam sabbathā sabbaṃ natthi tam aham Bāhiro
puthujjanapakkhe ṭhito ti vadāmi || ||
4. Api ca Nandiya yathā8 ariyasāvako pamādavihārī
ceva hoti appamādavihārī ca9 taṃ suṇāhi sādhukam10
manasi karohi bhāsissāmī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 āgāraṃ.
2 S1 -cāgaṃ.
3 B2 yāni kānici.
4 B1 saṃvajjante.
5 S1-3 yā.
6 S3 sīlattehi S1 sievaṃsantehi.
7 B1 sveva.
8 S1-3 Nandiyassa instead of Nandiyayathā.
9 S1-3 ce.
10 missing in S1-3 till etad avoca.

[page 398]
398 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
Evam bhante ti kho Nandiyo sakko Bhagavato paccas-
sosi || || Bhagavā etad avoca || ||
5. Kathañca Nandiya ariyasāvako pamādavihārī hoti || ||
Idha Nandiya ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā de-
vamanussānam buddo bhagavā ti || || So1 tena buddhe
aveccappasādena santuṭṭho na uttariṃ2 vāyamati divā
pavivekāya rattim paṭisallānāya || tassa evam pamattassa
viharato pāmujjaṃ na hoti || pāmujje asati pīti na hoti ||
pītiyā asati passaddhi na hoti || passaddhiyā asati dukkhaṃ
viharati || dukkhino cittaṃ na samādhiyati || asamāhite citte
dhammā na pātubhavanti || dhammānam apātubhāvā Pa-
mādavihārī teva3 saṅkhaṃ gacchati || || Puna ca paraṃ
Nandiya ariyasāvako Dhamme4 || Saṅghe || Ariyakantehi
sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃ-
vattanikehi || || So tehi ariyakantehi sīlehi santuṭṭho na
uttariṃ2 vāyamati divā pavivekāya rattim paṭisallāṇāya ||
tassa evam pamattassa viharato pāmujjaṃ na hoti || pāmujje
asati pīti na hoti || pītiyā asati passaddhi na hoti || passad-
dhiyā asati dukkhaṃ viharati || dukkhino cittaṃ na
samādhiyati || asamahite citte dhammā na {pātubhavanti}5 ||
dhammānam apātubhāvā Pamādavihārī teva3 saṅkhaṃ
gacchati || || Evaṃ kho Nandiya ariyasāvako pamādavihārī
hoti || ||
6. Kathañca Nandiya ariyasāvako appamādavihārī hoti || ||
Idha Nandiya ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || || So tena Buddhe avec-
cappasādena asantuṭṭho uttarim2 vāyamati divā pavivekāya
rattim paṭisallāṇāya || tassa evam appamattassa viharato
pāmujjam jāyati || pamuditassa pīti jāyati || pītimanassa
kāyo passambhati || passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati || sukhino
cittaṃ samādhiyati || samāhite citte dhammā pātubhavanti ||
dhammānam pātubhāvā Appamādavihārī teva saṅkhaṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add -pe- and omit so.
2 B1 uttari.
3 S1-3 tveva.
4 S1-3 dhamma.
5 instead of dhammā- S1-3 have a stroke and -pe-

[page 399]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 399
gacchati || || Puna ca param Nandiya ariyasāvako Dhamme ||
Saṅghe || || Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇ-
ḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || So tehi ariyakantehi
sīlehi asantuṭṭho uttariṃ vāyamati divā1 pavivekāya rattim
patisallāṇāya || tassa evam appamattassa viharato pāmujjaṃ
jāyati || pamuditassa pīti jāyati || pītimanassa kāyo passam-
bhati || passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati || sukhino cittaṃ
samādhiyati2 || samāhite citte dhammā pātubhavanti || dham-
mānam pātubhāvā Appamādavihārī teva saṅkham gacchati || ||
Evaṃ kho Nandiya ariyasāvako appamādavihārī hotī ti || ||
Puññābhisandavaggo catuttho || ||
Uddānaṃ || ||

Sabhāgatam4 Mahānāmo5 || Vassaṃ6 Kāḷī7 ca8 Nandiyā ti || ||

CHAPTER V. SAGĀTHAPUÑÑABHISANDAVAGGO PAÑCAMO.

SN_5,55(11).41. (1) Abhisanda (or Sayhaka)1.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā
sukhassāhārā9 || katamo cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || ayam pathamo puññā-
bhisando10 || || Puna ca param bhikkhave ariyasāvako
Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti
akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ayaṃ catuttho
puññabhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro || || Ime kho

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 S1 samādhiya.
3 S1-3 abhisandena.
4 S3 sabhāgavā.
5 S1 mahānāmaṃ.
6 S1 vāsī S3 vāsīva.
7 B1 kāḷi.
8 S3 va after an erased ca; S1 has candiyāti instead of ca Nano
9 S1-3 -sando -sando -āhāro.
10 this part of number 3 and the preceding word katame cattāro
are missing in S1-3; this is evidently a blunder.

[page 400]
400 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
bhikkhave cattāro puññābhisandā1 kusalābhisandā1 suk-
hassāhārā2 || ||
4. Imehi kho bhikkhave3 catuhi puññābhisandehi kusa-
lābhisandehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa na sukaram
puññassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ4 ettako puññābhisando kusa-
lābhisando sukhassāhāro ti || atha kho5 Asaṅkheyyo appa-
meyyo mahāpuññakkhandho teva saṅkhaṃ6 gacchati || ||
5. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahāsamudde na sukaram
udakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ ettakāni udakāḷhakānīti vā7
ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasahas-
sānī ti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānī ti vā8 || atha
kho Asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahā udakakkhandho teva9
saṅkham gacchati || || Evam eva kho bhikkhave imehi
catuhi puññābhisandehi kusalābhisandehi samanāgatassa
ariyasāvakassa na sukaram puññassa pamāṇam gaṇetum
ettako puññabhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro ti || ||
Atha kho Asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandho
teva9 saṅkhaṃ10 gacchatī ti || ||
6. Idam avoca Bhagavā11 || ||
Mahodadhim aparimitam mahāsaraṃ ||
bahubheravaṃ ratnagaṇānam12 ālayaṃ ||
Najjo yathā naragaṇasaṅghasevitā ||
puthusavanti13 upayanti sāgaraṃ ||1||
Evaṃ naram annapānavatthadadaṃ14 ||
seyyānisajjattharaṇassa15 dāyakaṃ ||
puññassa dhārā upayanti paṇḍitaṃ ||
najjo yathā vārivahā16 va sāgaran ti ||2||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -sando.
2 S1 āhāro
3 missing in S1-3.
4 S1-3 gahetum always.
5 S1-3 omit atha kho.
6 S1-3 saṅgahaṃ.
7 S1-3 omit ettakāni- B1 has udakaḷha- always.
8 B1 adds ti.
9 S1-3 tveva.
10 S3 saṃhaṃ S1 saṅgahaṃ.
11 S1-3 add -pe- etad avoca satthā.
12 S1-3 ratana-
13 S1 -savantī.
14 S1 annadapānadavatthadaṃ S3 annadapānavatthadaṃ.
15 B1 -pacca- instead of sajja.
16 S1-3 vārivahaṃ.

[page 401]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 401

SN_5,55(11).42. (2) Abhisanda (or Sayhaka) 21.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā
sukhassāhārā || katame cattāro2 || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti- || Dhamme || Saṅghe || || Vigatamala-
maccherena cetasā agāram ajjhāvasati || muttacāgo payata-
pāṇī vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato || ayaṃ
catuttho puññābhisando sukhassāhāro || || Ime kho bhi-
cattāro puññā- kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā || ||
4. Imehi kho bhikkhave catuhi- -teva saṅkhaṃ gacchati || ||
5. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yatthimā3 mahānadiyo saṃ-
sandanti4 samenti || seyyathīdaṃ Gaṅgā Yamunā Aciravatī5
Sarabhū Mahī || tattha na sukaram udakassa pamāṇaṃ
gaṇetuṃ- -teva saṅkham gacchatī ti || ||
6. Idam avoca Bhagavā || || Etad avoca satthā6 || ||
Mahodadhim aparimitaṃ mahāsaraṃ ||
bahubheravaṃ ratnāgaṇānam ālayaṃ7 ||
Najjo yathā naragaṇasaṅghasevitā ||
puthusavanti8 hi9 upayanti sāgaraṃ ||1||
Evaṃ naram annapānavatthadadaṃ ||
seyyānisajjattharaṇassa10 dāyakaṃ ||
puññassa dhārā upayanti paṇḍitaṃ ||
najjo yathā vārivahā11 va sāgaran ti ||2||

SN_5,55(11).43. (3) Abhisanda (or Sayhaka)3.
2. Cattāro me bhi- puññabhisandā- katame cattāro || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe- -Dhamme || pe
[pa] || {Saṅghe} || || Paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 In this and the next sutta I give only at large the parts
by which they differ from Abhisanda 1.
2 S1-3 omit katame-
3 S1-3 yatthavā.
4 S1-3 sandanti.
5 B1 acīra-
6 these three words in S1-3 only.
7 these two first padas ara not to be found in S1-3.
8 S1-3 savantī.
9 hi required by metre is in S1-3 and in this sutta only.
10 as in the preceding sutta.
11 S1-3 vohaṃ.

[page 402]
402 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
samannāgato1 ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammādukkhakkhaya
gāminiyā || ayaṃ catuttho puññābhisando kusalābhisando
sukhassāhāro || || Ime2 kho bhikkhave cattāro- -sukhassā-
hārā || ||
4. Imehi kho bhikkhave- -na sukaraṃ gaṇetuṃ- -maha-
puññakkhandho teva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī ti || ||
5. Idam avoca Bhagavā3 || ||
Yo puññakāmo kusale patiṭṭhito ||
bhāveti maggam amatassa pattiyā ||
so dhammasārādhigamo khaye4 rato ||
na vedhati maccurāja gamissatī ti5 || ||

SN_5,55(11).44. (4) Mahaddhana (or Aḍḍha)1.
2. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako
aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo mahāyaso6 ti vuccati ||
katamehi katuhi || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || Ari-
yakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti || akhaṇḍehi || la [pe] ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
4. Imehi kho bhikkhave catuhi dhammehi samannāgato
ariyasāvako aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo mahāyaso5 ti
vuccatī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).45. (5) Mahaddhana (or Aḍḍha)2.
2. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi- -mahābhogo mahāyāso6
ti vuccati || katamehi catuhi || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave- -samādhisaṃvattanikehi || ||
4. Imehi kho bhikkhave- -mahābhogo mahāyaso7 ti
vuccatī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add hoti.
2 B1 adds hi.
3 S1-3 add -pe- etad avoca satthā.
4 S1-3 kkhaye.
5 B1 maccujarākasmimpinti.
7 So all the MSS.-- The two mahaddhana are identical and ought to
differ only by the qualification mahāyaso which occur four times
in B1-2, once in S1-3 and ought to belong to either text, but
to which?

[page 403]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 403

SN_5,55(11).46. (6) Bhikkhū (or Suddaka).
2. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako
sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparayāno1 ||
katamehi catuhi || ||
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti2 || || Dhamme || Saṅghe || || Ariyakantehi
sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃ-
vattanikehi || ||
4. Imehi kho bhikkhave catuhi dhammehi samannāgato
ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sam-
bodhiparāyano ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).47. (7) Nandiya.
1. Kapilavatthu nidānaṃ3 || ||
2. Ekam antaṃ nisinnaṃ kho Nandiyaṃ sakkam Bha-
gavā etad avoca || || Catuhi kho Nandiya dhammehi
samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti- okatamehi ca-
tuhi || ||
3. Idha Nandiya ariyasāvako Buddhe- -{saṃvattanikehi} || ||
4. Imehi kho Nandiya catuhi dhammehi- -niyato sam-
bodhiparāyano ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).48. (8) Bhaddiya.
1. Kapilavatthu nidānam || || Upasaṅkamanaṃ kātabbaṃ4 || ||
2. Ekam antaṃ nisinnam kho Bhaddiyaṃ sakkaṃ- || ||
3. Idha Bhaddiya ariyasāvako- || ||
4. Imehi kho Bhaddiya catuhi- -sambodhiparāyano ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 adds ti.
2 B1 adds iti pi- -bhagavā ti.
3 S1-3 have Ek- sa- bha- sakkesu vi- kapila- -- atha kho
Nandiyo sakko yena bha- tenupa- upasaṅkamitvā --pe--
The sutta differs only from the preceding one by the name
Nandiya put instead of bhikkhave.
4 So B1-2, S1-3 as in the preceding text with the change of name.

[page 404]
404 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.

SN_5,55(11).49. (9) Mahānāma.
1. Kapilavatthu nidānam || {upasaṅkamanam} kātabbaṃ1 || ||
2. Ekam antam nisinnaṃ kho Mahānāmam- || ||
3. Idha Mahānāma ariyasāvako- || ||
4. Imehi kho Mahānāma catuhi dhammehi- -sambodhi-
parāyano ti2 || ||

SN_5,55(11).50. (10) Aṅga.
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave sotāpattiyaṅgāni || katamāni
cattari || ||
3. Sappurisasaṃsevo saddhammasavanaṃ yonisomanasi-
kāro dhammānudhammapaṭipatti || ||
4. Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni || ||
Sagāthakapuññābhisandavaggo pañcamo3 || ||
Tassa4 uddānaṃ || ||
Abhisandena5 tayo vuttā ||
Duve Mahaddhanena ca6 ||
Bhikkhu7 Nandiya8 Bhaddhiyam9 ||
Mahānām-Aṅgena te dasā ti10 || ||

CHAPTER VI. SAPPAÑÑAVAGGO CHAṬṬHO.

SN_5,55(11).51. (1) Sagāthakam.
2. Catuhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako
sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ||
katamehi catuhi || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So B1-2; S1-3 as in the preceding text with the change of name.
2 46,47,48,49 differ only by the interlocutor.
3 S1-3 catuttho.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 sayhakena.
6 S1-3 aḍḍha (S1 aḍḍa) apare dve instead of duve-
7 S1-3 suddakaṃ.
8 S1-3 nandikam.
9 S1 bhaddikaṃ S3 bhaddiṃ.
10 S1-3 mahānāmena aṅgikāni.

[page 405]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 405
3. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako Buddhe aveccappasādena
samannāgato hoti || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānam buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || Ari-
yakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi || la-pe ||
samādhisaṃvattanikehi || || Imehi kho bhikkhave catuhi
dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avini-
pātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano ti || ||
4. Idam avoca Bhagavā1 || ||
Yassa saddhā Tathāgate || acaḷā2 suppatiṭṭhitā3 ||
sīlaṃ ca yassa kalyāṇaṃ || ariyakantam pasaṃsitaṃ ||1||
Saṅghe pasādo yassatthi || ujubhūtaṃ ca dassanaṃ ||
Adaliddo ti tam āhu || amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ ||2||
Tasmā saddhañca sīlañca || pasādaṃ dhammadassanaṃ ||
anuyuñjetha medhāvī4 || saram buddhānasāsanan ti ||3||

SN_5,55(11).52. (2) Vassavuttham.
1. 5 Ekam samayam Bhagavā Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati Jeta-
vane Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu Sāvatthi-
yaṃ vassaṃ vuttho Kapilavatthum anuppatto hoti kenacid
eva karaṇīyena || ||
3. Assosum kho Kāpilavatthavā6 Sakyā7 || aññataro8
bhikkhu Sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ vutto Kapilavatthum anup-
patto ti || ||
4. Atha kho Kāpilavatthavā Sakyā yena so bhikkhu
tenupasaṅkamiṃsu || upasaṅkamitvā tam bhikkhum abhivā-
detvā ekam antam nisīdiṃsu || || Ekam antam nisinnā kho
Kāpilavatthavā9 sakyā7 tam bhikkhum etad avocuṃ || ||
5. Kacci bhante Bhagavā arogo10 ceva11 balavā cā ti || ||
Arogo cāvuso Bhagavā12 balavā cā ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add -pe- etad avoca satthā.
2 S3 acalaṃ.
3 S1 -ṭhite.
4 S3 medhāvi S1 modhāvī.
5 in B1 only.
6 B1 Kapila- always.
7 S1-3 sakkā.
8 B1 -tara.
9 S1 -vatthuvā.
10 S3 āro-
11 S1-3 ca.
12 S3 Bhagavā āvuso arogo instead of arogo-; S1 omits the phrase.

[page 406]
406 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
Kacci pana bhante Sāriputta-Moggalānā arogā ceva1
balavanto cā ti || ||
Sāriputta-Moggalānā2 pi kho avuso arogā3 ceva1 bala-
vanto cā ti || ||
Kacci pana bhante bhikkhusaṅgho arogo ca balavā4
cā ti || ||
Bhikkhusaṅgho pi kho āvuso arogo ca balavā cā ti || ||
6. Atthi pana te bhante kiñci iminā antaravassena
Bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahītan ti || ||
Sammukhā me tam āvuso Bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā
paṭiggahītaṃ || || Appakā te5 bhikkhave bhikkhū ye āsa-
vānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭ-
ṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
viharanti || atha kho eteva6 bahutarā bhikkhū ye pañcannam
orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānam7 parikkhayā opapātikā
tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā asmā8 lokā ti || ||
7. Aparampi kho me āvuso Bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ
sammukhā paṭiggahītaṃ || || Appakā te bhikkhave bhikkhū
ye pañcannam orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam7 parikkhayā
opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā asmā lokā ||
atha kho ete bahutarā bhikkhū ye tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam
parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino9 sakid-
eva10 imaṃ lokam āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī ti || ||
8. Aparam pi kho me āvuso Bhagavato sammukhā
sutaṃ sammukhā patiggahītaṃ || || Appakā te bhikkhave
bhikkhū ye tiṇṇaṃ samyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosa-
mohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino11 sakid eva10 imaṃ lokam
āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti || atha kho eteva bahu-
tarā bhikkhū ye tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānam parikkhayā sotā-
pannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).53. (3) Dhammadinna.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Bārānasiyaṃ viharati Isi-
patane Migadāye || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 ca.
2 S1 -lāni.
3 S3 ārogā.
4 S1 balava.
5 S3 appakante S1 appaka or appakā te corrected from appakaṃ te.
6 B1 ete ca.
7 B1 samghoja-
8 S3 tasmā.
9 missing in S1.
10 B1 sakiṃdeva.
11 B sikad-

[page 407]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 407
2. Atha kho Dhammadinno upāsako pañcahi upāsaka-
satehi saddhiṃ1 yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅka-
mitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi2 || ||
Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Dhammadinno upāsako Bhaga-
vantam etad avoca || ||
3. Ovadatu no bhante Bhagavā anusāsatu no bhante
Bhagavā yam amhākam assa dīgharattam hitāya sukhāyā
ti || ||
Tasmā ti ha vo3 Dhammadinna evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ || ||
Ye te suttantā Tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā
lokuttarā suññatapaṭisaṃyuttā || te kālena kālam upasam-
pajja viharissāmā ti4 || || Evaṃ5 hi vo3 Dhammadinna
sikkhitabban ti || ||
4. Na kho netam bhante sukaram amhehi puttasam-
bādhasayanam ajjhāvasantehi6 kāsikaṃ7 candanam8 pacca-
nubhontehi mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayantehi jātarūpara-
jataṃ sādiyantehi || ye te suttantā gambhīrā gambhīratthā
lokuttarā suññatapaṭisaṃyuttā te kālena kālam upasampajja
viharituṃ || || Tesaṃ no bhante Bhagavā amhākam pañcasu
sikkhāpadesu ṭhitānam uttaridhammaṃ9 desetū ti10 || ||
5. Tasmā ti11 ha vo3 Dhammadinna evam sikkhitabbaṃ ||
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatā bhavissāma12 || Iti
pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānam buddho
bhagavā ti || Dhamme || {Saṅghe} || Ariyakantehi sīlehi saman-
nāgata bhavissāma12 akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattani-
kehī ti || || Evaṃ hi vo3 Dhammadinna sikkhitabban ti || ||
Yānimāni bhante Bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni
desitāni || saṃvijjante te dhammā amhesu mayañ ca13 tesu
dhammesu sandissāma14 || ||
6. Mayaṃ hi bhante Buddhe aveccappasadena samannā-
gatā || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā devamanussānam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1-3.
2 S1-3 -pe- instead of ekam-
3 B1 te.
4 S3 viharissāma S1 viharissāmi.
5 B1 etaṃ.
6 S1 ajjho-
7 B1 kāsika.
8 S1 candaṃanaṃ.
9 S1 uttariṃ-
10 S1 desetuṃ ti.
11 S1-3 iti instead of tasmāti.
12 S1-3 -gato bhavissāmi.
13 S1-3 mayam bhante.
14 S1 sandissāmi.

408 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
buddho bhagavā ti || Dhamme || Saṅghe || pe-[pa] || Ariya-
kantehi sīlehi samannāgatā akhaṇḍehi || la-pe || {samādhi-
saṃvattanikehī} ti || ||
7. Lābhā vo1 Dhammadinna suladdhaṃ vo1 Dhamma-
dinna sotāpattiphalaṃ Dhammadinna2 vyākatan ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).54. (4) Gilāyanam.
1. Ekam samayam Bhagavā Sakkesu viharati Kapila-
vatthusmiṃ Nigrodhārāme || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū Bha-
gavato cīvarakammaṃ karonti Niṭṭhitacīvaro Bhagavā
temāsaccayena cārikam pakkamissatī ti || ||
3. Assosi kho Mahānāmo sakko Sambahulā kira bhikkhū
Bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ karonti Niṭṭhitacīvaro Bhagavā
temāsaccayena cārikam pakkamissatī ti || || Atha kho
Mahānāmo sakko yena Bhagavā tenupasaṅkami || upasaṅ-
kamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam antaṃ nisīdi3 ||
ekam antaṃ nisinno kho Mahānāmo sakko Bhagavantam
etad avoca || ||
4. Sutam etam bhante Sambahulā kira bhikkhū Bhaga-
vato cīvarakammaṃ karonti Niṭṭhitacīvaro Bhagavā te-
māsaccayena4 cārikam5 pakkamissatī ti || Na kho te etam6
bhante Bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭigga-
hītaṃ sappaññena upāsakena sappañño upāsako ābādhīko
dukkhito bāḷhagilāno ovaditabbo ti7 || ||
5. Sappaññena Mahānama8 upāsakena sappañño upāsako
ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno catuhi assāsaniyehi dham-
mehi assāsetabbo || || Assāsatāyasmā9 atthāyasmato Buddhe
aveccappasādena || Iti pi so Bhagavā || la-pe || satthā deva-
manussānaṃ buddho bhagavā ti || || Assāsatāyasmā10 atthā-
yasmato Dhamme11 Saṅghe11 || Ariyakantāni sīlāni12 akhaṇ-
ḍāni || la-pe || samādhisaṃvattanikānī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 te.
2 B1 tumhehi.
3 S1 omits ekam-
4 S1 -pe-
5 S1-3 cārikā.
6 B1 netaṃ instead of te etaṃ.
7 S3 omit ti.
8 missing in S1-3.9 S3 assāsatā- corrected from assāsati(?).
10 S1-3 assāsatu āyasmā.
11 almost complete in S1-3.
12 missing in S1.

[page 409]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 409
6. Sappaññena Mahānāma upāsakena sappañño upāsako
ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno imehi catuhi assāsaniyehi
dhammehi assāsetvā evam assa vacanīyo || ||
7. Atthāyasmato mātāpitusu apekhā ti || so ce evaṃ va-
deyya Atthi me mātāpitusu apekhā ti so evam assa vaca-
nīyo || Āyasmā pi1 kho māriso maraṇadhammo2 || sace
pāyasmā3 mātāpitusu apekhaṃ karissati marissateva || no
ce pāyasmā4 mātāpitusu apekhaṃ karissati marissateva5 ||
sādhāyasmā6 yā te7 mātāpitusu apekhā tam pajahāti8 || ||
8. So ce evam vadeyya9 || Yā10 me mātāpitusu apekhā
sā pahīnā ti || so evam assa vacanīyo || Atthi panāyasmato
puttadāresu apekhā ti || || Sa ce evaṃ vadeyya Atthi me
puttadāresu apekhā ti || so evam assa vacanīyo || Āyasmā
kho māriso maraṇadhammo sace pāyasmā puttadāresu
apekham karissati marissateva11 || no ce pāyasmā puttadā-
resu apekhaṃ karissati marissateva || sādhāyasmā12 yā te7
puttadāresu apekhā tam pajahā ti || ||
9. So ce evaṃ vadeyya || Yā me puttadāresu apekhā sā
pahīnā ti || so evam assa vacanīyo || Atthi panāyasmato
mānussakesu13 pañcasu kāmaguṇesu apekhā ti || || So ce
evaṃ vadeyya || Atthi me mānussakesu pañcasu kāmagunesu
apekhā ti || so evam assa vacanīyo || Mānussakehi14 kho
āvuso kāmehi15 dibbā16 kāmā abhikkantatarā ca paṇita-
tarā ca || sādhāyasmā17 mānussakehi kāmehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhā-
petvā catummahārājikesu devesu cittam adhimocehī ti || ||
10. So ce10 evaṃ vadeyya || Mānussakehi kāmehi cittaṃ
vuṭṭhitaṃ cātummahārājikesu18 devesu cittaṃ adhimoci-
tanti19 || so evam assa vacanīyo || Cātummahārājikehi kho

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B1.
2 S1 -dhamme.
3 B1 vāyasmā.
4 S1 pāyasmato B1 pāyasmā.
5 S3 marissati tevā.
6 So B1 S1 sacāyasmā S3 cāyasmā.
7 S1 yāto S3 yato instead of yā te.
8 S1-3 pajahati.
9 S1-3 vadeyyā.
10 missing in S1-3.
11 S1 marissata S3 marissati.
12 S1-3 socāyasmā.
13 B1 mānusa- always.
14 S3 mānusakesuhi.
15 S1-3 kāmesu.
16 S1-3 dibba.
17 S1-3 yācāyasmā.
18 S1-3 -rājika-
19 S1 adhicittanti.

[page 410]
410 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.
āvuso devehi Tāvatiṃsā devā abhikkantatarā ca paṇitatarā
ca || sādhāyasmā1 cātummahārājikehi cātummahārājikehi
devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā Tāvatiṃsesu devesu cittam
adhimocehī ti || ||
11--16. So ce evaṃ vadeyya || Cātummahārājikehi me
devehi2 cittaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ Tāvatiṃsesu devesu cittam adhi-
mocitan ti3 || so evam assa vacanīyo || Tāvatiṃsehi4 kho
avuso devehi pi5 Yāmā devā Tusitā devā Nimmānarati-
devā6 Paranimmitavasavattino7 devā8 || ||
17. Parinimmitavasavattīhi kho āvuso devehi Brahma-
loko abhikkantataro ca paṇitataro ca || sādhāyasmā9 Pari-
nimittavasavattīhi devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā Brahmaloke
cittam adhimocehī ti || ||
18. So ce10 evaṃ vadeyya || Paranimmitavasavattīhi me11
devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhitam12 Brahmaloke cittam adhimoci-
tan ti || so evam assa vacanīyo || Brahmaloko pi kho āvuso
anicco adhuvo sakkāya pariyāpanno || sādhāyasmā13 Brah-
malokā14 cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkāya15 nirodhe cittam
upasaṃharāhī ti16 || ||
19. So ce evam vadeyya || Brahmalokā me cittaṃ vuṭṭhi-
taṃ sakkāya nirodhe cittam17 upasaṃharāmīti18 || evaṃ
vuttassa19 kho Mahānāma upāsakassa āsavā20 vimutta-
cittena bhikkhunā na kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ vadāmi yad
idam vimuttiyā vimuttinti21 || ||

SN_5,55(11).55. (5) Caturo phalā1.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti || katame cattāro || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 sā (S3 sa) cāyasmā.
2 S1-3 omit me devehi.
3 S1 adhimocittanti the second t being erased in S3.
4 S1 tāvatiṃse.
5 missing in S1-3.
6 S1-3 -ratī-
7 S1-3 -vasavattī.
8 S1-3 are complete about each devaclass.
9 S1-3 sācāyasmā.
10 missing in S3.
11 S1 kho S3 nothing.
12 S1 inserts here brahmaloke cittaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ.
13 S1 sācā- S3 sacā.
14 S1-3 -loke.
15 S1 sakkāsa.
16 S1-3 upasaṃharati.
17 S1 has only cito
18 S1-3 upasaṃhatanti.
19 B1 -vimuttacittassa.
20 S1-3 vassasata.
21 S1-3 vimuttiyaṃ vimuttan ti.

[page 411]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 411
3. Sappurisasaṃsevo saddhammasavanaṃ yonisomana-
sikāro dhammānudhammapaṭipatti || ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).56. (6) Caturo phalā2.
2. Cattāro me bhikkhave dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti1 || ||

SN_5,55(11).57. (7) Caturo phalā3.
2. Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti || ||

SN_5,55(11).58. (8) Caturo phalā4.
2. Arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).59. (9) Paṭilābho.
2. Paññāpaṭilābhāya saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).60. (10) Vuḍḍhi.
2. Paññāvuddhiyā saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).61. (11) Vepullatā.
2. Paññāvepullāya saṃvattantī ti || ||
Sappaññavaggo chaṭṭho2 || ||
Sagāthakam Vassavutthaṃ3 Dhammaninnanti Gilāyanaṃ
Caturo phalā Paṭilābho Vuddhi4 Vepullatāya cā ti5 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This and the following texts are more, or less complete in S1-3.
2 put by S1-3 after the uddāna and preceded by sotāpattisaṃyuttassa.
3 S3 vassaṃvuttha.
4 S1 vuddhī.
5 This uddāna is to be found in the Singhalese MSS. only.

[page 412]
412 Sotāpatti-Saṃyuttam LV.

CHAPTER VII. MAHĀPAÑÑĀVAGGO SATTAMO.

SN_5,55(11).62. (1) Mahā.
4. Mahāpaññattāya1 saṃvattantī ti || ||

SN_5,55(11).63. (2) Puthu.
4. Puthupaññattāya saṃvattantī ti || || Vitthāretabbaṃ2 || ||

SN_5,55(11).64. (3) Vipula.
4. Vipulapaññattāya saṃvattantī ti3 || ||

SN_5,55(11).65. (4) Gambhīra.
4. Gambhīrapaññattāya saṃvattantī ti3 || ||

SN_5,55(11).66. (5) Asamatta (or Appamatta).
4. Appamattapaññattāya4 saṃvattantī ti5 || ||

SN_5,55(11).67. (6) Bhūri.
4. Bhūripaññattāya saṃvattantī ti3 || ||

SN_5,55(11).68. (7) Bahula.
4. Paññābahullāya saṃvattantī ti5 || ||

SN_5,55(11).69. (8) Sīgha.
4. Sīghapaññattāya6 saṃvattanti || ||

SN_5,55(11).70. (9) Lahu.
4. Bahulapaññattāya7 saṃvattantī ti5 || ||

SN_5,55(11).71. (10) Hāsa (or Hāsu).
4. Hāsapaññattāya8 saṃvattantī ti5 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 paññatāya always.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 S1 -vattanti S3 vattantī.
4 S1-3 asamatta-
5 S1 samvattanti.
6 B1-2 saṅgha- S1 (further on) dīgha.
7 B1 (and S1-3 further on) lahu.
8 S1-3 hāsu-

[page 413]
Sotāpatti-{Saṃyuttam} LV. 413

SN_5,55(11).72. (11) Javana.
4. Javanapaññattāya saṃvattantī ti1 || ||

SN_5,55(11).73. (12) Tikkha.
4. Tikkhapaññattāya saṃvattantī ti2 || ||

SN_5,55(11).74. (13) Nibbedhika.
2. Nibbedhikāya saṃvattanti || katame cattāro || ||
3. Sappurisaṃsevo saddhammasavanaṃ yonisomanasi-
kāro dhammānudhammapatipatti3 || ||
4. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro dhammā bhāvitā bahulī-
katā4 nibbedhikapaññattāya saṃvattantī ti || ||
Mahā-Puthu-Vipula-Gambhīram-Asamata-Bhūri-Bāhula-
Sīgha-Lahu-Hāsu-Javana-Tikkha-Vibbedhikāya cā ti5 || ||
Sotāpattisaṃyuttassa Mahāpaññāvaggo sattamo6 || ||
Sotāpatisaṃyuttaṃ ekādasamaṃ7 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 -saṃvattanti.
2 S1 -saṃvattanti.
3 missing in S1.
4 here S1-3 have -pe- and rehearse all the afore said terms:
puthu-paññattāya samvattanti javana- gambhīra asamatta- bhūri-
paññā- bāhula- dīgha- (in S1 instead of sīgha) lahu- hāsu-
javana- nibbeddhikapaññattāya saṃvattanti.
5 this uddāna is to be found in S1-3 only.
6 this mention in S1-3 only.
7 So B1; S1-3 have samattaṃ instead of ekādasamaṃ.

[page 414]
414

BOOK XII.
SACCA-SAṂYUTTAM.

CHAPTER I. SAMĀDHIVAGGO PATHAMO.

SN_5,56(12).1. (1) Samādhi.
1. Sāvatthi || la1 || ||
2. Samādhim bhikkhave bhāvetha || || Samāhito bhikkhave
bhikkhu yathābhūtam pajānāti || || Kiñca yathābhūtam pa-
jānāti || ||
3. Idam dukkhan ti pajānāti || ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo
ti yathābhūtam pa- || ayam dukkhanirodho ti yathābhūtam
pa- || ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam
pajānāti || ||
4. Samādhim bhikkhave bhāvetha samāhito bhikkhave
bhikkhu yathābhūtam pajānāti || || Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave
Idam dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo || Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo
ti yogo karanīyo || Ayam dukkhanirodho ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo || ||

SN_5,56(12).2. (2) Patisallāna.
2. Paṭisallāṇe2 bhikkhave yogam āpajjatha || paṭisallīno3
bhikkhave bhikkhu yathābhūtam pajānāti || Kiñca yathā-
bhūtam pajānāti || ||
3. Idaṃ dukkhan ti yathābhūtam4 pajānāti || ayam duk-
khasamudayo ti yathābhūtam4 || pe || ayaṃ dukkhanirodha-
gāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānāti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So B1; complete in S1-3.
2 S1-3 -ṇo.
3 S1-3 -sallāṇo always.
4 missing in S1-3.

[page 415]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 415
4. Paṭisallāṇe bhikkhave yogam āpajjatha || paṭisallīno
bhikkhave bhikkhu yathābhūtam pajānāti || || Tasmā ti ha
bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo || pe || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).3. (3) Kulaputta1.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam kulaputtā
sammāagārasmā anagāriyam pabbajiṃsu || sabbe te catun-
nam ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtam abhisamayāya || ||
3. Ye pi hi keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānam kula-
puttā sammāagārasmā1 anagāriyam pabbajjissanti || sabbe
te catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtam abhisama-
yāya || ||
4. Ye pi hi keci bhikkhave etarahi kulaputtā sammā-
agārasmā anagāriyam pabbajjanti || sabbe te catunnam
ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtam abhisamayāya || Katamesaṃ
catunnam || ||
5. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || Dukkhasamudayassa ari-
yasaccassa || dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa || dukkhaniro-
dhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasaccassa || ||
6. Ye2 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ kulaputtā
sammāagārasmā anagāriyam pabbajiṃsu || pabbajissanti ||
pabbajanti || sabbe te imesaṃ yeva catunnam ariyasaccā-
nam yathābhūtam abhisamayāya || || Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave
Idaṃ dukkhanti3 || pe || yogo karaṇīyo || Ayaṃ dukkhaniro-
dhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).4. (4) Kulaputta2.
2. Ye2 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ kulaputtā
sammāagārasmā anagāriyam pabbajitā yathābhūtam abhi-
samesuṃ || sabbe te cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam a-
bhisamesuṃ || ||
3. Ye pi4 hi keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānaṃ kula-
puttā sammāagārasmā5 anagāriyam pabbajitā yathābhū-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 omit sammā.
2 B1 adds pi.
3 S1 vuccati.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 omit sammā.

[page 416]
416 Sacca-Samyuttam LVI.
taṃ1 abhisamessanti || sabbe te ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam
abhisamessanti || ||
4. Ye pi2 hi keci bhikkhave etarahi kulaputtā sammā-
agārasmā3 anagāriyam pabbajitā yathābhūtam abhisamen-
ti4 || sabbe te5 cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisam-
enti6 || Katame cattāri || ||
5. Dukkham ariyasaccam || pe || dukkhanirodhagāminī
patipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
6. Ye7 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam kulaputtā
sammāagārasmā anagāriyam pabbajitā yathābhūtam abhi-
samesuṃ || abhisamessanti || abhisamenti || sabbe te imāni
cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisamenti || || Tasmā
ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo || la-pe ||
Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).5. (5) Samaṇabrāhmaṇā1.
2. Ye7 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā yathābhūtam abhisambujjhiṃsu8 || sabbe te
cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambujjhissanti || ||
3. Ye- -anāgatam addhānam- -abhisambujjhissanti9 || ||

vā yathābhūtam abhisambujjhanti11 sabbe te cattāri ariya-
saccāni yathābhūtam abhisambujjhanti11 || || Katamāni cat-
tāri || || Dukkham ariyasaccam || la12 || dukkhanirodhagāminī
patipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
5. Ye pi hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam samaṇā
vā brāhmaṇā va yathābhūtam abhisambujjhiṃsu || abhi-
sambujjhissanti abhisambujjhanti || sabbe te imāni cattāri

katamāni-

SN_5,56(12).6. (6) Samaṇabrāhmaṇā2.
2. Ye1 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānaṃ samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā yathābhūtam abhisambuddham pakāsesuṃ ||
sabbe te cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambud-
dham pakāsesuṃ || ||
3. Ye pi2 hi keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānaṃ sa-
maṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yathābhūtam abhisambuddham pa-
kāsessanti sabbe te cattāri3 ariyasaccāni4 yathābhūtam
abhisambuddham pakāsessanti || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhi- etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ya-
thābhūtam abhisambuddham pakāsenti || sabbe te cattāri
ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambuddham pakāsenti ||
Katamāni cattāri || || Dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || la || Dukkha-
nirodhagāminī patipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
5. Ye pi2 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam samaṇā
vā brāhmaṇā vā yathābhūtam abhisambuddham pakāse-
suṃ5 || pakāsessanti || pakāsenti || sabbe te imāni cattāri
ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambuddham pakāsenti || ||
Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo karanīyo ||
la-[pe] || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

tha8 || {seyyathīdaṃ} kāmavitakkaṃ vyāpādavitakkam vihiṃ-
sāvitakkaṃ || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
3. Nete bhikkhave vitakkā atthasaṃhitā9 nādibrahma-

ti vitakkeyyātha || [pe] || ayaṃ dukkhanirodho ti vitakkey-
yātha || ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti vitakkey-

SN_5,56(12).8. (8) Cintā.
2. Mā bhikkhave pāpakam akusalaṃ cittaṃ cinteyyā-
tha5 || Sassato loko ti vā Asassato loko ti vā || || Antavā
loko ti vā Anantavā loko ti vā || || Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran
ti vā || Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran ti vā || || Hoti Tathā-
gato parammaraṇā ti vā || Na hoti Tathāgato parammara-
ṇā ti6 vā || Hoti ca na ca hoti Tathāgato parammaraṇā
ti vā || Neva hoti na na hoti Tathāgato parammaraṇā ti
vā || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
3. Nesā bhikkhave cintā atthasaṃhitā nādibrahmacari-
yikā7 na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasa-
māya na abhiññaya na sambodhāya8 na nibbānāya saṃ-
vattanti || ||
4. Cintentā ca9 kho tumhe bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhanti
cinteyyātha || pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhāgāminī patipadā ti
cinteyyātha || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
5. Esā bhikkhave cintā atthasañhitā esā ādibrahmacari-
yikā7 esā nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiñ-

SN_5,56(12).9. (9) Viggāhikā.
2. Mā bhikkhave viggāhikakathaṃ katheyyātha2 || Na
tvam imaṃ dhammavinayam ājānāsi || aham imaṃ3 dham-
mavinayam ājānāmi || kiṃ tvam imaṃ dhammavinayam ājā-
nissasi4 || || Micchāpaṭipanno tvam asi || aham asmi5 sammā-
paṭipanno || || Pure vacanīyam pacchā avaca pacchā vacanī-
yam pure avaca || || Sahitam me asahitan te || || Āciṇṇan6 te
viparāvattaṃ || || Āropito te vādo || cara7 vādappamokkhāya
Niggahīto si nibbeṭhehi8 sace pahosī ti || || Taṃ kissa
hetu || ||
3. Nesā bhikkhave kathā atthasaṃhitā nādibrahmacari-
yikā9 na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamā-
ya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvat-
tati || ||
4. Kathentā ca kho tumhe bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti
katheyyātha || pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā
ti katheyyātha || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
5. Esā hi bhikkhave kathā || pa || yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).10. (10) Kathā.
2. Mā bhikkhave anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakatham ka-
theyyātha10 || seyyathīdaṃ || Rājakathaṃ || corakathaṃ || ma-
hāmattakathaṃ || senākathaṃ || bhayakathaṃ || suddhaka-
thaṃ || annakathaṃ || pānakatham || vatthakathaṃ || sayana-
kathaṃ || mālākathaṃ11 || gandha- || ñāti- || yāna- || gāmā- ||
nigama- || nagara- || janapada- || itthi- || purisa-12 || surā-13 ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 nibbāya.
2 S1-3 viggāhika (S1 viggāhi-) kathā kathetha.
3 S1 omits imaṃ, S3 all the phrase.
4 S1-3 ajā-
5 B1 asmiṃ and inserts aham asi after tvam asi.
6 B1 adhiciṇṇan.
7 S1 capara.
8 B1 nibbedhehi vā.
9 S1 -cariyikā.
10 S1-3 kathetha.
11 S1 māḷā-
12 S1-3 omits purisa-
13 S3 sura-

[page 420]
420 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
visikhā- || kumbhaṭṭhāna- || pubbapeta-1 || nānatta- || lokak-
khāyikaṃ samuddakkhāyikam || itibhavābhavakathaṃ iti vā || ||
Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
3. Nesā bhikkhave kathā atthasaṃhitā nādibrahmacari-
yikā2 na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasam-
āya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya3 saṃvat-
tati || ||
4. Kathentā ca kho tumhe bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti
katheyyātha || Ayam dukkhasamudayo ti || katheyyātha || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodho4 ti katheyyātha || Ayam dukkhanirodhagā-
minī patipadā ti katheyyātha || || Taṃ kissa hetu5 || ||
5. Esā bhikkhave kathā atthasaṃhitā esā ādibrahmacari-
yikā2 esā nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiñ-
ñāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || || Tasmāti ha
bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo || la-[pe] || Ayam
dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||
Samādhivaggo pathamo6 || ||
Tassuddānaṃ7 || ||
Samādhi Paṭisallāṇa8 || Kulaputtā9 apare duve10 || ||
Samaṇabrāhmaṇā11 Vitakkā12 || Cintā13 Viggāhikā
Kathā ti14 || ||

CHAPTER II.
DHAMMACAKKAPAVATTANA-VAGGO DUTIYO.

SN_5,56(12).11. (1) Tathāgatena vutta1.
1. Evam me sutaṃ15 ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Bārāṇa-
siyaṃ viharati Isipatane Migadāye || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 -petha- S1 has only -pe-
2 B1-2 -cariyakā.
3 S1 inserts na.
4 S1 nirodho.
5 S1-3 omit taṃ-
6 S1-3 paṭhamo vaggo samatto.
7 S1-3 uddānam.
8 S1-3 -sallāṇā.
9 S3 -putto.
10 S1-3 dve.
11 S1-3 samaṇā omitting brāhmaṇā.
12 S1-3 add ca.
13 S1-3 citta.
14 S1-3 kathenacāri.
15 this phrase in S1-3 only.

[page 421]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 421
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi || ||
Dve me bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevittabbā || Ka-
tame dve || ||
3. Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmesu khallikānuyogo hīno gam-
mo puthujjanīko1 anariyo anatthasaṃhito || yo cāyam atta-
kilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito || || Ete te
bhikkhave ubho ante anupakamma majjhimā paṭipadā Ta-
thāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upa-
samāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || ||
4. Katamā ca sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā Tathā-
gatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasam-
āya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || || Ayam
eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi
sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo
sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi || || Ayam kho sā
bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā Tathāgatena abhisambuddhā
cakkhu- ñaṇa- karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya
nibbānāya saṃvattati || ||
5. Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || ||
Jāti pi dukkhā jarā pi dukkhā vyādhi pi dukkhā mara-
ṇam pi dukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā
pi dukkhā2 || appiyehi sampayogo dukkho piyehi vippayogo
dukkho || yam picchaṃ na labhati3 tam pi dukkhaṃ || saṃ-
khittena pañcupādānakkhandhā pi4 dukkhā || ||
6. Idam kho pana5 bhikkhave dukkhasamudayam ariya-
saccaṃ6 || || Yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandī rāgasahaga-
tā tatra tatrābhinandinī || seyyathīdaṃ || || Kāmataṇhā bha-
vataṇhā vibhavataṇhā || ||
7. Idaṃ kho7 pana bhikkhave8 dukkhanirodham ariya-
saccaṃ || || Yo tassā yeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo
paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo || ||
8. Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkhanirodhagāminī pa-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 pothuj- -- the text of B2, after a long interruption,
reappears here at thuj- with the sheet dhāh.
2 S1-3 B2 omit soka-
3 B1 labbhati.
4 in B1-2 only.
5 B1 puts pana before kho.
6 B2 saccaṃ without ariya.
7 B1 vo.
8 S1 inserts here dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.

[page 422]
422 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
ṭipadā ariyasaccam || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ||
seyyathīdaṃ || sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe || sammāsamādhi || ||
9. Idaṃ dukkham ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave pubbe
ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi
paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi || || Taṃ kho
panidaṃ dukkham ariyasaccam pariññeyyan ti me bhikkhave
pubbe || la1 || pariññātan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussu-
tesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi || pe || āloko udapādi || ||
10. Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave
pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam
udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi || ||
Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayam2 ariyasaccam3 pahā-
tabban ti me bhikkhave pubbe || la-pe || pahīnan ti me bhik-
khave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ||
pe || āloko udapādi || ||
11. Idaṃ dukkhanirodham ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave
pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam
udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi || ||
Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodham ariyasaccaṃ sacchi-
kātabban ti me bhikkhave pubbe || la-pe || sacchikatan ti
me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum
udapādi || pe || āloko udapādi || ||
12. Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan ti
me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum
udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālo-
ko udapādi || || Tam kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī
paṭipadā ariyasaccam bhāvetabban ti me bhikkhave || pa4 ||
bhāvitan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā
udapādi āloko udapādi || ||
13. Yāva kīvañca me bhikkhave imesu catusu ariyasac-
cesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñā-
ṇaḍassanaṃ na suvisuddham5 ahosi || neva tāvāham6 bhik-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ananussutem- -āloko udapādi.
2 S1 B2 -samudaya.
3 S1 -saccanti B2 saccaṃ omitting ariya.
4 S1-3 have pubbe ananussutesu- -āloko udapādi.
5 B1-2 visuddhaṃ.
6 B1 tāhaṃ.

[page 423]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 423
khave sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇa-
brāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammā-
sambodhim abhisambuddho ti1 paccaññāsiṃ || ||
14. Yato ca kho me bhikkhave imesu catusu ariyasac-
cesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭam dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtam ñā-
ṇadassanaṃ suvisuddham ahosi || athāham bhikkhave sade-
vake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā
pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaram sammāsambodhim a-
bhisambuddho ti2 paccaññāsiṃ || ñāṇañca pana me dassa-
nam udapādi Akuppā me cetovimutti3 ayam antimā jāti
natthidāni punabbhavo ti || ||
15. Idam avoca Bhagavā || attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhik-
khū Bhagavato bhāsitam abhinanduṃ || imasmiṃ ca pana
veyyākaraṇasmim bhaññamāne āyasmato4 Koṇḍaññassa5
virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhum udapādi || yaṃ kiñci
samudayadhammaṃ6 sabban taṃ nirodhadhamman ti || ||
16. Evam7 pavattite ca pana Bhagavatā dhammacakke
Bhummā devā saddam anussāvesuṃ || || Etam Bhagavatā
Bārāṇasiyam Isipatane Migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacak-
kam pavattitaṃ appativattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena
vā devena vā Mārena vā Brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokas-
min ti || ||
17. Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā Cātummahārā-
jikā devā saddam anussāvesuṃ || || Etam Bhagavatā Bārā-
ṇasiyam Isipatane Migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkam
pavattitam appativattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā
devena vā Mārena vā Brahmuṇā vā kenaci vā lokasmin ti || ||
18. Cātummahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā Tāva-
ṭiṃsā devā8 Yāmā devā Tusitā devā Nimmānaratī devā
Paranimmittavasavattino9 devā Brahmakāyikā devā sad-
dam anussāvesuṃ || || Etam Bhagavatā Bārāṇasiyaṃ Isipa-
tane Migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkam pavattitaṃ

2 S3 omit ti.
