appativattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā
Mārena vā Brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin ti || ||
19. Iti ha tena khaṇena tena layena1 tena muhuttena
yāva Brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi2 || ayañ ca dasasa-
hassī lokadhātu3 saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi || ap-
pamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pātur ahosi atikkamma de-
vānaṃ devānubhāvan ti || ||
20. Atha kho Bhagavā udānam udānesi || || Aññāsi vata
bho {Koṇḍañño} aññāsi vata bho Koṇḍañño ti || || Iti hidam
āyasmato Koṇḍaññassa Aññāta-Koṇḍañño4 tveva5 nāmam
ahosī ti || ||
SN_5,56(12).12. (2) Tathāgatena vutta2.
2. Idaṃ dukkham ariyasaccan ti bhikkhave tathāgatānam
pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam
udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi || ||
Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkham ariyasaccam pariññeyyan ti
bhikkhave tathāgatānam pubbe || la-pe || pariññātan ti bhik-
khave tathāgatānam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cak-
khum udapādi || pe || āloko udapādi || ||
3. Idaṃ dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccan ti bhikkhave ta-
thāgatānam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum uda-
pādi || pe || āloko udapādi || || Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkha-
samudayam ariyasaccam pahātabban ti bhikkhave tathā-
gatānam pubbe || la6 || pahīnan ti bhikkhave tathāgatānam
pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi || pe ||
āloko udapādi || ||
4. Idaṃ dukkhanirodham ariyasaccan ti bhikkhave Ta-
thāgatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum uda-
pādi || pe || āloko udapādi || || Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhani-
rodham ariyasaccam sacchikātabban ti tathāgatānam pubbe7

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 omit tenalayena.
2 B1 abbhugacchi S1-3 abbhuggañchi B2 abbhuggachati.
3 S1 dasahassī- B1-2 -sahassi-
4 B1-2 aññata-koṇḍañño S1-3 aññākoṇḍañño (S3 -ñña).
5 B1-2 teva.
6 S1-3 ananu- dhammesu -pe-.
7 S1-3 omit tathāgatānam-

[page 425]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 425
la-pe || sacchikatan ti bhikkhave tathāgatānam pubbe
ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi || pe || āloko
udapādi || ||
5. Idaṃ1 dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan ti
bhikkhave tathāgatānam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā
udapādi āloko udapādi || || Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaniro-
dhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccam bhāvetabban ti bhikkhave
tathāgatānam pubbe || la-pe || bhāvitan ti bhikkhave tathā-
gatānam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum uda-
pādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko
udapādī ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).13. (3) Khandha.
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccāni || katamāni2 cat-
tāri || || Dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || dukkhasamudayam ariya- ||
dukkhanirodham ariya- dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ari-
yasaccaṃ || ||
3. Katamañca bhikkhave dukkham ariyasaccam || || Pañ-
cupādānakkhandhā tissa vacanīyaṃ3 || seyyathīdaṃ || || Rū-
pūpādānakkhandho || la || viññānūpādānakkhando || || Idaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || ||
4. Katamañca bhikkhave dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccaṃ || ||
Yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā4 nandirāgasahagatā5 tatra ta-
tatrābhinandinī6 || seyyathīdaṃ kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vi-
bhavataṇhā || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave dukkhasamudayam
ariyasaccaṃ || ||
5. Katamañca bhikkhave dukkhanirodham ariyasaccaṃ || ||
Yo tassā yeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo
mutti anālayo || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave dukkhanirodham
ariyasaccaṃ || ||
6. Katamañca bhikkhave dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā
ariyasaccaṃ || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || seyya-
thīdam || sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe || sammāsamādhi || || Idaṃ vuccati
bhikkhave dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 ayam.
2 B2 katamāri.
3 S1-3 add katame pañca.
4 B2 pona (B1 ponva-) bbha-
5 B1 S1 nandī-
6 B2 -nandini B1 -dīni.

[page 426]
426 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
7. Imāni kho bhikkhave ariyasaccāni || || Tasmā ti ha bhik-
khave || Idam dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo || la-pe || || Ayam duk-
khanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).14. (4) Āyatana.
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccāni-1 || -ayaṃ2 duk-
khanirodhagāminī patipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
3. Katamañca bhikkhave dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || || Cha
ajjhattikāni āyatanāni tissa vacanīyaṃ || katamāni cha || ||
Cakkhāyatanaṃ || la || manāyatanaṃ || || Idaṃ vuccati bhik-
khave dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || ||
4. Katamañca bhi- dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccaṃ || ||
Yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā3 tatra ta-
trābhinandinī4 || seyyathīdaṃ kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibha-
vataṇhā || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave dukkhasamudayam
ariyasaccaṃ || ||
5. Katamañca bhi- dukkhanirodham ariyasaccaṃ || yo
tasseva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mut-
ti anālayo || || Idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave dukkhanirodham
ariyasaccaṃ || ||
6. Katamañca bhikkhave dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā
ariyasaccaṃ || || Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo || sey-
yathīdam || sammādiṭṭhi || la-pe || sammāsamādhi || || Idaṃ
vuccati bhikkhave dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariya-
saccaṃ || ||
7. Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri ariyasaccāni || || Tasmā
ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo || la-pe ||
Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karāṇīyo
ti5 || ||

SN_5,56(12).15. (5) Dhārana1.
2. Dhāretha no tumhe bhikkhave mayā cattāri ariya-
saccāni desitānī ti || ||
3. Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu Bhagavantam etad

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 as in the preceding sutta.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 S1 nandī-
4 B1 -nandini B2 -nandīni.
5 S3 omits ti.

[page 427]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 427
avoca || || Ahaṃ kho bhante dhāremi Bhagavatā1 cattāri
ariyasaccāni desitānī ti || ||
Yathā kathaṃ pana tvam bhikkhu dhāresi mayā cattāri
ariyasaccāni desitānī ti2 || ||
4. Dukkhaṃ khvāham bhante Bhagavatā pathamam
ariyasaccam desitaṃ dhāremi || dukkhasamudayaṃ khvā-
haṃ bhante Bhagavatā dutiyam3 ariyasaccam desitaṃ
dhāremi || dukkhanirodhaṃ khvāham bhante4 Bhagavatā
tatiyam ariyasaccam dhāremi || dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ5
paṭipadaṃ khvāham bhante Bhagavatā6 catuttham ariya-
saccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi || || Evaṃ7 khvāham bhante dhā-
remi Bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī ti || ||
5. Sādhu sādhu bhikkhu sādhu kho tvam bhikkhu dhā-
resi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitāni8 || || Dukkhaṃ kho
bhikkhu mayā pathamam ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ tathā naṃ
dhārehi || pe || dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ9 kho bhik-
khu mayā catuttham ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ tathā naṃ dhā-
rehi || ||
6. Evaṃ kho10 bhikkhu dhārehi11 mayā cattāri ariya-
saccāni desitāni12 || || Tasmā ti ha bhikkhu Idam dukkhan
ti yogo karaṇīyo || la-pe || || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī pa-
ṭipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).16. (6) Dhārana2.
2. Dhāretha no tumhe bhikkhave mayā cattāri ariyasac-
cāni desitāni || ||
3. Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu Bhagavantam etad
avoca || || Ahaṃ kho bhante dhāremi Bhagavatā cattāri
ariyasaccāni desitānī ti || ||
Yathā katham pana tvam bhikkhu dhāresi mayā cattāri
ariyasaccāni desitānī ti || ||

1 missing in S3.
2 S3 has -pe- instead of yathākathaṃ-
3 S1-3 add pi.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 B1-2 -gāmini.
6 bhagavatā- till bhante dhāremi is missing in S1-3.
7 B2 inserts pi.
8 S1-3 desitānīti.
9 S1 -gāminī-
10 S1-3 vo.
11 S3 dhāresi.
12 missing in S1-3.

[page 428]
428 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
4. Dukkham khvāhaṃ1 bhante Bhagavatā pathamam
ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi || || Yo hi koci bhante sa-
maṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya || || Netaṃ dukkham
pathamam ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ2 samaṇena3 Gotamena desi-
taṃ || aham etaṃ dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam pac-
cakkhāya aññaṃ dukkham pathamaṃ ariyasaccam paññā-
pessāmī ti netaṃ ṭhānam vijjati || ||
5--6. Dukkhasamudayam khvāham1 bhante Bhagavatā ||
la || ||
7. Dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ4 paṭipadaṃ khvāham5 bhante6
Bhagavatā catuttham ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi || || Yo
hi koci bhante samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya || ||
Netaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā7 catuttham ariya-
saccam yaṃ2 samaṇena Gotamena desitam || aham etaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ catutthaṃ ariyasaccam
paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminim paṭipadaṃ ca-
tutthaṃ ariyasaccam paññāpessāmī ti netaṃ thānaṃ
vijjati || ||
8. Evam khvāham bhante dhāremi Bhagavatā cattāri
ariyasaccāni desitanī ti || ||
9. Sādhu sādhu bhikkhu sādhu kho tvam bhikkhu dhā-
resi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitāni || || Dukkhaṃ kho
bhikkhu mayā pathamam ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ tathā nam
dhārehi || || Yo hi koci bhikkhu samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā
evaṃ vadeyya || || Netaṃ dukkham pathamam ariyasaccaṃ
samaṇena Gotamena desitaṃ || aham etaṃ dukkham pa-
thamam ariyasaccam pacchakkhāya aññam dukkham ari-
yasaccam paññāpessamī ti netam ṭhānam vijjati || || Duk-
khasamudayaṃ kho bhikkhu || la || || Dukkhanirodhaṃ kho
bhikkhu || la8 || Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ9 kho bhik-
khu mayā catuttham ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ tathā naṃ dhāre-
hi || || Yohi koci bhikkhu samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evam vadey-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 khoham.
2 in B1-2 only.
3 S3 inserts vā.
4 B1 gāmini.
5 S1-3 kho.
6 missing in S1-3.
7 B1 dukkhaṃ- S1-3 -gaminiṃ (B1 -ni) paṭipadaṃ.
8 the abridgment in S1-3 is thus: pathamam ariyasaccam paccakkha
-pe- paññāpessāmīti netaṃ thānaṃ vijjati -pe-
9 S1-3 -gāminī-

[page 429]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 429
ya Netaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipatipadā1 catuttham ari
yasaccaṃ yaṃ2 samaṇena Gotamena desitaṃ || aham etaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadam3 catuttham ariyasaccam
paccakkhāya aññam dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ3 ca-
tuttham4 ariyasaccam paññāpessāmīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vij-
jati || ||
9. Evaṃ kho tvam2 bhikkhu dhārehi5 mayā cattāri ari-
yasaccāni desitāni4 || || Tasmā ti ha bhikkhu Idaṃ duk-
khan ti yogo karaṇīyo || la-pe || || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāmi-
nī paṭipadā ti6 yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).17. (7) Avijjā.
2. Atha7 kho aññataro bhikkhu- -nisīdi || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Avijjā avijjā ti8 bhante vuccati || || Kata-
mā nu kho bhante avijjā kittāvatā ca9 avijjāgato hotī ti || ||
4. Yaṃ kho bhikkhu dukkhe aññāṇam dukkhasamudaye
aññāṇam dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmini-
yā10 paṭipadāya11 aññāṇaṃ ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu avijjā
ettāvatā ca12 avijjāgato hotī ti || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhu Idam dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).18. (8) Vijjā.
2. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena Bhagavā tenupa-
saṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekam
antaṃ nisīdi || ||
3. Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu Bhagavantam
etad avoca || || Vijjā vijjā ti13 bhante vuccati14 || Katamā nu
kho bhante vijjā15 kittāvatā ca vijjāgato hotī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 -gāminī- B1 -paṭipadaṃ.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S1-3 -gāminī-
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 dhāresi.
6 S1-3 paṭipadanti.
7 in S1-3 only.
8 S1 omits ti.
9 missing in S1.
10 B -gāmini S3 -gāminīyā.
11 S1 padāya omitting paṭi.
12 S1-3 omit avijjā-
13 S1-3 add kho.
14 S3 pavuccati.
15 S1-3 add ti.

[page 430]
430 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
4. Yaṃ kho bhikkhu dukkhe ñāṇaṃ dukkhasamudaye
ñāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭi-
padāya1 ñāṇaṃ ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu vijjā || || Ettāvatā ca
vijjāgato hoti2 || ||
5. Tasmā tiha bhikkhu Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).19. (9) Saṅkāsanā.
2. Idaṃ dukkham ariyasaccan ti bhikkhave mayā pañña-
ttaṃ || tattha aparimāṇā3 vaṇṇā4 aparimāṇā vyañjanā apari-
māṇā saṃkāsanā5 itipidam dukkham ariyasaccan ti || ||
3. Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ || la || ||
4. Idaṃ dukkhanirodham || [la] 6 || ||
5. Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan ti7
bhikkhave mayā paññattaṃ || tattha aparimāṇā vaṇṇā apa-
rimāṇā vyañjanā aparimāṇā saṃkāsanā itipidaṃ dukkhani-
rodhagāminī paṭipadā8 ariyasaccan ti || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhu Idaṃ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo kara-
nīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).20. (10) Tathā.
2. Cattārīmāni bhikkhave tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni ||
katamāni cattāri || ||
3. Idaṃ dukkhan ti bhikkhave tatham9 etam avitatham
etam anaññatatham etaṃ || ||
4. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ti tatham etaṃ avitatham etam
anaññatham etaṃ || ||
5. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodho ti tatham etaṃ avitatham etam
anaññatham etaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -gāminiyā paṭi-
2 B1-2 hotī ti.
3 S1-3 -māṇa always.
4 S1-3 vaṇṇo.
5 saṃ always.
6 in 3 ana 4, which they give complete, S1-3 have always saṃ
instead of saṃkāsanā.
7 S3 saccaṃ S1 sacca.
8 S3 B1 -gāmini B1 paṭipada.
9 S1 tathām S3 tatham corrected from tathām.

[page 431]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 431
6. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti tatham etam
avitatham etam anaññatham etaṃ || ||
7. Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri tatthāni avitathāni anañña-
thāni || || Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo || la-pa || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇī yoti || ||
Dhammacakkapavattanavaggo1 dutiyo || ||
Tassa2 uddānaṃ || ||
Tathāgatena3 dve vuttā4 ||
Khandhā5 Āyatanena6 ca ||
Dhāraṇāya7 dve vuttā ||
Avijjā Vijjā8 Saṅkāsanā9 Tathena cā ti || ||

CHAPTER III.
KOTIGĀMA-VAGGO TATIYO.

SN_5,56(12).21. (1) Vijjā1.
1. Evam me sutaṃ10 ekaṃ samayaṃ Bhagavā Vajjisu11
viharati Koṭigāme12 || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || || Catunnam bhik-
khave ariyasaccānam ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evam idaṃ
dīgham addhānam sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva
tuṃhakañca || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
3. Dukkhassa bhikkhave ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appa-
ṭivedhā evam idaṃ dīgham addhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃ-
saritam mamañceva tumhākañca || || Dukkhasamudayassa
ariyasaccassa || pa13 || || Dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa13 || ||
Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāya14 ariyasaccassa ananubo-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 pavattanavaggo.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 S1-3 insert me B2 ca.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 khandha.
6 S1-3 āyatanāni.
7 S1-3 dhāraṇena.
8 B2 avijjā.
9 S1-3 saṃ corrected from taṃ in S1.
10 this phrase in S1-3 only.11 S1-3 Vijjusu.
12 S1-3 koḷi-
13 complete in S1-3 B2.
14 S1-3 -gamini (S2 nī) yā S1 -patipadā ti.

[page 432]
432 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
dhā appaṭivedhā evaṃ dīgham addhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃ-
saritam mamañceva tumhākañca || ||
4. Tayidam bhikkhave dukkham ariyasaccaṃ anubud-
dhaṃ1 paṭividdham2 || dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam anu-
buddham paṭividdham || dukkhanirodham ariyasaccaṃ || pe ||
dukkanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccam anubuddham
patividdhaṃ || || Ucchinnā bhavataṇhā khīṇā bhavanettī
natthidāni punabbhavo ti || ||
5. Idam avoca Bhagavā || pe || etad avoca satthā || ||
Catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ || yathābhūtam adassanā ||
Saṃsitam3 dīgham addhānaṃ || tāsu tāsveva jātisu || ||
Yāni4 etāni diṭṭhāni || bhavanetti samūhatā ||
Ucchinnaṃ5 mūlaṃ dukkhassa || natthidāni punabbhavo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).22. (2) Vijjā2.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā Idam
dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti6 || || Ayaṃ dukkhasa-
mudayo ti yathā- nappajānanti || || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodho ti
yathā- nappajānanti || || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā
ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti || na me7 te bhikkhave samaṇā
vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā8 samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu
vā9 brāhmaṇa sammatā || na ca panete āyasmanto10 sāmañ-
ñattham11 vā brahmāññatthaṃ11 vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayam
abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti || ||
3. Ye ca kho keci12 bhikkhave sammaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
vā Idaṃ dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānanti || pe || || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānanti ||
te kho me bhikkhave samanā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu
ceva13 samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca13 brāhmaṇasammatā ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 ananubuddhaṃ
2 S1 appaṭividdhaṃ.
3 S1 saṃsatam S3 samsaraṃ B2 saṃsaritaṃ.
4 S1-3 tāni.
5 S1-3 ucchinna.
6 S1 pajānanti.
7 S1-3 ime instead of na me.
8 S3 samaṇo vā brāhmaṇesu vā.
9 samaṇā vā instead of samaṇā vā missing in S1.
1O B2 ayasmantā S1-3 add yāsā.
11 B2 -ññattaṃ.
12 S1 koci.
13 S1-3 vā.

[page 433]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 433
te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañ1 ca brāhmaññatthañ1
ca diṭṭheva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasam-
pajja viharantī ti || ||
4. Idam avoca Bhagavā || pe || etad avoca satthā || ||
Ye dukkhaṃ nappajānanti || atho2 dukkhassa sambhavaṃ ||
Yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṃ || asesam uparujjhati ||1||
Tañca maggaṃ na jānanti || dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ ||
Cetovimuttihīnā te || atho paññāvimuttiyā ||
Abhabbā3 te antakiriyāya || te ve4 jātijarūpagā ||2||
Ye ca dukkham pajānanti5 || atho dukkhassa sambhavaṃ ||
Yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṃ || asesaṃ uparujjhati ||3||
Tañca maggam pajānanti || dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ ||
Ceto vimuttisampannā || atho paññāvimuttiyā ||
Bhabbā te antakiriyāya || na te jātijarūpagā ti ||4||

SN_5,56(12).23. (3) Sammāsambuddho.
1-2. Sāvatthi6 || || Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccāni ||
katamāni cattāri || ||
3. Dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || la-pe || dukkhanirodhagāminī
patipadā ariyasaccam || imāni7 kho bhikkhave cattari ari-
yasaccāni || ||
4. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave8 catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ ya-
thābhūtam abhisambuddhattā Tathāgato arahaṃ sammā-
sambuddho ti vuccati || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo kara-
nīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).24. (4) Araham.
1. Sāvatthi9 || ||
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam arahanto sam-
māsambuddhā yathābhūtam abhisambujjhiṃsu || sabbe te
cattāri ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambujjhiṃsu || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B2 -ññattaṃ.
2 S3 athakho.
3 S1 abhabbo.
4 in B1 only.
5 S3 dukkhasampajānanti instead of dukkhaṃ-
6 in B1-2 only.
7 S1 imā.
8 S1 bhive.
9 in B1-2 only.

[page 434]
434 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
3. Ye pi1 hi keci bhikkhave anāgatam addhānam ara-
hanto sammāsambuddhā yathabhūtam abhisambujjhissanti ||
sabbe te cattari ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambujj-
hissanti || ||
4. Ye pi hi keci bhikkhave etarahi arahanto sammā-
sambuddhā yathābhūtam abhisambujjhanti || sabbe te cattāri
ariyasaccāni yathābhūtam abhisambujjhanti || || Katamāni
cattāri || ||
5. Dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || dukkhasamudayam ariyasac-
caṃ || dukkhanirodham asiyasaccaṃ || dukkhanirodhagāminī
paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
6. Ye pi1 hi keci bhikkhave atītam addhānam arahanto
sammāsambuddhā yathābhūtam abhisambujjhiṃsu2 || abhi-
sambujjhissanti || abhisambujjhanti || sabbe te imāni cattāri
ariyasaccāni yathabhūtam abhisambujjhanti || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo kara-
ṇiyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).25. (5) Āsavakkhayo.
2. Jānato ham3 bhikkhave passato āsavānam khayaṃ
vadāmi no ajānato apassato || Kiñca4 bhikkhave jānato5
passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti6 || ||
3. Idaṃ dukkhan ti bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṃ
khāyo hoti || Ayam dukkhasamudayo ti || pe || Ayam dukkhaniro-
dhagāminī patipadā ti jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti7 || ||
4. Evam kho bhikkhave8 jānato evam passato āsavānaṃ
khayo hoti || || Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo
karaṇīyo9 || la [pe] || ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti
yogo karaṇīyo ti..

SN_5,56(12).26. (6) Mittā.
2. Ye hi keci10 bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca sota-
bbaṃ11 maññeyyuṃ || mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā

1 missing in S1-3.
2 S1-3 insert -pe-.
3 S1-3 ahaṃ, B2 has jānatvāhaṃ.
4 B1-2 S1 kiñci.
5 B2 inserts kiṃ.
6 S1-3 ti instead of hoti.
7 S1 ti.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 S1-3 add ti.
10 S3 omits hi keci.
11 S1 sotaso.

[page 435]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 435
vā || te vo bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtām
abhisamayāya samādapetabbā1 nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetab-
bā || || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
3. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || pe || dukkhanirodhagāminiyā2
paṭipadāya ariyasaccassa || ||
4. Ye hi keci2 bhikkhave anukampeyyātha || ye ca sotab-
bam3 maññeyyuṃ mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā4 || sālohitā vā5 ||
te vo bhikkhave imesaṃ catunnam ariyasaccānam yathā-
bhūtam abhisamayāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭ-
ṭhāpetabbā || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).27. (7) Tathā.
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccāni kātamāni cattāri || ||
3. Dukkham ariyasaccam || pe || dukkhanirodhagāminī pa-
ṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
4. Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avi-
tathāni anaññathāni6 || tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo ka-
rāṇiyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).28. (8) Loko.
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccāni || katamāni cattāri || ||
3. Dukkham ariyasaccaṃ || pe || dukkhanirodhagāminī7 pa-
ṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ || ||
4. Sadevake bhikkhave8 loke samārake sabrahmake9 sassa-
maṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo ||
tasmā ariyasaccānī ti vuccanti || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

1 B2 sammā- always S1-3 samādā- here only.
2 B1-2 -gāminī.
3 S1-3 sotabba (S1 -bbā).
4 S1-3 omit ñātī vā.
5 missing in S1-3, B1-2 add || la ||
6 missing in S1-3.
7 B1 -ni.
8 missing in B2.
9 missing in S1.

[page 436]
436 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).29. (9) Pariññeyyam or Abhiññeyyam.
2. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccāni || katamāni cattāri || ||
3. Dukkham ariyasaccaṃ1 [pe] dukkhanirodhagāminī pa-
ṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ || || Imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri ari-
yasaccāni || ||
4. Imesaṃ kho bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccānam atthi
ariyasaccam pariññeyyaṃ2 || atthi ariyasaccam pahātabbaṃ ||
atthi ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ3 || atthi ariyasaccam bhā-
vetabbaṃ || || Katamañ ca bhikkhave ariyasaccam pariñ-
ñeyyaṃ || ||
5. Dukkham bhikkhave ariyasaccam pariññeyyaṃ4 || duk-
khasamudayam ariyasaccam pahātabbaṃ || dukkhanirodham
ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ || dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭī-
padā ariyasaccam bhāvetabbaṃ || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).30. (10) Gavampati.
1. Ekaṃ samayaṃ5 sambahulā therā bhikkhū Cetesu6
viharanti Sahañcanike7 || ||
2. Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṃ therānam
bhikkhūnam pacchābhattam piṇḍapātapatikkantānam maṇ-
ḍalamāle8 sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānam ayam antarā ka-
thā udapādi || || Yo nu kho āvuso dukkham passati duk-
khasamudayam pi so passati dukkhanirodham pi passati
dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadam9 pi passatī ti10 || ||
3. Evaṃ vutte āyasmā Gavampati there bhikkhū etad
avoca || || Sammukhā me tam āvuso Bhagavato sutaṃ sam-
mukhā paṭiggahītaṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 adds bhāvetabbaṃ.
2 S1 omits atthi-
3 S1-3 inserts -pe-
4 S1-3 omit this phrase.
5 S1 inserts bhagavā.
6 S1 vetisu S3 cetisu.
7 S1-3 sahajāni (S1 -na) yaṃ.
8 S3 maṇḍaḷa- S1 B1 -māḷe.
9 S1-3 gāminī- always.
10 S1-3 passati S1 adds yo dukkham pi so passati.

[page 437]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 437
4. Yo bhikkhave dukkhampassati dukkhasamudayam pi
so passati dukkhanirodham pi passati dukkhanirodhaga-
minipaṭipadam1 pi passati || || Yo dukkhasamudayam passati2 ||
dukkham pi so passati dukkhanirodham pi passati dukkha-
nirodhagaminipaṭipadam pi passati || || Yo dukkhanirodham
passati dukkham pi so3 passati dukkhasamudayam pi pas-
sati || dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadam pi passati || || Yo duk-
khanirodhagāminipatipadam passati dukkham pi so3 pas-
sati || dukkhasamudayam pi passati || dukkhanirodham pi
passatī ti || ||
Koṭigāmavaggo tatiyo || ||
Tassa4 uddānaṃ || ||
Dve Vajji5 Sammāsambuddho6 ||
Arahaṃ Āsavakkhayo7 ||
Mittā8 Tathā ca Loko ca ||
Pariññeyyaṃ9 Gavampatī ti || ||

CHAPTER IV.
SIṂSAPĀVANAVAGGO CATUTTHO.

SN_5,56(12).31. (1) Siṃsapā.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Kosambiyaṃ viharati Siṃ-
sapāvane10 || ||
2. Atha kho Bhagavā parittāni11 siṃsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā
gahetvā bhikkhū āmantesi || || Taṃ kim maññatha bhik-
khave || Katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ yāni vā mayā parittāni
siṃsapāpannāni pāṇinā gahitāni yad idam12 upari siṃsapā-
vane13 ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 gāminī- always.
2 S1-3 omit dukkha-
3 missing in S1-3.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1 sagasaha S3 sahasaga.
6 buddho.
7 -khayam
8 S1-3 mettā B2 mettaṃ.
9 B1-2 abhiññeyyaṃ.
10 B1 sīsapā- B2 sisa- both always.
11 B1 repeats parittāni.
12 S1 yāni ca S3 ca only, instead of yadidaṃ.
13 S1-3 siṃsapāyeti.

[page 438]
438 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
Appamattakāni bhante Bhagavatā parittāni siṃsapā-
paṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni || atha kho etāneva bahutarāni yad
idam upari {siṃsapāvāne} ti1 || ||
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave etad eva bahutaraṃ yaṃ vo
mayā abhiññāya anakkhātam || appamattakam akkhātaṃ2 || ||
4. Kasmā3 cetam bhikkhave mayā anakkhātaṃ || || Na he-
tam bhikkhave atthasaṃhitaṃ nādibrahmacariyakaṃ na
nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na
abhiññāya4 na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati || tasmā
tam mayā anakkhātaṃ || ||
5. Kiñca bhikkhave mayā akkhātaṃ5 || || Idaṃ dukkhan ti
bhikkhave mayā akkhātaṃ || || Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ti
mayā akkhātaṃ || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodho6 ti mayā akkhātaṃ ||
Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti mayā akkhātaṃ || ||
6. Kasmā cetam bhikkhave mayā akkhātaṃ || || Etaṃ hi
bhikkhave atthasaṃhitam || etam ādibrahmacariyakam ||
etam nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya
sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati || tasmā tam akkhātaṃ || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).32. (2) Khadiro.
2. Yo bhikkhave evaṃ vadeyya Ahaṃ dukkham ariya-
saccam yathābhūtam anabhisamecca dukkhasamudayam ari-
yasaccaṃ yathābhūtam anabhisamecca dukkhanirodham
ariyasaccaṃ {yathābhūtam} anabhisamecca dukkhanirodha-
gāminipaṭipadam ariyasaccam yathābhūtam anabhisamecca
sammādukkhassantaṃ karissāmīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yo evaṃ vadeyya Ahaṃ khadi-
rapattānaṃ7 vā palāsapattānaṃ8 vā āmalakapattānaṃ9 vā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 siṃsapāyeti.
2 B1-2 omit appa-
3 S1-3 tasmā.
4 S1-3 nābhiññāya instead of na abhi-
5 S1 anakkhātaṃ.
6 S1 -nirodha.
7 S1 ayadaripattam S3 ayadapipattānaṃ instead of ahaṃ-
8 B1-2 sala (B2 ḷā) lapattānaṃ.
9 B1-2 āmalaki- (B2 kī-)

[page 439]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 439
puṭaṃ1 karitvā udakaṃ vā tālapattaṃ vā āharissamī ti2
netaṃ ṭhāṇaṃ vijjati || || Evam eva kho bhikkhave yo evaṃ
vadeyya Ahaṃ dukkham ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam abhi-
samecca || la3 || [pe] || sammādukkhassāntam karissāmīti ne-
taṃ ṭhanaṃ vijjati || ||
4. Yo ca kho bhikkhave evaṃ vadeyya || Ahaṃ dukkham
ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam abhisamecca || pe || dukkhaniro-
dhagāminipaṭipadam ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam abhisamecca
sammādukkhassantaṃ karissāmī ti ṭhānam etaṃ vijjati || ||
5. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yo evaṃ vadeyya || Aham pa-
dumapattānam vā palāsapattānaṃ4 vā māluvāpattānam5 vā
puṭaṃ6 karitvā udakaṃ vā tālapattaṃ vā āharissāmī ti2
ṭhānam etaṃ vijjati || evam eva kho bhikkhave yo evaṃ va-
deyya || Ahaṃ dukkham ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam abhisa-
mecca7 || la-pe || dukkhanirodhagaminipaṭipadam ariyasaccaṃ
yathābhūtam abhisamecca7 sammādukkhassantam karissāmī
ti || ṭhānam etaṃ vijjati || ||
6. Tasma ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminīpatipadā ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).33. (3) Daṇḍo.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave daṇḍo uparivehāsaṃ khitto sa-
kim pi mūlena nipatati8 sakim pi majjhena nipatati9 sakim
pi aggena nipatati || evam eva kho bhikkhave avijjānīvaraṇā
sattā taṇhāsamyojanā10 sandhāvantā11 saṃsarantā12 sakim pi
asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchanti sakim pi parasmā lokā
imaṃ lokam āgacchanti || Taṃ kissa hetu || || Adiṭṭhattā
bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
3. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la-pe || dukkanirodhagāmini-
patipadāya13 ariyasaccassa || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 pūṭaṃ S1-3 kuṭiṃ.
2 S1-3 harissāmīti.
3 B1-2 add dukkanirodhagāmini- -anabhisamecca.
4 S1 pulāsa- S3 phalāpattānaṃ.
5 B1-2 māluva-
6 B2 pūṭam S1-3 kuṭiṃ.
7 S1 anabhisamecca.
8 S1-3 patati.
9 B1-2 omit sakim pi-
10 B1 inserts bandhā B2 has saṃyojanabhandhāvantā.
11 B1 sandhāvatā, missing in B2.
12 S1 saṃsaranti, missing in B1-2.
13 B2 S1-3 -paṭipadā.

[page 440]
440 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
4. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).34. (4) Ceḷa.
2. Āditte bhikkhave cele1 vā sīse vā kim assa karaṇī-
yan ti || ||
Āditte bhante2 cele3 vā sīse vā tasseva celassa vā sīsassa
vā nibbāpanāya adhimatto chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho
ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañ4 ca kara-
ṇīyan ti || ||
3. Ādittam bhikkhave celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhit-
vā5 amanasikaritvā anabhisametānam catunnam ariyasac-
cānam yathābhūtam abhisamayāya6 adhimatto chando ca
vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appativānī ca sati ca sam-
pajaññañ4 ca karaṇīyaṃ || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la-pe || dukkhanirodhagāmi-
niyā paṭipadāya7 ariyasaccassa || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
nīyo ti || pa-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti
yogo karanīyo ti8 || ||

SN_5,56(12).35. (5) Sattisata.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso vassasatāyuko vassasata-
jīvitam enaṃ evaṃ vadeyyuṃ9 || || Ehambho10 purisa pubbaṇ-
hasamayam taṃ sattisatena11 hanissanti12 || majjhantikasa-
mayam13 sattisatena hanissanti || sāyaṇhasamayaṃ sattisa-
tehi11 hanissanti || So kho tvam ambho purisa divase di-
vase tīhi tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno14 vassasatāyuko vassasa-
tajīvī vassasatassa accayena anabhisametāni cattāri15 ariya-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 ceḷe-ḷa always.
2 S1-3 ca pana instead of bhante.
3 S1 celā.
4 S1 sappa-
5 S1-3 anajjhapekkhitvā.
6 S1 anabhi- S3 abhi- corrected from anabhi-
7 S1-5 -gāminīpatipadā.

10 S1-3 evamo
11 S1-3 -satehi always.

13 S1-3 majjhaṇtikaṃ-
14 B1 -māne.

Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 441
saccāni abhisamessasī ti1 || || Atthavasikena bhikkhave2 ku-
laputtena alam upagantuṃ || taṃ kissa hetu || ||
3. Anamataggo3 yam bhikkhave saṃsāro pubbakoṭi na
paññāyati sattipahārānam asipahārānam parasupahārānam4 ||
Evaṃ ce5 tam bhikkhave assa na kho panāham6 bhik-
khave saha7 dukkhena saha domanassena catunnam ariya-
saccānam abhisamayaṃ vadāni || || Api cāham bhikkhave saha
sukhena saha8 somanassena9 catunnam ariyasaccānam va-
dāmi || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
4. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || pe || dukkhanirodhagāmini-
yā10 paṭipadāya ariyasaccassa || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
pa-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).36. (6) Pāṇā.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso yam imasmiṃ Jambudīpe
tiṇakhaṭṭhasākhāpalāsam taṃ chetvā11 ekajjhaṃ saṃha-
reyya || ekajjhaṃ saṃharitvā sūlaṃ kareyya || sūlaṃ karitvā12
ye mahāsamudde13 mahantakā14 pāṇā te mahantakesu sūle-
su āvuneyya15 || ye mahāsamudde majjhimakā pāṇā te16 maj-
jhimakesu sūlesu āvuneyya || || Ye16 mahāsamudde sukhu-
makā pāṇā te sukhumakesu sūlesu āvuneyya || || Apariyādiṇṇā
ca bhikkhave mahāsammudde oḷārikā pāṇā assu || atha te17
imasmiṃ Jambudīpe tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsam18 parikkhayaṃ
pariyādānam gaccheyya || ato19 bahutarā kho bhikkhave
mahāsamudde sukhumakā pāṇā ye na sukarā sūlesu20 āvu-
nituṃ21 || tam kissa hetu || ||

1 S1-3 -samessatī ti.
2 missing in S1-3.
3 B1 anamataggā.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 ca.
6 S1-3 pahārānaṃ.
7 S3 sadāha.
8 B1-2 sahāva . . . sahā va.
9 S1 -senaṃ.
10 S1-3 -gāminī.

12 S1-3 katvā.

14 S1 mahattā- always.
15 S1-3 āvi- always.

18 S1-3 -palāsa omitting parikkhayam.
19 S1 tato.
20 S1 sūle S3 sūle.

[page 442]
442 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
3. Sukhumattā bhikkhave attabhāvassa || || Evam mahā
kho bhikkhave apāyo1 || evam mahantasmā2 kho bhikkhave
apāyasmā3 parimutto4 diṭṭhisampanno puggalo yo5 Idaṃ
dukkhanti yathābhūtam pajānāti || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhani-
rodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānāti || ||
4. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).37. (7) Suriyupamā1.
2. Suriyassa bhikkhave udayato etam pubbaṅgamam6
etam pubbanimittam yad idam aruṇuggam7 || evam eva kho
bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtam abhisama-
yāya etam pubbaṅgamam etam pubbanimittaṃ yad idaṃ
sammādiṭṭhi || ||
3. Sammādiṭṭhikassetam8 bhikkhave bhikkhuno patikaṅ-
khaṃ Idam dukkhan ti yathābhutam pajānissati9 || la-pe ||
Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pa-
jānissati9 || ||
Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmiṇī paṭipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).38. (8) Suriyupamā2.
2. Yāva kīvañca10 bhikkhave candimasuriyā loke nupaj-
janti neva tāva mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhā-
sassa || andhantamam11 tadā hoti andhakāratimisā12 || neva
tāva rattidivā13 paññāyanti na māsaddhamāsā paññāyanti
na utusaṃvaccharā paññāyanti || ||
3. Yato ca kho bhikkhave candimasuriyā loke uppajjan-
ti || atha mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhāsassa ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 apāye.
2 S1 mahātasmā S3 mahāsa.
3 S1-3 apāyamhā.
4 S1-3 parimuttatā.
5 missing in B1-2.
6 S1-3 -pe- instead of etaṃ-
7 S1-3 aruṇaggaṃ.

9 S1-3 -jānissanti.

11 B1-2 andhatamaṃ always.
12 S3 andhakārā.

[page 443]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 443
na1 andhantamam2 tadā hoti na andhakāratimisā3 || atha
rattidivā4 paññāyanti || māsaddhamāsā paññāyanti utusaṃ-
vaccharā paññāyanti || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhāve yāva kīvañca Tathāgato
nuppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho || neva tāva mahato ālo-
kassa pātubhāvo hoti mahato obhāsassa || {andhantamo}5 tadā
hoti6 andhakāratimisā || neva tāva catunnam ariyasaccānam
ācikkhanā hoti desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā
vibhajanā uttānikammaṃ || ||
5. Yato ca bhikkhave Tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ
sammāsambuddho || atha mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti
mahato obhāsassa || na1 andhantamaṃ tadā hoti na andha-
kāratimisā || atha kho7 catunnam ariyasaccānam ācikkhaṇā
hoti || desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaranā vibhajanā
uttānikammaṃ || || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
6. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la || dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
paṭipadāya8 ariyasaccassa || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo ||
la-pe || || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo ka-
raṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).39. (9) Indakhīlo.
2. Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā Idaṃ
dukkhan ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti || pe-la || Ayam duk-
kanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathā bhūtaṃ nappajānanti ||
te aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukham ullo-
kenti Ayaṃ nūna9 bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti passam passati || ||
3. Seyyathā pi bhikkhave tūlapicu10 vā kappāsapicu11 vā
lahuko vātupādāno12 same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto tam enam13

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 neva.
2 B1-2 andhakāratamam.
3 S1-3 andhakārā-
4 S1-3 rattindivā.
5 B2 -tamaṃ.
6 S1-3 omit andhano
7 missing in S1-3.
8 S1-3 patipadā (with ya erased in S3).
9 S3 nūnaṃ.
10 S1 cūla S3 culla.
11 B2 kappāsi-
12 B1 vāpādāno; S1-3 vātā (S3 -ta) po (S3 pe corrected from po) dāno
(S3 nā corrected from no), lahuko coming afterwards
13 S1-3 tamena.
13 S1-3 tamena.

[page 444]
444 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
puratthimo vāto pacchimena saṃhareyya || pacchimo vāto
puratthimena saṃhareyya || uttaro vāto dakkhiṇena saṃha-
reyya || dakkhiṇo vāto uttarena saṃhareyya || || Taṃ kissa
hetu || lahukattā bhikkhave kappāsapicuno || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ye keci samaṇā vā brāh-
maṇā vā Idam dukkhan ti yathā bhūtaṃ nappajānanti || la-
pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtaṃ
nappajānanti te aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā
mukham ullokenti Ayaṃ nūna bhavam jānaṃ jānāti passam
passatī ti || || Taṃ kissa hetu || adiṭṭhattā bhikkhave catun-
nam ariyasaccānaṃ || ||
5. Ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā
Idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānanti || la-pe || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānanti ||
te nāññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukham ullo-
kenti Ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti passam passatī ti || ||
6. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gam-
bhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampi || puratthimāya ce1
pi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi neva naṃ3 saṃ-
kampeyya na4 sampakampeyya na5 sampacāleyya || pacchi-
māya ce pi disāya || la-pe || uttarāya ce pi disāya dakkhiṇāya
ce pi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi neva naṃ5 saṃ-
kampeyya na6 sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya7 || || Taṃ
kissa hetu || || Gambhīrattā bhikkhave nemassa8 sunikhātattā
indakhīlassa || ||
7. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ye ca kho9 keci samaṇā vā
brāhmaṇā vā Idaṃ dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānanti || la-
pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam
pajānanti || te nāññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mu-
kham ullokenti || Ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti passam
passatī ti || || Taṃ kissa hetu || || Sudiṭṭhattā bhikkhave ca-
tunnam ariyasaccānam || || Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||

1 S1 cetiyaya.
2 in S1-3 only.
3 in B2 only.
4 in B1-2 only.
5 in S1-3 only.
6 missing in S1.
7 S1-3 omit na sampacā-
8 S1-3 imassa.
9 S1 hi instead of ca kho.

[page 445]
Saṃyuttam-Nikāya. 445
8. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la-pe || dukkhanirodhagāmi-
niyā paṭipādāya1 ariyasaccassa || ||
9. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).40. (10) Vādino.
2. Yo hi2 koci bhikkhave bhikkhu Idaṃ dukkhanti ya-
thābhūtam pajānāti || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī
paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānati || puratthimāya ce pi di-
sāya āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vā-
dagavesī Vādam assa āropessāmī ti || tam vata3 saha dham-
mena samkampessati vā sampakampessati vā sampacālessa-
ti vā ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati || pacchimāya ce pi disāya ||
uttarāya ce pi disāya || dakkhiṇāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya
samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vādagavesī Vādam assa
āropessāmī ti || tam vata saha dhammena samkampessati
vā sampakampessati vā sampacālessati vā ti netaṃ ṭhā-
naṃ vijjati || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave silāyūpo soḷasakukkuko tassassu4
aṭṭhakukku5 heṭṭhā nemaṅgamā6 aṭṭhakukku upari nemassa ||
puratthimāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi
neva naṃ7 saṃkampeyya8 na sampakampeyya na9 sam-
pacāleyya || pacchimāya ce pi disāya || pe [-pa] || uttarāya ce
pi disāya || dakkhiṇāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vāta-
vuṭṭhi neva samkampeyya na9 sampakampeyya na sampa-
cāleyya || || Taṃ kissa hetu || || Gambhīrattā bhikkhave ne-
massa sunikhātattā silāyūpassa || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave || yo hi koci10 bhikkhu Idaṃ
dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānāti || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhani-
rodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānāti || la-pe ||
Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajā-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 -gāminīpatipādā S1 -gaminīpadā.
2 in B1-2 only.
3 S1-3 va always.
4 S1-3 tassā assa.
5 S3 -kukkuko S1 -kukkhuko.
6 S3 neṅgamā.
7 missing in B1-2.
8 S1 sampakampeyya.
9 missing in S1.
10 S1-3 insert bhikkhave.

[page 446]
446 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
nāti || puratthimāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya samaṇo vā
brāhmaṇo vā vādatthiko vādagavesī Vādam assa āropessā-
mīti taṃ vata saha dhammena saṃkampessati vā sampa-
kampessati1 vā2 sampacālessati3 vā ti netaṃ4 ṭhānaṃ
vijjati || || Pacchimāya ce pi dīsāya || pe || uttarāya ce pi
disāya || dakkhiṇāya ce pi disāya āgaccheyya || samaṇo vā
{brāhmaṇo} vā vādatthiko vādagavesī Vādam assa āropessā-
mī ti || taṃ vata saha dhammena samkampessati vā sam-
pakampessati vā5 sampacālessati vā ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
vijjati || || Taṃ kissa hetu || || Sudiṭṭhattā bhikkhave ca-
tunnam ariyasaccānaṃ || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la-pe || dukkhanirodhagāmi-
niyā paṭipādāya ariyasaccassa || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||
Siṃsapāvanavaggo6 catuttho || ||
Tassa7 uddānaṃ || ||
Sīsapā Khadiro Daṇḍo ||
Celā8 Sattisatena9 ca ||
Pāṇā Suriyupamā dvedhā10 ||
Indakhīlo ca Vādinoti11 || ||

CHAPTER V. PAPĀTAVAGGO PAÑCAMO.

SN_5,56(12).41. (1) Cintā.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Rājagahe viharati Veḷuvane
Kalandakanivāpe || ||
2. Tatra kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || || Bhūtapubbam
bhikkhave aññataro puriso Rājagahā nikkhamitvā Loka-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 sakampessati.
2 S1 add ti.
3 S3 saṃkapessati missing in S1.
4 S1-3 have -pe- and abridge more than B1-2.
5 S1-3 -pe- instead of sampa-
6 S1 B1-2 sīsapā- S1-3 -paṇṇa- instead of vana.
7 missing in B1-2.
8 S1-3 telam.
9 S1 sattiṃ.
10 S1-3 dve.
11 S1-3 cadenacāti.

[page 447]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 447
cintaṃ1 cintessāmī ti yena Sumāgadhā2 pokkharaṇī tenu-
pasaṅkami || upasaṅkamitvā Sumāgadhāya3 pokkhariṇiyā
tīre nisīdi lokacintaṃ cintento || ||
3. Addasā kho bhikkhave so puriso Sumāgadhāya pok-
kharaṇiyā tīre4 caturaṅginiṃ5 senam bhisamūḷālam pavi-
santiṃ6 || disvānassa etad ahosi || Ummatto7 smi nāmāhaṃ8
viceto smi nāmāham || yaṃ loke natthi tam mayā diṭṭhan
ti9 || ||
4. Atha kho so10 bhikkhave puriso nagaram11 pavisitvā
mahājanakāyassa ārocesi || Ummatto smi nāmāham bhante
viceto smi nāmāham bhante || yaṃ loke natthi tam mayā
diṭṭhan ti || ||
Katham12 pana tvam ambho purisa ummatto || kathaṃ
viceto || kiñca13 loke natthi yaṃ14 tayā diṭṭhan ti || ||
5. Idhāham bhante Rājagahā nikkhamitvā Lokacintaṃ
cintessamī ti yena Sumāgadhā15 pokkaraṇī tenupasaṅka-
miṃ || upasaṅkamitvā Sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre nisī-
diṃ lokacintaṃ cintento || addasaṃ kho ham16 bhante
Sumagadhāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre4 caturaṅginiṃ17 senaṃ
bhisamūḷālam pavisantiṃ18 || evaṃ khvāham bhante ummatto
evam viceto idañ ca loke natthi yam mayā diṭṭhan ti || ||
Taggha tvam ambho purisa ummutto || taggha viceto ||
idañ ca loke natthi yaṃ tayā diṭṭhan ti || ||
6. Taṃ kho pana bhikkhave so puriso bhūtaṃ yeva
addasa no abhūtaṃ || || Bhūtapubbam bhikkhave devāsura-
saṅgāmo samupabbuḷho19 ahosi || tasmiṃ kho pana bhik-
khave saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu20 asurā parājiniṃsu || parājitā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B2 lokaṃ-
2 S1-3 -gavā (instead of gadhā) always.
3 S3 sumoga-
4 missing in S1-3.
5 B1-2 S1 -aṅgini.
6 B1-2 pavisantaṃ.
7 B1-2 ummattā-
8 S1-3 nāmaham always.
9 S1-3 diṭṭhaṃ.
10 S1-3 omit atha kho, putting so after bhikkhave.
11 S1-3 rājagaham.
12 preceded by yathā in S1-3.
13 B1 kiñci.
14 S1-3 yat.
15 S1 samā-
16 S1-3 khvāham.

19 B1 -vyūḷho.
20 janisu in S1 which omits asurā parājiniṃsu.

448 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
ca kho bhikkhave asurā bhītā bhisamuḷālena asurapuram
pavisiṃsu devānaṃ yeva kho bhāyamānā1 || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave mā lokacintaṃ cintetha ||
Sassato loko ti va Assassato loko ti va || Antavā loko ti
vā Anantavā loko ti vā2 || Taṃ jīvam taṃ sarīranti vā
Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran ti vā || Hoti tathāgato pa-
rammaraṇā ti vā || Na hoti3 tathāgato parammaraṇā ti vā ||
Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato param maraṇā ti vā || Neva
hoti na na hoti tathāgato param maraṇā ti vā || || Taṃ
kissa hetu || ||
8. Nesā4 bhikkhave cintā atthasaṃhitā5 nādibrahma-
cariyikā6 na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na
upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya7
saṃvattati || ||
9. Cintentā ca8 kho tumhe bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti
cinteyyātha || la || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti
cinteyyātha || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
10. Esā bhikkhave cintā atthasaṃhitā esā ādibrahma-
cariyikā9 esā nibbidāya virā- ni- upa- abhi- sambo- nib-
bānāya saṃvattati || ||
11. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-[pe] || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti
yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).42. (2) Papāto.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Rājagahe viharati Gijjha-
kūte pabbate || ||
2. Atha kho Bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi || || Āyāma
bhikkhave yena Paṭibhānakūṭo tenupasaṅkamissāma divā-
vihārāyā ti || ||
Evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū Bhagavato paccassosuṃ || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 bhayamānā corrected from bhiya- B1-2 mohayamānā
instead of kho-
2 S1 omits anantāva-
3 missing in S1.
4 B1-2 nasā.
5 S1 -hitaṃ.
6 B1-2 nāadibrahmacariyakā.
7 S1-3 omit na abhiññāya-
8 in S1-3 only.
9 B1-2 -cariyakā.

[page 449]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 449
3. Atha kho Bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhim
yena Paṭibhānakūṭo tenupasaṅkami || || Addasā kho añña-
taro bhikkhu Paṭibhāṇakūṭe mahantam papātam || disvāna
Bhagavantam etad avoca || || Mahā vatāyam bhante papāto
subhayānako1 bhante papāto || atthi nu kho bhante imam-
hā papātā añño papāto mahantataro ca bhayānakataro
cā ti || ||
Atthi2 kho bhikkhave imamhā papātā añño papāto
mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā ti || ||
Katamo pana bhante3 imamhā papātā añño papāto
mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā ti4 || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhu5 samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā Idaṃ
dukkhan ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti || Ayaṃ dukkhasa-
mudayo ti yathā- nappa- || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodho ti yathā-
nappa- || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathā-
bhūtaṃ nappajānanti || te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu
abhiramanti || jarāsaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhi- || mara-
ṇasaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhi- || sokaparidevadukkha-
domanassupāyāsasaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiramanti || ||
Te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiratā jarāsaṃvattani-
kesu saṅkharesu abhiratā maraṇasaṃkattanikesu saṅkhā-
resu abhiratā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsasaṃ-
vattanikesu6 saṅkhāresu abhiratā jātisaṃvattanike7 pi
saṅkhāre7 abhisaṅkharonti || {jarāsaṃvattanike}8 pi saṅkhāre9
abhisaṅkharonti || maraṇasaṃvattanike pi saṅkhāre abhi-
saṅkharonti || sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyasasaṃvat-
tanike pi saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharonti || || Te10 jātisaṃvatta-
nike pi saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharitvā jarāsaṃvattanike pi
saṅkhāre abhisaṅkhāritvā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassu-
pāyāsasaṃvattanike11 pi saṅkhāre8 abhisaṅkharitvā jāti-
papātam pi papatanti || jarāpapātam pi papatanti || mara
ṇapapātam pi papatanti || sokaparidevadukkhadomanassu-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 sumahāvatāyam.
2 S1-3 add nu.
4 S1-3 bhikkhave.
4 S1-3 ca.
5 B1 bhikkhave.
6 S1-3 -domanassa upāyāsa-
7 S1-3 add su.
8 S3 add su.
9 S3 saṅkhāre with su erased.
1O missing in S1-3.
11 S1-3 -domanassa (S3 ssaṃ) upāyasa-

[page 450]
450 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
pāyāsapapātam1 pi papatanti || || Te na parimuccanti
jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi doma-
nassehi upāyāsehi || na parimuccanti dukkhasmā ti vadāmi || ||
5. Ye ca kho keci bhikkhu2 samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā
Idaṃ dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānanti || la-pe || Ayam
dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānanti ||
te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti || jarāsaṃ-
vattanikesu saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti || maraṇasaṃvattani-
kesu saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti || sokaparidevadukkhadoma-
nassupāyāsasaṃvattanikesu3 saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti || ||
Te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu anabhiratā jarāsaṃvat-
tanikesu saṅkhāresu anabhiratā maraṇasaṃvattanikesu saṅ-
khāresu anabhiratā sokaparidevadukkadomanassupāyāsa-
saṃvattanikesu3 saṅkhāresu anabhiratā {jātisaṃvattanike} pi
saṅkhāre nābhisaṅkharonti || jarāsaṃvattanike saṅ- nābhisaṅ-
kharonti || maraṇasaṃvattanike pi saṅkhāre {nābhisaṅkharon-
ti} || sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsasaṃvattanike pi
saṅkhāre nābhisaṅkharonti || || Te jātisaṃvattanike pi {saṅkhāre}
anabhisaṅkharitvā || jarāsaṃvattanike pi saṅkhāre anabhisaṅ-
kharitvā maraṇasaṃvattanike pi saṅkhāre anabhisaṅkharitvā
sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsasaṃvattanike3 pi saṅ-
khāre anabhisaṅkharitvā jātipapātam pi na papatanti4 ||
jarāpapātam pi na papatanti4 || pe || sokaparidevadukkhado-
manassupāyasasapapātam5 pi na papatanti3 || || Te pari-
muccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi duk-
khehi domanassehi upāyāsehi || parimuccanti dukkhasmā ti
vadāmi || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo || la || pe ||
Ayaṃ dukkanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).43. (3) Pariḷāho.
2. Atthi bhikkhave Mahā-Pariḷāho nāma nirayo6 || tattha
yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpam passati aniṭṭharūpaṃ yeva

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -domanassa upāyāsasaṃvattati (S1 tī) yapapātam.
2 B1-2 bhikkhave.
3 S1-3 -domanassa upāyāsa-
4 S1 nappatanti instead of na papatanti.
5 S1-3 -manassaupāyāsasaṃvattanikapapātam.
6 S1 niraye.

[page 451]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya 451
passati no iṭṭharūpaṃ || akantarūpam yeva passati no
kantarūpaṃ || amanāparūpam passati no manāparūpam || ||
Yaṃ kiñci sotena saddaṃ suṇāti || pa-pe1 || yaṃ kiñci
kāyena poṭṭhabbam phussati || yaṃ kiñci manasā dhammaṃ
vijānāti aniṭṭharupaṃ yeva vijānāti no iṭṭharūpam || akan-
tarupaṃ yeva vijānāti || pe || no manāparūpan ti || ||
3. Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu Bhagavantam etad
avoca || || Mahā vata so bhante Pariḷāho sumahā vata so
bhante Pariḷāho || || Atthi nu kho bhante etamhā pariḷāhā
añño2 pariḷāho mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā ti || ||
Atthi3 kho bhikkhu etamhā pariḷāhā añño pariḷāho4
mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā ti || || Katamo pana
bhante etamhā Pariḷāhā añño Pari- mahan- ca bhayāna-
kataro cā ti || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhu5 samaṇā vā6 brāhmaṇā vā Idaṃ
dukkhan ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti || la-pe || Ayaṃ duk-
khanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti ||
te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiramanti || la-pe || abhi-
ratā abhisaṅkharonti || abhisaṅkharitvā jātipariḷāhena pi
pariḍayhanti jarāpariḷāhena pi pariḍayhanti || maraṇapari-
ḷāhena pi pariḍayhanti || sokaparidevadukkhadomanassu-
pāyāsapariḷāhena pi pariḍayhanti || || Te na parimuccanti
jātiyā jarāya7 maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi do-
manassehi upāyāsehi || na parimuccanti dukkhasmā ti va-
dāmi || ||
5. Ye ca kho keci bhikkhu5 samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā
Idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānanti || la-pe || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānanti ||
jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti || la-pe || ana-
bhiratā nābhisaṅkharonti || anabhisaṅkharitvā jātipariḷāhena
pi na8 pariḍayhanti || jarāpariḷāhena pi na pariḍayhanti ||
jarāpariḷāhena pi na pariḍayhanti || maraṇapariḷāhena pi
na pariḍayhanti || sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsapa-
riḷāhena pi na pariḍayhanti || || Te parimuccanti jātiyā

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 more complete in S1-3 than in B1-2.
2 S3 aññe.
3 S1-3 add nu.
4 S1-3 have -pe- instead of añño-
5 B1-2 bhikkhave.
6 S1 va.
7 S1 jarā.
8 missing in B1.

[page 452]
452 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi
upāyāsehi || parimuccanti dukkhasmā ti vadāmi || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).44. (4) Kūṭāgara.
2. Yo hi1 bhikkhave evaṃ vadeyya || Ahaṃ dukkham
ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam anabhisamecca || la1 || dukkhani-
rodhagaminipaṭipadam2 ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam anabhi-
samecca sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī ti netaṃ thānaṃ
vijjati || ||
3. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yo3 evam vadeyya || Aham
kūṭāgārassa heṭṭhimam4 gharam akaritvā5 uparimaṃ6
gharam āropessāmī ti7 netaṃ thāṇaṃ vijjati || || Evam
eva kho bhikkhave yo evaṃ8 vadeyya || || Ahaṃ dukkham
ariyasaccam yathābhūtam anabhisamecca || la-[pe] || dukka-
nirodhagāminipaṭipadam2 ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam ana-
bhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī ti netaṃ
ṭhānaṃ vijjati || ||
3. Yo3 ca kho bhikkhave9 evaṃ vadeyya || Ahaṃ duk-
kham ariyasaccam yathābhūtam abhisamecca || la-pe ||
dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadam ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtam
abhisamecca sammā dukkassantaṃ karissāmī ti ṭhānaṃ
etaṃ vijjati || ||
4. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yo evaṃ vadeyya || Ahaṃ
kūṭāgārassa heṭṭhimam10 gharaṃ karitvā uparimaṃ11
gharam āropessāmī ti ṭhānam etaṃ vijjati || || Evam eva
kho bhikkhave yo evaṃ vadeyya || Ahaṃ dukkham ariya-
saccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisamecca || la-pe || dukkhanirodha-
gāminipatipadam ariyasaccam yathābhūtam abhisamecca
sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī ti ṭhānaṃ etaṃ vijjati || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1-2 ca kho instead of hi.
2 S1-3 -gāminīpaṭipadā.
3 S1 ye.
4 S3 heṭṭhima.
5 S1-3 ākiritvā.
6 S1-3 uparima.
7 S1 arocessā-
8 S1 kkheveye instead of kho bhikkhave yo.
9 S1 insert ye.
10 S1-3 heṭṭhima.
11 S3 uparima S1 -caṃ.

[page 453]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 453
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminipatipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).45. (5) Chiggaḷa11.
1. Ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Vesāliyaṃ viharati Mahā-
vane Kūṭāgārasāḷāyaṃ || ||
2. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando pubbaṇhasamayam nivā-
setvā pattacīvaram ādāya Vesālim2 piṇḍāya pāvisi || ||
3. Addasā kho āyasmā Ānando sambahule licchavi-
kumārake santhāgāre3 upāsanam4 kāronte durato va
sukhumena ṭālacchiggaḷena asanam5 atipātente poṅkhānu-
poṅkam avirādhitaṃ || ||
4. Disvānassa6 etad ahosi || Sikkhitā vatime7 licchavi-
kumārakā susikkhitā vatime licchavikumārakā yatrahi
nāma durato va sukhumena taḷacchigaḷena asanam atipā-
tessanti poṅkhānupoṅkham avirādhitan ti || ||
5. Atha kho āyasmā Ānando Vesāliyam piṇḍāya caritvā
pacchābhattam piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto8 yena Bhagavā tenu-
pasaṅkami ||pe || Ekam antaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā Ānando
Bhagavantam etad avoca || ||
6. Idhāham bhante pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā patta-
cīvaram ādāya Vesālim2 piṇḍaya pāvisiṃ9 || addasaṃ
khvāham bhante sambahule licchavikumārake santhāgāre3
upāsanam karonte durato va sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena
asanam atipātente poṅkhānupoṅkham aviradhitaṃ || || Dis-
vāna me etad ahosi || Sikkhitā vatime licchavikumarakā
susikkhitā vatime licchavikumārakā yatra hi nāma durato
va sukhumena10 tāḷacchiggaḷena asanam atipātessanti11
poṅkānupoṅkham avirādhitan ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 This text no mentioned in the ending uddāna ought to come
after the andhakarī and be the sixth not the fifth.
2 S1-3 vesāliyaṃ.
3 B1-2 sandhā-
4 S1 upaṭṭhākam.
5 S1 āsanam.
6 S1-3 disvāssa.
7 S1-3 catime.
8 S1-3 piṇḍapātam atikkanto.
9 B1-2 pāvīsi.
10 missing in S1-3.
11 S1 atipaṭ-

[page 454]
454 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
7. Taṃ kim maññasi Ānanda || katamaṃ nu kho dukkarata-
raṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā yo durato va sukhumena
tāḷacchiggaḷena asanam atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkham
avirādhitaṃ || yo vā satadhā bhinnassa1 vālassa koṭiyā
koṭim paṭivijjheyyā ti || ||
Etad eva bhante dukkarataraṃ ceva2 durabhisam-
bhavatarañca yo vā3 satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā4
koṭim paṭivijjheyyā ti || ||
8. Atha kho Ānanda duppaṭivijjhataram paṭivijjhanti
ye5 Idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam paṭivijjhanti6 || la-pe ||
Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmini patipadā ti yathābhutam paṭi-
vijjhanti6 || ||
9. Tasmā ti hānanda Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
pa-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).46. (6) Andhakāra.
2. Atthi bhikkhave lokantarikā aghā asaṃvutā andha-
kārakā7 andhakāratimisā yatthāpimesaṃ8 candimasuriyā-
nam evammahiddhikānam evammahānubhāvānam ābhā9
nānubhontī ti || ||
3. Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu Bhagavantam etad
avoca || || Mahā vata so bhante andhakāro10 sumahā vata
so bhante andhakāro || atthi nu kho bhante etamhā andha-
kārā añño andhakāro mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā
ti || ||
Atthi kho bhikkhu etamhā andhakārā añño andhakāro
mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā ti || ||
Katamo pana bhante etamhā andhakārā añño andhakāro
mahantataro ca bhāyanakataro cā ti || ||
4. Ye hi keci bhikkhu samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā Idaṃ
dukkhan ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti || la-pe || Ayam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 bhinna.
2 S3 dukkarañceva S1 dukkarece.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 missing in S1.
5 S1-3 yo.
6 S1-3 -jjhati.
7 S1 -ka B1-2 andhakārā.
8 B1-2 yatthamimesaṃ S3 -cesaṃ.
9 B1-2 ābhāya.
10 S1-3 -kāre.

[page 455]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 455
dukkhanirodhagāminipatipadā ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajananti ||
te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiramanti || la || pe1 ||
abhiratā abhisaṅkharonti || abhisaṅkharitvā jātandhakāram
pi papatanti || jarandhakāram pi papatanti || maraṇandha-
kāram pi papatanti || sokaparidevadomanassupāyāsandha-
kāram pi papatanti || te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya2
maraṇā sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi
na parimuccanti dukkhasmā ti vadāmi || ||
5. Ye ca kho keci bhikkhu samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā
Idaṃ dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānanti || la-pe || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodhagāmini patipadā ti yathābhūtam pajānanti ||
te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti || la [pe] ||
anabhiratā anabhisaṅkharonti || anabhisaṅkhāritvā jātandha-
kāram pi na papatanti || jarandhakāram pi na papatanti ||
maraṇandhakāram pi na papatanti || sokaparidevadukkha-
domanassupāyāsandhakāram pi na papatanti || te pari-
muccanti jātiyā jarāya3 maraṇena sokehi paridevehi duk-
khehi4 domanassehi upāyāsehi || parimuccanti dukkhasmā ti
vadāmi || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || pe [pa] Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).47. (7) Chiggaḷa2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso mahāsamudde ekacchig-
gaḷaṃ yugam pakkhipeyya || tatrāpissa5 kāṇo6 kacchapo
yo vassasatassa vassasatassa7 accayena sakiṃ sakim um-
mujjeyya || ||
3. Tam kim maññatha8 bhikkhave || api nu so9 kāṇo
kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṃ sakim
ummujjanto amusmim10 ekacchiggaḷe yuge gīvam paveseyyā
ti11 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 abridge less.
2 S3 jarā.
3 S1-3 jarā.
4 missing in S1-3.
5 S1-3 tatrassa.
6 S1-3 kāṇa.
7 in B1-2 only.
8 S1 maññathā.
9 B1-2 kho.
10 B2 amukasmiṃ.
11 S1-3 pavisissati.

[page 456]
456 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
Yadi nūna bhante kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno
accayenā ti || ||
4. Khippataram kho1 so bhikkhave kāṇo kacchapo
vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṃ sakim ummajjanto
amusmim2 ekacchiggaḷe yuge gīvam paveseyya na3 tvevā-
ham4 bhikkhave sakiṃ vinipātagatena5 bālena6 manussat-
taṃ vadāmi || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
5. Na hettha bhikkhave atthi7 dhammacariyā samacariyā
kusalakiriyā8 puññakiriyā || aññamaññakhādikā ettha bhik-
khave vattati dubbalakhādikā || || Tam kissa hetu || ||
6. Adiṭṭhattā bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccānam || kata-
mesaṃ catunnaṃ || || Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la-pe || duk-
khanirodhagāminipaṭipadāya9 ariyasaccassa || ||
7. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo karaṇīyo ||
pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karaṇī-
yo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).48. (8) Chiggala3.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ayam mahāpathavī ekodakā10
assa || tatra puriso ekacchiggaḷaṃ yugam pakkhipeyya ||
tam enam11 puratthimo12 vāto pacchimena saṃhareyya ||
pacchimo vāto puratthimena saṃhareyya || uttaro vāto
dakkhiṇena saṃhareyya || dakkhiṇo vāto uttarena13 saṃha-
reyya || || Tatrassa kāṇo kacchapo so14 vassasatassa vassa-
satassa accayena sakiṃ sakiṃ ummujjeyya || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave api nu so15 kāṇo
kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṃ sakim

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in B1-2.
2 B2 amukasmiṃ.
3 S1 has a blank instead of gīvaṃ paveseyya na.
4 S1 tvāvāhaṃ S3 tvāhaṃ.
5 S1-3 vinipātaṃ B1 vinita-
6 B1 bahule- B2 bāhullena.
7 S1 attha.
8 sama- kusala- are to be found only in B1-2.
9 S1-3 -paṭipadā.
10 S1-3 ekodikā.
11 S1-3 ena.
12 S1-3 purimo.
13 S1-3 uttare.
14 missing in S3.
15 B1-2 kho.

[page 457]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 457
ummujjanto1 amusmim2 ekacchiggaḷe3 yuge gīvam pave-
seyyā ti || ||
Adhiccam idam bhante yaṃ so kāṇo kacchapo vassa-
satassa vassasatassa accayena sakiṃ sakim ummujjanto
amusmim ekacchiggaḷe3 yuge gīvam paveseyyā ti4 || ||
4. Evam adhiccam idam bhikkhave yam manussattam
labhati || evam adhiccam idam bhikkhave yaṃ Tathāgato
loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho || evam adhiccam
idam bhikkhave yaṃ tathāgatapavedito5 dhammavinayo
loke dippati || ||
5. Tassidam6 bhikkhave manussattam laddhaṃ || tathā-
gato ca7 loke uppanno arahaṃ8 sammāsambuddho || tathā-
gatappavedito ca dhammavinayo loke dippati || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).49. (9) Sineru1.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso Sinerussa9 pabbatarā-
jassa sattamuggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā10 upanikkhi-
peyya11 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaram yā ca12 sattamuggamattiyo pāsānasakkharā
upanikkhittā yo ca13 Sinerupabbatarājā ti || ||
Etad eva bhante14 bahutaraṃ15 yad idaṃ Sinerupabba-
tarājā || appamattikā sattamuggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā
upanikkhittā saṅkham16 pi na upenti upanidham pi na upenti17
kalabhāgaṃ18 pi na upenti Sinerupabbatarājānam19 upani-
dhāya sattamuggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā ti || ||

1 S1-3 add ca.
2 B2 amukasmiṃ always.
3 S1 chiggaḷe.
4 S1-3 pavise-
5 S3 -pavedita S1 -pavedi.
6 S1-3 tatiyaṃ.
7 B1-2 omit ca S1 adds ce.
8 in B1-2 only.
9 S1 sinerū- always B2 sinnerupabba-
10 S3 -sakkarā.
11 S1 upaninik-
12 S1 va S3 vā.
13 S1-3 omit yo ca.
14 S1-3 bhikkhave.
15 S1-3 -tarā.
16 S1-3 saṅkam.
17 S1-3 omits upanidhaṃ-
18 S1 sala-
19 S1 -rājaṃ S3 rājā.

[page 458]
458 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisam-
pannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etad eva bahutaraṃ
dukkhaṃ yad idam parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam appamatta-
kam avasiṭṭhaṃ1 saṅkham pi na upeti upanidham pi na
upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti || purimaṃ2 dukkhakkhan-
dham3 parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam upanidhāya yad idaṃ
sattakkhattum paramatā || yo Idaṃ dukkhan ti yathābhūtam
pajānāti || la-[pe] || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti
yathābhūtam pajānāti || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).50. (10) Sineru2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Sineru4 pabbatarājā yam5
parikkhayam pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā6 satta-
muggamattiyo7 pāsānasakkharā8 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho9
bahutaraṃ yaṃ10 vā Sinerussa pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇam
pariyādiṇṇam yā11 vā sattamuggamattiyo pāsānasakkharā
avasiṭṭhā ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ Sinerussa pabbatarājassa
yad idam parikkhīnam pariyādinnaṃ || appamattakā12
sattamuggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā saṅkham pi
na upenti || upanidham pi na upenti || kalabhāgam pi na
upenti || Sinerussa pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇam pariyādin-
nam upanidhāya sattamuggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā ava-
siṭṭhā ti || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisam-
pannassa13 puggalassa abhisametāvino etad eva bahutaraṃ14

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 asiṭṭhaṃ.
2 S1-3 purima.
3 B2 -kkhantaṃ.
4 S1 sinerū B2 sinneru as before both always.
5 so B2; B1 sam; missing in S1-3.
6 B2 dhapetvā.
7 S3 -mattikāyo.
8 S1-3 add ti.
9 missing in S1.
10 S3 ya; missing in S1.
11 S3 has yo corrected from yā.
12 B1-2 -mattikā.
13 S1-3 -sampanna S3 adding ssa underneath.
14 S1-3 bahutarā taṃ B2 bahutara.

dukkhaṃ yad idam || pe1 || yo Idam dukkhan ti yathābhū-
tam pajānāti || la-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā
ti yathābhūtam pajānāti || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhanti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
