CHAPTER VI. ABHISAMAYAVAGGO CHAṬṬHO.

SN_5,56(12).51. (1) Nakhasikho.
2. Atha kho Bhagavā parittam nakhasikhāyam paṃsum
āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi || Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave ||
katamaṃ nu kho bahutaram yo vāyam8 mayā paritto
nakhasikhāyam paṃsu āropito || ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaram yad idam mahāpathavī ||
appamattako9 yam Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam
paṃsu10 āropito saṅkham pi11 na upeti upanidham pi na
upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti || mahāpathavī upanidhāya
Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam paṃsu12 āropito ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 complete in B1-2 till paramatā (S. the preceding sutta).
2 S1-3 omit pañcamo B2 has only vaggo.
3 missing in S1-3.
4 B2 candhā.
5 S1-3 kūṭaṅgalandha- B2 kuṭāgāranta-
6 S1 sinerū B2 sinneru.
7 This Uddāna mentions only nine suttas and among them two chiggala;
but there is a third chiggala separated from the others and put
before andhakārī.
8 S1-3 omit vā.
9 B1-2 -mattakā.
10 S1 paṃsuṃ.
11 missing in B1 S1.
12 S1-3 paṃsuṃ.

[page 460]
460 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
3. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisam-
pannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etad eva bahutaraṃ
dukkham1 || pe || yo Idaṃ dakkhanti yathābhūtam pajānāti ||
la [pe] 2 || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmini patipadā ti yathā-
bhūtam pajānā ti || ||
4. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idam dukkhanti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti3 ||
yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).52. (2) Pokkharaṇī.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanāni
āyāmena paññāsayojanāni vitthārena paññasayojanāni
ubbedhena puṇṇā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā4 || ||
Tato puriso kusaggena udakam uddhareyya5 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaram yaṃ vā kusaggena udakam ubbhataṃ yaṃ vā
pokkharaṇiyā udakan ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam pokkharaṇiyā6
udakaṃ || appamattakaṃ kusaggena udakam ubbhataṃ
saṅkham pi na upeti upanidham pi na upeti kalabhāgam
pi na upeti7 pokkharaṇi yā udakam upanidhāya kusaggena
udakam ubbhatan ti || ||
4--5. Evam kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || la || pe || yogo
karaṇīyo ti8 || ||

SN_5,56(12).53. (3) Sambejja1.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yatthimā9 mahānadiyo saṃ-
sandanti10 samenti || seyyathīdam Gaṅgā Yamunā Acira-
vatī11 Sarabhū Mahī || Tato puriso dve12 vā tīṇi vā uda-
kaphusitāni uddhareyya13 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing B1-2.
2 See the preceding sutta p.459 note 1.
3 B1 S1 omit ti.
4 S3 -peyya.
5 S1-3 uddhā-
6 S1 pokkharaṇi.
7 S1-3 insert yo.
8 S1-3 omit yogo-
9 S1-3 yattha.
10 S1-3 sandanti.
11 B1-2 acī-
12 S1 de.
13 uddhareyya and the sequel is omitted (by blunder) till the next
udakaphusitāni in S3.

[page 461]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 461
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaram yāni dve1 vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni
yam vā sambhejja2 udakan ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idaṃ sambhejja2 uda-
kam || appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni3
ubbhatāni saṅkham pi na upenti upanidham pi na upenti
kalabhāgam pi na upenti sambhejja4 udakam upanidhāya
dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni5 || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || so yeva
peyyalo || yogo karaṇīyo ti6 || ||

SN_5,56(12).54. (4) Sambhejja2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yatthimā7 mahānadiyo saṃ-
sandanti samenti8 seyyathīdaṃ Gaṅgā Yamunā Aciravatī9
Sarabhū Mahī tam8 udakam10 parikkhayam pariyādānam
gaccheyya ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā11 udakaphusitāni3 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaram yaṃ vā12 sambhejja udakam parikkhīṇaṃ pari-
yādinnam yāni vā13 udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ sambhejja4 udakaṃ yad
idam parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam appamattakāni dve vā
tīṇi vā11 udakaphusitāni14 avasiṭṭhāni saṅkham pi na
upenti upanidham pi na upenti kalabhāgam pi na upenti
sambhejja14 udakam parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam upanidhāya
dve vā tīṇi vā15 udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī ti || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || la ||
yogo karaṇīyo ti16 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1 de.
2 S1-3 sambhojja.
3 S3 udakaṃ-
4 S1-3 sambhojjaṃ.
5 B1 uddhatāni.
6 S1-3 -pe- instead of so yeva-
7 S1-3 yattha.
8 missing in S1-3.
9 B1-2 acī- S1 aciravitī.
10 S1-3 udaka.
11 S1-3 dvedhā tidhā instead of dvevā- always.
12 S1 vo.
13 B1-2 upaṇidhāya dvevā tīṇivā instead of yāni vā.
14 S1 uphusitāni.
15 S1-3 sambhojjaṃ B1 sambhesajja B2 sambhe.
16 S1-3 omit la || yogo-

[page 462]
462 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).55. (5) Pathavī 1.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso mahāpathaviyā satta-
kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhipeyya1 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ yā vā2 sattakolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā
ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam mahāpathavī ||
appamattikā sattakolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā saṅ-
kham pi na upenti upanidham pi na upenti || pe || mahā-
pathavim upanidhāya sattakolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanik-
khittā3 || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || so
yeva peyyālo || yogo karanīyo ti4 || ||

SN_5,56(12).56. (6) Pathavī2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahāpathavī parikkhayam
pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā sattakolaṭṭhimattiyo
guḷikā || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ yaṃ vā mahāpaṭhaviyā parikkhīṇam pariyā-
dinnam yā vā5 sattakolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā avasiṭṭhā ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaram mahāpathaviyā6 yad idam
parikkhīnam pariyādinnam || appamattikā sattakolaṭṭhi-
mattiyo7 guḷikā avasiṭṭhā saṅkham pi na upenti || pe ||
kalabhāgam pi na upenti mahāpathaviyā8 parikkhīnam
pariyādinnam upanidhāya sattakolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā ava-
siṭṭhā ti || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasavakassa || so
yeva peyyālo || yogo karaṇīyo ti4 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -khepeyya.
2 S3 yathā instead of yā vā.
3 B1 add ti written but erased in S3.
4 S1-3 have -pe- instead of so yeva-
5 S1-3 yathā instead of yāvā.
6 S1-3 -pathavī B1 pathavīyā.
7 S1 omits satta.
8 S1-3 omit mahā B1 has mahāpathavī.

[page 463]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 463

SN_5,56(12).57. (7) Samudda 1.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso1 mahāsamudde dve vā
tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni uddhareyya2 || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaram yāni vā3 dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbha-
tāni yaṃ vā mahāsamudde udakan ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam mahāsamudde
udakaṃ || appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni
ubbhatāni saṅkham pi na upenti upanidham pi na upenti
kalabhāgam pi na upenti mahāsamudde udakam upani-
dhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatānī ti || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || so yeva
peyyālo || yogo karaṇīyo ti4 || ||

SN_5,56(12).58. (8) Samudda2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahāsamudde udakam parik-
khayam pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā
udakaphusitāni || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ yaṃ vā mahāsamudde udakam parikkhīṇam
pariyādinnam yāni vā3 dve vā tīṇi va udakaphusitāni
avasiṭṭhānī ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaram mahāsamudde udakaṃ yad
idam parikkhīṇam pariyadinnaṃ || appamattakāni dve vā
tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhāni saṅkham pi na upenti
upanidham pi na upenti kalabhāgaṃ pi na upenti mahā-
samudde udakam parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam upanidhāya
dve vā tīni vā udakaphusitāni avasitthānī ti || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || so yeva
peyyālo || karaṇīyo ti4 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S3.
2 B1 uddharitāni.
3 missing in B1-2.
4 S1-3 have only -pe- instead of so yeva-

[page 464]
464 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).59. (9) Pabbatupamā 1.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso Himavato pabbatarā-
jassa1 sattasāsapamattiyo pāsānasakkharā upanikkhipeyya || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaram yā vā2 sattasāsapamattiyo3 pāsāṇasakkharā
upanikkhittā ayaṃ vā4 Himavā pabbatarājā ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam Himavā pabba-
tarājā || appamattakā5 sattasāsapamattiyo6 pāsāṇasakkharā
upanikkhittā saṅkham pi na upenti upanidham pi na
upenti kalabhāgam pi na upenti Himavantam7 pabbata-
rājānam upanidhāya sattasāsapamattiyo pāsānasakkharā
upanikkhittā ti || ||
4--5. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa || la-pe ||
yogo karaṇīyo ti8 || ||

SN_5,56(12).60. (10) Pabbatupamā2.
2. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave Himavā pabbatarājā parikkha-
yam pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā sattasāsapamattiyo6
pāsāṇasakkharā || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ yaṃ vā Himavato pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇam
pariyādinnam yā vā9 sattasāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā
avasiṭṭhā ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ Himavato pabbatarājassa
yad idam parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam appamattakā10 satta-
sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā11 saṅkham pi na
upenti upanidham pi na upenti kalabhāgam pi na upenti ||
Himavato pabbatarājassa parikkhīnam pariyādinnam upa-
nidhāya sattasāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā ti || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisam-
pannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etad eva bahutaraṃ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 himavanto pabbatarājāssa.
2 S3 va.
3 S1 omits satta.
4 S1-3 omits ayaṃ vā.
5 S1-3 -mattikā.
6 S1-3 omit satta.
7 S1-3 himavatam.
8 S1-3 omit yogo-
9 S1-3 omit yā vā S1 has a ya or sa erased.
10 B1 S1 -mattikā.
11 B1 add ti.

[page 465]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 465
dukkhaṃ yad idam parikkhīnam pariyādinnam || appamatti-
kam1 avasiṭṭhaṃ saṅkhaṃ pi na upeti upanidham pi na
upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti purimaṃ2 dukkhakkhandham
parikkhīṇam pariyādinnam upanidhāya yad idam sattak-
khattuparamatā || yo Idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānā-
ti || la || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yathābhūtam
pajānāti || ||
5. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipatipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||
Abhisamayavaggo chaṭṭho4 || ||
Tassuddānaṃ5 || ||
Nakhasikhaṃ6 Pokkharaṇī7 ||
Sambhejja8 apare duve9 ||
Pathavī dve Samuddā10 dve ||
Dve mā ca11 Pabbatupamā ti12 || ||

CHAPTER VII. VAGGO SATTAMO (CAKKAPEYYĀLO).

SN_5,56(12).61. (1) Aññatra.
2. Atha kho Bhagavā parittam nakhasikhāyam13 paṃ-
sum āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ || pe || paritto nakhasikhāyam paṃsu14 āropito ||
ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī ti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -mattikam.
2 B1 purima.
3 B1-3 sattakkhattuṃo S1-3 -paramattā.
4 S1-3 samatto.
5 S1-3 uddānaṃ.
6 B1 -sikho.
7 S1-3 -kharaṇiyaṃ.
8 S1 -bhojja.
9 S1-3 dve.
10 S3 samuddo B1 samuddehi instead of samuddā dve.
11 S1-3 omit mā S3 omits ca.
12 B1-2 omit ti.
13 S1-3 -sikhāya (ṃ being erased in S1).
14 S1 paṃsuṃ.

[page 466]
466 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam mahāpathavī1 ||
appamattako2 yam Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam
paṃsu3 āropito saṅkham pi na upeti upanidham pi na
upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti mahāpathavim upanidhāya
Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam paṃsu āropito ti || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā4 te sattā ye ma-
nussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete5 bahutarā sattā ye
aññatra6 manussehi paccājāyanti || || Taṃ kissa hetu || ||
5. Adhiṭṭhatā bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ || ka-
tamesaṃ catunnaṃ || || Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la-pe ||
dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipādāya ariyasaccassa || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la-pe || Ayam dukkhanirodhagāminī patipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

SN_5,56(12).62. (2) Paccantam.
2. Atha kho Bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyam paṃsum
āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ yo vāyam mayā paritto nakhasikhāyam paṃsu
āropito ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam mahāpathavī ||
appamattako2 yam Bhagavatā7 paritto nakhasikhāyam
paṃsu āropito saṅkham pi na upeti upanidham pi na
upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti || mahāpathavim upanidhāya
Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam paṃsu āropito ti || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā4 te sattā ye majjhi-
mesu8 janapadesu9 paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va10 bahu-
tarā sattā ye paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti ||
aviññātāresu milakkhesu11 || pa pe || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 add ti.
2 B1 -mattakā.
3 S1-3 paṃsuṃ always.
4 B1 appamattakā.
5 B1 etad eva.
6 S1-3 aññetatra.
7 S1-3 bhagavā.
8 S3 majjhisu.
9 missing in S1-3.
10 B1 ca.
11 B1 milakkhūsu S3 cilakkhesu.

[page 467]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 467

SN_5,56(12).63. (3) Paññā.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pana1
ariyena paññācakkhunā samannāgatā || atha kho ete bahu-
tarā sattā ye avijjāgatā sammuḷhā || pa2 || ||

SN_5,56(12).64. (4) Surāmeraya.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye3 surā-
merayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā4 paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va
bahutarā sattā ye surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā4 appaṭi-
viratā || la5 || ||

SN_5,56(12).65. (5) Odakā.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye thalajā ||
atha kho ete bahutarā sattā ye udakajā || || Taṃ kissa
hetu || la6 || ||

SN_5,56(12).66. (6) Matteyyā.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te suttā ye matteyyā ||
atha kho ete bahutarā sattā ye amatteyyā7 || pa || ||

SN_5,56(12).67. (7) Petteyyā.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye petteyyā ||
atha kho ete va8 bahutarā sattā ye apetteyyā || la || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 tamena instead of ye pana.
2 S1-3 have nothing and do not point out here any division.
3 in B1 only.
4 S1-3 omit -majja-
5 S1-3 omit here and every where any sign of abbreviation
and separate the several texts only by a spiral line.
6 instead of atha kho- S1-3 have etad eva bahutarā -dakajā
and nothing more.
7 S1 appamatteyyā, S3 matteyya, this omitting ye.
8 S1 B1 omit va.

[page 468]
468 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).68. (8) Sāmañña.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye sāmaññā ||
atha kho ete va1 bahutarā sattā ye asāmaññā || pa || ||

SN_5,56(12).69. (9) Brahmañña.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye brah-
maññā2 || atha kho ete3 bahutarā sattā ye abrahmaññā4 ||
la || ||

SN_5,56(12).70. (10) Pacāyika.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye kule
jeṭṭhāpacāyino || atha kho ete3 bahutarā sattā ye kule
jeṭṭhāpacāyino ti || ||
Vaggo5 uddānaṃ || ||
Aññatra Paccantam Paññāya6 ||
Surāmeraya Odakā7 ||
Matteyyā8 Peteyyā9 cā ti10 ||
Sāmaññam Brahma11 Pacāyikan12 ti || ||

CHAPTER VIII. APPAKĀ-VIRATAM.

SN_5,56(12).71. (1) Pāṇa.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pāṇāti-
pātā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete13 bahutarā sattā ye pāṇāti-
pātā appaṭiviratā || || Taṃ kissa hetu14 || la || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 ete, S1 etad eva.
2 S3 brahmaññe.
3 S1-3 etad eva.
4 S1 brahmaññā.
5 so B1-2; S1-3 Cakkapeyyālo pathamako (S3 has -pathamavaggo) --
6 S1-3 aññapattapaccaṅgapaññāye.
7 S1-3 uda (S1 dā) kaṃ.
8 S1 metteyyo S3 matteyyo.
9 S1-3 patteyyo.
10 S1-3 ceva.
11 S3 add ñña erased.
12 S3 pacāyano.
13 S1-3 add va always.
14 S1-3 omit taṃ- and the sign of abbreviation separating
the several texts as before by a line.

[page 469]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 469

SN_5,56(12).72. (2) Adinnam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye adinnā-
dānā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā ye adinnā-
dānā appaṭiviratā1 || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).73. (3) Kāmesu.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye kāmesu
micchācārā2 paṭiviratā || atha kho ete bahutarā sattā ye
kāmesu micchācārā appaṭiviratā || pa || ||

SN_5,56(12).74. (4) Musāvāda.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye musā-
vādā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete bahutarā sattā ye musāvādā
appaṭiviratā || ||

SN_5,56(12).75. (5) Pesuṇaṃ.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pisu-
nāya3 vācāya paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā
ye pisuṇāya3 vācāya appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).76. (6) Pharusam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pharu-
sāya4 vācāya paṭiviratā || atha kho ete bahutarā sattā ye
pharusāya4 vācāya appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).77. (7) Samphappalāpam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye sam-
phappalāpā5 paṭiviratā || atha kho bahutarā sattā ye sam-
phappalāpā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -dānāppaṭi-
2 S1 pāṇātipātā instead of kāmesu-
3 S3 pisuṇā.
4 S1-3 pharu (S1 rū) sā.
5 S1 -pām S1-3 omit the end of this and the beginning of the next
sutta from atha to atha, the whole being represented by -pe-

[page 470]
470 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).78. (8) Bījam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye bīja-
gāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭiviratā || atha kho1 ete2
va bahutarā sattā ye bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā
appativiratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).79. (9) Vikāle.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye vikāla-
bhojanā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete bahutarā sattā3 ye vi-
kālabhojanā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).80. (10) Gandhavilepanam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye mālā-
gandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā ||
atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā ye mālāgandhavilepana-
dhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā appaṭiviratā || ||
Vaggo4 || uddānaṃ || ||
Pāṇam Adinnaṃ Kāmesu ||
Musāvādaṃ ca5 Pesuññaṃ6 ||
Pharusaṃ7 Samphappalāpam8 Bījam8 ||
Vikāle Gandhavilepanan ti9 || ||

CHAPTER IX 10. ĀMAKADHAññA-PEYYĀLAM.

SN_5,56(12).81. (1) Naccam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye nacca-
gīta-vādita-visūkadassanā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va11

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 written but erased in S3.
2 S1 te.
3 S1-3 omit atha kho- -sattā.
4 S1-3 add dutiyo.
5 S1-3 omit ca.
6 S3 pesuñña.
7 S3 pa- S1 -rū-
8 S1-3 add ca.
9 S1 vikālocavilepanāti S3 vikālepanāti.
10 chapter III according to S1-3.
11 B2 ataceva.

[page 471]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 471
bahutarā sattā ye nacca-gīta-vādita-visūkadassanā appaṭi-
viratā || || Taṃ kissa hetu || la1 || ||

SN_5,56(12).82. (2) Sayaṇam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te2 sattā ye uccā-
sayanā3 mahāsayanā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye uccāsayanā mahāsayanā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).83. (3) Rajatam4.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye jātarū-
parajatapaṭiggahanā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va5 bahutarā
sattā ye jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).84. (4) Dhaññam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye āmaka-
dhaññapaṭiggahanā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye āmakadhaññapaṭiggahanā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).85. (5) Maṃsam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye āmaka-
maṃsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va6 bahutarā
sattā ye āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).86. (6) Kumāriyam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye itthi-
kumārapāṭiggahaṇā7 paṭiviratā || ātha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye itthikumārapaṭiggahaṇā8 appaṭiviratā || la || ||

1 This mention and the sign of abbreviation are as before missing
in S1-3 which separate the texts only by a line.
2 S1 has nothing more of this text.
3 S3 -sayana.
4 missing in S1.
5 missing in B1.
6 B1 has only ete here ard further on.
7 B1-2 -kumārikāpaṭi- S3 kumāra with kā erased.
8 B1-2 -kumārikā.

[page 472]
472 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).87. (7) Dāsī.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye dāsīdā-
sapaṭiggahaṇā1 paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā
ye dāsīdāsapaṭiggahaṇā1 appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).88. (8) Ajelakam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye ajeḷa-
kapaṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā
ye ajeḷakapaṭiggahaṇā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).89. (9) Kukkuṭasūkara.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye kukku-
ṭasūkarapaṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratā || atha kho eteva bahutarā
sattā ye kukkuṭasūkarapaṭiggahaṇā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).90. (10) Hatthino.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye hatthi-
gavassavaḷavāpaṭiggahanā2 paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va
bahutarā sattā ye hatthigavassavaḷavāpaṭiggahaṇā3 appaṭi-
viraṭā || la || ||
Tatiyo4 Vaggo || Uddānaṃ || ||
Naccaṃ5 Sayanaṃ Rajataṃ ||
Dhaññaṃ Maṃsaṃ6 Kumāriyaṃ7 ||
Dāsī Ajelakaṃ8 ceva ||
Kukkuṭasūkara-Hatthino ti9 || ||

1 B2 S1-3 dāsi-
2 S1 -gāvassa- S3 -gāvāssa.
3 S1 -gāvassa- S3 -gavāssa-
4 in S1-3 only.
5 S1-3 uccā.
6 S1-3 dhaññamaṃ (S1 ma-) sa.
7 B1 kumārikā.
8 S1-3 dāsi ajelakā.
9 S1-3 kukkuṭavaḷavena cā ti.

[page 473]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 473

CHAPTER X. BAHUTARĀ SATTĀ.

SN_5,56(12).91. (1) Khetta.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye khetta-
vatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye khettavatthupaṭiggahanā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).92. (2) Kayavikkaya.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye kaya-
vikkayā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā ye
kayavikkayā1 appaṭivaratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).93. (3) Dūteyyam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye dūteyya-
pahīnagamanānuyogā paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye dūteyyapahīnagamanānuyogā appaṭiviratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).94. (4) Tulākūṭam.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye tulā-
kūṭa-{kaṃsakūṭa}-mānakūṭā2 pativiratā || atha kho ete va
bahutarā sattā ye tulākūṭa-kaṃsakūṭa-mānakūṭā appaṭi-
viratā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).95. (5) Ukkoṭana.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye ukkoṭa-
navañcananikatisāviyogā2 paṭiviratā || atha kho ete va ba-
hutarā sattā ye ukkoṭanavañcananikatisāviyogā2 appati-
visatā || la || ||

SN_5,56(12).96--101. (6--11) Vadha-ālopa-sāhasakāram.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye che-
dana-vadha-bandhana-viparāmosa-ālopa-sāhasākārā3 pati-

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 kāya-
2 B1 -kuṭ- always S3 omits mānakūṭā here.
3 B1-2 -vadhanan- always S1 -sāhasākāra.

[page 474]
474 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
viratā || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā ye bhedana-vadha-
bandhana-viparāmosa-ālopa-sāhasākārā appaṭiviratā || || Taṃ
kissa hetu || || Adiṭṭhattā bhikkhave catunnam ariyasaccā-
naṃ || katamesaṃ catunnaṃ || ||
5. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || la || dukkhanirodhagāminiyā1
patipadāya ariyasaccassa || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhan ti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || la || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ti yogo
karaṇīyo ti || ||

CHAPTER XI. GATIYO PAÑCAKĀ.

SN_5,56(12).102. (1) Pañcagati.
2. Atha kho Bhagavā parittam nakhasikhāyam paṃsum
āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi || ||
3. Taṃ kim maññatha bhikkhave || katamaṃ nu kho
bahutaraṃ yo vāyam mayā paritto nakhasikhāyam2 paṃsu3
āropito4 || ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī ti || ||
Etad eva bhante bahutaraṃ yad idam mahāpathavī
appamattako5 yam Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam
paṃsu3 āropito saṅkham pi na upeti upanidham6 pi na
upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti mahāpathavim upanidhāya7
Bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyam paṃsu3 āropito ti || ||
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye ma-
nussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va ba-
hutarā sattā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti || la-pe || ||

SN_5,56(12).103. (2) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye manussā
cutā manussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye manussā cutā tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S1-3 -gāmini (S1 -nī).
2 S1 -khāya.
3 S1-3 pamsuṃ.
4 B1 āropitā.
5 B1-2 appamattakā.
6 S1 unidham.
7 S1-3 insert tadeva.

[page 475]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 475

SN_5,56(12).104. (3) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye manussā
cutā manussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye manussā cutā pittivisaye paccājāyanti1 || ||

SN_5,56(12).105--107. (4--6) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye manussā
cutā devesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā
ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti ||
tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).108--110. (7--9) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye devā
cutā devesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete bahutarā sattā ye
devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti ||
tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).111--113. (10--12) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā2 te sattā ye devā
cutā manussesu paccājayanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti || ||
tiracchānayoniyā paccājayanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||
SN_5,56(12).114--116. (13--15) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye nirayā
cutā manussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti ||
tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Instead of this number 3, B1 has iminā nayena pañcacagati
vitthāretabbā || ||
2 B1 appamattakā.

[page 476]
476 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.

SN_5,56(12).117--119. (16--18) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye nirayā
cutā devesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā sattā
ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti ||
tiracchānayoniya paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).120--122. (19--21) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye tiracchā-
nayoniyā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va
bahutarā sattā ye tiracchānayoniya1 cutā niraye paccājā-
yanti ||
tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).123--125. (22--24) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye tiracchā-
nayoniyā cutā devesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahu-
tarā sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti ||
tiracchāna paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).126--128. (25--27) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pittivi-
sayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahu-
tarā sattā ye pittivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti ||
tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti ||
pittivisaye paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).129. (28) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pitti-
visayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye pittivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B1 -yoniyo.

[page 477]
Saṃyutta-Nikāya. 477

SN_5,56(12).130. (29) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pitti-
visayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti || atha kho ete va bahutarā
sattā ye pittivisayā cutā tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti || ||

SN_5,56(12).131. (30) Pañcagati.
4. Evam eva kho1 bhikkhave appakā te sattā ye pittivisayā
cutā devesu paccājāyanti2 || atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye
pittivisayā cutā pittivisaye paccājāyanti || Tam kissa hetu ||
adiṭṭhattā bhikkhave3 catunnam ariyasaccānaṃ || katamesaṃ
catunnam || ||
5. Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa || dukkhasamudayassa ariya-
saccassa || dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa || dukkhanirodha-
gāminiyā paṭipadāya4 ariyasaccassa || ||
6. Tasmā ti ha bhikkhave Idaṃ dukkhanti yogo kara-
ṇīyo || Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ti yogo karaṇīyo || Ayaṃ
dukkhanirodho ti yogo karaṇīyo || Ayaṃ dukkhanirodha-
gāminī paṭipadā ti yogo karaṇīyo ti || ||
7. Idam avoca Bhagavā || attamanā te bhikkhū Bhaga-
vato bhāsitam abhinandun ti5 || ||
Āmakadhaññapeyyālaṃ6 || ||
Cakkapeyyālasamatti7 || ||
Uddānam || ||
Khetta Kayavikkayañca Dūteyyam8 Tulākūtaṃ Vadhena
ca Alopa-Sahasākāram || Appakā te virataṃ || Atha kho
eteva Bahutarā sattā || Gatiyo pañcakā9 so vaggo tena
pavuccatī ti10 || ||
Saccasaṃyuttaṃ dvādasamaṃ11 || ||

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 missing in S1.
2 S1-3 add -pe-.
3 S1-3 bhikkhu (S1 -kha-).
4 S1-3 -gāminī paṭipadā.
5 S1-3 abhinandaṃ.
6 in B1-2 only.
7 in S1-3 only.
8 S1 dūteyaṃ S3 duteyyaṃ.
9 S1 gatiyovakā.
10 This uddāna is to be found in the Singhalese MSS. only.
11 S1-3 samattaṃ.

[page 478]
478 Sacca-Saṃyuttam LVI.
Magga-Bojjhaṅgaṃ Sati ca Indriyaṃ
Sammappadhānañ ca Balañ ca Iddhiyā1
{Anuruddhaj-Jhāna} Suppakāsitaṃ
Sotena Saccha Bhagavā pakāsayi2 || ||
Mahāvaggasaṃyuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ3 || ||
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S3 iddhiyo.
2 This recapitulation is to be found in the Singhalese MSS. only.
3 This mention in B1-2 only.
